quotes.quote: The price of gold is up 14 fold since last time I tried unfolding it. And laundry has declined two folds.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Oh, let there be nothing on earth but laundry, Nothing but rosy hands in the rising steam And clear dances done in the sight of heaven.
quotes.author: Richard Wilbur

quotes.quote: Give me a laundry list and I'll set it to music.
quotes.author: Gioachino Rossini

quotes.quote: Laundry is the only thing that should be separated by colour.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Now they show you how detergents take out bloodstains, a pretty violent image there. I think if you've got a T-shirt with a bloodstain all over it, maybe laundry isn't your biggest problem.Maybe you should get rid of the body before you do the wash.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Behind every working woman is an enormous pile of unwashed laundry.
quotes.author: Barbara Dale

quotes.quote: Give me a laundry-list and I'll set it to music.
quotes.author: Gioacchino Rossini

quotes.quote: The laundry has its hands on my dirty shirts, sheets, towels and tablecloths, and who knows what tales they tell.
quotes.author: Joseph Smith, Jr.

quotes.quote: No matter how hard I try to keep up with it there is always a mountain of laundry. I'm starting to think its self-breeding.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Look after your laundry, and your soul will look after itself.
quotes.author: W Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: No matter what your laundry list of requirements in choosing a mate, there has to be an element of good luck and good fortune and good timing.
quotes.author: Patty Duke

quotes.quote: Behind every successful woman is a basket of dirty laundry.
quotes.author: Sally Forth

quotes.quote: It's better to have loved and lost than to have to do forty pounds of laundry a week.
quotes.author: Dr. Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: I believe you should live each day as if it is your last, which is why I don't have any clean laundry, because, come on, who wants to wash clothes on the last day of their life?
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The nearest one came to a tumble dryer was if the laundry basket was dropped on the way to the washing-line and then the whole lot went tumbling down the drive.
quotes.author: Ann Patras

quotes.quote: A good time here is going to Rite Aid. A big Sunday is doing your laundry.
quotes.author: Whit Lesure

quotes.quote: Law and order exist for the purpose of establishing justice and when they fail in this purpose they become the dangerously structured dams that block the flow of social progress.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: The end of law is not to abolish or restrain, but to preserve and enlarge freedom. For in all the states of created beings capable of law, where there is no law, there is no freedom.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: The safety of the people shall be the highest law.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: There's a natural law of karma that vindictive people, who go out of their way to hurt others, will end up broke and alone.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.quote: At his best, man is the noblest of all animals; separated from law and justice he is the worst.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: I am free, no matter what rules surround me. If I find them tolerable, I tolerate them; if I find them too obnoxious, I break them. I am free because I know that I alone am morally responsible for everything I do.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: We cannot expect people to have respect for law and order until we teach respect to those we have entrusted to enforce those laws.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Laws and principles are not for the times when there is no temptation: they are for such moments as this, when body and soul rise in mutiny against their rigour ... If at my convenience I might break them, what would be their worth?
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: In times of war, the law falls silent.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: The Law is hard, but it is the Law.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Laws grind the poor, and rich men rule the law.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: People are more afraid of the laws of Man than of God, because their punishment seems to be nearest.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Law is order, and good law is good order.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Without law men are beasts.
quotes.author: Maxwell Anderson

quotes.quote: The law was made for one thing alone, for the exploitation of those who don't understand it.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: The law isn't justice. It's a very imperfect mechanism. If you press exactly the right buttons and are also lucky, justice may show up in the answer. A mechanism is all the law was ever intended to be.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: If there were no bad people, there would be no good lawyers.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: When men are pure, laws are useless; when men are corrupt, laws are broken.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The law is reason, free from passion.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The clearest way to show what the rule of law means to us in everyday life is to recall what has happened when there is no rule of law.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Good people do not need laws to tell them to act responsibly, while bad people will find a way around the laws.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: We must reject the idea that every time a law's broken, society is guilty rather than the lawbreaker. It is time to restore the American precept that each individual is accountable for his actions.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: It may be true that the law cannot make a man love me, but it can keep him from lynching me, and I think that's pretty important.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: No man is above the law and no man is below it; nor do we ask any man's permission when we ask him to obey it. Obedience to the law is demanded as a right; not asked as a favor.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: An unjust law is itself a species of violence. Arrest for its breach is more so.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Laws alone can not secure freedom of expression; in order that every man present his views without penalty there must be spirit of tolerance in the entire population.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Good laws have their origins in bad morals.
quotes.author: Ambrosius Macrobius

quotes.quote: Where you find the laws most numerous, there you will find also the greatest injustice.
quotes.author: Arcesilaus

quotes.quote: Law is order in liberty, and without order liberty is social chaos.
quotes.author: Archbishop Ireland

quotes.quote: A law is something which must have a moral basis, so that there is an inner compelling force for every citizen to obey.
quotes.author: Chaim Weizmann

quotes.quote: Make no mistake about it: Law school is not a bastion of intellectual discourse.
quotes.author: Tucker Max

quotes.quote: Law school taught me one thing: how to take two situations that are exactly the same and show how they are different.
quotes.author: Hart Pomerantz

quotes.quote: What do lawyers learn in law school? They learn to win... What we've got to start thinking about is how do we solve problems.
quotes.author: Benjamin Carson

quotes.quote: All students enter law school with a certain amount of idealism and desire to serve the public, but after three years of brutal competition we care for nothing but the right job with the right firm where we can make partner in seven years and earn big bucks.
quotes.author: John Grisham

quotes.quote: The study of law can be disappointing at times, a matter of applying narrow rules and arcane procedure to an uncooperative reality; a sort of glorified accounting that serves to regulate the affairs of those who have powerâand that all too often seeks to explain, to those who do not, the ultimate wisdom and justness of their condition. But that's not all the law is. The law is also memory; the law also records a long-running conversation, a nation arguing with its conscience.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: At Columbia Law School, my professor of constitutional law and federal courts, Gerald Gunther, was determined to place me in a federal court clerkship, despite what was then viewed as a grave impediment: On graduation, I was the mother of a 4-year-old child.
quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quotes.quote: I did not learn the flaws of the criminal-justice system in law school or college or by reading about it. I grew up knowing the flaws and how it was disproportionately impacting the black community. It's not academic for me.
quotes.author: Kamala Harris

quotes.quote: If law school is so hard to get through... how come there are so many lawyers?
quotes.author: Calvin Trillin

quotes.quote: In point of substantial merit the law school belongs in the modern university no more than a school of fencing or dancing.
quotes.author: Thorstein Veblen

quotes.quote: At some point in their life, everyone thinks they should go to law school. You may in fact think you want to go to law school now.
quotes.author: Tucker Max

quotes.quote: Law school has been described as a place for the accumulation of learning. First-year students bring some in; third-year students take none away. Hence it accumulates.
quotes.author: Daniel R. White

quotes.quote: We must begin to train lawyers the minute they walk into law school to tell the truth. They must immediately begin to learn the business of representing people. They must be assigned cases the first day.
quotes.author: Gerry Spence

quotes.quote: Part of being a good lawyer is knowing when to keep your mouth shut. But those arenât the types of people who go to law school.
quotes.author: Evan Chesler

quotes.quote: The leading rule for the lawyer, as for the [person] of every calling, is diligence.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: A lawyer is a person who writes a 10,000-word document and calls it a âbrief.'
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: Straining at gnats and swallowing camels is a required course in all law schools.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: I went to law school. I found it interesting for the first three weeks.
quotes.author: Demitri Martin

quotes.quote: Law school teaches you one thing above all: how to speak while saying absolutely nothing.
quotes.author: Krysten Ritter

quotes.quote: A good lawyer never give up, until he wants to, or until he gets what he wants.
quotes.author: Tarun Singhal

quotes.quote: Lawyers are: By law's dark by ways he has stored his mind with wicked knowledge on how to cheat mankind.
quotes.author: George Crabbe

quotes.quote: A jury consists of twelve persons chosen to decide who has the better lawyer.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The leading rule for the lawyer, as for the man of every calling, is diligence.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Lawyers are like rhinoceroses: thick skinned, short-sighted, and always ready to charge.
quotes.author: David Mellor

quotes.quote: Lawyers are: One skilled in the circumvention of the law.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The main business of a lawyer is to take the romance, the mystery, the irony, the ambiguity out of everything he touches.
quotes.author: Antonin Scalia

quotes.quote: He is no lawyer who cannot take two sides.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Lawyers are merchants of misery.
quotes.author: Nancy Levit

quotes.quote: Laws should be like clothes. They should be made to fit the people they serve.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: Where there is a rift in the lute, the business of the lawyer is to widen the rift and gather the loot.
quotes.author: Arthur G. Hays

quotes.quote: A lawyer is a person who writes a 10,000-word document and calls it a brief.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: A very clever lawyer can create a lot of damage, we can only hope that lawyers never figure out how to manipulate physical law.
quotes.author: R. A. Delmonico

quotes.quote: Divorce lawyers stoke anger and fear in their clients, knowing that as long as the conflicts remain unresolved the revenue stream will keep flowing.
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.quote: The power of the lawyer is in the uncertainty of the law.
quotes.author: Jeremy Bentham

quotes.quote: It is not what a lawyer tells me I may do; but what humanity, reason, and justice tell me I ought to do.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Arguing with a lawyer is not the hardest thing in the world; not arguing is.
quotes.author: Raheel Farooq

quotes.quote: I'm a lawyer. I go for due process; I go for fairness and equity these values mean a lot to me.
quotes.author: Mohamed ElBaradei

quotes.quote: There is never a deed so foul that something couldn't be said for the guy; that's why there are lawyers.
quotes.author: Melvin Belli

quotes.quote: A lawyer is a gentleman that rescues your estate from your enemies and then keeps it to himself.
quotes.author: Henry P. Brougham

quotes.quote: Lawyers are: One who defends you at the risk of your pocketbook, reputation and life.
quotes.author: Eugene E. Brussell

quotes.quote: A lawyer without books would be like a workman without tools.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Miracles of Heaven: to believe lawyers.
quotes.author: Anis Mansour

quotes.quote: How lawyers make work for one another! You're all priests, worshipping the same god. No wonder you adore one another.
quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.quote: Lawyers were notorious for finding cases in the most unlikely places, especially ones with huge potential damagers awards.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Make crime pay. Become a lawyer.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: As a lawyer who has dealt in defamation, I know that someone's reputation has to be lowered in the eyes of right-thinking people to sue.
quotes.author: David Hunt

quotes.quote: Lawyers are the only persons in whom ignorance of the law is not punished.
quotes.author: Jeremy Bentham

quotes.quote: A lawyer will do anything to win a case, sometimes he will even tell the truth.
quotes.author: Patrick Murray

quotes.quote: A good lawyer is a bad Christian.
quotes.author: John Lothrop Motley

quotes.quote: You gotta know when to be lazy. Done correctly, it's an art form that benefits everyone.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: I'm not lazy, I'm just very relaxed.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Yesterday I did nothing and today I'm finishing what I did yesterday.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Ambition is a poor excuse for not having sense enough to be lazy.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: Any man who reads too much and uses his own brain too little falls into lazy habits of thinking.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Laziness is in tune with transitory time.
quotes.author: Pierre Saint-Amand

quotes.quote: Lazy people tend not to take chances, but express themselves by tearing down other's work.
quotes.author: Ann Rule

quotes.quote: The lazy are always wanting to do something.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: Laziness is the enemy of virtue, and the very train of all wickedness.
quotes.author: Patrick Fleming

quotes.quote: Deep down I'm a lazy person in a constantly moving body.
quotes.author: Eva LaRue

quotes.quote: Laziness may appear attractive, but work gives satisfaction.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: People are not lazy. They simply have impotent goals - that is, goals that do not inspire them.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Although laziness is common and a natural part of life, it has the potential to completely consume us.
quotes.author: Chantalle Blikman

quotes.quote: Working hard is great, being lazy sometimes is great, but failed potential is the worst.
quotes.author: Campbell Scott

quotes.quote: Laziness is the first big step towards efficiency.
quotes.author: Patrick Bennett

quotes.quote: The trouble with the world is that laziness is seldom curable and never fatal.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: I'm always busy, but I'm lazy as well.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.quote: Lazy people live lonely lives.
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: The flesh, or human nature, is generally lazy and self-centered.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: There are all kinds of stupid people that annoy me but what annoys me most is a lazy argument.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: Progress isn't made by early risers. It's made by lazy men trying to find easier ways to do something.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Laziness prevents more crimes than morality.
quotes.author: Abraham Miller

quotes.quote: Let us be lazy in everything, except in loving and drinking, except in being lazy.
quotes.author: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

quotes.quote: I love my job only when I'm on vacation.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I do believe sometimes discipline is very important. I'm not just lying around like a lazy cow all the time.
quotes.author: Bjork

quotes.quote: While laziness comes in many forms, it usually has one direct effect. And that's that nothing gets accomplished.
quotes.author: Carolyn Steber

quotes.quote: Don't be too lazy. Don't get too desperate.
quotes.author: Constance Friday

quotes.quote: There are no ugly women, only lazy ones.
quotes.author: Helena Rubinstein

quotes.quote: I'm afraid of only two things: being lazy and being cowardly.
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.quote: A lazy person, whatever the talents with which he starts out, have condemned himself to second-rate thoughts, and to second-rate friends.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: You can't teach people to be lazy - either they have it, or they don't.
quotes.author: Dagwood Bumstead

quotes.quote: Offer the lazy an egg, and they'll want you to peel it for them.
quotes.author: Lithuanian Proverb

quotes.quote: Laziness erodes a person of his enthusiasm and energy. As a result the person loses all opportunities and finally becomes dejected and frustrated. The worst thing is that he stops believing in himself.
quotes.author: Sam Veda

quotes.quote: I choose a lazy person to do a hard job. Because a lazy person will find an easy way to do it.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: I'm lazy. But it's the lazy people who invented the wheel and the bicycle because they didn't like walking or carrying things.
quotes.author: Lech Walesa

quotes.quote: The sluggard does not plow after the season, so he begs during the harvest and has nothing.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: He that is busy is tempted by but one devil; he that is idle, by a legion.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Work hard and become a leader; be lazy and never succeed.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: Lazy people are always eager to be doing something.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: The lazy man is apt to be envious.
quotes.author: Omaha Proverb

quotes.quote: Lazy people tend not to take chances, but express themselves by tearing down other's work.
quotes.author: Ann Rule

quotes.quote: Work is the law of the modern world, which has no place for lazy people.
quotes.author: Mihai Eminescu

quotes.quote: In doing nothing men learn to do evil.
quotes.author: Marcus Porcius Cato

quotes.quote: The lazy man gets round the sun as quickly as the busy one.
quotes.author: R. T. Wombat

quotes.quote: Even a foolish old woman like me knows that lazy people don't think for themselves; they only think about themselves.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: The lazier a man is, the more he plans to do tomorrow.
quotes.author: Norwegian Proverb

quotes.quote: If a man will not work, he shall not eat.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: A young man idle, an old man needy.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Too many young people itch for what they want without scratching for it.
quotes.author: Thomas Taylor

quotes.quote: A loafer always has the correct time.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: The only time a lazy man ever succeeds is when he tries to do nothing.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The Devil often finds work for them who find none for themselves.
quotes.author: Benjamin Whichcote

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is the only day in the year that appeals to a lazy man.
quotes.author: Jimmy Lyons

quotes.quote: There are people, who the more you do for them, the less they will do for themselves.
quotes.author: JANE AUSTEN

quotes.quote: To a lazy man every day is a holiday.
quotes.author: Turkish Proverb

quotes.quote: Lazy people live lonely lives.
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: Some men are so lazy they won't even feed themselves.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: Towards evening the lazy person begins to get busy.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Lazy folks take the most pains.
quotes.author: J. W. MONETTE

quotes.quote: Outstanding leaders go out of their way to boost the self-esteem of their personnel. If people believe in themselves, it's amazing what they can accomplish.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: Leaders aren't born they are made. And they are made just like anything else, through hard work. And that's the price we'll have to pay to achieve that goal, or any goal.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Leaders must be close enough to relate to others, but far enough ahead to motivate them.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Great leaders are almost always great simplifiers, who can cut through argument, debate and doubt, to offer a solution everybody can understand.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Great leaders have a heart for people. They take time for people. They view people as the bottom line, not as a tool to get to the bottom line.
quotes.author: Pat Williams

quotes.quote: Leaders establish the vision for the future and set the strategy for getting there.
quotes.author: John P. Kotter

quotes.quote: Cruel leaders are replaced only to have new leaders turn cruel.
quotes.author: Che Guevara

quotes.quote: Great leaders communicate a vision that captures the imagination and fires the hearts and minds of those around them.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Leaders don't create followers, they create more leaders.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: Great leaders don't need to act tough. Their confidence and humility serve to underscore their toughness.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Good leaders need a positive agenda, not just an agenda of dealing with crisis.
quotes.author: Michael Porter

quotes.quote: Leaders keep their eyes on the horizon, not just on the bottom line.
quotes.author: Warren Bennis

quotes.quote: Leaders understand that the real fight is the fight against time. There's so much to achieve in such less time.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: When leaders take back power, when they act as heroes and saviors, they end up exhausted, overwhelmed, and deeply stressed.
quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.quote: Leaders lead but in the end it's the people who deliver.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: Leaders understand the ultimate power of relationships.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: Very few of the great leaders ever get through their careers without failing, sometimes dramatically.
quotes.author: Philip Crosby

quotes.quote: Good leaders must communicate vision clearly, creatively, and continually. However, the vision doesn't come alive until the leader models it.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Average leaders inspire people to punch a time clock. Great leaders inspire industry and passion.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Leaders are visionaries with a poorly developed sense of fear and no concept of the odds against them.
quotes.author: Robert Jarvik

quotes.quote: The great leaders have always stage-managed their effects.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: Leaders know the importance of having someone in their lives who will unfailingly and fearlessly tell them the truth.
quotes.author: Warren G. Bennis

quotes.quote: Good leaders must first become good servants.
quotes.author: Robert Greenleaf

quotes.quote: The best leaders... almost without exception and at every level, are master users of stories and symbols.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: Leaders get out in front and stay there by raising the standards by which they judge themselves - and by which they are willing to be judged.
quotes.author: Frederick W. Smith

quotes.quote: Leaders should lead as far as they can and then vanish. Their ashes should not choke the fire they have lit.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: Only a few good leaders have paused to reflect seriously on being leaders.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Leaders are responsible not for running public opinion polls but for the consequences of their actions.
quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

quotes.quote: Leaders must wake people out of inertia. They must get people excited about something they've never seen before, something that does not yet exist.
quotes.author: Rosabeth Moss Kanter

quotes.quote: Leaders lead. They don't divide; they don't create a climate that is poisonous.
quotes.author: Jeb Bush

quotes.quote: An army of a thousand is easy to find, but, ah, how difficult to find a general.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Even the largest army is nothing without a good general.
quotes.author: Afghan (on leadership)

quotes.quote: He that cannot obey, cannot command.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: He who rules must fully humor as much as he commands.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The good will of the governed will be starved if not fed by the good deeds of the governors.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The higher the monkey climbs, the more he shows his tail.
quotes.author: John Wycliffe

quotes.quote: The master of the people is their servant.
quotes.author: Yemeni (on leadership)

quotes.quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Leadership is the art of getting someone else to do something you want done because he wants to do it.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Leaders must be close enough to relate to others, but far enough ahead to motivate them.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: No man will make a great leader who wants to do it all himself, or to get all the credit for doing it.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: A man who wants to lead the orchestra must turn his back on the crowd.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
quotes.author: Warren Bennis

quotes.quote: A man can only lead when others accept him as their leader, and he has only as much authority as his subjects give to him. All of the brilliant ideas in the world cannot save your kingdom if no one will listen to them.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: Leadership does not always wear the harness of compromise.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: The task of leadership is not to put greatness into humanity, but to elicit it, for the greatness is already there.
quotes.author: John Buchan

quotes.quote: A gentle hand may lead even an elephant by a hair.
quotes.author: Iranian (on leadership)

quotes.quote: A great one must have a long heart.
quotes.author: Ethiopian (on leadership)

quotes.quote: A ruler must sometimes humor as well as command.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Great chiefs prove their worthiness.
quotes.author: Seneca Proverb

quotes.quote: If the townspeople are happy, look to the chief.
quotes.author: Liberian (on leadership)

quotes.quote: If you can't serve, you can't rule.
quotes.author: Bulgarian (on leadership)

quotes.quote: In the country of the blind, the one-eyed man is king.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: When we think we lead, we are most led.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Never give an order that can't be obeyed.
quotes.author: General Douglas MacArthur

quotes.quote: Don't tell people how to do things, tell them what to do and let them surprise you with their results.
quotes.author: George Patton

quotes.quote: Example is not the main thing in influencing others. It is the only thing.
quotes.author: Albert Schweiter

quotes.quote: You do not lead by hitting people over the head. That's assault, not leadership.
quotes.author: Dwight Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Nothing else so destroys the power to stand alone as the habit of leaning upon others. If you lean, you will never be strong or original. Stand alone or bury your ambition to be somebody in the world.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Some lean back. But those who lean forward are poised to cross the finish-line, first!
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: The weaker we feel, the harder we lean. And the harder we lean, the stronger we grow spiritually, even while our bodies waste away.
quotes.author: J. I. Packer

quotes.quote: Everyone has sorrow. Everyone has obligations. Everyone keeps going. You lean on the people who love you. You do the best you can, and you keep going.
quotes.author: Jennifer Weiner

quotes.quote: Lean on principles, one day they'll end up giving way.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Lean forward into your lifeâ¦catch the best bits and the finest wind. Just tip your feathers in flight a wee bit and see how dramatically that small lean can change your life.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: People who lean on logic and philosophy and rational exposition end by starving the best part of the mind.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: A lean sorrow is hardest to bear.
quotes.author: Sarah Orne Jewett

quotes.quote: Believe in fate, but lean forward where fate can see you.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: You gotta lean towards the things that make you like yourself. Forget everything else.
quotes.author: Matt Berninger

quotes.quote: A mom isn't an individual to lean on, but a person to generate leaning needless.
quotes.author: Dorothy Canfield Fisher

quotes.quote: In truth, the more we lean into life, the more we authentically interact with the world, the brighter our flame.
quotes.author: Mark Nepo

quotes.quote: God is a good choice to lean on. He has a proven record of faithfulness to those who commit their lives to Him.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Everything now will prepare you for the next step. Don't run from adversity; lean into it with all your heart and God will make you a leader worth following.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: As more women lean in to their careers, more men need to lean in to their families. We need to encourage men to be more ambitious in their homes.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: We must learn to lean upon ourselves; we must learn to plan and execute business enterprises of our own; we must learn to venture our pennies if we would gain dollars.
quotes.author: Timothy Thomas Fortune

quotes.quote: If we lean into what we love instead of soldiering toward what we 'should,' our pace quickens, our energy rises, optimism sets in. What we love is nutritious for us.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: Lean forward into your life. Begin each day as if it were on purpose.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: If something's working, you lean into it. You don't fight it.
quotes.author: Billy Lawrence

quotes.quote: A tree falls the way it leans. Be careful the way you lean.
quotes.author: Danny DeVito

quotes.quote: You have to lean into the turn. On every creative aspect, you have to lean into what's working.
quotes.author: Billy Lawrence

quotes.quote: It's still a lean back, enjoy or a lean forward, be involved, enjoy medium. It's real engagement, real emotion.
quotes.author: Christopher Locke

quotes.quote: Women always need other women to lean on. They become friends in order to hate each other better. The more they hate each other, the more inseparable they become.
quotes.author: Herta Muller

quotes.quote: Be passionate about something and lean to that strength.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: She took a leap of faith and grew her wings on the way down.
quotes.author: David Brinkley

quotes.quote: To live, to truly live, we must be willing to risk. To be nothing in order to find everything. To leap before we look.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: There are many talented people who haven't fulfilled their dreams because they over thought it, or they were too cautious, and were unwilling to make the leap of faith.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.quote: Sometimes its better to take a leap of faith and just believe what you hear instead of trying to find the story behind it.
quotes.author: Ash Sweeney

quotes.quote: Take a leap of faith and see that these troubled waters have no power over you unless you give it to them, and even then they lie.
quotes.author: Ted Dekker

quotes.quote: Leave behind your old self and take a leap of faith into the unknown, you will surely find out what you are truly capable of becoming. Always have faith folks.
quotes.author: Kemmy Nola

quotes.quote: No one else in our family was a professional musician so this took an enormous leap of faith on their part.
quotes.author: Tony Visconti

quotes.quote: It's a leap of faith doing any serialised storytelling.
quotes.author: J. J. Abrams

quotes.quote: Take a leap of faith. You will either land somewhere new or learn to fly.
quotes.author: Kandyse Mcclure

quotes.quote: Ultimately it's a leap of faith and a leap of imagination to put yourself back in time into those conditions and situations and see how you would react.
quotes.author: Derek Jacobi

quotes.quote: Every great move forward in your life begins with a leap of faith, a step into the unknown.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: It is terribly important to realize that the leap of faith is not so much a leap of thought as of action. For while in many matters it is first we must see then we will act; in matters of faith it is first we must do then we will know, first we will be and then we will see. One must, in short, dare to act wholeheartedly without absolute certainty.
quotes.author: William Sloane Coffin

quotes.quote: I am coming to terms with the fact that loving someone requires a leap of faith, and that a soft landing is never guaranteed.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: But failure has to be an option in art and in exploration because it's a leap of faith. And no important endeavor that required innovation was done without risk. You have to be willing to take those risks.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.quote: Gravity is love and every turn is a leap of faith.
quotes.author: Warren Miller

quotes.quote: Take a leap of faith and begin this wondrous new year by believing.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: There is a leap of faith with any conclusion the mind can conceive.
quotes.author: H. Mortara

quotes.quote: It only takes one idea, one second in time, one friend, one dream, one leap of faith, to change everything forever.
quotes.author: Mike Dooley

quotes.quote: You have to take a leap of faith to realize a dream, and this is something that a lot of people aren't willing to do.
quotes.author: Ron Bramlett

quotes.quote: The challenging part is in the beginning; its a leap of faith. But I think the most important thing is to just do it. Start.
quotes.author: Tom Szaky

quotes.quote: Although knowledge of structure is helpful, real creativity comes from leaps of faith in which you jump to something illogical. But those leaps form the memorable moments in movies and plays.
quotes.author: Francis Ford Coppola

quotes.quote: You can't solve many of today's problems by straight linear thinking. It takes leaps of faith to sense the connections that are not necessarily obvious.
quotes.author: Matina Horner

quotes.quote: There is always a certain leap of faith that editors have made with their nonfiction writers. If the trust is broken, things can get very embarrassing for the writers and the publisher.
quotes.author: A Scott Berg

quotes.quote: Taking a leap of faith is better than taking a leap of doubt.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: If we never had the courage to take a leap of faith, we'd be cheating God out of a chance to mount us up with wings like eagles and watch us soar.
quotes.author: Jen Stephens

quotes.quote: Life remains unchanged till a leap of faith runs towards heaven.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: When there is no possibility of retreat, we will find the innovation that only the liminal situation can bring. In short, we find the faith of leap.
quotes.author: Alan Hirsch

quotes.quote: You take that leap of faith. You have to be willing to follow, blindly, wherever it takes you. If you know where you're going beforehand, you're not going to end up with anything worth knowing.
quotes.author: Sam Messer

quotes.quote: Leap of faith yes, but only after reflection.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: It's always a leap of faith when you get involved with somebody.
quotes.author: Christian Slater

quotes.quote: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young. The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: A man who asks is a fool for five minutes. A man who never asks is a fool for life.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: A moment's insight is sometimes worth a life's experience.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: He who learns but does not think, is lost! He who thinks but does not learn is in great danger.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: You don't learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing, and by falling over.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: I am always ready to learn although I do not always like being taught.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: There is no end to education. It is not that you read a book, pass an examination, and finish with education. The whole of life, from the moment you are born to the moment you die, is a process of learning.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: You can teach a student a lesson for a day; but if you can teach him to learn by creating curiosity, he will continue the learning process as long as he lives.
quotes.author: Clay P. Bedford

quotes.quote: I am learning all the time. The tombstone will be my diploma.
quotes.author: Eartha Kitt

quotes.quote: The most useful piece of learning for the uses of life is to unlearn what is untrue.
quotes.author: Antisthenes

quotes.quote: The purpose of learning is growth, and our minds, unlike our bodies, can continue growing as we continue to live.
quotes.author: Mortimer Adler

quotes.quote: Every act of conscious learning requires the willingness to suffer an injury to one's self-esteem. That is why young children, before they are aware of their own self-importance, learn so easily.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: The illiterate of the 21st century will not be those who cannot read and write, but those who cannot learn, unlearn, and relearn.
quotes.author: Alvin Toffler

quotes.quote: I never learned from a man who agreed with me.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: The man who is too old to learn was probably always too old to learn.
quotes.author: Henry S. Haskins

quotes.quote: Developing a desire to learn is the kindling point of all classroom achievement.
quotes.author: Robert John Meehan

quotes.quote: Expecting all children the same age to learn from the same materials is like expecting all children the same age to wear the same size clothing.
quotes.author: Madeline Hunter

quotes.quote: If learning is an act of exploration, then technology equips the explorer for the journey of a lifetime.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It is paradoxical that many educators and parents still differentiate between a time for learning and a time for play without seeing the vital connection between them.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Teenagers learn best by doing things, they learn best in teams and they learn best by doing things for real - all the opposite of what mainstream schooling actually does.
quotes.author: Geoff Mulgan

quotes.quote: Learning is not attained by chance. It must be sought for with ardor and attended to with diligence.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: Never let formal education get in the way of your learning.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If a man empties his purse into his head, no one can take it away from him. An investment in knowledge always pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: In a time of drastic change it is the learners who inherit the future. The learned usually find themselves equipped to live in a world that no longer exists.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: That's what learning is. You suddenly understand something you understood all your life, but in a new way.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: We now accept the fact that learning is a lifelong process of keeping abreast of change. And the most pressing task is to teach people how to learn.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: We learn more by looking for the answer to a question and not finding it than we do from learning the answer itself.
quotes.author: Lloyd Alexander

quotes.quote: Only the curious will learn and only the resolute overcome the obstacles to learning. The quest quotient has always excited me more than the intelligence quotient.
quotes.author: Eugene S. Wilson

quotes.quote: A man should never be ashamed to own he has been in the wrong, which is but saying... that he is wiser today than he was yesterday.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Many times what we perceive as an error or failure is actually a gift. And eventually we find that lessons learned from that discouraging experience prove to be of great worth.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: I hope that in this year to come, you make mistakes. Because if you are making mistakes, then you are making new things, trying new things, learning, living, pushing yourself, changing your world. You're doing things you've never done before, and more importantly, you're doing something.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed on an equal or greater benefit.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: We need to realize that our path to transformation is through our mistakes. We're meant to make mistakes, recognize them, and move on to become unlimited.
quotes.author: Yehuda Berg

quotes.quote: You will only fail to learn if you do not learn from failing.
quotes.author: Stella Adler

quotes.quote: You don't learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing, and by falling over.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Mistakes fail in their mission of helping the person who blames them on the other fellow.
quotes.author: Henry Haskins

quotes.quote: You must learn from the mistakes of others. You can't possibly live long enough to make them all yourself.
quotes.author: Samuel Levenson

quotes.quote: There are no mistakes. The events we bring upon ourselves, no matter how unpleasant, are necessary in order to learn what we need to learn; whatever steps we take, they're necessary to reach the places we've chosen to go.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: As you begin to take action toward the fulfillment of your goals and dreams, you must realize that not every action will be perfect. Not every action will produce the desired result. Not every action will work. Making mistakes, getting it almost right, and experimenting to see what happens are all part of the process of eventually getting it right.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: Mistakes are a part of being human. Appreciate your 'mistakes' for what they are: precious life lessons that can only be learned the hard way. Unless it's a fatal mistake, which, at least, others can learn from.
quotes.author: AI Franken

quotes.quote: When you make a 'mistake', don't look back at it long. Take the reason of the thing into your mind and then look forward. 'Mistakes' are lessons of wisdom. The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
quotes.author: Hugh White

quotes.quote: Don't carry your mistakes around with you. Instead, place them under your feet and use them as stepping stones. Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Good people are good because they have come to wisdom through failure. We get very little wisdom from success.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to fail. Don't waste energy trying to cover up failure. Learn from your failures and go on to the next challenge. It's OK to fail. If you're not failing, you're not growing.
quotes.author: H. Stanley Judd

quotes.quote: An expert is a man who has made all the mistakes which can be made in a very narrow field
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: Any married man should forget his mistakes - no use two people remembering the same thing.
quotes.author: Duane Dewel

quotes.quote: I think we all wish we could erase some dark times in our lives. But all of life's experiences, bad and good, make you who you are. Erasing any of life's experiences would be a great mistake.
quotes.author: Luis Miguel

quotes.quote: A mistake should be your teacher, not your attacker. A mistake is a lesson, not a loss. It is a temporary, necessary detour, not a dead end.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A man of genius makes no mistakes. His errors are volitional and are the portals of discovery.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: Mishaps are like knives, that either serve us or cut us, as we grasp them by the blade or the handle.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.quote: Many great people have experience some kind of failure. They build on the lessons from failing to become great
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Well, we all make mistakes, dear, so just put it behind you. We should regret our mistakes and learn from them, but never carry them forward into the future with us.
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: It's always helpful to learn from your mistakes because then your mistakes seem worthwhile.
quotes.author: Gary Marshall

quotes.quote: Mistakes are a part of being human. Appreciate your mistakes for what they are: precious life lessons that can only be learned the hard way. Unless it's a fatal mistake, which, at least, others can learn from.
quotes.author: Al Franken

quotes.quote: My mother is quite a woman. She would push me, and when I got tired of her pushing, I'd say: 'Leave me alone. Don't push so much.'
quotes.author: Laurence Fishburne

quotes.quote: All of the religions are looking after the poor. At least leave me alone to look after the rich. I am the rich man's guru.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: I try to push ideas away, and the ones that will not leave me alone are the ones that ultimately end up happening.
quotes.author: J. J. Abrams

quotes.quote: Life could be so wonderful if people would leave you alone.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: I'll always be happy if they'd leave me alone in that delightful and unknown furthest corner, apart from struggles, putrefactions and nonsense; the ultimate corner of sugar and toast, where the mermaids catch the branches of the willows and the heart opens to a flute's sharpness.
quotes.author: Federico Garcia Lorca

quotes.quote: I don't know myself, what to do, where to go ... I lie in the crack of a book for my comfort ... it's what the world offers ... please leave me alone to dream as I fancy.
quotes.author: William H. Gass

quotes.quote: Either give me more wine or leave me alone.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: No, I'm a man with a rule. People leave me alone, I leave them alone. If they don't, I don't.
quotes.author: Lee Child

quotes.quote: Only God can judge me so I'm gone, either love me or leave me alone.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.quote: The liberal idea of tolerance is more and more a kind of intolerance. What it means is 'Leave me alone; don't harass me; I'm intolerant towards your over-proximity.
quotes.author: Slavoj Zizek

quotes.quote: People like eccentrics. Therefore they will leave me alone, saying that I am a mad clown.
quotes.author: Vaslav Nijinsky

quotes.quote: Leave me alone, is not a good news! Let's be together is not a bad news. We were made to be each others keepers. Let love lead
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: O love-why can't you leave me alone? Which is a rhetorical question meaning: for heaven's sake, don't.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Often we can help each other most by leaving each other alone; at other times we need the hand-grasp and the word of cheer.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Don't bother me, leave me alone. Anyway, I'm almost grown.
quotes.author: Chuck Berry

quotes.quote: I am grown by sympathy a little eager and sentimental, but leave me alone, and I should relish every hour and what it brought me, the pot-luck of the day, as heartily as the oldest gossip in the bar-room.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I don't want to be alone, I want to be left alone.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: If I leave you alone, and you leave me alone, we are both better off. And I will leave you alone if you leave me alone. And there is a lot of traction to be gained from that.
quotes.author: William G. Kline

quotes.quote: Let me be me, or let me be.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: You keep to your own ways, and leave mine to me.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Reason is not automatic. Those who deny it cannot be conquered by it. Do not count on them. Leave them alone.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: I am as I am, And so is a stone; Them that don't like me, Must leave me alone.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Be a good neighbor, and leave me alone.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: Give me a treat, or leave me alone. Itâs Monday.
quotes.author: Paige

quotes.quote: Those who have come here to hate should leave now; for in their hate, they only betray themselves.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: Some leaves hang on longer but eventually they all fall.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: The tree leaves rustled like that noise e-books make when you turn the page.
quotes.author: Daniel Nayeri

quotes.quote: Though leaves are many, the root is one.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Autumn that year painted the countryside in vivid shades of scarlet, saffron, and russet, and the days were clear and crisp under harvest skies.
quotes.author: Sharon Kay Penman

quotes.quote: Now Autumn's fire burns slowly along the woods and day by day the dead leaves fall and melt.
quotes.author: William Allingham

quotes.quote: Autumn casts a spell and dying never was so beautiful.
quotes.author: Amelia Dashwood

quotes.quote: Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: When leaves turn bright colors in the fall they make one last effort to compete with the flowers.
quotes.author: Brent M. Jones

quotes.quote: As leaves move in the wind, your mind moves with your breath.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: How beautifully leaves grow old. How full of light and color are their last days.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: Flowers, leaves, fruit, are the air-woven children of light.
quotes.author: Jacob Moleschott

quotes.quote: The last red leaf is whirled away, The rooks are blown about the skies.
quotes.author: Tennyson

quotes.quote: In the whisper of the leaves appears an interchange of love.
quotes.author: William Jones

quotes.quote: Autumn is a second spring when every leaf is a flower.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The leaves and the light are one.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: When leaves turn bright colors in the fall they make one last effort to compete with the flowers
quotes.author: Brent M. Jones

quotes.quote: The rustling of the leaves is like a low hymn to nature.
quotes.author: James Ellis

quotes.quote: Green leaves on a dead tree is our epitaph-green leaves, dear reader, on a dead tree.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: The leaf and his body were one. Neither possessed a separate permanent self. Neither could exist independently from the rest of the universe.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: And the leaves were telling secrets to the wind.
quotes.author: Peter Mulvey

quotes.quote: Fallen leaves on the ground are the golden song of immortal creativity.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: There is not a single leaf which is a mere ornament; all contribute to the fruitfulness of the earth, and the support of its inhabitants.
quotes.author: Christoph Christian Sturm

quotes.quote: The true order is what the wind creates by scattering the leaves.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: There's never been a better time to let the leaves of mediocrity fall from your tree of life.
quotes.author: David Ault

quotes.quote: A chaplet of leaves crowns the victor.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: The fall of leaves is an emblem of the decline of life.
quotes.author: R. Trevor

quotes.quote: Autumn is the mellower season, and what we lose in flowers we more than gain in fruits.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Autumn colors remind us we are all one dancing in the wind.
quotes.author: Lorin Morgan-Richards

quotes.quote: Leaves leave this world in beautiful fall colors and songs.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Every leaf is a spacious plain; every line a flowing brook; every period a lofty mountain.
quotes.author: James Hervey

quotes.quote: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: If you are brave enough to say goodbye life will reward you with a new hello.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Leave something for someone but dont leave someone for something.
quotes.author: Enid Blyton

quotes.quote: Everybody has to leave, everybody has to leave their home and come back so they can love it again for all new reasons.
quotes.author: Donald Miller

quotes.quote: And the danger is that in this move toward new horizons and far directions, that I may lose what I have now, and not find anything except loneliness.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: There are no goodbyes for us. Wherever you are, you will always be in my heart.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: A farewell is necessary before we can meet again, and meeting again after moments or a lifetime is certain for those who are friends.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Leaving things behind and starting again is a way of coping with difficulties. I learnt very early in my life that I was able to leave a place and still remain myself.
quotes.author: Rachel Cusk

quotes.quote: Leaving home in a sense involves a kind of second birth in which we give birth to ourselves.
quotes.author: Robert Neelly Bellah

quotes.quote: However painful the process of leaving home, for parents and for children, the really frightening thing for both would be the prospect of the child never leaving home.
quotes.author: Robert Neelly Bellah

quotes.quote: You never really leave a place or person you love, part of them you take with you ,leaving a part of yourself behind.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I hope the leaving is joyful; and I hope never to return.
quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

quotes.quote: People fear leaving their safe harbor of the known and venturing off into the unknown. Human beings crave certainty - even when it limits them.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: The sea that calls all things unto her calls me, and I must embark.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: A fear of the unknown keeps a lot of people from leaving bad situations.
quotes.author: Kathie Lee Gifford

quotes.quote: You get a strange feeling when you're about to leave a place, like you'll not only miss the people you love but you'll miss the person you are now at this time and this place, because you'll never be this way again.
quotes.author: Azar Nafisi

quotes.quote: Never part without loving words to think of during your absence. It may be that you will not meet again in this life.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: Gone - flitted away, Taken the stars from the night and the sunFrom the day! Gone, and a cloud in my heart.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: Every parting is a form of death, as every reunion is a type of heaven.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: Adieu! I have too grieved a heartto take a tedious leave.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Have you ever thought about it, about simply leaving? Really, truly thought about it with the intent to follow through and not as a dream or a passing fancy?
quotes.author: Erin Morgenstern

quotes.quote: Has this world been so kind to you that you should leave with regret? There are better things ahead than any we leave behind.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Parting is such sweet sorrow.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Never say goodbye, because goodbye means going away and going away means forgetting.
quotes.author: Peter Pan

quotes.quote: There ain't no way you can hold onto something that wants to go, you understand? You can only love what you got while you got it.
quotes.author: Kate Dicamillo

quotes.quote: I make it easier for people to leave by making them hate me a little.
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: Life is a series of hellos and goodbyes / I'm afraid it's time for goodbye again.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: This is the time to remember/'Cause it will not last forever/ These are the days to hold on to / 'Cause we won't although we'll want to
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: The story of life is quicker than the blink of an eye / The story of love is hello, goodbye.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: Even if we never talk again after tonight, please know that I am forever changed because of who you are and what you mean to me.
quotes.author: Chasing Amy

quotes.quote: Leaving home in a sense involves a kind of second birth in which we give birth to ourselves.
quotes.author: Robert Neelly Bellah

quotes.quote: You can never go home again, but the truth is you can never leave home, so it's all right.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Home is a place you grow up wanting to leave, and grow old wanting to get back to.
quotes.author: John Ed Pearce

quotes.quote: You don't have a home until you leave it and then, when you have left it, you never can go back.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Leaving home's a cinch. It's the staying, once you've found it, that takes courage.
quotes.author: Catherine Watson

quotes.quote: A child enters your home and for the next twenty years makes so much noise you can hardly stand it. The child departs, leaving the house so silent you think you are going mad.
quotes.author: John Andrew Holmes

quotes.quote: It is always sad when someone leaves home, unless they are simply going around the corner and will return in a few minutes with ice-cream sandwiches.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: However painful the process of leaving home, for parents and for children, the really frightening thing for both would be the prospect of the child never leaving home.
quotes.author: Robert Neely bellah

quotes.quote: Growing up means leaving home and becoming a self supporting adult. I think this the hardest task any human being hast to face.
quotes.author: John Bradshaw

quotes.quote: After you leave home, you may find yourself feeling homesick, even if you have a new home that has nicer wallpaper and a more efficient dishwasher than the home in which you grew up.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: Where we love is home,Home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.quote: It is restful to leave one's home; not because traveling does not entail varied and difficult daily actions, but because it removes our responsibilities.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: When you have a solid upbringing and a strong sense of place, that sustains you. My sense of home never leaves me.
quotes.author: Lyle Lovett

quotes.quote: A man who leaves home to mend himself and others is a philosopher; but he who goes from country to country, guided by the blind impulse of curiosity, is a vagabond.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: You see much more of your children once they leave home.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: It's just as hard to go back to a place you once left, as it is to leave it again.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: No one leaves home unless home is the mouth of a shark.
quotes.author: Warsan Shire

quotes.quote: You leave home to seek your fortune and, when you get it, you go home and share it with your family.
quotes.author: Anita Baker

quotes.quote: You can go other places, all right, you can live on the other side of the world, but you can't ever leave home.
quotes.author: Sue Monk Kidd

quotes.quote: Leave home? It's quite a scary thought. I'm not the most independent person and that's the result. When you're always surrounded by people it becomes quite normal.
quotes.author: Rupert Grint

quotes.quote: If you love your son, make him leave home.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: The wise man and the tortoise travel but never leave their home.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Every day when you leave your home you give away more than you could ever imagine about who you are and what you do.
quotes.author: Derren Victor Brown

quotes.quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.
quotes.author: George Moore

quotes.quote: Stay, stay at home, my heart, and rest;Home-keeping hearts are happiest.
quotes.author: Henry W. Longfellow

quotes.quote: To know after absence the familiar street and road and village and house is to know again the satisfaction of home.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.quote: When you're safe at home you wish you were having an adventure; when you're having an adventure you whish you were safe at home.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: Unless you move, the place where you are is the place where you will always be.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: The greatest gifts you can give your children are the roots of responsibility and the wings of independence.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: The most important thing that parents can teach their children is how to get along without them.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: No matter what happens in life, be good to people. Being good to people is a wonderful legacy to leave behind.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Please think about your legacy, because you're writing it every day.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Each day we choose to live the legacy we want to leave.
quotes.author: Pam Farrel

quotes.quote: Legacy is greater than currency.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Your legacy is being written by yourself. Make the right decisions.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: A man's legacy is determined by how the story ends.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.quote: Create your legacy, and pass the baton.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: Our legacy is how we spend our time and who we spend it with.
quotes.author: Jim Stengel

quotes.quote: Do whatever you gotta do to chase your legacy every second of your life.
quotes.author: Ray Lewis

quotes.quote: What you do is your history. What you set in motion is your legacy.
quotes.author: Leonard Sweet

quotes.quote: We don't live forever... Our legacy does.
quotes.author: Greg PlittÂ

quotes.quote: Create your legacy by fulfilling your potential...
quotes.author: Gino Norris

quotes.quote: Leave yourÂ legacyÂ todayÂ beforeÂ you're gone tomorrow.Â
quotes.author: Johnny Wowk

quotes.quote: The earth is hiring and the pay is your legacy.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Let the blood and the bruises define your legacy.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: What we are most passionate about becomes our legacy.
quotes.author: Mike Crump

quotes.quote: Living to create an earthly legacy is a short-sighted goal.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Legacy is what a president does that affects later generations.
quotes.author: Michael Beschloss

quotes.quote: Yesterday is gone, live for today and leave a legacy for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: When the legacy you leave behind lasts for hours, days or a lifetime, you matter.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: If you're going to live, leave a legacy. Make a mark on the world that can't be erased.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: A legacy is not about what you did while you were there it is what happens when you are gone.
quotes.author: Darrell Waltrip

quotes.quote: If your life is motivated by your ambition to leave a legacy, what you'll probably leave as a legacy is ambition.Â
quotes.author: Rich Mullins

quotes.quote: Everyone leaves a legacy, whether they want to or not. The question is, "What kind of legacy will you leave?"
quotes.author: Dillon Burroughs

quotes.quote: The things you do for yourself are gone when you are gone, but the things you do for others remain as your legacy.
quotes.author: Kalu Ndukwe Kalu

quotes.quote: Carve your name on hearts, not tombstones. A legacy is etched into the minds of others and the stories they share about you.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: The need to leave a legacy is our spiritual need to have a sense of meaning, purpose, personal congruence, and contribution.Â
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Your story is the greatest legacy that you will leave to your friends.It's the longest-lasting legacy you will leave to your heirs.
quotes.author: Steve Saint

quotes.quote: What you leave behind is not what is engraved in stone monuments, but what is woven into the lives of others.
quotes.author: Pericles

quotes.quote: If your actions create a legacy that inspires others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, then, you are an excellent leader.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Legalism is concerned simply with external conformity and is blind to internal motivation.
quotes.author: R.C. Sproul

quotes.quote: The implications of legalism are staggering in their arrogance. Legalism claims that the death of Jesus on the cross was either unnecessary or insufficient. It essentially says to God, Your plan didn't work. The cross wasn't enough and I need to add my good works to it to be saved.
quotes.author: C.J. Mahaney

quotes.quote: Legalism breeds a sense of entitlement that turns us into complainers.
quotes.author: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.quote: Legalism is the tendency to regard as divine law things which God has neither required nor forbidden in Scripture and the corresponding inclination to look with suspicion on others for their failure or refusal to conform.
quotes.author: Sam Storms

quotes.quote: A low view of law always produces legalism; a high view of law makes a person a seeker after grace.
quotes.author: John Gresham Machen

quotes.quote: Legalism strict adherence, or the principle of strict adherence, to law or pre-scription, especially to the letter rather than the spirit.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Legalism insists on conformity to manmade religious rules and requirements, which are often unspoken but are nevertheless very real. There are far too many instances within Christendom where our traditions and rules are, in practice, more important than God's commands.
quotes.author: Jerry Bridges

quotes.quote: Legalism involves seeking forgiveness from God, justification before God, and acceptance by God through obedience to God. Legalism is substituting, in essence, my works for Jesus' finished work. Legalism is self-atonement and the height of arrogance. It's living as if the cross of Christ was unnecessary or insufficient.
quotes.author: C.J. Mahaney

quotes.quote: If one accepts the terms of the covenant and obeys God's law, he or she receives the blessings associated with the covenant.
quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.quote: Legalism is when we try to obtain the result of obedience by our own means and strength. It is self-righteousness, as opposed to God's righteousness covering us, and the two are as different as spirit and flesh.
quotes.author: Kelly Minter

quotes.quote: Legalism is a fancy word for an obession with goodmess. It's a belief that good thing come from God to those who are good. And it's a belief that you can actually be good enough to get to God on your own.
quotes.author: Christine Hoover

quotes.quote: The moral law commands us to make the highest possible good in a world the final object of all our conduct.
quotes.author: Paul Ricoeur

quotes.quote: Law will take over because law always carries with it a sense of security and manipulative power.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: Legalism is a subtle danger because no one thinks of himself as a legalist.
quotes.author: Philip Yancey

quotes.quote: Believers have just as much to fear from legalism as from waywardness. The first detracts from the beauty of the message, while the second mars it content.
quotes.author: Max Anders

quotes.quote: Legalism lacks the supreme sense of worship. It obeys but it does not adore.
quotes.author: Geerhardus Vos

quotes.quote: Legalism does not consist in yielding obedience to the law. Rather, it is to seek justification and good standing with God through the merit of works done in obedience to the law instead of by faith in Christ.
quotes.author: Sam Storms

quotes.quote: Legalism makes believers think that God accepts them on the basis of what they do. Licentiousness makes believers think that God does not care what they do. Both errors have terrible spiritual consequences.
quotes.author: Bryan Chapell

quotes.quote: Legalism is using God's word to enforce your will.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Legalism is looking to something besides Jesus Christ in order to be acceptable and clean before God.
quotes.author: Timothy Keller

quotes.quote: At its heart, legalism is a desire to appear holy. It is trying to be justified before men and not God.
quotes.author: David Wilkerson

quotes.quote: Legalism is adding human rules and regulations to the Bible, and judging others based on these new humanistic rules. Legalism is not taking the Bible seriously on every point. That is Christianity.
quotes.author: Rob Rienow

quotes.quote: Legalism says God will love us if we change. The gospel says God will change us because He loves us.
quotes.author: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.quote: Legalism is to seek to achieve forgiveness from God and acceptance by God through my obedience to God.
quotes.author: Keri Harvey

quotes.quote: Legalism is nothing but a leader's way of avoiding suffering.
quotes.author: Gene Edwards

quotes.quote: The truth about the life of a man is not what he does, but the legend which he creates around himself
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The only way you can become a legend is in your coffin.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: Legends are all to do with the past and nothing to do with the present.Â
quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

quotes.quote: Legend adheres to artists whose deaths seem the corollaries of their works.
quotes.author: Joyce Johnson

quotes.quote: At the heart of every legend there is a grain of truth.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: Legend remains victorious in spite of history.
quotes.author: Sarah BernhardtÂ

quotes.quote: Your memories become fantasies if they are not shared, and your life in all its triviality becomes a legend.
quotes.author: Aleksandar Hemon

quotes.quote: And, before science had caught up with the legend, the legend had swallowed science and everything.
quotes.author: Richard Matheson

quotes.quote: Every human being has a personal legend to be fulfilled, and this is our reason for being in the world. This personal legend manifests itself in our enthusiasm for the task.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Legends die hard. They survive as truth rarely does.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: Legends are material to be moulded, and not facts to be recorded.
quotes.author: Hervey Allen

quotes.quote: Legend: A lie that has attained the dignity of ageâ¦
quotes.author: HL Mencken

quotes.quote: Legends don't have to make sense. They just have to be beautiful. Or at least interesting.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: You don't need to be legendary all the time. You can just be legendary for ten minutes a day.
quotes.author: Caitlin Moran

quotes.quote: A legend is an old man with a cane.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: Sometimes a legend that endures for centuries... endures for a reason.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: To be a legend, you generally had to be dead.
quotes.author: Nalini Singh

quotes.quote: When the legend becomes fact, print the legend.
quotes.author: Robert Wuhl

quotes.quote: You are the storyteller of your own life, and you can create your own legend, or not.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: Legends are not born--they are created.
quotes.author: Ricky Pierce

quotes.quote: You can't become legendary if you have no energy.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Sometimes legends make reality, and become more useful than the facts.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: Legends were not only for the desperate. Legends were for the brave.Â
quotes.author: Kathryn Lasky

quotes.quote: Legends that endure in the future...were events that took place in the distant past.
quotes.author: Eiichiro Oda

quotes.quote: Legend does not contradict history. It preserves the fundamental after but magnifies and embellishes it.
quotes.author: Adrien Rouquette

quotes.quote: Heroes come and go, but legends are forever.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.quote: All legends have a base in fact.
quotes.author: David Gemmell

quotes.quote: And history becomes legend and legend becomes history.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: Being a legend is a hazardous thing if you're only a legend. If you can keep updating yourself, then being a legend is just an added bonus.
quotes.author: Joan Baez

quotes.quote: Voltaire has suffered the greatest misfortune that can befall a writer; he has become a legend, which ensures that he will not be read until someone destroys the legend.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: In the morning a man walks with his whole body; in the evening, only with his legs.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: How many legs does a dog have if you call his tail a leg? Four. Saying that a tail is a leg doesn't make it a leg.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Swollen in head, weak in legs, sharp in tongue but empty in belly.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: The legs are the wheels of creativity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Success has no idle hands; affords no legs at rest.
quotes.author: Johnnie Dent, Jr.

quotes.quote: When my legs begin to move, the thoughts begin to flow.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Coward: One who, in a perilous emergency, thinks with his legs.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: When the legs go, the heart and the head follow quickly behind.
quotes.author: Don Meyer

quotes.quote: I prayed for twenty years but received no answer until I prayed with my legs.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: Shattered legs may heal in time, but some betrayals fester and poison the soul.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: There is nothing worse than giving the longest of legs to the smallest of ideas.
quotes.author: Machado de Assis

quotes.quote: A lie has no legs, and cannot stand; but it has wings, and can fly far and wide
quotes.author: William Warburton

quotes.quote: Conversation is the legs on which thought walks; and writing, the wings by which it flies.
quotes.author: Marguerite Gardiner

quotes.quote: Be content to progress in slow steps until you have legs to run and wings with which to fly.
quotes.author: Pio of Pietrelcina

quotes.quote: She could not complain about not having shoes when the person she was talking to had no legs.
quotes.author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quotes.quote: To be pessimist is to amputate one's own legs and arms! Only an optimist man has the ability to move!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Fortune loves to give bedroom slippers to people with wooden legs, and gloves to those with no hands.
quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

quotes.quote: A conservative is a man with two perfectly good legs who, however, has never learned how to walk forward.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A man that has lost moral sense is like a man in battle with both of his legs shot off: he has nothing to stand on.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: In the mountains, the shortest way is from peak to peak: but for that you must have long legs.
