quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The best definition of man is: a being that goes on two legs and is ungrateful.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: Winning is about heart, not just legs. It's got to be in the right place.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: When your legs get weaker time starts running faster.Â
quotes.author: Mikhail Turovsky

quotes.quote: Gender is between your ears and not between your legs.
quotes.author: Chaz Bono

quotes.quote: When you have got an elephant by the hind legs and he is trying to run away, it's best to let him run.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: A man's legs must be long enough to reach the ground.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The combination of both legs leads to social harmony and material abundance.
quotes.author: Marshall Fritz

quotes.quote: Never give up. When your heart becomes tired, just walk with your legs - but move on.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: If you don't like the situation, if you are afraid and can't deal with it, nothing wrong with your legs, get out of there.
quotes.author: John Henrik Clarke

quotes.quote: Observe and learn from stronger and better people than yours instead of laughing and pulling legs of poor and weak than yours.
quotes.author: Prerak Trivedi

quotes.quote: Leisure is the time for doing something useful. This leisure the diligent person will obtain, the lazy one never.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It's not a man's working hours that is important, it is how he spends his leisure time.
quotes.author: Marilynne Robinson

quotes.quote: If you are losing your leisure, look out! â It may be you are losing your soul.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Leisure is only possible when we are at one with ourselves. We tend to overwork as a means of self-escape, as a way of trying to justify our existence.
quotes.author: Josef Pieper

quotes.quote: Leisure only means a chance to do other jobs that demand attention.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: It is in his pleasure that a man really lives; it is from his leisure that he constructs the true fabric of self.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: A life of leisure never satisfies anyone who possesses a lively mind.
quotes.author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.quote: Those who decide to use leisure as a means of mental development, who love good music, good books, good pictures, good company, good conversation, are the happiest people in the world.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.quote: Work is external to the worker. . . . It is not part of his nature; consequently he does not fulfill himself in his work but denies himself. . . . The worker therefore feels himself at home only during his leisure time, whereas at work he feels homeless.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Organizing your leisure effectively is the highest level of civilization.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The real problem of leisure time is how to keep others from using yours.
quotes.author: Arthur Lacey

quotes.quote: Spend your leisure time in cultivating an ear attentive to discourse, for in this way you will find that you learn with ease what others have found out with difficulty.
quotes.author: Isocrates

quotes.quote: Work is only justified by leisure time. To admit the emptiness of leisure time is to admit the impossibility of life.
quotes.author: Guy Debord

quotes.quote: If the use of leisure time is confined to looking at TV for a few extra hours every day, we will deteriorate as a people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A broad margin of leisure is as beautiful in a man's life as in a book.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: To be able to fill leisure intelligently is the last product of civilization.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russel

quotes.quote: The soul is dyed with the color of its leisure thoughts.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: In our leisure we reveal what kind of people we are.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: All intellectual improvement arises from leisure.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Employ thy time well, if thou meanest to gain leisure.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It is that unoccupied space which makes a room habitable, as it is our leisure hours which make life endurable.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: The end of labor is to gain leisure.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Getting to know experienced people is the best leisure time you can have.
quotes.author: Mahrukh Memon

quotes.quote: Leisure isn't always relaxation and it's relaxation that counts.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: A life of leisure and a life of laziness are two things.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: In order to become prosperous, a person must initially work very hard, so he or she has to sacrifice a lot of leisure time.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: Leisure time is that five or six hours when you sleep at night.
quotes.author: George Allen

quotes.quote: Leisure, some degree of it, is necessary to the health of every man's spirit.
quotes.author: Harriet Martineau

quotes.quote: The best intelligence test is what we do with our leisure.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, get tequila and salt.
quotes.author: Sanjaya Malakar

quotes.quote: When life hands you lemons, make whisky sours.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you handle it. If Life gives you lemons, make lemonade. If the lemons are rotten, take out the seeds and plant them in order to grow new lemons.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, order the lobster tail.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, throw them back.
quotes.author: Joe Jonas

quotes.quote: If life gives you lemons, make apple juice and make people wonder how the hell you did it.
quotes.author: Gurbaksh Chahal

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons don't make lemonade, make pink lemonade. Be unique.
quotes.author: Wanda Sykes

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, you exchange them at the store for something more edible.
quotes.author: Grace Helbig

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, make lemonade and sell it to all of those who get thirsty from complaining.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: If life gives you lemons, make some kind of fruity juice.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemon, take it. don't waste food.
quotes.author: Giselle Marquez

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, make sure you know whose eyes you need to squeeze them in.
quotes.author: Colleen Hoover

quotes.quote: When life hands me lemons I hand them back and pick something else.
quotes.author: Behdad Sami

quotes.quote: When fate hands you a lemon, make lemonade.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, make lemonade, and then throw it in the face of the person who gave you the lemons until they give you the oranges you originally asked for.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: When life give you lemons, eat them, they are good for you Ã¢â¬â life knows best.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons....throw them back and grow your own. 'Organically' Those are the good ones.
quotes.author: Andrea L'Artiste

quotes.quote: If Life hands you a lemon, throw it at someone.
quotes.author: John Rzeznik

quotes.quote: If life hands you lemons, make lemonade! Words to live by, especially when you kept in mind that the only way to make them into lemonade was to squeeze the hell out of them.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: I believe that if life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade... And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.
quotes.author: Ron White

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, sell them and buy a pineapple. How to better your life 101.
quotes.author: Davin Turney

quotes.quote: A grapefruit is just a lemon that saw an opportunity and took advantage of it.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, chunk it right back.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: If life gives you lemons, don't settle for simply making lemonade - make a glorious scene at a lemonade stand.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: When life hands you lemonade, don't try to make lemons.
quotes.author: Vince Guthrie

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, throw them at the zombies.
quotes.author: Bruce Campbell

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, squirt someone in the eye.
quotes.author: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.quote: When Life Gives You Lemons you tell life to Get a Life because lemons are a terrible gift.
quotes.author: Patrick Schell

quotes.quote: If life throws you a lemon - make lemonade.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.quote: Fifty lemons are a load for one person, but for fifty persons they are perfume.
quotes.author: Ethiopian Proverb

quotes.quote: Liberty cannot be preserved without general knowledge among the people.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: Seek freedom and become captive of your desires. Seek discipline and find your liberty.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: Liberty is not the power of doing what we like, but the right to do what we ought.
quotes.author: Lord Acton

quotes.quote: They who can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety deserve neither liberty nor safety.
quotes.author: Benjamin_Franklin

quotes.quote: Better to die fighting for freedom then be a prisoner all the days of your life.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Those who deny freedom to others, deserve it not for themselves
quotes.author: Abraham_Lincoln

quotes.quote: If liberty means anything at all, it means the right to tell people what they do not want to hear.
quotes.author: George_Orwell

quotes.quote: For to be free is not merely to cast off one's chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Freedom has its life in the hearts, the actions, the spirit of men and so it must be daily earned and refreshed-else like a flower cut from its life-giving roots, it will wither and die.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Liberty is always dangerous, but it is the safest thing we have.
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: Liberty means responsibility. That is why most men dread it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: While we are free to choose our actions, we are not free to choose the consequences of our actions.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Liberty doesn't work as well in practice as it does in speeches.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Liberty is the condition of duty, the guardian of conscience. It grows as conscience grows. The domains of both grow together. Liberty is safety from all hindrances, even sin. So that Liberty ends by being Free Will
quotes.author: John Acton

quotes.quote: Liberty means responsibility. That is why most men dread it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: If liberty has any meaning it means freedom to improve.
quotes.author: Philip Wylie

quotes.quote: You're free. And freedom is beautiful. And, you know, it'll take time to restore chaos and order - order out of chaos. But we will.
quotes.author: President George W. Bush Washington

quotes.quote: Life without liberty is like a body without spirit.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Liberty consists in the freedom to do everything which injures no one else; hence the exercise of the natural rights of each man has no limits except those which assure to the other members of the society the enjoyment of the same rights.
quotes.author: Gilbert Du Motier

quotes.quote: Freedom is what you do with what's been done to you.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: To be without some of the things you want is an indispensable part of happiness.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Every law is an infraction of liberty.
quotes.author: Jeremy Bentham

quotes.quote: Liberty is the right to do what the law permits.
quotes.author: Baron de Montesquieu

quotes.quote: People hardly ever make use of the freedom they have, for example, freedom of thought; instead they demand freedom of speech as a compensation.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Liberty a word without which all other words are vain.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Liberty is worth paying for.
quotes.author: Jules Verne

quotes.quote: Once freedom lights its beacon in a man's heart, the gods are powerless against him
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: For to be free is not merely to cast off one's chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: There are three types of baseball players: Those who make it happen, those who watch it happen and those who wonder what happens.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: In the end, it's about the teaching, and what I always loved about coaching was the practices. Not the games, not the tournaments, not the alumni stuff. But teaching the players during practice was what coaching was all about to me.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: I donât have to be logical. Iâm a leopard. Weâre considered wild animals, you know. (Spoken by Megan.)
quotes.author: Amy Neftzger

quotes.quote: As leopard feels at home with leopard.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The penguin doesn't know it's cute, and the leopard seal doesn't know it's kind of big and monstrous. This is just the food chain unfolding.
quotes.author: Paul Nicklen

quotes.quote: I think every woman should have leopard, but not every woman will wear leopard. You have to have courage to wear leopard.
quotes.author: Rachel Zoe

quotes.quote: Long ago, our ancestors sacrificed their children to the leopards. The souls of the children grew inside the leopards, until the leopards became human. We were Gods then.
quotes.author: DeWitt Bodeen

quotes.quote: Leopards did not kill this man. Leopards never kill with claws alone. Use teeth!
quotes.author: Carroll Young

quotes.quote: Clothing was no problem at all. Everybody wore leopard skins... Everybody except the leopards.
quotes.author: Heck Allen

quotes.quote: Eye easily deceived. Same leopard can hide behind different spots.
quotes.author: Lester Ziffren

quotes.quote: They're not bunny, they're leopard. And they're not stupid, they're special. We're special.
quotes.author: Deborah Kaplan

quotes.quote: This leopard uses its spots to help it hide in the bush.
quotes.author: Janis Diamond

quotes.quote: We're the leopards / The leader of the pack lives down in the local drain / We're the leopards / King Kong built a car inside his brain
quotes.author: Marc Bolan

quotes.quote: Leaping quick on leopard's back / I face the brunt of his attack / In the land of nod I'm king / Until the alarm clock rings
quotes.author: Burleigh Drummond

quotes.quote: Life is like the leopard's den / And once you find you've fallen in / A safari of the heart / Surely comes to an end
quotes.author: Burleigh Drummond

quotes.quote: Oh a leopard can't change his spots / And oil and water can't mix / But I have recently heard an old dog learned new tricks
quotes.author: John Rox

quotes.quote: No blind spots in the leopard's eyes / Can only help to jeopardize / The lives of lambs, the shepherd cries
quotes.author: Collin John Newman

quotes.quote: A leopard doesn't change its spots / Mark the one willing to explore / A chance to see so much more / A tug at the heart will light the spark
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: When I was chased by a striped leopard in dense camouflage of the jungle, / There was an overwhelming craving to clamber up the tree; and hide in the myriad of branches.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: You're like this leopard who's pretending to be a house cat.
quotes.author: Holly Black

quotes.quote: As far as I'm concerned, leopard is a neutral.
quotes.author: Jenna Lyons

quotes.quote: The African leopard is an audacious animal, although it is ungrateful of me to say a word against him, after the way he has let me off personally ... taken as a whole, he is the most lovely animal I have ever seen; only seeing him, in the one way you can gain a full idea of his beauty, namely in his native forest, is not an unmixed joy to a person, like myself, of a nervous disposition.
quotes.author: Mary Kingsley

quotes.quote: AÂ leopardÂ does not change his spots, or change his feeling that spots are rather a credit.
quotes.author: Ivy Compton-Burnett

quotes.quote: The snowÂ leopardÂ is absolutely magnificent. It represents really what endangered species are all about.
quotes.author: Jack HannaÂ

quotes.quote: We all know the leopard can't change his stripes.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: The only way a no-legged leopard could hurt you is if it fell out of a tree onto your head.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: In a Leopard the spotts are not observed.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: The leopard does not change his spots.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: You cannot change the stripes of a leopard.
quotes.author: Emmitt Smith

quotes.quote: A world without leopards, well, who would want to live in it?
quotes.author: Diana Vreeland

quotes.quote: The Snow Leopard's Tale is a mystical pilgrimage into that wild country where animal passion and the human heart begin to walk the very same trail. Whether one has been in the business of adventuring, as Thomas McIntyre has, or has enjoyed such adventures from the safety of one's armchair, The Snow Leopard's Tale is a haunting, beautifully written, and thought-provoking tale, as all great parables are.
quotes.author: Ted Kerasote

quotes.quote: Leopard is an animal design, and my designs come from nature.
quotes.author: Roberto Cavalli

quotes.quote: Cut the ending. Revise the script. The man of her dreams is a girl.
quotes.author: Julie Anne Peters

quotes.quote: I am a writer who happens to love women. I am not a lesbian who happens to write.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: Everybody's journey is individual. If you fall in love with a boy, you fall in love with a boy. The fact that many Americans consider it a disease says more about them than it does about homosexuality.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: No one has imagined us. We want to live like trees, sycamores blazing through the sulfuric air, dappled with scars, still exuberantly budding, our animal passion rooted in the city.
quotes.author: Adrienne Rich

quotes.quote: I found you in the clarity of the moon, Not the rigor of the sun. Not in the light, where its easier to see, But when the world is blind and loves eyes are free.
quotes.author: Malika E Nura

quotes.quote: Love is a wild fire that cannot be contained by any mere element known to man.
quotes.author: Cristina Marrero

quotes.quote: Treasure the love you receive above all. It will survive long after your gold and good health have vanished.
quotes.author: Og Mandingo

quotes.quote: Bisexuality immediately doubles your chances for a date on Saturday night.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Drag is when a man wears everything a lesbian won't.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You had to be willing to fight in order for a love story to last a life time.
quotes.author: Cristina Marrero

quotes.quote: The music business was not safe, but it was FUN. It was like falling in love with a woman you know is bad for you, but you love every minute with her, anyway.
quotes.author: Lionel Richie

quotes.quote: Everyone wants to hear I Love You but what they want more is for it to be true when you say it.
quotes.author: Christine Justice

quotes.quote: She loves me for the way I never leave her and I love her for the thousand secret ways she makes me stay.
quotes.author: Michael Xavier

quotes.quote: Those who hate most fervently must have once loved deeply. those who want to deny the world must have once embraced what they now set on fire.
quotes.author: Kurt Tucholsky

quotes.quote: If you need someone to be around to complete you, it's something missing from inside. Find that first and then get love.
quotes.author: Enhance Dreams

quotes.quote: It's so tiring to make love to women, it takes forever. I'm too lazy to be a lesbian.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: So many things to think about, so many words to say. So many deeds to be done, so many habits to create. So much character to show, so much love to give. In all of this there is transformation and in all of this I live.
quotes.author: Kristiana Evans

quotes.quote: I became a lesbian because of women, because women are beautiful, strong, and compassionate.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: Being a lesbian means I have the opportunity to love what is uncommon and I'm okay with that. I do not cry myself to sleep or am upset by the life that I lead because of who I care about. Because I accept the fact that it is simply love.
quotes.author: Jenna Anne

quotes.quote: The true feminist deals out of a lesbian consciousness whether or not she ever sleeps with women.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: That is the true season of love. when we believe that we alone can love, that no one could ever have loved as much before, and that no one will ever love in the same way again.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Silently one by one, in the infinite meadows of heaven, Blossomed the lovely stars, the forget-me-nots of the angels.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: I am a strong, black, lesbian woman. Every time I say it, I feel so much better.
quotes.author: Brittney Griner

quotes.quote: There's something about you and I'm finding it impossible to stay away. Whenever you're near, 'I love you' is all I want to say.
quotes.author: Francine Chiar

quotes.quote: As you continue to send out love, the energy returns to you in a regenerating spiral... As love accumulates, it keeps your system in balance and harmony. Love is the tool, and more love is the end product.
quotes.author: Sara Paddison

quotes.quote: But the true feminist deals out of a lesbian consciousness whether or not she ever sleeps with women.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: No government has the right to tell its citizens when or whom to love. The only queer people are those who don't love anybody.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: I would certainly never suggest that any lesbian should be ashamed of her sexual preference.
quotes.author: Ed McBain

quotes.quote: No woman could adjust herself to lesbianism without developing exceptional qualities of courage.
quotes.author: Diana Frederics

quotes.quote: Before our eyes met, my mind was an empty mirror. I fear that my dreams will shatter. Now I see you every day in my dreams with all your beauty, that teases me, I lost my peace, I lost my sleep. All night I stay up thinking of you. What else can I say? I am in love.
quotes.author: Glen Rambharack

quotes.quote: You'll learn, as you get older, that rules are made to be broken. Be bold enough to live life on your terms, and never, ever apologize for it. Go against the grain, refuse to conform, take the road less traveled instead of the well-beaten path. Laugh in the face of adversity, and leap before you look. Dance as though EVERYBODY is watching. March to the beat of your own drummer. And stubbornly refuse to fit in.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: The moment you recognize what is beautiful in this world, you stop being a slave
quotes.author: Aravind Adiga

quotes.quote: Never run from the enemy, tackle them
quotes.author: Victoria Addino

quotes.quote: Chasing a person doesn't give you value or build values in you. You earn your value by chasing morality and practicing dignity.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Do not constantly spend your time complaining about a problem you may be having or may be up against, focus your time toward correcting the problem. Always remember, Time is value!
quotes.author: Victoria Addino

quotes.quote: Ultimately there is no such thing as failure. There are lessons learned in different ways.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: I stopped thinking about it after trying to figure out what are the lessons learned, and there are so many. After I had basically sorted that out, I figured it's time to really look at the future and not at the past.
quotes.author: Kalpana Chawla

quotes.quote: This year has been full of lessons learned and soul searching and realizing I'm an adult. It's time to take responsibility and not take the easy way out.
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.quote: I believe that nothing is more important to our ability to effectively address our present than understanding the lessons learned from those who have come before us.
quotes.author: Charlie Gonzalez

quotes.quote: The lessons learned as we try to build ever more sophisticated nanomachines will almost certainly inform our understanding of the origins of life.
quotes.author: Paul McEuen

quotes.quote: I'm thankful for every break in my heart, I'm grateful for every scar, some pages turned, some bridges burned, but there were lessons learned.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Success can be measured not only in achievements, but in lessons learned, lives touched and moments shared along the way.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Success can be measured not only in achievements, but in lessons learned, lives touched and moments shared along the way.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Toast to the lessons not yet learned and to the trials that will teach them.
quotes.author: Brooke Fraser

quotes.quote: I believe that nothing is more important to our ability to effectively address our present than understanding thelessons learned from those who have come before us.
quotes.author: Charlie Gonzalez

quotes.quote: There are so many things you can learn about, but you'll miss the best things if you keep your eyes shut
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, Nothing is going to get better. It's not.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: You have brains in your head.You have feet in your shoes.You can steer yourselfAny direction you choose.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Today is gone.Today was fun.Tomorrow is another one.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Not everyone is meant to be in your future. Some people are just passing through to teach you lessons in life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Not everything will go as you expect in your life. This is why you need to drop expectations and go with the flow of life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Life is inherently risky. There is only one big risk you should avoid at all costs, and that is the risk of doing nothing.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: A good life is when you assume nothing, do more, need less, smile often, dream big, laugh a lot, and realize how blessed you are.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Focus on what matters and let go of what doesn't.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: People tend to complicate their own lives, as if living weren't already complicated enough.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.quote: Ultimately there is no such thing as failure. There are lessons learned in different ways.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: Lessons learned in the home, last the longest.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Once you accept that perfection is just a goal, screwing up isn't so hard to handle. Each misstep is still a step, another lesson learned, another opportunity to get it right the next time.
quotes.author: Nick Vujicic

quotes.quote: Every failure is a lesson learned about your strategy.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: The mental and physical space we create by letting go of things that belong in our past gives usÃ¢â¬Â¦the option to fill the space with something new.
quotes.author: Susan Fay West

quotes.quote: You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Letting go of your painful past is how you open yourself to a wonderful future.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: You can meet someone who's just right, but he might not be meant for you. You break up, you lose things, you never feel the same again. But maybe you should stop questioning why. Maybe you should just accept it and move on.
quotes.author: Winna Efendi

quotes.quote: If you want to fly on the sky, you need to leave the earth. If you want to move forward, you need to let go the past that drags you down.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Letting go doesn't have to mean walking away. It means the things that hurt you don't hurt you anymore.
quotes.author: Sue Fitzmaurice

quotes.quote: Some relationships are like glass. It's better to leave it broken, than to hurt yourself more by picking it up and trying to put it back together.
quotes.author: Herman Hesse

quotes.quote: Just because someone has been in your life for many years, doesn't mean there shouldn't be a point at which you finally decide to let go.
quotes.author: Wilfred James Dolor

quotes.quote: Letting go does not mean you stop caring. It means you stop trying to force others to.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Letting go doesn't mean that you don't care about someone anymore. It's just realizing that the only person you really have control over is yourself.
quotes.author: Deborah Reber

quotes.quote: Letting go is the willingness to change your beliefs in order to bring more peace and joy into your life instead of holding onto beliefs that bring pain and suffering.
quotes.author: Hal Tipper

quotes.quote: The only thing a person can ever really do is keep moving forward. Take that big leap forward without hesitation, without once looking back. Simply forget the past and forge toward the future.
quotes.author: Alyson Noel

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the choice to see people as they are now. When we're mad at people, we're angry because of something they said or did before this moment. By letting go of the past, we make room for miracles to replace our grievances.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Letting go may sound so simple, but rarely is it a one-time thing. Just keep letting go, until one day it's gone for good.
quotes.author: Eleanor Brownn

quotes.quote: Don't dwell on things from yesterday. Learn from them and keep moving forward in life.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: In the process of letting go you will lose many things from the past, but you will find yourself.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: If you want to make room for something new, you must let go of something old that no longer serves you.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Letting go is hard; holding on much harder and moving on seems to be the hardest at times.
quotes.author: Sepi Tajima

quotes.quote: Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: If love becomes too painful, then it's time to let that love go and save yourself. You have to keep this in mind because you'll be able to find another love but not another self.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: Letting go is not about giving up, being lazy, or sacrificing yourself... Letting go doesn't have to mean losing; it can be about coming into a new, open, clean space from which you can create.
quotes.author: Rebekah Elizabeth

quotes.quote: Giving up isn't always the bad thing it's made out to be. Sometimes when you stop putting your energy into something, you free yourself to focus more deeply on something else.
quotes.author: Maria Ana Bulquerin

quotes.quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be. When I let go of what I have, I receive what I need.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: If you truly want to be respected by people you love, you must prove to them that you can survive without them.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Learning to ignore certain people is one of the great paths to inner peace. Life gets easier when you delete those who make it difficult.
quotes.author: Mitch Cuento

quotes.quote: Forget about the past. It does not exist, except in your memory. Drop it. And stop worrying about how you're going to get through tomorrow. Life is going on right here, right now - pay attention to that and all will be well.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: Loving someone is setting them free, letting them go.
quotes.author: Kate Winslet

quotes.quote: To let go is to release the images and emotions, the grudges and fears, the clingings and disappointments of the past that bind our spirit.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: No matter how bad you want a person, if your hearts are in two different places, you'll have to pass and move on.
quotes.author: Alexandra Elle

quotes.quote: One of the simplest ways to stay happy is letting go of the things that makes you sad.
quotes.author: Daily Dose

quotes.quote: The truth is, unless you let go, unless you forgive yourself, unless you forgive the situation, unless you realize that the situation is over, you cannot move forward.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Letting go doesn't mean that you don't care about someone anymore. It's just realizing that the only person you really have control over is yourself.
quotes.author: Deborah Reber

quotes.quote: Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: You can only lose what you cling to.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: In the process of letting go you will lose many things from the past, but you will find yourself.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Change has to come for life to struggle forward.
quotes.author: Helen Hollick

quotes.quote: Letting go helps us to to live in a more peaceful state of mind and helps restore our balance. It allows others to be responsible for themselves and for us to take our hands off situations that do not belong to us. This frees us from unnecessary stress.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong; but sometimes it is letting go.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Inner peace can be reached only when we practice forgiveness. Forgiveness is letting go of the past, and is therefore the means for correcting our misperceptions.
quotes.author: Gerald Jampolsky

quotes.quote: Some people believe holding on and hanging in there are signs of great strength. However, there are times when it takes much more strength to know when to let go and then do it.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: We need to learn to let go as easily as we grasp and we will find our hands full and our minds empty.
quotes.author: Leo F. Buscaglia

quotes.quote: If you let go a little, you will have a little peace. If you let go a lot, you will have a lot of peace.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.quote: One of the simplest ways to stay happy is by letting go of the things that make you sad.
quotes.author: Tinku Razoria

quotes.quote: I must let go of the life I've planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for me.
quotes.author: Kumar Anupam

quotes.quote: What does it matter, if you let go? For the weight that is on you means nothing and never meant anything.
quotes.author: Jeremy Limn

quotes.quote: If people refuse to look at you in a new light and they can only see you for what you were, only see you for the mistakes you've made, if they don't realize that you are not your mistakes, then they have to go.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Renew, release, let go. Yesterday's gone. There's nothing you can do to bring it back. You can't should've done something. You can only DO something. Renew yourself. Release that attachment. Today is a new day!
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: I realise there's something incredibly honest about trees in winter, how they're experts at letting things go.
quotes.author: Jeffrey McDaniel

quotes.quote: You cannot let go of anything if you cannot notice that you are holding it. Admit your 'weaknesses' and watch them morph into your greatest strengths.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: By letting it go it all gets done. The world is won by those who let it go. But when you try and try, the world is beyond the winning.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Absorb what is useful. Discard what is not.Add what is uniquely your own.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: We must learn to let go, to give up, to make room for thethings we have prayed for and desired.
quotes.author: Charles Fillmore

quotes.quote: People have a hard time letting go of their suffering.Out of a fear of the unknown, they prefer suffering that is familiar.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: The farther behind I leave the past, the closer I am to forging my own character.
quotes.author: Isabelle Eberhardt

quotes.quote: You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: To let go is to release the images and emotions, the grudges and fears, the clingings and disappointments of the past that bind our spirit.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: Surrender to what is. Let go of what was. Have faith in what will be.
quotes.author: Sonia Ricotti

quotes.quote: Keep what is worth keeping and with the breath of kindness blow the rest away.
quotes.author: Dinah McCraik

quotes.quote: Sometimes letting things go is an act of far greater power than defending or hanging on.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Beware of him that is slow to anger; for when it is long coming, it is the stronger when it comes, and the longer kept. Abused patience turns to fury.
quotes.author: Francis Quarles

quotes.quote: Letting go helps us to to live in a more peaceful state of mind and helps restore our balance. It allows others to be responsible for themselves and for us to take our hands off situations that do not belong to us. This frees us from unnecessary stress.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: People have a hard time letting go of their suffering. Out of a fear of the unknown, they prefer suffering that is familiar.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Nothing in the universe can stop you from letting go and starting over.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: Holding on to anger, resentment and hurt only gives you tense muscles, a headache and a sore jaw from clenching your teeth. Forgiveness gives you back the laughter and the lightness in your life.
quotes.author: Joan Lunden

quotes.quote: Forgive, forget. Bear with the faults of others as you would have them bear with yours.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: It's not an easy journey, to get to a place where you forgive people. But it is such a powerful place, because it frees you.
quotes.author: Tyler Perry

quotes.quote: It's one of the greatest gifts you can give yourself, to forgive. Forgive everybody.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: People can be more forgiving than you can imagine. But you have to forgive yourself. Let go of what's bitter and move on.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: When we give ourselves the chance to let go of all our tension, the body's natural capacity to heal itself can begin to work.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: In the process of letting go you will lose many things from the past, but you will find yourself.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: To let go is to release the images and emotions, the grudges and fears, the clingings and disappointments of the past that bind our spirit.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: It is important that we forgive ourselves for making mistakes. We need to learn from our errors and move on.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: You've gotta know when it's time to turn the page.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: We need to learn to let go as easily as we grasp and we will find our hands full and our minds empty.
quotes.author: Leo F. Buscaglia

quotes.quote: I can have peace of mind only when I forgive rather than judge.
quotes.author: Gerald Jampolsky

quotes.quote: When a deep injury is done us, we never recover until we forgive.
quotes.author: Alan Paton

quotes.quote: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.
quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.quote: We may not know how to forgive, and we may not want to forgive; but the very fact we say we are willing to forgive begins the healing practice.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: Forgo your anger for a moment and save yourself a hundred days of trouble.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Forgiving is an act of mercy toward an offender. We are no longer controlled by angry feelings toward this person.
quotes.author: Robert D. Enright

quotes.quote: Forgiveness works directly on the emotion of anger (and related constructs such as resentment, hostility, or hatred) by diminishing its intensity or level within the mind and heart.
quotes.author: Richard Fitzgibbons

quotes.quote: To forgive is to set yourself free, to acknowledge that it does no good to hate. Hate really, really destroys both the other person and yourself. That realization is what I think taught me about forgiveness, and so I try to live by it.
quotes.author: Ruby Bridges Hall

quotes.quote: The practice of peace and reconciliation is one of the most vital and artistic of human actions.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: You're only human. Let's break free of this gravity of judgment. And fly high on the wings of forgiveness.
quotes.author: India.Arie

quotes.quote: Be angry, and yet do not sin; do not let the sun go down on your anger.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Forgive all who have offended you, not for them, but for yourself.
quotes.author: Harriet Nelson

quotes.quote: To forgive is the highest, most beautiful form of love. In return, you will receive untold peace and happiness.
quotes.author: Robert Muller

quotes.quote: I believe that things should be let go once they are discussed. Apology accepted. End of story.
quotes.author: Brad Goreski

quotes.quote: Let go of offence. Let go of fear. Let go of revenge. Don't live angry, let go now!
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Nothing in the universe can stop you from letting go and starting over.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: I think every girl has that a guy she has trouble letting go of.
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.quote: In the process of letting go you will lose many things from the past, but you will find yourself.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong; but sometimes it is letting go.
quotes.author: Herman Hesse

quotes.quote: You don't need strength to let go of something. What you really need is understanding.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: Letting go doesn't mean that you don't care about someone anymore. It's just realizing that the only person you really have control over is yourself.
quotes.author: Deborah Reber

quotes.quote: Letting go does not mean you stop caring. It means you stop trying to force others to.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: I know nothing about letting go.
quotes.author: John Hodgman

quotes.quote: You will find that it is necessary to let things go; simply for the reason that they are heavy. So let them go, let go of them. I tie no weights to my ankles.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: There ain't no way you can hold onto something that wants to go, you understand? You can only love what you got while you got it.
quotes.author: Kate Dicamillo

quotes.quote: If you didn't love him, this never would have happened. But you did. And accepting that love and everything that followed it is part of letting it go.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: The truth was, he now belonged only to my past, and it was time I begin to accept it, as much as it hurt to do so.
quotes.author: Tammara Webber

quotes.quote: It's time to let go, be guided and expect miracles.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Bernstein

quotes.quote: If it's time to let go, JUST LET GO. You can't carry on through life with extra weight on your conscience.
quotes.author: Shannon Leto

quotes.quote: Letting go has never been easy, but holding on can be as difficult. Yet strength is measured not by holding on, but by letting go.
quotes.author: Len Santos

quotes.quote: Sometimes letting things go is an act of far greater power than defending or hanging on.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: If you can't do anything about it then let it go. Don't be a prisoner to things you can't change.
quotes.author: Tony Gaskins

quotes.quote: The process of letting go is like taking a journey to the center of your being.
quotes.author: Darren L. Johnson

quotes.quote: The art of letting go is simply about personal empowerment. Realizing what you're in charge of, realizing what you control, and more importantly, what you don't control.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Letting go helps us to to live in a more peaceful state of mind and helps restore our balance. It allows others to be responsible for themselves and for us to take our hands off situations that do not belong to us. This frees us from unnecessary stress.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: It's not the daily increase but daily decrease. Hack away at the unessential.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: There is a time for departure even when there's no certain place to go.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: One of the hardest lessons in life is letting go. Whether it's guilt, anger, love, loss or betrayal. Change is never easy. We fight to hold on and we fight to let go.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Letting go gives us freedom and freedom is the only condition for happiness.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Start leaving what you want to leave. Your future is waiting.
quotes.author: Danielle LaPorte

quotes.quote: Close some doors. Not because of pride, incapacity or arrogance, but simply because they no longer lead somewhere.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: When you choose not to take action on something because you realize you have no control, this is letting go.
quotes.author: Darren L. Johnson

quotes.quote: If you're brave enough to say goodbye, life will reward you with a new hello.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Be strong enough to let go and patient enough to wait for what you deserve.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The word 'leukemia' is a very frightening word. In many instances, it's a killer and it's something that you have to deal with in a very serious and determined way if you're going to beat it.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: Some cancers are curable, while others are highly incurable. The spectrum is enormous. Metastatic pancreatic cancer is a highly incurable disease, whereas some leukemia forms are very curable. There is a big difference between one form and another.
quotes.author: Siddhartha Mukherjee

quotes.quote: What is time, really? When you are diagnosed with a terminal disease like cancer or leukemia, your perception of time changes.
quotes.author: Craig Sager

quotes.quote: If I missed a game, that meant I was losing the battle. I'm not going to let leukemia affect me.
quotes.author: Craig Sager

quotes.quote: In order that people who suffer from depression seek treatment without a second thought, the stigmas must further fall until we reach a point in time when that person with leukemia and that person with depression both receive the same level of sympathy and the same level of rigorous treatment. Both people deserve it.
quotes.author: Gayle Forman

quotes.quote: Yes, thanks to God... my life has a goal, much more important than my artistic activities, that is the struggle against Leukemia.
quotes.author: Jose Carreras

quotes.quote: The happiest moment in my life? When my doctor told me I was completely cured of leukaemia.
quotes.author: Jose Carreras

quotes.quote: Leukemia is evidently psychosomatic in origin and at least eight cases of leukemia had been treated successfully by Dianetics after medicine had traditionally given up. The source of leukemia has been reported to be an engram containing the phrase 'It turns my blood to water.'
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: I'm a leukemia survivor,and I crecall during my darkest dats in the hospial when my friends would come to see me, especially the male friends- they had certain mortality issues with their visit.
quotes.author: Lew Temple

quotes.quote: Leukemia is cancer of the white blood cells - cancer in one of its most explosive, violent incarnations. As one nurse on the wards often liked to remind her patients, with this disease even a paper cut is an emergency.
quotes.author: Siddhartha Mukherjee

quotes.quote: People naturally want to know about what happened, about my leukemia. They ask the same questions again and again. And there have been so many positive conclusions, even through the bad times, that I don't mind at all to be reminded of my struggles.
quotes.author: Jose Carreras

quotes.quote: People always stay the age that they died at. My big brother died of leukemia when I was six. He was eight. Now when I think of him, he's always eight, and he's still my big brother. He never changes, and the part of me that remembers him never changes.
quotes.author: Christopher Moore

quotes.quote: Because I work on leukemia, the image of cancer I carry in my mind is that of blood. I imagine that doctors who work on breast cancer or pancreatic cancer have very different visualizations.
quotes.author: Siddhartha Mukherjee

quotes.quote: The great success stories of chemotherapy were always in relatively obscure types of cancer. Childhood leukemia constitutes less than two percent of all cancers and many of chemotherapy's other successes were in diseases so rare that many clinicians had never even seen a single case.
quotes.author: Ralph W. Moss

quotes.quote: I don't know why I deserved the illness in the first place, but then I don't know why I deserved to be cured. Leukemia is like that. It mystifies you. It changes your life.
quotes.author: Siddhartha Mukherjee

quotes.quote: Many children use an alternative vocabulary for complex disease names. Hence, some say 'smiling mighty Jesus' in place of spinal meningitis or 'Luke and Leia' instead of leukemia.
quotes.author: Darshak Sanghavi

quotes.quote: The young girl was named Christina, and she was dying. She knew that. Bone cancer. Leukemia. They called it first names like that, but she knew its last name was death.
quotes.author: David Duchovny

quotes.quote: Leukemia was a malignant proliferation of white cells in the blood. It was cancer in a molten, liquid form.
quotes.author: Siddhartha Mukherjee

quotes.quote: My experience of cancer has made me a much stronger person. People say that I must look at life differently now. Not at all! I still work too hard and do not find enough time to spend with family and friends. I looked at my cancer as nothing more than a blood disorder and something that I was going to beat.
quotes.author: James Fisher

quotes.quote: I wonât give up until weâve beaten blood cancers in children for good (currently 90% success rate) because I donât want any other kids to go through what I've been through. One day I even want to walk the North Pole!
quotes.author: Joe Smale

quotes.quote: The type of leukemia that I am dealing with is treatable. So if I do what my doctors tell me to do - get my blood checked regularly, take my meds and consult with my doctor and follow any additional instructions he might make - I will be able to maintain my good health and live my life with a minimum of disruptions to my lifestyle.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: I think everybody has their pain. For me, the time that I really had to grow up was when I was 15 and I had my best friend die of leukemia. Watching somebody so strong go through that is definitely something that will give you a little bit of depth. There have been a lot of things that have happened in my life that has forced me to grow up.
quotes.author: Lindsey Haun

quotes.quote: The unrelenting grip of Soldier's Syndrome slips finger by slow finger. The marrow's been affected-emotional leukemia at the deepest level. Transplants of love and friendship aid healing, yet time is still key, and the clock never ticks fast enough. Eternity gains perspective when seconds feel like years. How long have I been gone? Six eternities and counting.
quotes.author: Chila Woychik

quotes.quote: But the story of leukemia the story of cancer isn't the story of doctors who struggle and survive, moving from institution to another. It is the story of patients who struggle and survive, moving from on embankment of illness to another. Resilience, inventiveness, and survivorship qualities often ascribed to great physicians are reflected qualities, emanating first from those who struggle with illness and only then mirrored by those who treat them. If the history of medicine is told through the stories of doctors, it is because their contributions stand in place of the more substantive heroism of their patients.
quotes.author: Siddhartha Mukherjee

quotes.quote: My mum died of leukemia when I was in high school - she lost her life at 40. It was very hard, and I didn't do that much in Chicago after that. I actually sat around and didn't do anything for three years. I didn't know what I wanted to do anymore because my everything was gone. I was a mama's boy, and I had to turn into a man real quick.
quotes.author: Cory Hardrict

quotes.quote: The sky was pouring and so did her heart. Everything hidden were now oozing out.She had almost got him drenched in tears. She still had a lot to tell and he, a lot to hear. He had to know all that she had ever loved was he. That was their last rain together. And, that was a day before the doctor declared, she was in the last stage of Leukemia.
quotes.author: Shatabhisha Debata

quotes.quote: The fact that the general incidence of leukemia has doubled in the last two decades may be due, partly, to the increasing use of x-rays for numerous purposes. The incidence of leukemia in doctors, who are likely to be so exposed, is twice that of the general public. In radiologists â¦ the incidence is ten times greater.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: I support the Leukemia-Lymphoma Society. Stem cell research is a big part of curing these diseases. I'm a big supporter of stem cell research.
quotes.author: Jeff Gordon

quotes.quote: There was a lot of pain. I've broken a lot of bones out there, but it was what I loved doing. I didn't really choose to have leukemia. This is just a battle that was given me.
quotes.author: Susan Butcher

quotes.quote: I have a fan who suffered with leukemia, and apparently, the only thing that helped him through that was my music, so of course thatâs the ultimate sense of achievement. Itâs an incredible feeling.
quotes.author: James Arthur

quotes.quote: Your level of belief in yourself will inevitably manifest itself in whatever you do.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: By stretching yourself beyond your perceived level of confidence you accelerate your development of competence.
quotes.author: Michael J. Gelb

quotes.quote: The real democratic idea is, not that every man shall be on a level with every other, but that every one shall have liberty, without hindrance, to be what God made him
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: To be successful you have to be selfish, or else you never achieve. And once you get to your highest level, then you have to be unselfish. Stay reachable. Stay in touch. Don't isolate.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: The mass never comes up to the standard of its best member, but on the contrary degrades itself to a level with the lowest.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Every true man, sir, who is a little above the level of the beasts and plants does not live for the sake of living, without knowing how to live; but he lives so as to give a meaning and a value of his own to life.
quotes.author: Luigi Pirandillo

quotes.quote: Life externalizes at the level of our thought
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

quotes.quote: If you feel you are down on your luck, check the level of your effort
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Trust only movement. Life happens at the level of events, not of words. Trust movement
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: If you're playing with the best, you just rise up to that level
quotes.author: Tony Goldwyn

quotes.quote: The man who loves other countries as much as his own stands on a level with the man who loves other women as much as he loves his own wife.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: As experience widens, one begins to see how much upon a level all human things are.
quotes.author: Joseph Farrell

quotes.quote: A drawing is always dragged down to the level of its caption.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Expect your every need to be met. Expect the answer to every problem, expect abundance on every level...
quotes.author: Eileen Caddy

quotes.quote: Leverage is the ability to apply positive pressure on yourself to follow through on your decisions even when it hurts.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: Rich people use debt to leverage investments and grow cash flows. Poor people use debt to buy things that make rich people richer.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: The greatest leverage you can create for yourself is the pain that comes from inside, not outside. Knowing that you have failed to live up to your own standards for your life is the ultimate pain.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Life is based on leverage. The more you know how to leverage life, the more successful you will become.
quotes.author: Ehab Atalla

quotes.quote: People with leverage have dominance over people with less leverage. In other words, just as humans gained advantages over animals by creating leveraged tools, similarly, humans who use these tools of leverage have more power over humans that do not. Saying it more simply, 'leverage is power'.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Successful people donât use the obstacles of time, education, and money as excuses...they use them as leverage to get help.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: Fair play doesn't pertain in bargaining. What matters there is leverage.
quotes.author: Alan Rosenberg

quotes.quote: You never get what you deserve; only what you have the leverage to negotiate.
quotes.author: Jalen Rose

quotes.quote: Relationships are leverage. If you give value to someone else first, you have leverage.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuck

quotes.quote: Financial leverage is the advantage the rich have over the poor and middle class.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Celebrate what God has given others. Leverage what God has given you.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: When you combine ignorance and leverage, you get some pretty interesting results.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: One who sees the weakness of his strength can also leverage the strength of his weakness, readily, to his advantage.
quotes.author: Anuj Somany

quotes.quote: It is far more lucrative and fun to leverage your strengths instead of attempting to fix all the chinks in your armor.
quotes.author: Timothy Ferriss

quotes.quote: The leverage and influence social media gives citizens are rapidly spreading into the business world.
quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

quotes.quote: Leverage is the reason some people become rich and others do not become rich
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Leverage is everything-don't begin to pry until you've got the long arm on your side.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Brainpower is the ultimate leverage
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Denim comes and goes into style often, but my Levi's have longevity. They will never be just a fad.
quotes.author: Melina Matsoukas

quotes.quote: The story of Levi Strauss and the invention of blue jeans is mostly legend with threads of truth, which my version stretches to near popping
quotes.author: Tony Johnston

quotes.quote: The reputation of Levi's jeans lived on long after Strauss's death as the image of the Wild, Wild West took its place in American lore. Cowboys wearing Levi's gave the brand a rugged spirit of individualism. Casual and accessible, denim jeans were embraced by American youth as a symbol of rebellion.
quotes.author: Nick Carbone

quotes.quote: Despite common belief, Levi Strauss & Co. did not invent what we know as "jeans": there were plenty of similar denim pants made before. However, by adding rivets to areas that typically undertook the most stress, such as the pockets, Levi's found a way to make pants that would stand the test of time.Â
quotes.author: Sara Idacavage

quotes.quote: Renamed the 501 jean in 1890, the iconic American garment has evolved throughout the centuries from utilitarian uniform to personal style statement, worn by miners and cowboys to hippies and Hollywood bad boys alike.
quotes.author: Nerissa Pacio Itchon

quotes.quote: Levi'sâoriginally intended for use by goldminers and cowboysâhave become an integral part of the American way of life. Yet as the world's number-one manufacturer of branded clothing, Levi Strauss is a name known and beloved in more than 80 countries
quotes.author: Nancy House

quotes.quote: In the 60s, the 501 begins to show up at protest rallies in Berkeley, love-ins in San Francisco, and a little music festival in Bethel, NY called Woodstock. The 60s were all about universality and individuality, and the 501 was â and continues to be â the perfect expression of both.
quotes.author: Ibby Sasso

quotes.quote: It has no denim-toned house paint. Levi makes what is essentially a commodity: blue jeans. Its ads may evoke rugged outdoorsmanship, but Levi hasn't promoted any particular life style to sell other products.
quotes.author: Naomi Klein

quotes.quote: I tend to splurge on fancy dresses because I always think I'll get a lot of wear out of them, but it's false logic. You should really spend more money on the things you wear every day, like jeans.
quotes.author: Alexa Chung

quotes.quote: People associate clothes with actual behavior, and it's kind of crazy. If you get shot in some Levi's you don't go after Levi's. It's not the clothes. It's always the people.
quotes.author: Ice Cube

quotes.quote: I'm not a movie star. I'm a brand name. Van Damme is like Levi's. I go on vacation, and everywhere I go, people love me for my name, not for my movies.
quotes.author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

quotes.quote: Bacon is like a good pair of Levi's-it never goes out of style.
quotes.author: Michael Symon

quotes.quote: I came in with my idea of what a cowboy would wear, but then I met some real cowboys and they said that I rode the horses well, shoed the horses, but no good cowboy would be wearing a pair of Levi's. I had to get a good old pair of Wranglers.
quotes.author: Steve Kanaly

quotes.quote: The liar's punishment is, not in the least that he is not believed, but that he cannot believe anyone else.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Anybody who says they are a good liar obviously is not, because any legitimately savvy liar would always insist they're honest about everything.
quotes.author: Chuck Klosterman

quotes.quote: No one believes a liar. Even when she's telling the truth.
quotes.author: Sara Shepard

quotes.quote: A storyteller makes up things to help other people; a liar makes up things to help himself.
quotes.author: Daniel Wallace

quotes.quote: There is beauty in truth, even if it's painful. Those who lie, twist life so that it looks tasty to the lazy, brilliant to the ignorant, and powerful to the weak. But lies only strengthen our defects. They don't teach anything, help anything, fix anything or cure anything. Nor do they develop one's character, one's mind, one's heart or one's soul.
quotes.author: Jose N. Harris

quotes.quote: If you look up 'charming' in the dictionary, you'll see that it not only has references to strong attraction, but to spells and magic. Then again, what are liars if not great magicians?
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: I've studied pathological liars, and anything they say, they believe, and that's one of the reasons they're so convincing, because they have no connection with the truth. It's a dead issue. It's like they're color-blind to the truth. So anything that comes out of their mouths is their reality.
quotes.author: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quotes.quote: Liars share with those they deceive the desire not to be deceived.
quotes.author: Sissela Bok

quotes.quote: He who does not bellow the truth when he knows the truth makes himself the accomplice of liars and forgers.
quotes.author: Charles Peguy

quotes.quote: Those who think it is permissible to tell white lies soon grow color-blind.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: The hardest tumble a man can make is to fall over his own bluff.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: But he that sows lies in the end shall not lack of a harvest, and soon he may rest from toil indeed, while others reap and sow in his stead.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: It is always the best policy to tell the truth, unless, of course, you are an exceptionally good liar.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.quote: No man has a good enough memory to make a successful liar.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Lying is done with words, and also with silence.
quotes.author: Adrienne Rich

quotes.quote: A good liar knows that the most efficient lie is always a truth that has had a key piece removed from it.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.quote: Sometimes it is easier to see clearly into the liar than into the man who tells the truth. Truth, like light, blinds. Falsehood, on the contrary, is a beautiful twilight that enhances every object.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: A good liar must remember his lies.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Liars are the cause of all the sins and crimes in the world.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Clever liars give details, but the cleverest don't.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: While photographs may not lie, liars may photograph.
quotes.author: Lewis Hine

quotes.quote: Liars are always ready to take oaths.
quotes.author: Vittorio Alfieri

quotes.quote: Of all the liars in the world, sometimes the worst are your own fears.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: The essence of lying is in deception, not in words.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: A lie is enough to prove you are a liar. Lies help people to forget about the things you have done in the past and remain constant for whole future as doubt.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: The trust of the innocent is the liar's most useful tool.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: All men are born truthful and die liars.
quotes.author: Vauvenargues

quotes.quote: Liars are always most disposed to swear.
quotes.author: Vittorio Alfieri

quotes.quote: I don't debate with liars.
quotes.author: Evo Morales

quotes.quote: I do myself a greater injury in lying than I do him of whom I tell a lie.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Conservatives believe in equality of opportunity. Liberals believe in equality of outcome.
quotes.author: Mike Rosen

quotes.quote: A liberal is a man who will give away everything he doesn't own.
quotes.author: Frank Dane

quotes.quote: The trouble with our liberal friends is not that they are ignorant, but that they know so much that isn't so.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: A liberal is a man or a woman or a child who looks forward to a better day, a more tranquil night, and a bright, infinite future.
quotes.author: Leonard Bernstein

quotes.quote: Enraging liberals is simply one of the more enjoyable side effects of my wisdom.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: A liberal is a man too broadminded to take his own side in a quarrel.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Extremes to the right and to the left of any political dispute are always wrong.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Liberals are the greatest proponents of reason.
quotes.author: Bill Branyon

quotes.quote: Conservatives want to make the poor rich, while liberals want to make the rich poor.
quotes.author: Mark W. Smith

quotes.quote: Liberalism is the wolf on the sled dog team.
quotes.author: Susan Stamper Brown

quotes.quote: Liberalism is to freedom as anarchism is to anarchy.
quotes.author: Ernst JÃ¼nger

quotes.quote: The liberals can understand everything but people who don't understand them.
quotes.author: Lenny Bruce

quotes.quote: A liberal knows that the only certainty in this life is change but believes that the change can be directed toward a constructive end.
quotes.author: Henry A. Wallace

quotes.quote: A liberal is a man too broad-minded to take his own side in a quarrel.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Liberals feel unworthy of their possessions. Conservatives feel they deserve everything they've stolen.
quotes.author: Mort Sahl

quotes.quote: Liberalism itself has failed, and for a pretty good reason. It has been too often compromised by the people who represented it.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: The trouble with our Liberal friends is not that they're ignorant; it's just that they know so much that isn't so.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The one thing people are the most liberal with, is their advice.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Liberalism is a belief in radical change made through practical measures.
quotes.author: Adam Gopnik

quotes.quote: Outrage is easy, cheap, and oversold. The nation needs less anger and more thoughtful reflection, less shouting and more listening, less dissembling and more honesty.
quotes.author: Mario Cuomo

quotes.quote: Liberalism is trust of the people tempered by prudence; conservatism, distrust of the people tempered by fear.
quotes.author: William E. Gladstone

quotes.quote: A liberal is a conservative who has been arrested.
quotes.author: Tom Wolfe

quotes.quote: The Liberals are the flying saucers of politics. No one can make head nor tail of them and they never are seen twice in the same place.
quotes.author: John G. Diefenbaker

quotes.quote: The essence of the liberal outlook lies not in what opinions are held, but in how they are held: instead of being held dogmatically, they are held tentatively, and with a consciousness that new evidence may at any moment lead to their abandonment.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: A liberal is a man or woman or a child who looks forward to a better day, a more tranquil night, and a bright, infinite future.
quotes.author: Leonard Bernstein

quotes.quote: A liberal is a man who is willing to spend somebody else's money.
quotes.author: Carter Glass

quotes.quote: A liberal is a power worshipper without the power.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: A liberal: someone who thinks he knows more about your experience than you do.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Liberals are not always so liberal with people who disapprove - disapprove of their point of view.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: Those who are in a position of strength have a responsibility to protect the weak.
quotes.author: Thomas Cushman

quotes.quote: The greatest force of personal liberation is the decision to widen our circle of compassion, moving from focus on self to focus on service.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: The true value of a human being can be found in the degree to which he has attained liberation from the self.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The paths to liberation are numerous, but the bank along the way is always the same, the Bank of Karma, where the liberation account of each of us is credited or debited depending on our actions.
quotes.author: Yann Martel

quotes.quote: Self-realization is liberation. Liberation is self-realization.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Liberation is an ever shifting horizon, a total ideology that can never fulfill its promises. It has the therapeutic quality of providing emotionally charged rituals of solidarity in hatred - it is the amphetamine of its believers.
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.quote: For to be free is not merely to cast off one's chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Zen is a way of liberation, concerned not with discovering what is good or bad or advantageous, but what is.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Freeing oneself from words is liberation.
quotes.author: Bodhidharma

quotes.quote: The liberation of the earth, the liberation of women, the liberation of all humanity is the next step of freedom we need to work for, and it's the next step of peace that we need to create.
quotes.author: Vandana Shiva

quotes.quote: National liberation is necessarily an act of culture.
quotes.author: Amilcar Cabral

quotes.quote: If you are angry or in pain, separate yourself from anger and pain and watch them. Externalization is the first step to liberation.
quotes.author: Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj

quotes.quote: Liberation does not concern the person, for liberation is freedom from the person. Basically the disciple and teacher are identical. Both are the timeless axis of all action and preception. The only difference is that one 'knows' himself for what he is while the other does not. The idea of being a person, an ego, is nothing other than an image held together by memory.
quotes.author: Jean Klein

quotes.quote: Once freedom is equated with a certain material standard of living, confiscation becomes the path to liberation.
quotes.author: James Bovard

quotes.quote: It's a kind of liberation to break free in language, if you can break free, but it's also a confinement, because form confines you - whatever the form.
quotes.author: Gerald Stern

quotes.quote: Liberation and equal-rights issues notwithstanding, it was a man's job to make a woman feel cherished and respected.
quotes.author: Tom Clancy

quotes.quote: Any attempt at liberation, no matter how great it might be, if it does not take into consideration the necessity of dissolving the ego, it is condemned to failure.
quotes.author: Samael Aun Weor

quotes.quote: Women's liberation will not be achieved until a woman can become paunchy and bald and still think that she's attractive to the opposite sex.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: Freedom means the power to act by soul guidance, not by the compulsions of desires and habits. Obeying the ego leads to bondage; obeying the soul brings liberation.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: Liberation is the path of transcendence. Manifestation is the path of immanence. Both lead to the same place: the divine.
quotes.author: Anodea Judith

quotes.quote: The dream is the liberation of the spirit from the pressure of external nature, a detachment of the soul from the fetters of matter.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The true liberation, the true path to freedom, lay in the ability to forgive.
quotes.author: Alyson Noel

quotes.quote: Women's liberation could have not succeeded if science had not provided them with contraception and household technology.
quotes.author: Max Perutz

quotes.quote: Liberation means you don't have to be silenced.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Liberation is not deliverance.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Liberation from every form of exploitation, the possibility of a more human and dignified life, the creation of a new humankind - all pass through this struggle.
quotes.author: Gustavo GutiÃ©rrez

quotes.quote: The liberation cannot be reached but by means of the perception of the identity of the individual spirit with the universal spirit.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The prison life of the past looks in our own time like liberation itself.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.quote: Liberation does not come from outside.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Creativeness is liberation from slavery. Man is free when he finds himself in a state of creative activity. Creativeness leads to ecstasy of the moment. The products of creativeness are within time, but the creative act itself lies outside time.
quotes.author: Nikolai Berdyaev

quotes.quote: Liberation that raises a cry against others is no true liberation. Liberation that means revolutions of hate and violence and takes away lives of others or abases the dignity of others cannot be true liberty.
quotes.author: Oscar Romero

quotes.quote: Underlying most arguments against the free market is a lack of belief in freedom itself.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: Liberty lies in the hearts of men and women; when it dies there, no constitution, no law, no court can save it.
quotes.author: Learned Hand

quotes.quote: Libertarian principles are very simple, but you can't violate any of them and still call yourself Libertarian.
quotes.author: John McAfee

quotes.quote: He considered himself an anarchist, and his core beliefs were developing and supporting people's right to freedom.
quotes.author: Jim Smith

quotes.quote: Libertarians believe consenting adults have the right to do whatever they choose, except band together.
quotes.author: Emo Philips

quotes.quote: Libertarians recognize the inevitable pluralism of the modern world and for that reason assert that individual liberty is at least part of the common good.
quotes.author: Tom G. Palmer

quotes.quote: When the people fear their government, their is tyranny; when the government fears the people, there is liberty.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: A Libertarian society of unfettered individualism spreads its benefits to virtually everyone not just those who have the resources to seize political power.
quotes.author: Harry Browne
