quotes.quote: Libertarianism holds that the only proper role of violence is to defend person and property against violence, that any use of violence that goes beyond such just defense is itself aggressive, unjust, and criminal
quotes.author: Murray N. Rothbard

quotes.quote: The libertarian can have no truck with left or right because he regrets any form of authoritarianism.
quotes.author: Leonard Read

quotes.quote: For libertarians, freedom entails the right of people to live their lives any way they choose, so long as their conduct is peaceful. For conservatives, freedom entails the right of government to do just about anything it wants, even if its conduct is violent.
quotes.author: Jacob Hornberger

quotes.quote: Whether you're a libertarian liberal or a more egalitarian liberal, the idea is that justice means being non-judgmental with respect to the preferences people bring to public life.
quotes.author: Michael Sandel

quotes.quote: Libertarianism is the philosophy which says that you can run your life better than the government can, and you have the right to be left alone in order to do it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Libertarians recognize the difference between adults and children, as well as differences between normal adults and adults who are insane or mentally hindered or retarded.
quotes.author: Tom G. Palmer

quotes.quote: The difference between libertarianism and socialism is that libertarians will tolerate the existence of a socialist community, but socialists can't tolerate a libertarian community.
quotes.author: David D. Boaz

quotes.quote: Libertarians make no exceptions to the golden rule and provide no moral loophole, no double standard, for government.
quotes.author: Murray N. Rothbard

quotes.quote: Libertarians typically argue that particular obligations, at least under normal circumstances, must be created by consent; they cannot be unilaterally imposed by others.
quotes.author: Tom G. Palmer

quotes.quote: If we wish to preserve a free society, it is essential that we recognize that the desirability of a particular object is not sufficient justification for the use of coercion.
quotes.author: Friedrich Hayek

quotes.quote: If a nation values anything more than freedom, it will lose its freedom; and the irony of it is that if it is comfort or money that it values more, it will lose that, too.
quotes.author: Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Any society that would give up a little liberty to gain a little security will deserve neither and lose both.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Liberty is the only thing you cannot have unless you are willing to give it to others.
quotes.author: William Allen White

quotes.quote: A libertarian is a person who believes that no one has the right, under any circumstances, to initiate force against another human being, or to advocate or delegate its initiation. Those who act consistently with this principle are libertarians, whether they realize it or not. Those who fail to act consistently with it are not libertarians, regardless of what they may claim.
quotes.author: L. Neil Smith

quotes.quote: Libertarian socialism is properly to be regarded as the inheritor of the liberal ideals of the enlightenment.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Liberty will never yield equality. Freewill produces a mess that you either accept or reject in favor of slavery.
quotes.author: A.E. Samaan

quotes.quote: Libertarians are constantly arguing with each other who is the most pure libertarian and who is most ideologically pure.
quotes.author: John Mackey

quotes.quote: So long as the people do not care to exercise their freedom, those who wish to tyrannize will do so; for tyrants are active and ardent, and will devote themselves in the name of any number of gods, religious and otherwise, to put shackles upon sleeping men.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Libertarianism is a theory of politics that is so compelling that once you have absorbed it, it becomes the lens through which you end up understanding all economic and political events.
quotes.author: Llewellyn Rockwell

quotes.quote: The Libertarian position on the freedom of speech is a strong support of freedom of speech, and we oppose government intervention in controlling what is or is not moral.
quotes.author: Michael Badnarik

quotes.quote: A libertarian is just an anarchist on the gold standard.
quotes.author: Alexis Gilliland

quotes.quote: Any terrorism is an attack on libertarian values.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Liberty is always dangerous, but it is the safest thing we have.
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: Liberty, when it begins to take root, is a plant of rapid growth.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Liberty doesn't work as well in practice as it does in speeches.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Liberty means responsibility. That is why most men dread it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Liberty is maintained by responsible freedom.
quotes.author: Roger W Hancock

quotes.quote: Liberty without learning is always in peril; learning without liberty is always in vain.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The love of liberty is the love of others; the love of power is the love of ourselves.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Liberty lies in the hearts of men and women; when it dies there, no constitution, no law, no court can save it.... While it lies there, it needs no constitution, no law, no court to save it.
quotes.author: Learned Hand

quotes.quote: I prefer liberty to chains of diamonds.
quotes.author: Lady Mary Wortley Montagu

quotes.quote: The basis of a democratic state is liberty.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Absolute liberty is absence of restraint; responsibility is restraint; therefore, the ideally free individual is responsible to himself.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: Life without liberty is like a body without spirit.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: The tree of liberty needs to be watered from time totime with the blood of patriots and tyrants.
quotes.author: Lyn Nofziger

quotes.quote: Liberty for wolves is death to the lambs.
quotes.author: Isaiah Berlin

quotes.quote: But what is liberty without wisdom, and without virtue? It is the greatest of all possible evils; for it is folly, vice, and madness, without tuition or restraint.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: There can be no liberty without the law.
quotes.author: Cecil B. DeMille

quotes.quote: Liberty is the only thing you can't have unless you give it to others.
quotes.author: William Allen White

quotes.quote: When liberty comes with hands dabbled in blood it is hard to shake hands with her.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If liberty means anything at all, it means the right to tell people what they do not want to hear.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: The true character of liberty is independence, maintained by force.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Liberty is the power that we have over ourselves.
quotes.author: Hugo Grotius

quotes.quote: Liberty, then, is the sovereignty of the individual, and never shall man know liberty until each and every individual is acknowledged to be the only legitimate sovereign of his or her person, time, and property, each living and acting at his own cost; and not until we live in a society where each can exercise his right of sovereignty at all times without clashing with or violating that of others.
quotes.author: Josiah Warren

quotes.quote: Our liberty will not be secured at the sword's point... We must secure it by making ourselves worthy of it. And when the people reaches that height, God will provide a weapon, the idols will be shattered, tyranny will crumble like a house of cards, and liberty will shine out like the first dawn.
quotes.author: Jose Rizal

quotes.quote: There can be no liberty for a community which lacks the means by which to detect lies.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: The liberty of the individual is no gift of civilization. It was greatest before there was any civilization.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Liberty cannot be preserved without general knowledge among the people.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: Excess of liberty, whether it lies in state or individuals, seems only to pass into excess of slavery.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Liberty is an acknowledgement of faith in God and His works.
quotes.author: Frederic Bastiat

quotes.quote: Liberty will not descend to a people; a people must raise themselves to liberty; it is a blessing that must be earned before it can be enjoyed.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Liberty is like rich food and strong wine: the strong natures accustomed to them thrive and grow even stronger on them; but they deplete, inebriate and destroy the weak.
quotes.author: Jean Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: I'm pretty good at thinking about everything - all of my consequences - before I make a decision, and I think about everything that's going to happen because of that decision. I'm a Libra, and I'm very strategic.
quotes.author: Hilary Duff

quotes.quote: I always feel more grounded and stable when I have balance in my life; I'm a Libra!
quotes.author: Laura Regan

quotes.quote: Sometimes in my life I feel like a bit of a sorceress who can't totally control all their power. I'm a Libra, so... Libra women are pretty magical.
quotes.author: Olivia Thirlby

quotes.quote: The whole business with the fossilized dinosaur skeletons was a joke the paleontologists haven't seen yet. This proves two things: Firstly, that God moves in extremely mysterious, not to say, circuitous ways. God does not play dice with the universe; Secondly, the Earth's a Libra.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Libra is the Scales, sir. Justice maybe? The idol could be a statue by the Law Courts.
quotes.author: DS Peter Jakes

quotes.quote: The Libra husband is reasonable. He is a born judge, and no other zodiacal type can order his life with so much wisdom." God! That's all I need: order! That's all I need: an ordered life. You know, a manager. But he's *got* to be a Libran.
quotes.author: Edith 'Little Edie' Bouvier Beale

quotes.quote: Sat in Libra's Bowl, where it's all, it's all, it's all / It's all, balancing / It's the black in the grate / The smoke in the sink / It's the ether that you and I / Opted to drink / It's the tooth that was chipped / On the first ever kiss / It's you and it's me and that's what it is.
quotes.author: Alison Moyet

quotes.quote: Billy is a Libra, a sign of love / Billy has a one-track mind / He's great in the kitchen and never complains / He's the happily married kind.
quotes.author: Benjamin Weisman

quotes.quote: When the bright Virgin gives the beauteous days, / And Libra weighs in equal scales the year; / From Heaven's high cope the fierce effulgence shook / Of parting Summer, a serener blue, / With golden light enliven'd, wide invests / The happy world. Attemper'd suns arise, / Sweet-beam'd, and shedding oft through lucid clouds / A pleasing calm; while broad, and brown, below / Extensive harvests hang the heavy head.
quotes.author: James Thomson

quotes.quote: Therewith the moone's exaltation,* *rising / *In meane* Libra, gan alway ascend, *in the middle of* / As we were ent'ring at a thorpe's* end. *village's / For which our Host, as he was wont to gie,* *govern / As in this case, our jolly company, / Said in this wise; 'Lordings every one, / Now lacketh us no more tales than one.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quotes.quote: I am a Libra so I have to balance things.
quotes.author: Mark Viduka

quotes.quote: Libras hate to see others hurthing, but when you irritate them their temper can be destructive.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: No need to give Libra orders. They won't obey them anyway.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Blaze all way to the Libra back to the cheater.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The elegance is as physical, as moral quality that has nothing common with the clothing. You can see a countrywoman more elegant than one so called elegant woman.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Libras receive great pleasure by pleasing and helping others.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: As a Libra you win people over with your charm.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Never lose an opportunity of seeing anything beautiful, for beauty is God's handwriting.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A libra is skilled enough to be one step ahead, but make you believe they are one step behind.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Librarians are generals in the war on ignorance.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Librarians lend people books from the library. The best librarians are children's book librarians.
quotes.author: Richard Scarry

quotes.quote: Not all librarians are evil cultists. Some librarians are instead vengeful undead who want to suck your soul.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: Librarians as a race tend to be tedious.
quotes.author: Peter Shaffer

quotes.quote: The Librarian liked being best man. You were allowed to kiss bridesmaids, and they weren't allowed to run away.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Librarians save lives: by handing the right book, at the right time, to a kid in need.
quotes.author: Judy Blume

quotes.quote: Google can bring you back 100,000 answers. A librarian can bring you back the right one.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Librarians are tour-guides for all of knowledge.
quotes.author: Patrick Ness

quotes.quote: Information is valuable. Librarians and libraries are, at best incidental; at worst, in the way.
quotes.author: Donald A. Barclay

quotes.quote: In general, librarians enjoyed special requests. A reference librarian is someone who likes the chase. When librarians read for pleasure, they often pick a good mystery.
quotes.author: Karen Joy Fowler

quotes.quote: Librarians are the secret masters of the world. They control information. Don't ever piss one off.
quotes.author: Spider Robinson

quotes.quote: Librarians consider free access to information the foundation of democracy.
quotes.author: Marilyn Johnson

quotes.quote: Love with librarians mean love with books.
quotes.author: Abid Hussain

quotes.quote: Good librarians are natural intelligence operatives. They possess all of the skills and characteristics required for that work: curiosity, wide-ranging knowledge, good memories, organization and analytical aptitude, and discretion.
quotes.author: Marilyn Johnson

quotes.quote: Bad libraries build collections, good libraries build services, great libraries build communities.
quotes.author: R. David Lankes

quotes.quote: Books are the quietest and most constant of friends; they are the most accessible and wisest of counselors, and the most patient of teachers.
quotes.author: Charles William Eliot

quotes.quote: To be a librarian is not to be neutral, or passive, or waiting for a question. It is to be a radical positive change agent within your community.
quotes.author: R. David Lankes

quotes.quote: The librarian must be the librarian militant before he can be the librarian triumphant.
quotes.author: Melvil Dewey

quotes.quote: The librarian isn't a clerk who happens to work in a library. A librarian is a data hound, a guide, a sherpa and a teacher. The librarian is the interface between reams of data and the untrained but motivated user.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Librarians are on the front lines of an invisible struggle over our information diet and, for better or worse, the scales are not tipping in their direction.
quotes.author: Peter Morville

quotes.quote: When the going gets tough, the tough get a librarian.
quotes.author: Joan Bauer

quotes.quote: It is an awfully sad misconception that librarians simply check books in and out. The library is the heart of a school, and without a librarian, it is but an empty shell.
quotes.author: Jarrett J. Krosoczka

quotes.quote: You can take the girl out of the library, but you can't take the neurotic, compulsively curious librarian out of the girl.
quotes.author: Molly Harper

quotes.quote: Librarians have always been among the most thoughtful and helpful people. They are teachers without a classroom.
quotes.author: Willard Scott

quotes.quote: Librarians are almost always very helpful and often almost absurdly knowledgeable. Their skills are probably very underestimated and largely underemployed.
quotes.author: Charles Medawar

quotes.quote: Don't mark up the Library's copy, you fool! Librarians are Unprankable. They'll track you down! They have skills!
quotes.author: Charles Ogden

quotes.quote: Librarian is a service occupation. Gas station attendant of the mind.
quotes.author: Richard Powers

quotes.quote: The most important asset of any library goes home at night Ã¢â¬â the library staff.
quotes.author: Timothy Healy

quotes.quote: We need librarians who can handle this tremendous jumble of information that is in cyberspace.
quotes.author: Robert Darnton

quotes.quote: Never argue with a librarian; they know too much.
quotes.author: Carole Nelson Douglas

quotes.quote: To build up a library is to create a life. It's never just a random collection of books.
quotes.author: Carlos Maria Dominguez

quotes.quote: Without libraries what have we? We have no past and no future.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Libraries will get you through times of no money better than money will get you through times of no libraries.
quotes.author: Anne Herbert

quotes.quote: The most important asset of any library goes home at night-the library staff.
quotes.author: Timothy Healy

quotes.quote: People can lose their lives in libraries. They ought to be warned.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: I have found the most valuable thing in my wallet is my library card.
quotes.author: Laura Bush

quotes.quote: A library is the delivery room for the birth of ideas, a place where history comes to life.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: I ransack public libraries, and find them full of sunk treasure.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Libraries store the energy that fuels the imagination. They open up windows to the world and inspire us to explore and achieve, and contribute to improving our quality of life. Libraries change lives for the better.
quotes.author: Sidney Sheldon

quotes.quote: A library is not a luxury but one of the necessities of life.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Libraries raised me.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Libraries allow children to ask questions about the world and find the answers. And the wonderful thing is that once a child learns to use a library, the doors to learning are always open.
quotes.author: Laura Bush

quotes.quote: Libraries are our friends.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: What a school thinks about its library is a measure of what it feels about education.
quotes.author: Harold Howe

quotes.quote: A library is a place where you learn what teachers were afraid to teach you.
quotes.author: Alan M. Dershowitz

quotes.quote: The love of libraries, like most loves, must be learned.
quotes.author: Alberto Manguel

quotes.quote: Libraries are not, never will be, used by everyone.
quotes.author: Alberto Manguel

quotes.quote: The love of libraries, like most loves, must be learned.
quotes.author: Alberto Manguel

quotes.quote: In a library, no empty shelf remains empty for long.
quotes.author: Alberto Manguel

quotes.quote: Libraries are the future of reading.
quotes.author: Courtney Milan

quotes.quote: Libraries: Here is where people, one frequently finds, lower their voices, and raise their minds.
quotes.author: Richard Armour

quotes.quote: Libraries are not made; they grow.
quotes.author: Augustine BIRRELL

quotes.quote: My grandma always said that God made libraries so that people didn't have any excuse to be stupid.
quotes.author: Joan Bauer

quotes.quote: Your library is your paradise.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: Great libraries have always looked to both the future and the past.
quotes.author: Laura Shapiro

quotes.quote: If information is the currency of democracy, then libraries are its banks.
quotes.author: Wendell H. Ford

quotes.quote: In the library, one often finds people close their mouths and open their minds!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A great library contains the diary of the human race.
quotes.author: George Mercer Dawson

quotes.quote: A truly great library contains something in it to offend everyone.
quotes.author: Jo Godwin

quotes.quote: Libraries were full of ideas perhaps the most dangerous and powerful of all weapons.
quotes.author: Sarah J. Maas

quotes.quote: Above all, don't lie to yourself. The man who lies to himself and listens to his own lie comes to a point that he cannot distinguish the truth within him, or around him, and so loses all respect for himself and for others. And having no respect he ceases to love.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: Lies require commitment.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: If you tell a big enough lie and tell it frequently enough, it will be believed.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.quote: Things come apart so easily when they have been held together with lies.
quotes.author: Dorothy Allison

quotes.quote: Man is not what he thinks he is, he is what he hides.
quotes.author: Andr_ Malraux

quotes.quote: A lie can travel halfway around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Every violation of truth is not only a sort of suicide in the liar, but is a stab at the health of human society._
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: False words are not only evil in themselves, but they infect the soul with evil._
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: He who permits himself to tell a lie once, finds it much easier to do it a second and a third time till at length it becomes habitual.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: There is nothing in the world more shameful than establishing one's self on lies and fables.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: A lie with a purpose is one of the worst kind, and the most profitable.
quotes.author: Finley Peter Dunne

quotes.quote: Lying increases the creative faculties, expands the ego, lessens the friction of social contacts. It is only in lies, wholeheartedly and bravely told, that human nature attains through words and speech the forbearance, the nobility, the romance, the idealism, that -- being what it is -- it falls so short of in fact and in deed.
quotes.author: Clare Boothe Luce

quotes.quote: I detest the man who hides one thing in the depth of his heart and speaks forth another.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: With lies you may go ahead in the world, but you can never go back.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: The least initial deviation from the truth is multiplied later a thousandfold._
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: A lie has speed, but truth has endurance.
quotes.author: Edgar J. Mohn

quotes.quote: We tell lies when we are afraid... afraid of what we don't know, afraid of what others will think, afraid of what will be found out about us. But every time we tell a lie, the thing that we fear grows stronger.
quotes.author: Tad Williams

quotes.quote: When you tell a lie, you steal someone's right to the truth.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: A single lie destroys a whole reputation of integrity.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: A lie does not consist in the indirect position of words, but in the desire and intention, by false speaking, to deceive and injure your neighbour.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: By a lie, a man...annihilates his dignity as a man.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: We lie loudest when we lie to ourselves.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: He who permits himself to tell a lie once, finds it much easier to do it a second and a third time till at length it becomes habitual.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: A successful lie cannot be brought into this world and capriciously abandoned; like any committed relationship, it must be maintained, and with far more devotion than the truth, which carries on being carelessly true without any help.
quotes.author: Lionel Shriver

quotes.quote: People do not believe lies because they have to, but because they want to.
quotes.author: Malcolm Muggeridge

quotes.quote: A lie never lives to be old.
quotes.author: Sophocles quotes

quotes.quote: The more you defend a lie, the angrier you become.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Because everybody lies. It's part of living in society. Don't get me wrong - I think it's necessary. The last thing anyone wants is to live in a society where total honesty prevails. Can you imagine the conversations? You're short and fat, one person might say, and the other might answer, I know. But you smell bad. It just wouldn't work. So people lie by omission all the time. People will tell you most of the story...and I've learned that the part they neglect to tell you is often the most important part. People hide the truth because they're afraid.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: A lie will easily get you out of a scrape, and yet, strangely and beautifully, rapture possesses you when you have taken the scrape and left out the lie.
quotes.author: C. E. Montague

quotes.quote: Falsehood is so easy, truth so difficult....Examine your words well, and you will find that even when you have no motive to be false, it is a very hard thing to say the exact truth, even about your own immediate feelings -- much harder than to say something fine about them which is_not_the exact truth.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Life isn't complicated if you don't break your concentration on your true vision.
quotes.author: Robert Randle

quotes.quote: Life is a privilege / Its youthful days shine with the radiance of continuous Mays.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Life is given to us / we earn it by giving it.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Life is a timelessly unshakable victory of marvelously majestic honesty / over the horrendously squelched web of disconcertingly malicious deceit
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Life in the world is short / Why shoulder an unnecessary load / Of worldly relationships?
quotes.author: Mirabai

quotes.quote: Life is like a roller coaster / you will have your ups and your downs / you just need to get over it.
quotes.author: Angelina Sabia

quotes.quote: What is life? I try to see / What is life? It's unity / What is life? Life is a dream / What is life? Life is a treat
quotes.author: Derrick Simpson

quotes.quote: There is a beauty at the goal of life / A beauty growing since the world began, / Through every age and race, through lapse and strife / Till the great human soul complete her span.
quotes.author: Archibald Lampman

quotes.quote: Life has its ups and downs / As we all have experienced / But what a wonderful reality / We all share- if we are objective.
quotes.author: Liam Ã ComÃ¡in

quotes.quote: Life's not promised to anyone / Live today and love someone / Don't live life so critical / Make room for your miracle
quotes.author: Derek Allen

quotes.quote: My life has been the poem / I would have writ / But I could not both live / and utter it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Life is a divine adventure.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Life is holy endured faith.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Life is the soul's nursery - Its training place for the destinies of eternity.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: Life is too short to be little. You must enlarge your imagination and then act on it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Every life is worthy and every life is capable of greatness. We have an obligation to make sure that opportunity for greatness is there.
quotes.author: Condoleezza Rice

quotes.quote: A human life is a story told by God.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: All of life is the exercise of risk.
quotes.author: William Sloane Coffin

quotes.quote: Life is a lively process of becoming.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: Life is never free of contradictions.
quotes.author: Manmohan Singh

quotes.quote: Life is a perpetual yesterday for us.
quotes.author: Alice Sebold

quotes.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Life is inherently risky. There is only one big risk you should avoid at all costs, and that is the risk of doing nothing.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.
quotes.author: Arthur Rubinstein

quotes.quote: We all have two lives. The second one starts when we realize we only have one.
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.quote: You get in life what you have the courage to ask for.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: When one door closes, another opens; but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one that has opened for us.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Death must be so beautiful. To lie in the soft brown earth, with the grasses waving above one's head, and listen to silence. To have no yesterday, and no to-morrow. To forget time, to forgive life, to be at peace.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Let us so live that when we come to die even the undertaker will be sorry.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Life and death are one thread, the same line viewed from different sides.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: If a man can bridge the gap between life and death, if he can live on after he's dead, then maybe he was a great man.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: Death is not something you get over. It's the rip that exposes life in a before and after chasm, and all you can do is try to exist as best you can in the after.
quotes.author: Lily Graham

quotes.quote: When confronted with two alternatives, life and death, one is to choose death without hesitation.
quotes.author: Yamamoto Tsunetomo

quotes.quote: Life and death are illusions. We are in a constant state of transformation.
quotes.author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quotes.quote: Life is eternal, and love is immortal,Life is eternal, and love is immortal, and death is only a horizon; and a horizon is nothing save the limit of our sight.
quotes.author: Rossiter Worthington Raymond

quotes.quote: Death is the destination we all share, no one has ever escaped it. And that is as it should be because death is very likely the single best invention of life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: It is possible to provide security against other ills, but as far as death is concerned, we men live in a city without walls.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: It's matters not how a man dies, but how he lives.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: We trouble our life by thoughts about death, and our death by thoughts about life.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Life was such a fragile thing as delicate and as beautiful as a butterfly, as ephemeral as a sunset. Death is peaceful. Death is quiet, silent. It is calming.
quotes.author: Akanksha

quotes.quote: Death is a stripping away of all that is not you. The secret of life is to 'die before you die'â and find that there is no death.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: The real question is not whether life exists after death. The real question is whether you are alive before death.
quotes.author: Osho Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The anguish of death hangs over and leads the human spirit to wonder about the mysteries of existence, man's destiny, life, the world.
quotes.author: E. Morin

quotes.quote: I would rather die a meaningful death than to live a meaningless life.
quotes.author: Corazon Aquino

quotes.quote: The certainty of death and the uncertainty of the hour of death is a source of grief throughout our life.
quotes.author: E. Morin

quotes.quote: If one was to think constantly of death, the business of life would stand still.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Death is the veil which those who live call life; They sleep, and it is lifted.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: God conceals from men the happiness of death that they may endure life.
quotes.author: Marcus Annaeus Lucanus

quotes.quote: The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: Even death is not to be feared by one who has lived wisely.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
quotes.author: Marcus Aelius Aurelius

quotes.quote: If we don't know life, how can we know death?
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Death is not extinguishing the light; it is only putting out the lamp because the dawn has come.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: After all, to the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.
quotes.author: J K Rowling

quotes.quote: For life and death are one, even as the river and the sea are one.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: There is no pause in life, the moment we pause, we stop living.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: If you want your children to turn out well, spend twice as much time with them and half as much money on them.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: I have a simple philosophy: Fill whatâs empty. Empty whatâs full. Scratch where it itches.
quotes.author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quotes.quote: I wish I had not been in a hurry to get on to the next thing: dinner, bath, book, bed. I wish I had treasured the doing a little more and the getting it done a little less.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: I have the feeling that in a balanced life one should die penniless. The trick is dismantling.
quotes.author: Art Garfunkel

quotes.quote: Women need real moments of solitude and self-reflection to balance out how much of ourselves we give away.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: I have so much admiration for women who are mothers, who balance family and work.
quotes.author: Beyonce

quotes.quote: The critical part of a balance in life is choosing priorities. If you are trying to balance a family and a career, the choices are complex because both are important.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: We need to introduce a little balance into your life. Part of this balance means not missing out on some of the marvels of life around you, the fun, some excitement, or other challenges in life.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: I think Iâve discovered the secret of life â you just hang around until you get used to it.
quotes.author: Charles Schulz

quotes.quote: Like with anything in life, find the balance between too much work and being too lazy; between spending too much and being a scrooge; between being gone all the time and being in each otherâs way; between talking each otherâs ears off and dead silence.
quotes.author: Christian Olsen

quotes.quote: Do we work for and pay for all this convenience in order to live our lives, or do we live our lives in order to work for and pay for all this convenience?
quotes.author: Colin Beavan

quotes.quote: Life is a great big canvas, and you should throw all the paint on it you can.
quotes.author: Danny Kaye

quotes.quote: We have overstretched our personal boundaries and forgotten that true happiness comes from living an authentic life fueled with a sense of purpose and balance.
quotes.author: Dr. Kathleen Hall

quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind donât matter and those who matter donât mind.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Life is the game that must be played.
quotes.author: Edwin Arlington Robinson

quotes.quote: Be moderate in order to taste the joys of life in abundance.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: We can be sure that the greatest hope for maintaining equilibrium in the face of any situation rests within ourselves.
quotes.author: Francis J. Braceland

quotes.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be.
quotes.author: Grandma Moses

quotes.quote: Striving for excellence motivates you; striving for perfection is demoralizing.
quotes.author: Harriet Braiker

quotes.quote: Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no ones definition of your life, but define yourself.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.quote: You will never feel truly satisfied by work until you are satisfied by life.
quotes.author: Heather Schuck

quotes.quote: All the art of living lies in a fine mingling of letting go and holding on.
quotes.author: Henry Ellis

quotes.quote: It is not work that kills men; it is worry. Worry is rust upon the blade.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A man sooner or later discovers that he is the master-gardener of his soul, the director of his life.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Balance is not something you find, itâs something you create.
quotes.author: Jana Kingsford

quotes.quote: Problems arise in that one has to find a balance between what people need from you and what you need for yourself.
quotes.author: Jessye Norman

quotes.quote: I think everybody should get rich and famous and do everything they ever dreamed of so they can see that itâs not the answer.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: So divinely is the world organized that every one of us, in our place and time, is in balance with everything else.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: No matter how bad things are, you can always make things worse.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: You start with a darkness to move through but sometimes the darkness moves through you.
quotes.author: Dean Young

quotes.quote: Life is at its best when everything has fallen out of place, and you decide that you're going to fight to get them right, not when everything is going your way and everyone is praising you.
quotes.author: Thisuri Wanniarachchi

quotes.quote: Faith is why I'm here today and faith is why I made it through.
quotes.author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

quotes.quote: You need to spend time crawling alone through shadows to truly appreciate what it is to stand in the sun.
quotes.author: Shaun Hick

quotes.quote: Life is hard for everyone. That's why there's such a nice reward at the end of it.
quotes.author: Aidan Quinn

quotes.quote: If you would only recognize that life is hard, things would be so much easier for you.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.quote: My philosophy is: Life is hard, but God is good. Try not to confuse the two.
quotes.author: Anne F. Beiler

quotes.quote: Life is hard. It is not too short, it is too long. But you have to learn how to live; you have to have a sense of humour.
quotes.author: Carolina Herrera

quotes.quote: Life is hard. After all, it kills you.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
quotes.author: Kenji Miyazawa

quotes.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The gem cannot be polished without friction, nor man perfected without trials.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
quotes.author: Robert Schuller

quotes.quote: Pain is your friend; it is your alie. Pain reminds you to finish the job and get the hell home. Pain tells you when you have been seriously wounded. And you know what the best thing about pain is? It tells you you're not dead yet!
quotes.author: G.I. Jane

quotes.quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.author: Robert H Schuller

quotes.quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: I ask not for a lighter burden, but for broader shoulders.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: One who gains strength by overcoming obstacles possesses the only strength which can overcome adversity.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Life is not always fair. Sometimes you get a splinter sliding down a rainbow.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Nothing good comes cheaply so we shouldn't be surprised when we meet the hard while going for the best. Hard times are not quit times.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: The last battle always seems the toughest and to give up will always bring the worst defeat.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: Don't pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: The hardest thing to learn in life is which bridge to cross and which to burn.
quotes.author: David Russell

quotes.quote: If you're already in a hole, it is no use to continue digging.
quotes.author: Roy W. Walters

quotes.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Life is short. Live passionately.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The trouble is you think you have time.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: What a wonderful life I've had! I only wish I'd realized it sooner.
quotes.author: Colette

quotes.quote: This is your life, and it's ending one minute at a time.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Men talk of killing time, while time quietly kills them.
quotes.author: Dion Boucicault

quotes.quote: Be patient and understanding. Life is too short to be vengeful or malicious.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: Life is not lost by dying; life is lost minute by minute, day by dragging day, in all the thousand small uncaring ways.
quotes.author: Stephen Vincent Benet

quotes.quote: Live every day as if it were going to be your last; for one day you're sure to be right.
quotes.author: Harry Morant

quotes.quote: Don't be fooled by the calendar. There are only as many days in the year as you make use of.
quotes.author: Charles Richards

quotes.quote: As you grow older, you'll find the only things you regret are the things you didn't do.
quotes.author: Zachary Scott

quotes.quote: Live as you would have wished to live when you are dying.
quotes.author: Christian Furchtegott Gellert

quotes.quote: Begin doing what you want to do now. We are not living in eternity. We have only this moment, sparkling like a star in our hand. . . and melting like a snowflake. Let us use it before it is too late.
quotes.author: Marie Beynon Ray

quotes.quote: Every second is of infinite value.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Expect an early death - it will keep you busier.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: Life is too short to work so hard.
quotes.author: Vivien Leigh

quotes.quote: Life is too short to worry about anything. You had better enjoy it because the next day promises nothing.
quotes.author: Eric Davis

quotes.quote: Life is too short to be little. Man is never so manly as when he feels deeply, acts boldly, and expresses himself with frankness and with fervor.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Let's not allow ourselves to be upset by small things we should despise and forget. Remember "Life is too short to be little".
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: I still find each day too short for all the thoughts I want to think, all the walks I want to take, all the books I want to read, and all the friends I want to see.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: Is life not a thousand times too short for us to bore ourselves?
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Life is a flash of lightning in the dark of night. It is a brief time of tremendous potential.
quotes.author: Alan Wallace

quotes.quote: Waste your money and you're only out of money, but waste your time and you've lost a part of your life.
quotes.author: Michael Leboeuf

quotes.quote: Life is too short to be living somebody else's dream.
quotes.author: Hugh Hefner

quotes.quote: Life is short, but it's long enough to ruin any man who wants to be ruined.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Life is short, so enjoy it to the fullest.
quotes.author: John Walters

quotes.quote: I feel that life is short, so we should be disciplined, but at the same time we should have a good time.
quotes.author: Wyclef Jean

quotes.quote: Time is long but life is short.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.quote: Life is short, and it is here to be lived.
quotes.author: Kate Winslet

quotes.quote: Life is like a taxi. The meter just keeps a-ticking whether you are getting somewhere or just standing still.
quotes.author: Lou Erickson

quotes.quote: Yes, you can lose somebody overnight, yes, your whole life can be turned upside down. Life is short. It can come and go like a feather in the wind.
quotes.author: Shania Twain

quotes.quote: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them; that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Life belongs to the living, and he who lives must be prepared for changes.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang

quotes.quote: Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don't.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Change is the law of life and those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The inherent nature of life is constant change.To fear change is to fear life itself.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: The nature of life is constant change. The world is not the same today as it was yesterday, and it will be different still tomorrow.We can be victims of that change, or we can proactively drive change.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Enjoy life as it is today - it is going to change!
quotes.author: Stephen Ramjewan

quotes.quote: True life is lived when tiny changes occur.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Life is a progress, and not a station.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Just when I think I have learned the way to live, life changes.
quotes.author: Hugh Prather

quotes.quote: Life is about change, sometimes it's painful, sometimes it's beautiful, but most of the time it's both.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Change is the essence of life - everything is in a process of moving, growing, adapting and changing, and change is the most important action that shapes the direction of life.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.quote: Life is its own journey, presupposes its own change and movement, and one tries to arrest them at one's eternal peril.
quotes.author: Laurens Van Der Post

quotes.quote: Change is the essence of life.Be willing to surrender what you are for what you could become.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: We change, whether we like it or not.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: To live is to change, and to be perfect is to change often.
quotes.author: John Henry Cardinal Newman

quotes.quote: One must never lose time in vainly regretting the past or in complaining against the changes which cause us discomfort, for change is the essence of life.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Change is not merely necessary to life, it is life.
quotes.author: Alvin Toffler

quotes.quote: Change is the only evidence of life.
quotes.author: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.quote: If you're in a bad situation, don't worry it'll change. If you're in a good situation, don't worry it'll change.
quotes.author: John A. Simone

quotes.quote: Someday perhaps change will occur when times are ready for it instead of always when it is too late. Someday change will be accepted as life itself.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: When people shake their heads because we are living in a restless age, ask them how they would like to live in a stationary one, and do without change.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: None of us knows what the next change is going to be, what unexpected opportunity is just around the corner, waiting a few months or a few years to change all the tenor of our lives.
quotes.author: Kathleen Norris

quotes.quote: Change is inevitable except from a vending machine.
quotes.author: Robert C. Gallagher

quotes.quote: Continuity gives us roots; change gives us branches, letting us stretch and grow and reach new heights.
quotes.author: Pauline R. Kezer

quotes.quote: He who rejects change is the architect of decay. The only human institution which rejects progress is the cemetery.
quotes.author: Harold Wilson

quotes.quote: One's philosophy is not best expressed in words; it is expressed in the choices one makes...in the long run we shape our lives and we shape ourselves. The process never ends until we die. And the choices we make are ultimately our responsibility.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: We have free will, but our free will lies in our choice of thoughts.
quotes.author: Emmett Fox

quotes.quote: We cannot lead a choiceless life. Every day, every moment, every second, there is a choice. If it were not so, we would not be an individuals.
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

quotes.quote: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
quotes.author: H.L. Hunt

quotes.quote: The history of free men is never really written by chance but by choice â their choice.
quotes.author: Dwight Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Every intersection in the road of life is an opportunity to make a decision.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes./ You can steer yourself any direction you choose./ You're on your own. And you know what you know./ And you are the guy who decide where to go.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: It is the ability to choose which makes us human.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: Mankind's greatest gift, also its greatest curse, is that we have free choice. We can make our choices built from love or from fear.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: Until a person can say deeply and honestly, 'I am what I am today because of the choices I made yesterday.' That person cannot say, 'I choose otherwise.'
quotes.author: Steven Covey

quotes.quote: it is our choices... that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: By choosing we learn to be responsible. By paying the price of our choices, we learn to make better choices.
quotes.author: Martha Sinetar

quotes.quote: Creative choice is your birthright. Please own it.
quotes.author: John Bradshaw

quotes.quote: Free choice is one of the highest of all the mental processes.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: Know to choose well. Most of lives depend thereon. It needs a good taste and correct judgement, for which neither intellect nor study sufficient.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian y Morales

quotes.quote: When you have to make a choice and you don't make it, that is in itself a choice.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: As adults, our choices are almost unlimited, but that does not mean they are not painful. Frequently our choices lie between the lesser of two evils, but it is still within our power to make these choices.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: The entirety of one's adult life is a series of personal choices, decisions. If we can accept this totally, then we become free people. To the extent that we do not accept this we will forever feel ourselves victim.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: You are the person who has to decide. / Whether you'll do it or toss it aside;/ You are the person who makes up your mind./ Whether you'll lead or will linger behind./ Whether you'll try for the goal that's afar./ Or just be contented to stay where you are.
quotes.author: Edgar A. Guest

quotes.quote: Choice of attention â to pay attention to this and ignore that â is to the inner life what choice of action is to the outer. In both cases, a man is responsible for his choice and must accept the consequences whatever they may be.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: Destiny is not a matter of chance, but of choice, not something to wish for, but to attain.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.quote: We are so often wide awake about the decisions our elected officials make in the political, public realm, and so asleep about our private choices.
quotes.author: Courtney E. Martin

quotes.quote: This independence of will, mind, and imagination would inform her poetry and her life choices from that point on.
quotes.author: Becca Anderson

quotes.quote: Life is all about choices. I remember the choices that my mother, for instance, did not have the opportunity to make.
quotes.author: Gwen Ifill

quotes.quote: To make such choices, you have to know who you are, what is important to you, and where you would like to go.
quotes.author: Vincent Barnett

quotes.quote: In all things in life, choose your conscience and trust your instincts, and lead your life without regrets.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: Life is the sum of all your choices.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Being smart and making smarter decisions puts you in a better position to make better choices.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: No matter how difficult your situation may be, there is always a choice you can make. A choice which will make all the difference in your life.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: When nothing else seems to work, just choose how you see, hear, and feel about whatever it is. Always remember, there will always be choices!
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Rise above the storm and you will find the sunshine.
quotes.author: Mario Fernandez

quotes.quote: The best decisions you can ever make are the decisions that will guide you to enhance your gifts in order to create a better life for you and others.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Do not bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Your life can be amazing, if you only tough this period out.
quotes.author: Dan Savage

quotes.quote: Stop waiting around for your life to get better and start getting better with your thoughts, decisions and actions.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Every generation has their challenge. And things change rapidly, and life gets better in an instant.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.quote: Don't start living tomorrow, tomorrow never arrives. Start working on your dreams and ambitions today.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: It's gonna get harder before it gets. But it will get better, you just gotta make it through the hard stuff first.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: In the middle of a difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Most great people have attained their greatest success one step beyond their greatest failure.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: There is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: Become addicted to constant and never-ending self-improvement.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: You can always get better. Nobody can stop you from getting better, and nobody can stop you from trying to make something right.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Life is about growing and improving and getting better.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you've imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Everything in your life gets better when you get better, and nothing is ever going to get better until you get better.
quotes.author: Larry Winget

quotes.quote: If you believe it will work out, you'll see opportunities. If you believe it won't, you will see obstacles.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: The first step is you have to say that you can.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: Sometimes life gets weird. Hang in there, it gets better.
quotes.author: Tanner Patrick

quotes.quote: Well, this should certainly teach us, should it not, never to repine, never to despair, never to allow the upper lip to unstiffen, but always to remember that, no matter how dark the skies may be, the sun is shining somewhere and will eventually come smiling through.
quotes.author: P. G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: Iâd like to be an example of no matter how dark and thick and hopeless it feels, for years maybe, things can and will change.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: Your goals are the road maps that guide you and show you what is possible for your life.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Failure is a man's inability to reach his goals in life, whatever they may be.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: An aim in life is the only fortune worth finding.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: You have to set goals that are almost out of reach. If you set a goal that is attainable without much work or thought, you are stuck with something below your true talent and potential.
quotes.author: Steve Garvey

quotes.quote: The only goal is in the process. The process is the thingÃ¢â¬Â¦with little flashes of light here and there. Those are the gigs, those are the live shows. But it's the life in betweenÃ¢â¬âthat's all I got.
quotes.author: Jeff Buckley

quotes.quote: A man who could not see the end of his"provisional existence" was not able to aim at an ultimate goal in life.
quotes.author: Viktor E Frankl

quotes.quote: The reason so many individuals fail to achieve their goals in life is that they never really set them in the first place.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Whatever your goal in life, be proud of every day that you are able to work in that direction.
quotes.author: Chris Evert

quotes.quote: Joy, rather than happiness, is the goal of life, for joy is the emotion which accompanies our fulfilling our natures as human beings. It is based on the experience of one's identity as a being of worth and dignity.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: There must be a goal at every stage of life! There must be a goal!
quotes.author: Vannevar Bush

quotes.quote: If you drop out you put yourself further away from the goal of life than if you were to keep working.
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.quote: The goal of life is not to possess power but to radiate it.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: The important thing in life is to have a great aim, and the determination to attain it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Freedom is the only worthy goal in life. It is won by disregarding things that lie beyond our control. Stop aspiring to be anyone other than your own best self: for that does fall within your control.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Each of us has a fire in our hearts for something. It's our goal in life to find it and keep it.
quotes.author: Mary Lou Retton

quotes.quote: If you want to accomplish the goals of your life, you have to begin with the spirit.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Man is a goal seeking animal. His life only has meaning if he is reaching out and striving for his goals.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Many people fail in life, not for lack of ability or brains or even courage but simply because they have never organized their energies around a goal.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Life takes on meaning when you become motivated, set goals and charge after them in an unstoppable manner.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: The mystery of human existence lies not in just staying alive, but in finding something to live for.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: The most important thing is to figure out Your goal in life. If Your intentions and methods are correct, there is no way You will not achieve it.
quotes.author: Arjun Rampal

quotes.quote: The goal of life is not to have our lives mean something to ourselves. The goal of life is to have our lives mean something to others.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: You should have important goals in your life and make every effort possible to obtain those goals. Set your goals high. Believe in being the best in everything you want to accomplish.
quotes.author: Charles Calhoun

quotes.quote: You must take action now that will move you towards your goals. Develop a sense of urgency in your life.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: The goal of life is to realize God and to be always immersed in thought in Him.
quotes.author: Sarada Devi

quotes.quote: The big secret in life is there is no secret. Whatever your goal. You can get there if you're willing to work.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: To live for some future goal is shallow. It's the sides of the mountain that sustain life, not the top.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: Think little goals and expect little achievements. Think big goals and win big success.
quotes.author: David J. Schwartz

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Life is an operation which is done in a forward direction. One lives toward the future, because to live consists inexorably in doing, in each individual life making itself.
quotes.author: Jose Ortega Gasset

quotes.quote: People change and things go wrong but just remember life goes on.
quotes.author: Mac Miller

quotes.quote: All the art of living lies in a fine mingling of letting go and holding on.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.quote: Life goes on is a redundancy. Life is defined by its going on.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: Sometimes, you regret letting certain people into your life. The harm has already been done. All you can do is learn a lesson from it and move on. Life is to short to spend it on regrets. life goes on.
quotes.author: Gloria Lamisi

quotes.quote: To be judged for your imperfections is to be judged for being human, mistakes are made, life goes on, don't let other people change who you are.
quotes.author: Lee Jameson

quotes.quote: Even though we have been hurt, we must find a way to get through it, life goes on whether we want it to or not. The world keeps turning no matter how bad we feel. This is why we have to learn how to bounce back and keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Rashida Rowe

quotes.quote: We have this unspoken connection. We see each other, lock eyes, smile that one certain smile that means nothing to anyone else, but the world to us, and keep going on. life goes on, but our love remains.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: I am strengthened by my weaknesses. I am brave because of my fears. I am greater because of my mistakes. Life goes on, forget the past.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: When the pretty birds have flown, And you feel hurt and alone, Be strong and carry on, And remember that life goes on.
quotes.author: Mouloud Benzadi

quotes.quote: One thing always sure. Life go on with you or without you, no matter how much you seen.
quotes.author: Lalita Tademy

quotes.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Life goes on pretty much the same way. I've been working on a couple of films on the side. You may see some more. You may even see another television show.
quotes.author: Norman Lear

quotes.quote: if something does go wrong, here is my advice. Keep calm and Carry on.
quotes.author: Maira Kalman

quotes.quote: Life gets more interesting as it goes on. It becomes fuller because there is perspective there.
quotes.author: Ann Dowd

quotes.quote: Remember, whether you choose to move on or stay stuck in the past, life goes on!
quotes.author: Billy Cox

quotes.quote: Life is more than just chess. Though king dies, life goes on.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Change has to come for life to struggle forward.
quotes.author: Helen Hollick

quotes.quote: You either get bitter or you get better. It's that simple. You either take what has been dealt to you and allow it to make you a better person, or you allow it to tear you down. The choice does not belong to fate, It belongs to you.
quotes.author: Josh Shipp

quotes.quote: You are responsible for your life. You can't keep blaming somebody else for your dysfunction. Life is really about moving on.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Sometimes our light goes out, but is blown again into instant flame by an encounter with another human being.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: So long as this struggle known as life goes on, there will always be the music to fit the mood and make it better.
quotes.author: Patrick James Balthazor

quotes.quote: It's never nice to lose someone close to you; unfortunately, life goes on, and we have to make peace with it and move on.
quotes.author: Francois Hougaard

quotes.quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: If you carry joy in your heart, you can heal any moment.
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.quote: Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The great courageous act that we must all do, is to have the courage to step out of our history and past so that we can live our dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Grief is in two parts. The first is loss. The second is the remaking of life.
quotes.author: Anne Roiphe

quotes.quote: Life is not lost by dying; life is lost minute by minute, day by dragging day, in all the thousand small uncaring ways.
quotes.author: Stephen Vincent Benet

quotes.quote: Our time in this life is limited. And how we respect that time will create a greater possibility for fulfillment.
quotes.author: Ruben Papian

quotes.quote: Let's not allow ourselves to be upset by small things we should despise and forget. Remember 'Life is too short to be little'.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Live honestly to a higher note. Life is too short. So, do the best you can and live your life to a higher note.
quotes.author: Kimora Lee Simmons

quotes.quote: Men talk of killing time, while time quietly kills them.
quotes.author: Dion Boucicault

quotes.quote: Every day has been so short, every hour so fleeting, every minute so filled with the life I love that time for me has fled on too swift a wing.
quotes.author: Aga Khan III

quotes.quote: There comes a time in your life when you have to let go of all the pointless drama and the people who create it and surround yourself with people who make you laugh so hard that you forget the bad and focus solely on the good. After all, life is too short to be anything but happy.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Life is short, break the rules, forgive quickly, kiss slowly. love truly, laugh uncontrollably, and never regret anything that makes you smile.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Live every day as if it were going to be your last; for one day you're sure to be right.
quotes.author: Harry Morant

quotes.quote: Begin doing what you want to do now. We are not living in eternity. We have only this moment, sparkling like a star in our hand--and melting like a snowflake...
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The truth is you don't know what is going to happen tomorrow. Life is a crazy ride, and nothing is guaranteed.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: Enjoy every moment you have. Because in life, there are no rewinds, only flashbacks.
quotes.author: Anmol Andore

quotes.quote: Life is short, and it's up to you to make it sweet.
quotes.author: Sarah Louise Delany

quotes.quote: Life is a first impression. You get one shot at it. Make it everlasting.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote: Life is too short to worry about anything. You had better enjoy it because the next day promises nothing.
quotes.author: Eric Davis

quotes.quote: Enjoy life while you can. It can be taken in a heart beat.
quotes.author: Jasmin Morin

quotes.quote: Country people do not behave as if they think life is short; they live on the principle that it is long, and savor variations of the kind best appreciated if most days are the same.
quotes.author: Edward Hoagland

quotes.quote: Life is too short to cry for anything so smile and do what makes you happy with morals.
quotes.author: Abdel Rahman Sabry

quotes.quote: All days will pass, all moments will last, each friend will part, it's a journey too fast.
quotes.author: Senora Roy

quotes.quote: If you want something, don't wish for it. Life is too short to wait.
quotes.author: Stephen Hines

quotes.quote: Life is too short, and the time we waste in yawning never can be regained.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: Embrace your uniqueness. Time is much too short to be living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Kobi Yamada

quotes.quote: Life is short and if you're looking for extension, you had best do well. Cause there's good deeds and then there's good intentions. They are as far apart as Heaven and Hell.
quotes.author: Ben Harper

quotes.quote: We only have one life and one body to care of, and we better do it right. You never know what tomorrow may bring and so we better live this life the best we can and be grateful for everything we have.
quotes.author: Novak Djokovic

quotes.quote: If there's even a slight chance at getting something that will make you happy, risk it. Life's too short and happiness is too rare.
quotes.author: A.R. Lucas

quotes.quote: Life is transitory it doesn't last forever, but with the time that is given you can find some sort of purpose.
quotes.author: Jeremy Limn

quotes.quote: I think life is far too short to concentrate on your past. I rather look into the future.
quotes.author: Lou Reed

quotes.quote: Waste your money and you're only out of money, but waste your time and you've lost a part of your life.
quotes.author: Michael Leboeuf

quotes.quote: We are constantly reminded about how short life is. Please try to leave your best positive impression on everyone that you meet.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Life is too short, or too long, for me to allow myself the luxury of living it so badly.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Life is like walking through paradise with peas in your shoes.
quotes.author: Charles Edward Jerningham

quotes.quote: Life is a matter of really tough choices.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: Life is tough, but if you are stupid, it's a lot tougher.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: Life is tough, and it's really tough when you're stupid.
quotes.author: Damon Runyon

quotes.quote: When you think life is tough, it can get a lot tougher.
quotes.author: Kate Gosselin

quotes.quote: Never give up, and be confident in what you do. There may be tough times, but the difficulties which you face will make you more determined to achieve your objectives and to win against all the odds.
quotes.author: Marta

quotes.quote: You've got to stay strong to be strong in tough times.
quotes.author: Tilman J. Fertitta

quotes.quote: In tough times, everyone has to take their share of the pain.
quotes.author: Theresa May

quotes.quote: Life is tough; and if you have the ability to laugh at it, you have the ability to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.quote: You're going to go through tough times that's life. But I say, nothing happens to you, it happens for you. See the positive in negative events.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Life is tough and you have to be tougher than life to change the world.
quotes.author: Sebastian Pinera

quotes.quote: Life is tough, and if we don't laugh, we're going to our head will explode.
quotes.author: Jeff Ross

quotes.quote: Life is tough pilgrim, it is even tougher if you're stupid.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: If things are going bad and life is tough, hang in there. Ride it out. Come out on top.
quotes.author: Ashton Irwin

quotes.quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Life is tough enough without having someone kick you from the inside.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: But life is tough and if you're creative, it's tougher.
quotes.author: Bobby Short

quotes.quote: Life is not meant to be hard: if it is, we make it so.
quotes.author: Ivan Panin

quotes.quote: Life is not always fair. Sometimes you get a splinter sliding down a rainbow.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: The messiness of experience, that may be what we mean by life.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.quote: Life is a grindstone. Whether it grinds us down or polishes us up depends on us.
quotes.author: L. Thomas Holdcroft

quotes.quote: People do not live nowadays â they get about ten percent out of life.
quotes.author: Isadora Duncan

quotes.quote: Life is tough but I'm tougher.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: Life sucks, but it's better than the alternative.
quotes.author: Michael Flynn

quotes.quote: Tough is the life my Dad had, his whole career cut short at the age of 40 by a stroke.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: Farming's a tough life. So is marathoning. Lots of hard work, little time off. Each life conditioned me for the other one.
quotes.author: Dick Beardsley

quotes.quote: Maybe people â both able-bodied and amputees â can look at me and say, 'You know what? Life is tough, but if this guy can make it, then I can make it.'
quotes.author: Scott Rigsby

quotes.quote: When we long for life without difficulties, remind us that oaks grow strong in contrary winds and diamonds are made under pressure.
quotes.author: Peter Marshall

quotes.quote: There is a great deal of pain in life and perhaps the only pain that can be avoided is the pain that comes from trying to avoid pain.
quotes.author: R.D. Laing

quotes.quote: Don't let life discourage you; everyone who got where he is had to begin where he was.
quotes.author: Richard L. Evans

quotes.quote: Life is trying things to see if they work.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Life is what you make it. So why not make it a beautiful one full of happiness and joy.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Life's like a play: it's not the length, but the excellence of the acting that matters.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Our life always expresses the result of our dominant thoughts.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: And I say, the meaning of life is what you make it. There will be as many different meaningful lives as there are people to live them.
quotes.author: AC Grayling

quotes.quote: This life is what you make it. Not matter what, you're going to mess up sometimes, it's a universal truth.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Life is what you make it so make the best of it.
