quotes.author: Shay Anthony

quotes.quote: Life is what you make it. Your flows are makeshift. I draw this off inspiration, you trace shit.
quotes.author: Pusha T. Clipse

quotes.quote: Life is 10 percent what you make it, and 90 percent how you take it.
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Once you know what direction to take, finding the path to it becomes easy.
quotes.author: Preeti Shenoy

quotes.quote: Life is what you make it. Don't make excuses, make it happen.
quotes.author: Chamillionaire

quotes.quote: Advice? I don't offer advice. Not my business. Your life is what you make it.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.quote: Your life is what you make it. If you choose to submit to your failures, then you won't have much success in your life.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Life is what you make of it. You can make it easy on yourself or you can make it hard.
quotes.author: Deep Roy

quotes.quote: Life is what you make it and I choose to make mine a happy one, full of fun and laughter and you are more than welcome to join me.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Life is ours to be spent, not to be saved.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Life will always be to a large extent what we ourselves make it.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: Do not let making a living prevent you from making a life.
quotes.author: John R. Wooden

quotes.quote: If you have not made somebody's day happier, if you've not appreciated something good that has happened to you and if you have not felt thankful to be alive, then you have wasted that day of your life on earth!
quotes.author: Preeti Shenoy

quotes.quote: Life is what you make it. Always has been, always will be.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Life is what you make it: If you snooze, you loose; and if you snore, you loose more.
quotes.author: Phyllis George

quotes.quote: May you live all the days of your life.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: In this life, when you deny someone an apology, you will remember it at time you beg forgiveness.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Short cuts make long delays.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Mistakes are a part of being human. Appreciate your mistakes for what they are: precious life lessons that can only be learned the hard way.
quotes.author: Al Franken

quotes.quote: Life is inherently risky. There is only one big risk you should avoid at all costs, and that is the risk of doing nothing.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: The hardest thing to learn in life is which bridge to cross and which bridge to burn.
quotes.author: David Russell

quotes.quote: Don't let anyone ever make you feel like you don't deserve what you want.
quotes.author: Heath Ledger

quotes.quote: To see the world, things dangerous to come to, to see behind walls, to draw closer, to find each other and to feel. That is the purpose of life.
quotes.author: The Secret Life Of Walter Mitty

quotes.quote: We make a living by what we get. We make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Mistakes are part of the dues one pays for a full life.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: In the long run, we shape our lives, and we shape ourselves. The process never ends until we die. And the choices we make are ultimately our own responsibility.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and experience comes from bad judgment.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: At times you have to leave the city of your comfort and go into the wilderness of your intuition. What you ll discover will be wonderful. What you ll discover is yourself.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you' Not much.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterwards.
quotes.author: Vernon Saunders Law

quotes.quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: And in the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Life is not measured by the number of breaths you take, but by every moment that takes your breath away.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Breathe. Let go. And remind yourself that this very moment is the only one you know you have for sure.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
quotes.author: John Powell

quotes.quote: No matter how hard you kick, no matter how high you get, you can't go all the way around.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: But one of the big lessons I have learned from my journey is you can't please everyone, so don't try.
quotes.author: Chris Colfer

quotes.quote: You can't wait around for something to become good, it either is, or isn't.
quotes.author: Toni Aleo

quotes.quote: I am not someone who is ashamed of my past. I'm actually really proud. I know I made a lot of mistakes, but they, in turn, were my life lessons.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: You get in life what you have the courage to ask for.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: A great attitude becomes a great day which becomes a great month which becomes a great year which becomes a great life.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: You can't live your life for other people. You've got to do what's right for you, even if it hurts some people you love.
quotes.author: The Notebook

quotes.quote: We are who we choose to be.
quotes.author: Green Goblin

quotes.quote: Bad things happen to good people all the time. It sucks. It's not fair but then much of life isn't fair. It's how you live that matters. It's how you deal with the bumps in the road.
quotes.author: Maya Banks

quotes.quote: Life is divided into the horrible and the miserable.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: The life of man is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish, and short.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: Life is not lost by dying; life is lost minute by minute, day by dragging day, in all the thousand small uncaring ways.
quotes.author: Stephen Vincent Benet

quotes.quote: Life sucks, but you have the option to sit there and cry about it or you can simply move on and become stronger.
quotes.author: Leah Iacono

quotes.quote: I make a new discovery that totally blows; dying is the easy part. It's coming back to life that sucks.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: My life sucks when I'm only half-aware of it. If I quit drinking and saw what it's really like, I'd probably jump off a bridge.
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Life sucks, but in a beautiful kind of way.
quotes.author: Axl Rose

quotes.quote: When life sucks, throw yourself into art.
quotes.author: Monica Drake

quotes.quote: Not everything happens for a reason. Sometimes life just sucks.
quotes.author: Alexa Chung

quotes.quote: I believe pain is nature's way of saying, you're still alive, and life sucks.
quotes.author: Bill Engvall

quotes.quote: Things happen in life and you can't control them. It sucks and you have to move on.
quotes.author: Abbi Glines

quotes.quote: Life isn't a book. There's no guarantee of a happy ending.
quotes.author: P C Cast

quotes.quote: Mondays are fine. It's your life that sucks.
quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

quotes.quote: Life is an incurable disease.
quotes.author: Abraham Cowley

quotes.quote: You fall out of your mother's womb, you crawl across open country under fire, and drop into your grave.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: Life is like an onion: you peel off layer after layer and then you find there is nothing in it.
quotes.author: James Huneker

quotes.quote: Half the world is composed of idiots, the other half of people clever enough to take indecent advantage of them.
quotes.author: Walter Kerr

quotes.quote: If you think your life sucks, it probably does. Do something about it.
quotes.author: Chris Crutcher

quotes.quote: Let's play a game of whose life sucks worse. I'll win, I always win.
quotes.author: Meredith Grey

quotes.quote: Life is amazing. Even when it sucks, it is amazing, and we should be grateful for every moment.
quotes.author: Hal Elrod

quotes.quote: Life is hard. Then you die. Then they throw dirt in your face. Then the worms eat you. Be grateful that it happens in that order.
quotes.author: David Gerrold

quotes.quote: The world is a grindstone and life is your nose.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: Life is little more than a loan shark: It exacts a very high rate of interest for the few pleasures it concedes
quotes.author: Luigi Pirandello

quotes.quote: Whenever life sucks, remember you're going to die someday.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Life Sucks, get a helmet.
quotes.author: Denis Leary

quotes.quote: Life may have no meaning. Or even worse, it may have a meaning of which I disapprove.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: Life sucks, then you die. Then it sucks again.
quotes.author: Tonya Hurley

quotes.quote: When life sucks, read. They can't yell at you for that. And if they do, then you can ignore them.
quotes.author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quotes.quote: Let me put it this way, if you were drowning, you wouldn't really be in a place to lend a hand as far as being rescued. You'd be at the mercy of the lifeguard. Once pulled out, you may be a little out of it, not sure where you are, but safe nonetheless.
quotes.author: Bart Millard

quotes.quote: It is a gift to be a teenager, and I see a dad's job as lifeguard, not chaperone.
quotes.author: Jonathan Franklin

quotes.quote: This thing with the lifeguard... things happen. Keep moving or die.
quotes.author: Liz W. Garcia

quotes.quote: Look, if you don't want to hire Kelly as a lifeguard just because she's a woman, that's discrimination.
quotes.author: Sam Bobrick

quotes.quote: If only I had known that being a lifeguard meant guarding their lives, I would never have said yes.
quotes.author: Stephen Hillenburg

quotes.quote: The difference between being a lifeguard and a private eye is that a lifeguard has to spot trouble and respond. Private eye gets hired by someone who's already in trouble. Either way, a stranger's life is suddenly in your hands.
quotes.author: David Hasselhoff

quotes.quote: Lifeguards are sick! It is unnatural to spend all your time standing on sand, unless you are an A-rab, or a cat.
quotes.author: Jim Mulholland

quotes.quote: I'm a lifeguard, I work at a pool with three other guys. We didn't give ourselves a name.
quotes.author: Stuart Murdoch

quotes.quote: Sand, water, muscles, gleaming... things. It all spells the beach. And yet, the beach can be a dangerous place. That's why we have people we call lifeguards.
quotes.author: Mark Leveson

quotes.quote: And throughout the ages, lifeguards have been sung about in song, and in song, because that's the only way you CAN...
quotes.author: Mark Leveson

quotes.quote: Twenty years as a lifeguard teaches you to recognize people in trouble. I knew the second I saw her she was drowning, even though she wasn't even in the water.
quotes.author: David Hasselhoff

quotes.quote: There are many differences between being a lifeguard and being a PI. Lifeguards run on sand. PIs run on everything.
quotes.author: David Hasselhoff

quotes.quote: Most of the big, strong boys are lifeguards as a sideline.
quotes.author: Paul Gerard Smith

quotes.quote: Patrolling the length and the breadth of your pool / I call your name from the vestibule / Lifeguard
quotes.author: Stephen Brian Street

quotes.quote: Lifeguard, save me from life / Save me from life / Save me from the ails and the ills, and / from other things.
quotes.author: Stephen Brian Street

quotes.quote: Guess I'll swim way out into the sea / And then I'll meet him when he rescues me / (Please don't talk to the lifeguard please don't talk to the lifeguard) / Dark and handsome...
quotes.author: George Goehring

quotes.quote: Swimming in the sea and I think I'll / You guessed it / Only lifeguards / Only lifeguards / Packing all the time /Can save me / Waiting X3 / For the son of man
quotes.author: Brian Milko

quotes.quote: Take me out so deep when you know you can't swim / Need a lifeguard and I need protection / To put it on me deep in the right direction
quotes.author: Fred Jerkins III

quotes.quote: Lifeguard jobs typically involve watching swimmers and helping to ensure their safety while in the water, as well as enforcing rules, regulations, and local laws.
quotes.author: Jason R. Rich

quotes.quote: Many lifeguard jobs are seasonal and are held by students.
quotes.author: Jason R. Rich

quotes.quote: Lifeguards who are posted at the lakes and ocean beaches must be on the watch for strong currents, changing weather conditions, and dangerous animals, such as jellyfish and sharks.
quotes.author: Facts On File

quotes.quote: Lifeguards not only need to be strong swimmers, but they must be levelheaded, calm, and ready to react in emergency situations.
quotes.author: Facts On File

quotes.quote: Many lifeguards also work as swimming instructors.
quotes.author: Facts On File

quotes.quote: Lifeguard have a tremendous amount of responsibility when on duty.
quotes.author: Facts On File

quotes.quote: Lifeguards also work as teachers, ensuring that people adhere to safe bathing areas and other rules.
quotes.author: Susan Hodgson

quotes.quote: Some people become lifeguards for the wrong reason. They want to sit in the sun all day and work on their tans--or nap in style at an indoor facility. In reality, life guarding is far from relaxing.
quotes.author: Ryan Jacobson

quotes.quote: A good lifeguard needs to be alert, observant, and able to react quickly in an emergency.
quotes.author: Ryan Jacobson

quotes.quote: To be a lifeguard, you need to be a strong swimmer with a knack for staying focused,
quotes.author: Ryan Jacobson

quotes.quote: As a lifeguard, your mission is to keep swimmers safe, mainly by helping them avoid dangerous situations.
quotes.author: Ryan Jacobson

quotes.quote: Lifeguards at beaches and swimming pools are needed only during summer.
quotes.author: T Hartzenberg

quotes.quote: She lived frugally, but her meals were the only things on which she deliberately spent her money. She never compromised on the quality of her groceries, and drank only good-quality wines.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Let others lead small lives,but not you.Let others argue over small things,but not you.Let others cry over small hurts,but not you.Let others leave their future in someone elses hands,but not you. not you.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Your genetics load the gun. Your lifestyle pulls the trigger.
quotes.author: Mehmet Oz

quotes.quote: Just like your body and lifestyle can be healthy or unhealthy, the same is true with your beliefs. Your beliefs can be your medicine or your poison.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Be yourself. Don't worry about what other people are thinking of you.
quotes.author: Phil Lester

quotes.quote: There's lots of people in this world who spend so much time watching their health that they haven't the time to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Lack of activity destroys the good condition of every human being, while movement and methodical physical exercise save it and preserve it.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Adopting a new healthier lifestyle can involve changing diet to include more fresh fruit and vegetables as well as increasing levels of exercise.
quotes.author: Linford Christie

quotes.quote: Look at the sparrows; they do not know what they will do in the next moment. Let us literally live from moment to moment.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Individually, people are finding that a simpler lifestyle provides greater satisfaction than relentless pursuit of materialism.
quotes.author: Laurance Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Looking good and feeling good go hand in hand. If you have a healthy lifestyle, your diet and nutrition are set, and you're working out, you're going to feel good.
quotes.author: Jason Statham

quotes.quote: To insure good health: eat lightly, breathe deeply, live moderately, cultivate cheerfulness, and maintain an interest in life.
quotes.author: William Londen

quotes.quote: Do not live in the shadow of the masters for ever. Learn to live in the light of your soul. Life deserves full expression.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Self-observation is the first step of inner unfolding.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: In whatever work environment, whether we admit it or not, there is always a little part of us that has been or will be tempted by a lifestyle for the wrong reasons.
quotes.author: Dominic Cooper

quotes.quote: Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Select your friendships carefully. Gather people around you who will reinforce your lifestyle.
quotes.author: Dan Buettner

quotes.quote: Follow your dreams, work hard, practice and persevere. Make sure you eat a variety of foods, get plenty of exercise and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
quotes.author: Sasha Cohen

quotes.quote: Everyone out there is your customer. Therefore customer service is a lifestyle, not a performance you turn on when you arrive at work and off when you arrive at home.
quotes.author: Monica L. Wofford

quotes.quote: I'm living my life, not buying a lifestyle.
quotes.author: Barbara Kruger

quotes.quote: The perfect lifestyle is never worth the cost of your life.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: If you have to sacrifice the quality of your family life or your spiritual life to keep up with your lifestyle ideas, you're cheating yourself.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: Our only security is our ability to change.
quotes.author: John Lilly

quotes.quote: A society that thinks the choice between ways of living is just a choice between equally eligible 'lifestyles' turns universities into academic cafeterias offering junk food for the mind.
quotes.author: George Will

quotes.quote: Some humans will create illusions in order to justify their desires, choices, or lifestyle.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: If you start living a healthy lifestyle by eating gods percepts; then all of that unhealthy baggage will run out of you.
quotes.author: Yolondis Peoples

quotes.quote: If you have credit cards, it can be part of your lifestyle to go into a store, hotel, or restaurant, in any city, and order whatever you wish.
quotes.author: Germain Decelles

quotes.quote: A good night's sleep is an important part of a healthy lifestyle.
quotes.author: Germain Decelles

quotes.quote: You can maintain a good lifestyle without drowning in debts. Take the time to create a realistic budget.
quotes.author: Paul Cresswell

quotes.quote: There is a lot of advice out there on how to live a frugal life. You can go from anything as simple as turning off the lights when you leave a room to grinding your own flour.
quotes.author: Paul Cresswell

quotes.quote: As we work to create light for others,we naturally light our own way.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: What is to give light must endure the burning.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Light itself is a great corrective. A thousand wrongs and abuses that are grown in darkness disappear, like owls and bats, before the light of day.
quotes.author: James A. Garfield

quotes.quote: Light is to darkness what love is to fear; in the presence of one the other disappears.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: In order for the light to shine so brightly, the darkness must be present.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: He whose face gives no light, shall never become a star.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Give light, and the darkness will disappear of itself.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: Your path is illuminated by the lightYet darkness lets the stars shine bright.
quotes.author: J.L.W. Brooks

quotes.quote: A man should learn to detect and watch that gleam of light which flashes across his mind from within.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Travel light, live light, spread the light, be the light.
quotes.author: Yogi Bhajan

quotes.quote: Light must come from inside. You cannot ask the darkness to leave; you must turn on the light.
quotes.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quotes.quote: In the right light, at the right time, everything is extraordinary.
quotes.author: Aaron Rose

quotes.quote: His high endeavors are an inward lightThat makes the path before him always bright.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: When you possess light within, you see it externally.
quotes.author: Anas Nin

quotes.quote: There are two ways of spreading light; to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: We are told to let our light shine, and if it does, we won't need to tell anybody it does. Lighthouses don't fire cannons to call attention to their shining- they just shine.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: At times our own light goes outand is rekindled by a spark from another person.Each of us has cause to think with deep gratitudeof those who have lighted the flame within us.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: If there is light in the soul, There will be beauty in the person. If there is beauty in the person, There will be harmony in the house. If there is harmony in the house, There will be order in the nation. If there is order in the nation, There will be peace in the world
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: It is better to light one small candle than to curse the darkness.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: We are indeed the light of the world--but only if our switch is turned on.
quotes.author: John Hagee

quotes.quote: It's not necessary to blow out your neighbor's light to let your own shine.
quotes.author: M.R. Dehaan

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of light - the glow that illumines, and the glare that obscures.
quotes.author: James Grover Thurber

quotes.quote: Walk while ye have the light, lest darkness come upon you.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Give light and people will find the way.
quotes.author: Ella Baker

quotes.quote: Light is the symbol of truth.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: The light shines in the darkness and the darkness comprehended it not.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: The light at the end of the tunnelmay be an oncoming train.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To light a candle is to cast a shadow.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: You can't have a light without a dark to stick it in.
quotes.author: Arlo Guthrie

quotes.quote: Sometimes the best lighting of all is a power failure.
quotes.author: Doug Coupland

quotes.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Light thinks it travels faster than anything but it is wrong. No matter how fast light travels, it finds the darkness has always got there first, and is waiting for it.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Look at how a single candle can both defy and define the darkness.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Everyone is a moon, and has a dark side which he never shows to anybody.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: When you light a candle, you also cast a shadow.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: What makes night within us may leave stars.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Every moment of light and dark is a miracle.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: If you believe in light, you'll be in light, you don't have to face darkness.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: Don't fight darkness - bring the light, and darkness will disappear.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness has not overcome it.
quotes.author: John 1:5

quotes.quote: The issue is now clear. It is between light and darkness and everyone must choose his side.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Though the light shines on things unclean, yet it is not thereby defiled.
quotes.author: Augustine

quotes.quote: Every human being is a mixture of light and darkness, trust and fear, love and hate.
quotes.author: Jean Vanier

quotes.quote: Peace and negativity cannot coexist just as light and darkness cannot coexist.
quotes.author: S. N. Goenka

quotes.quote: You can't discover light, by analyzing the dark.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Where there is much light the shade is deepest.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The light of the day is followed by night, as a shadow follows a body.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Just remember, a dark shadow need light to exist but light doesn't need darkness to be luminous.
quotes.author: GWEN HAYES

quotes.quote: And the light shineth in darkness; and the darkness comprehended it not.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: Life isn't just about darkness or light, rather it's about finding light within the darkness.
quotes.author: Landon Parham

quotes.quote: In the light we read the inventions of others in the darkness we invent our own stories.
quotes.author: Alberto Manguel

quotes.quote: When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There's light and joy, but there's also darkness all around and we can be lost in it.
quotes.author: David Almond

quotes.quote: Even though it's dark and cold there is always a shade of light.
quotes.author: Angela Bernabe

quotes.quote: Where death follows, there's life. When darkness surrounds you in a world of chaos, search and you'll eventually find the light.
quotes.author: Lee Argus

quotes.quote: Why not dare yourself to become a shinning positive light where darkness is the only thing known?
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: I think we all have light and dark inside us.
quotes.author: Sean Penn

quotes.quote: After darkness comes the light.
quotes.author: NEPOS

quotes.quote: The lighthouse does great service to humanity; yet it is the slave of those who trim the lamps.
quotes.author: Alice Wellington Rollins

quotes.quote: Man must behave like a lighthouse; he must shine day and night for the goodness of everyman.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: We are told to let our light shine, and if it does, we won't need to tell anybody it does. Lighthouses don't fire cannons to call attention to their shining- they just shine.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: Is the beam from a lighthouse affected by howling wind and rain? It remains perfectly steadfast and unaffected by the storm. Your true self is like that. Nothing can ever harm you once you are consciously aware that it is so.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: The scars you share become lighthouses for other people who are headed to the same rocks you hit.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Lighthouses are endlessly suggestive signifiers of both human isolation and our ultimate connectedness to each other.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Lighthouses don't go running all over an island looking for boats to save; they just stand there shining.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Lighthouses don't get all wobbly when the weather gets rough; they just stand there shining.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Look to the lighthouse of the Lord. There is no fog so dense, no night so dark, no gale so strong, no mariner so lost but what its beacon light can rescue.
quotes.author: Thomas S Monson

quotes.quote: I can think of no other edifice constructed by man as altruistic as a lighthouse. They were built only to serve.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The lighthouse of the Lord beckons to all as we sail the seas of life.
quotes.author: Thomas S Monson

quotes.quote: A lighthouse doesn't save the ships; it doesn't go out and rescue them, it's just this pillar that helps to guide people home.
quotes.author: Lea Michele

quotes.quote: A fallen lighthouse is more dangerous than a reef.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: I am lighthouse rather than lifeboat. I do not rescue, but instead help others to find their own way to shore, guiding them by my example.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Once the lighthouse is seen, the rest of the sea is ignored.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: A lighthouse is not interested in who gets its light! It just gives it without thinking! Giving light is its nature!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Don't forget that maybe you are the lighthouse in someone's storm.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Lighthouses are more helpful than churches.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If you are a lighthouse, you cannot hide yourself; if you hide yourself, you cannot be a lighthouse!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: If you close your eyes, no lighthouse can help you!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Darkness reigns at the foot of the lighthouse.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: It's about how you're like a lighthouse, always searching far into the distance. But the thing you're looking for is usually close to you and always has been. That's why you have to look within yourself to find answers instead of searching beyond.
quotes.author: Susane Colasanti

quotes.quote: The rocky ledge runs far into the sea, / And on its outer point, some miles away, / The Lighthouse lifts its massive masonry, / A pillar of fire by night, of cloud by day.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The lighthouse shines across the sea; / The homing fieldfares sing for glee: / 'Behold the shore!'
quotes.author: Ada Cambridge

quotes.quote: THE long still day is ending / In hollow and on height, / The lighthouse seaward sending / White rays of steady light;
quotes.author: Roderic Quinn

quotes.quote: The sea is noisy and wavy. / my boat bobs as i am splashed with / seaweed. the lofty lighthouse / illuminates the land that lies eastward.
quotes.author: Nicholas Alahverdian

quotes.quote: It might have been the lighthouse spark / Some sailor, rowing in the dark, / Had importuned to see!
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: The lighthouse that stands unintentionally stoic and tall and lights the way for those out at sea..
quotes.author: Buffy Sammons

quotes.quote: And fair across to where we know / The shelving sea cliffs areâ / The lighthouse, with a still faint glow, / Beneath a twinkling star.
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: He's the One I always run to / When the waves won't let me be / The lighthouse that I turn to / On a rough and troubled sea.
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: Thunder is good, thunder is impressive; but it is lightning that does all the work.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Lightning strikes the earth and thunder heralds the doom but the earth bears it all in silence, teaching us that life may be harsh to us but we shouldn't be so to life.
quotes.author: Tista Ray

quotes.quote: They say marriages are made in Heaven. But so is thunder and lightning.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: When you've been struck by lightning as many times as I have, you start to expect the worst pretty much all the time.
quotes.author: Jennifer Bosworth

quotes.quote: Lightning, your presence from ground to sky, no one knows what becomes of me, when you take me so quickly.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: There is a lightning quickness to the speed at which candidates can build and accidentally dismantle their own campaigns. If candidates don't figure out their place in the new digital world of politics, they will be destroyed by it.
quotes.author: Bill Burton

quotes.quote: God only exhibits his thunder and lightning at intervals, and so they always command attention.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Sometimes you don't need lightning to start a fire. Sometimes, it builds on its own.
quotes.author: Sarah Mlynowski

quotes.quote: If lightning is the anger of the gods, then the gods are concerned mostly about trees.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: It is not the roaring thunder that smites, but the silent lightning.
quotes.author: Ivan Panin

quotes.quote: Thunder is good, thunder is impressive; but it is lightning that does the work.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: They say that lightning never strikes in the same place twice, but the same is not true for courage. As it turns out, when courage strikes, it almost always begets more courage.
quotes.author: Kathi Appelt

quotes.quote: Lightning rendeth the rocks.
quotes.author: Owain

quotes.quote: The more brilliant the lightning, the quicker it disappears.
quotes.author: Avicenna

quotes.quote: Electricity is really just organized lightning.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Lightning doesn't strike through a cave.
quotes.author: Goitsemang Mvula

quotes.quote: Lightning is something which, again, we would rather avoid.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: The best lightning rod for your protection is your own spine.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Lightning came like a rip in the inky night, as if behind the dark canvass was a brilliant light just waiting to flood through any crack no matter how small.
quotes.author: Angela Abraham

quotes.quote: No mortal eye has ever fully seen a flash of lightning, for no matter how firmly we look, our eyes are sure to be dazzled.
quotes.author: Berthold Auerbach

quotes.quote: The reason lightning doesn't strike twice in the same place is that the same place isn't there the second time.
quotes.author: William Tyler

quotes.quote: When his flame falls, my lightning rises, and so on.
quotes.author: Victoria Aveyard

quotes.quote: The lightning is in God's hands, and it strikes just where He bids it.
quotes.author: Azel Stevens Roe

quotes.quote: Lightning is the shorthand of a storm, and tells of chaos.
quotes.author: Eric Mackay

quotes.quote: The cloud of mind is discharging its collected lightning.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: And when I breathed, my breath was lightning.
quotes.author: Black Elk

quotes.quote: The affections are like lightning: you cannot tell where they will strike till they have fallen.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: If there were no thunder, men would have little fear of lightning.
quotes.author: Jules Verne

quotes.quote: Lightning hides the colour of night.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Lightning makes no sound until it strikes.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Liking someone comes natural, but loving someone it's a choice.
quotes.author: Abraham Ruiz

quotes.quote: You learn to like someone when you find out what makes them laugh, but you can never truly love someone until you find out what makes them cry.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.quote: Why is it so embarrassing to admit you like someone? It should be a compliment to them, and even if they don't like you back, they should at least commend you on your refined taste.
quotes.author: Dalya Moon

quotes.quote: The fact of the matter is that when there are feelings involved and you like someone, it doesn't matter if you're an actor, a teacher, a doctor, a lawyer, a receptionist, you can't really help it when you have feelings for someone.
quotes.author: Jessica Szohr

quotes.quote: I'm all for being in love and whenever I like someone, I end up pretty much completely smitten.
quotes.author: Ed Westwick

quotes.quote: To look into that persons eyes and find yourself so completely lost in another world, a world full of absolute comfort and happiness.
quotes.author: Lily Collins

quotes.quote: I'm so in love, every time I look at you my soul gets dizzy.
quotes.author: Jesse Tyler

quotes.quote: You flew off with the wings of my heart and left me flightless.
quotes.author: Stelle Atwater

quotes.quote: We've all at some point in our life encountered that feeling of secretly liking someone, secretly having your eyes on them, secretly wishing they knew, but deep inside you were afraid of what the outcome would be. So you kept it unnoticed. Kept it hidden, locked inside, just hoping that maybe one day that moment would finally come when they would notice you!
quotes.author: Telisa McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Liking someone doesn't mean you have to be lovers, sometimes you just have to be friends.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes you never realize how much you like someone, until you watch them liking someone else.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Do you know what it's like to like someone so much you can't stand it and know that they'll never feel the same way
quotes.author: Jenny Han

quotes.quote: If you don't expect to like someone and then you do, that's an incredibly exciting moment.
quotes.author: Steven Moffat

quotes.quote: Everytime you speak about how much you like someone else, it kills me inside.
quotes.author: Xuan Ta

quotes.quote: I like the way he danced. And then I like the way we danced together.
quotes.author: Anita Diamant

quotes.quote: If love is liking someone an awful lot, then I suppose I'm in love with several people.
quotes.author: Steig Larsson

quotes.quote: If I had a rose for every time I thought of you, I'd be picking roses for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Swedish Proverb

quotes.quote: Love's easy. It kind of comes with the territory. But liking is another story.
quotes.author: Melina Marchetta

quotes.quote: It's a lot easier to like people when they can't make life miserable for you anymore.
quotes.author: Carol Kendall

quotes.quote: You know you are in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Sometimes your nearness takes my breath away; and all the things I want to say can find no voice. Then, in silence, I can only hope my eyes will speak my heart.
quotes.author: Robert Sexton

quotes.quote: What I feel for you seems less of earth and more of a cloudless heaven.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Just because you discover that you may like somebody after all, it doesn't necessarily mean there's any attraction.
quotes.author: Steve Kluger

quotes.quote: How do you make yourself not like someone
quotes.author: Louise Rennison

quotes.quote: Wanna hear something funny? What? I think I started liking you.
quotes.author: Jenny Han

quotes.quote: I like someone I can have fun with and who can be more laid-back than I am, because it calms me down.
quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.quote: I like you more than I would like to have a cigarette.
quotes.author: Wendy Cope

quotes.quote: You know you really like someone, when you sit the painful way in your chair just to get a better look at them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Liking one person is an extra reason for liking another.
quotes.author: E. M. FORSTER

quotes.quote: You can tell if someone's into you. You can feel the chemistry.
quotes.author: BRADLEY COOPER

quotes.quote: If the lilacs bloomed earlier, it could mean we had a milder winter, so look out for potential insect outbreaks.
quotes.author: David Wolfe

quotes.quote: I cannot understand why my arm is not a lilac tree.
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: April is the cruelest month, breeding lilacs out of the dead land, mixing memory and desire, stirring dull roots with spring rain.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: May: the lilacs are in bloom. Forget yourself.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Philosophy: a purple bullfinch in a lilac tree.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: And the lost heart stiffens and rejoices in the lost lilac and the lost sea voices and the weak spirit quickens to rebel for the bent golden-rod and the lost sea smell quickens to recover.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote:
When lilacs last in the door-yard bloom'd,
And the great star early droop'd in the western sky in the night,
I mourn'dÃ¢â¬âand yet shall mourn with ever-returning spring.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The smell of moist earth and lilacs hung in the air like wisps of the past and hints of the future.
quotes.author: Margaret Millar

quotes.quote: Lilacs are May in essence.
quotes.author: Jean Hersey

quotes.quote: Lilac makes on occasion a sound between a sniff and a snort that's as damning as all improper words in the language and, like them, can't be written down.
quotes.author: Leslie Ford

quotes.quote: The true beloveds of this world are in their lover's eyes lilacs opening, ship lights, school bells, a landscape, remembered conversations, friends, a child's Sunday, lost voices, one's favorite suit, autumn and all seasons, memory, yes, it being the earth and water of existence, memory.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: Strive not for beauty of raiment, nor for stately dwellingsÃ¢â¬Â¦behold the lilac.
quotes.author: L.E. Modesitt Jr.

quotes.quote: The lilac branches are bowed under the weight of the flowers: blooming is hard, and the most important thing is - to bloom.
quotes.author: Yevgeny Zamyatin

quotes.quote: Winter is on my head, but eternal spring is in my heart; I breathe at this hour the fragrance of the lilacs, the violets, and the roses, as at twenty years ago.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: A faint smell of lilac filled the air. There was always lilac in this part of town. Where there were grandmothers, there was always lilac.
quotes.author: Laura Miller

quotes.quote: When you chopped logs with the ax and they split open they smelled beautiful, like Christmas. But when you split someone's head open it smelled like abattoir and quite overpowered the scent of the wild lilacs you'd cut and brought into the house only this morning, which was already another life.
quotes.author: Kate Atkinson

quotes.quote: Fear is a slinking cat I find beneath the lilacs of my mind.
quotes.author: Sophie Tunnell

quotes.quote: When you're on top and you lead the parade, everyone's there throwing lilies and lilac water on your head. But when those parades have gone by and there's a storm in your heart, there are very few people that are going to sit there and listen to you bemoan life.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.quote: Nothing is more wistful than the scent of lilac, nor more robust than its woody stalk, for we must remember that it is a tree as well as a flower, we must try not to forget this.
quotes.author: Stevie Smith

quotes.quote: Snow is bruised lilac in half light: such pure solace.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: Now that the lilacs are in bloom. She has a bowl of lilacs in her room.
quotes.author: T.S. Elliot

quotes.quote: The Persian Lilac is also extremely useful, as much for the beauty and fragrance of the flowers as the ease with which it can be grown.
quotes.author: Groombridge and Sons

quotes.quote: Just now the lilac is in bloom. All before my little room.
quotes.author: Betty S. Flowers

quotes.quote: O months of blossoming, months of transfigurations / May without cloud and June stabbed to the heart / I shall not ever forget the lilacs or the roses / Nor those the spring has kept folded away apart.
quotes.author: Louis Aragon

quotes.quote: I imagine the earth when I am no more: Women's dresses, dewy lilacs, a song in the valley. Yet the books will be there on the shelves, well born, Derived from people, but also from radiance, heights.
quotes.author: Czeslaw Milosz

quotes.quote: Lilacs are found growing where winters are cold enough to afford proper growth and ample blossoms.
quotes.author: Kim Smith

quotes.quote: If you do not want your lilac to become a tree, prune to a height of eight to nine feet, which keeps the blossoms at eye level.
quotes.author: Kim Smith

quotes.quote: With its versatile form and lovely heart-shaped leaves the lilac is an exceptional companion to a wide range of flowering trees and shrubs.
quotes.author: Kim Smith

quotes.quote: The ineffable beauty and fragrance of lilacs are enhanced by the many varities of suitable companion plants.
quotes.author: Kim Smith

quotes.quote: The common lilac is amazingly fragrant, but once it's finished blooming, it is a rather unattractive plant.
quotes.author: Vincent Simeone

quotes.quote: There is a garden in her eyes where roses and white lilies flow.
quotes.author: Thomas Campion

quotes.quote: But who will watch my lilies, When their blossoms open white? By day the sun shall be sentry, And the moon and the stars by night!
quotes.author: Bayard Taylor

quotes.quote: Consider the lilies of the field whose bloom is brief: We are as they; Like them we fade away As doth a leaf.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: The rose is the flower and handmaiden of love - the lily, her fair associate, is the emblem of beauty and purity.
quotes.author: Dorothea Dix

quotes.quote: And the stately lilies stand Fair in the silvery light, Like saintly vestals, pale in prayer; Their pure breath sanctifies the air, As its fragrance fills the night.
quotes.author: Julia C.R. Dorr

quotes.quote: It is not growing like a tree in bulk, doth make man better be; Or standing long an oak, three hundred year, To fall a log at last, dry, bald, and sere: A lily of a day is fairer far in May, Although it falls and die that nightâIt was the plant and flower of Light.
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: Is not this lily pure? What fuller can procure A white so perfect, spotless clear As in this flower doth appear?
quotes.author: Francis Quarles

quotes.quote: I would far rather have two or three lilies of the valley gathered for me by a person I like, than the most expensive bouquet that can be bought.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gaskell

quotes.quote: A lily of a day Is fairer far in May, Although it fall and die that night, It was the plant and flower of light. In small proportions we just beauties see, And in short measures life may perfect be.
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: A lily or a rose never pretends, and its beauty is that it is what it is.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: As the lily among thorns, so is my love among the daughters.
quotes.author: Solomon Ibn Gabirol

quotes.quote: Look to the lilies how they grow! 'Twas thus the Saviour said, that we, Even in the simplest flowers that blow, God's ever-watchful care might see.
quotes.author: David Macbeth Moir

quotes.quote: When a baby comes you can smell two things: the smell of flesh, which smells like chicken soup, and the smell of lilies, the flower of another garden, the spiritual garden.
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.quote: In a marshland amongst the crocodiles, there float beautiful water lilies! Even in the Hell, one can find the good and the beauty.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Hope is like a harebell, trembling from its birth, Love is like a rose, the joy of all the earth, Faith is like a lily, lifted high and white, Love is like a lovely rose, the worldâs delight. Harebells and sweet lilies show a thornless growth, But the rose with all its thorns excels them both.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: Those virgin lilies, all the night Bathing their beauties in the lake, That they may rise more fresh and bright, When their beloved sun's awake.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: Now folds the lily all her sweetness up, And slips into the bosom of the lake; So fold thyself, my dearest, thou, and slip Into my bosom, and be lost in me.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: The modest Rose puts forth a thorn,The humble sheep a threatâning horn: While the Lily white shall in love delight, Nor a thorn nor a threat stain her beauty bright.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Very whitely still The lilies of our lives may reassure Their blossoms from their roots, accessible Alone to heavenly dews that drop not fewer; Growing straight out of man's reach, on the hill. God only, who made us rich, can make us poor.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barett Browning

quotes.quote: O lovely lily clean, O lily springing green, O lily bursting white, Dear lily of delight, Spring in my heart agen That I may flower to men.
quotes.author: Masefield

quotes.quote: Look to the lilies how they grow! 'Twas thus the Saviour said, that we, Even in the simplest flowers that blow, God's ever-watchful care might see.
quotes.author: Moir

quotes.quote: I wish I were the lily's leaf To fade upon that bosom warm, Content to wither, pale and brief, The trophy of thy paler form.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: I remained lost in oblivion; My face I reclined on the Beloved. All ceased and I abandoned myself, leaving my cares forgotten among the lilies.
quotes.author: John of the Cross

quotes.quote: To define is to limit.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Human sympathy has its limits.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Limit love and you limit life.
quotes.author: Vera Stanley Alder

quotes.quote: Doubt is the limit of progress.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Whatever limits us, we call fate.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: All limitations are self imposed.
quotes.author: Icarus

quotes.quote: Your limitations create your sound.
quotes.author: Norah Jones

quotes.quote: Music has no limits of a life-span.
quotes.author: Nadine Gordimer

quotes.quote: We are limited only by our thoughts
quotes.author: Miranda Kerr

quotes.quote: Death is the last limit of all things.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Belief in limits creates limited people
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: There is no limit to the power of loving.
quotes.author: John Morton

quotes.quote: Adversity tests the limit of our strength.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: You never know the limit of a human being.
quotes.author: Alberto Juantorena

quotes.quote: Beyond the limits there lies other limits.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: God's love is unbounded. It has no limits.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: The fears we don't face become our limits.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Adversity tests the limit of your strength.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: One who fears failure limits his activities. Failure is only the opportunity more intelligently to begin again.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Any definition which limits us is deplorable.
quotes.author: Edward Albee

quotes.quote: Limitation makes the creative mind inventive.
quotes.author: Walter Gropius

quotes.quote: There is no limit to what can be accomplished if it doesn't matter who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Language helps form the limits of our reality.
quotes.author: Dale Spender

quotes.quote: There are no limitations to any of our dreams.
quotes.author: Gene Simmons

quotes.quote: Beyond the limit of pain, it is longer painful.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: A man who limits his interests, limits his life.
quotes.author: Vincent Price

quotes.quote: Every limit is a beginning as well as an ending.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The only limits are, as always, those of vision.
quotes.author: James Broughton

quotes.quote: Everyone has limits. Not everyone accepts them.
quotes.author: Felix Baumgartner

quotes.quote: Don't believe what your eyes are telling you. All they show is limitation. Look with your understanding, find out what you already know, and you'll see the way to fly.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Art consists of limitation. The most beautiful part of every picture is the frame.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Age is no barrier. It's a limitation you put on your mind.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.quote: In imagination, there's no limitation.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: All limitations are self-imposed.
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

quotes.quote: Your limitations create your sound.
quotes.author: Norah Jones

quotes.quote: Your limitation lies in your imagination.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The man who knows his limitations, has none.
quotes.author: David Foster Wallace

quotes.quote: Limitation makes the creative mind inventive.
quotes.author: Walter Gropius

quotes.quote: There are no limitations to any of our dreams.
quotes.author: Gene Simmons

quotes.quote: The enemy of art is the absence of limitations.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: There are no limitations to the mind except those that we acknowledge.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: All conceptions are limitations of the conceiver.
quotes.author: Neville Goddard

quotes.quote: If you accept your limitations you go beyond them.
quotes.author: Brendan Behan

quotes.quote: The limitations in life do not necessary limit you.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Understand your limitations and capitalize on them.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Most of the time, our limitations are self-imposed.
quotes.author: Marcus Buckingham

quotes.quote: When we argue for our limitations, we get to keep them.
quotes.author: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.quote: People mistake their limitations for high standards.
quotes.author: Jean Toomer

quotes.quote: The wise know their limitations; the foolish do not.
quotes.author: Benjamin Hoff

quotes.quote: To understand the limitation of things, desire them.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The new limitations are the human ones of perception.
quotes.author: Milton Babbitt

quotes.quote: There are no limitations, just dreams to be fulfilled.
quotes.author: Joel Brown

quotes.quote: Every limitation must be overcome to realised the goal.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Limited minds can recognize limitations only in others.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: To be aware of limitations is already to be beyond them.
quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.quote: Challenge your limitations for the pure joy of challenge.
quotes.author: Chin-Ning Chu

quotes.quote: The mind that perceives the limitation is the limitation.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Limitations imply possibilities. A problem is a challenge.
quotes.author: Russell Page

quotes.quote: A barrier is a limitation only when you perceive it as one.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: It is important to have people believe in you. With this support, what you can achieve is limitless.
quotes.author: Ronnie Coleman

quotes.quote: Service is a limitless opportunity, it is the reason why we breathe.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: Breathe in the sweet air of limitless possibility, and make life as rich as you know it can be.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Your ability to love, to reach out, and to experience life is limitless. The limitation is only of the body and mind.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: The universe is limitless and so are you. There is a limitless supply of good that the universe wants to show you. Step out of the way and let it be!
quotes.author: James Van Praagh

quotes.quote: Your brain has a capacity for learning that is virtually limitless, which makes every human a potential genius.
quotes.author: Michael J. Gelb

quotes.quote: If you are aware of your weaknesses and are constantly learning, your potential is virtually limitless.
quotes.author: Jay Sidhu

quotes.quote: The great gift of the human imagination is that it has no limits or ending.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Limitless is your potential. Magnificent is your future.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Civilization is a limitless multiplication of unnecessary necessities.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Our opportunities to give of ourselves are indeed limitless, but they are also perishable.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Life is wide, limitless. There is no border, no frontier.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: The artist's world is limitless. It can be found anywhere, far from where he lives or a few feet away. It is always on his doorstep.
quotes.author: Paul Strand

quotes.quote: Human minds are limitless, like space. It may be foolish for a person to even try to deliberately affect another person's mind.
quotes.author: Fuyumi Soryo

quotes.quote: Do not limit the limitless God! With Him, face the future unafraid because you are never alone.
quotes.author: Lettie Cowman

quotes.quote: If you embrace that the things that you can do are limitless, you can put your ding in the universe. You can change the world.
quotes.author: Tim Cook

quotes.quote: The number of ways you can live in one lifetime is limitless. So why limit yourself? The sky is NOT the limit. Beyond the universe is.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: God is limitless in His love, and asks that we at least make the effort to be limitless in ours.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: When we turn our attention away from ourselves, our potential is limitless.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: Human life is limited, but knowledge is limitless. To drive the limited in pursuit of the limitless is fatal; and to presume that one really knows is fatal indeed!
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: Within us is the unborn possibility of limitless experience. Ours is the privilege of giving birth to it!
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

quotes.quote: The universe is but a partial manifestation of your limitless capacity to become.
quotes.author: Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj

quotes.quote: A certain type of perfection can only be realized through a limitless accumulation of the imperfect.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Your range of available choices - right now - is limitless.
quotes.author: Frederick Carl Frieseke

quotes.quote: Human potential is the only limitless resource we have in this world.
quotes.author: Carly Fiorina

quotes.quote: The possibilities of success are limitless, as long as you're willing to put the work in.
quotes.author: T.I.

quotes.quote: There exist limitless opportunities in every industry. Where there is an open mind, there will always be a frontier.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: God's children have a limitless supply of the fruit of the Spirit.
quotes.author: Henry R Brandt

quotes.quote: Imagination might not be limitless. It's still tethered to the universe of what we know.
quotes.author: Chang-Rae Lee

quotes.quote: The truth is limitless in its range, if you drop the T and look at it in reverse it could hurt.
quotes.author: Lupe Fiasco

quotes.quote: There are no straight lines or sharp corners in nature. Therefore, buildings must have no straight lines or sharp corners.
quotes.author: Antoni Gaudi

quotes.quote: Every single line means something.
quotes.author: Jean-Michel Basquiat

quotes.quote: Straight lines go too quickly to appreciate the pleasures of the journey. They rush straight to their target and then die in the very moment of their triumph without having thought, loved, suffered or enjoyed themselves.
quotes.author: Rene Crevel

quotes.quote: The essence of drawing is the line exploring space.
quotes.author: Andy Goldsworthy

quotes.quote: Lines create an experience beyond the literal. There is so much potential in losing and finding the line again. Like letting go and being awakened. Lines, like music, create potential for mystery.
quotes.author: Linda Saccoccio

quotes.quote: Remember, a line cannot exist alone; it always brings a companion along. Do remember that one line does nothing; it is only in relation to another that it creates a volume.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: A line is a visual trail of energy that has been drawn across a surface, and is a manifestation of the life energy of the person that made it.
quotes.author: Mick Maslen

quotes.quote: Art is a line around your thoughts.
quotes.author: Gustav Klimt

quotes.quote: They say stay in the lines, but there's always something better on the other side.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.quote: You can't tell any kind of a story without having some kind of a theme, something to say between the lines.
quotes.author: Robert Wise

quotes.quote: Long-lived persons have one or two lines which extend through the whole hand; short-lived persons have two lines not extending through the whole hand.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The line that describes the beautiful is elliptical. It has simplicity and constant change. It cannot be described by a compass, and it changes direction at every one of its points.
quotes.author: Rudolf Arnheim

quotes.quote: Line... is the most important part of any painting.
quotes.author: Lyle Carbajal

quotes.quote: The song of the curved line is called happiness.
quotes.author: Rene Crevel

quotes.quote: Lines are results, do not draw them for themselves.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: Line is so versatile â you can do a fine, tight, closely observed description or simply put a line around an idea â like a cartoonist.
quotes.author: Stan Smith

quotes.quote: Every line tells its own story, even the very tentative ones.
quotes.author: Gillian Redwood

quotes.quote: It is possible that, through horizontal and vertical lines constructed with awareness, but not with calculation, led by high intuition, and brought to harmony and rhythm, these basic forms of beauty, supplemented if necessary by other direct lines or curves, can become a work of art, as strong as it is true.
quotes.author: Piet Mondrian

quotes.quote: Nature creates curved lines while humans create straight lines.
quotes.author: Hideki Yukawa

quotes.quote: There is a thin line that separates laughter and pain, comedy and tragedy, humor and hurt.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: The shortest distance between two points is a straight line.
quotes.author: Archimedes

quotes.quote: The line has almost become a work of art in itself.
quotes.author: Theo van Doesburg

quotes.quote: Lingerie is the maximum expression of a woman's femininity.
quotes.author: Dolce & Gabana

quotes.quote: Lingerie is my next love after clothing; I think it is what is worn underneath that really inspires a woman to feel beautiful in her clothes - that inner, secret glamour.
quotes.author: Alice Temperley

quotes.quote: Lingerie is one of the most important pieces of your wardrobe. You can have a wardrobe malfunction if you dont choose the right thing to wear underneath!
quotes.author: Adriana Lima

quotes.quote: Lingerie is not about seducing men, it's about embracing womanhood.
quotes.author: Dita Von Teese

quotes.quote: Trust the man who gifts you lingerie more than the man who gifts you roses, at least the former is clear about his intentions for you.
quotes.author: Musings Heart

quotes.quote: Lingerie is that inner, secret glamour.
quotes.author: Alice Temperley

quotes.quote: For me, wearing lingerie isn't about anyone else but me. If I dressed for others I would be a miserable person.
quotes.author: Ashley Graham

quotes.quote: I love to wear lingerie. The problem is that men always rip it off too quickly. When women are dolled up in lingerie they feel sexy. So let us wear it for five minutes.
quotes.author: Karen McDougal

quotes.quote: I go to bed wearing a very baggy one-piece cheetah suit, just because it makes my son laugh. My sexy lingerie has been locked in a drawer for a while. Sandra Bullock
quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

quotes.quote: Real elegance is everywhere â especially in the things that donât show.
quotes.author: Christian Dior

quotes.quote: One of my ex-husbands thought I had a breast job. They looked bigger. I just got the proper lingerie.
quotes.author: Cybill Shepherd

quotes.quote: When it comes to lingerie, there are no rules. I feel the sexiest when I'm myself, no hair, no makeup.
quotes.author: Irina Shayk

quotes.quote: Here's the thing about lingerie: The only time we see it outside our own bedrooms, it is on women who are gloriously freakish in their physical perfection.
quotes.author: Lynn Coady

quotes.quote: She wore her pain like lingerie, only who loved her enough, got to see it.
quotes.author: Himanshu Chhabra

quotes.quote: They call it lingerie. I call it sensual innovation.
quotes.author: Lebo Grand

quotes.quote: Give a girl the right lingerie and she can conquer the world.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you're wearing lingerie that makes you feel glamorous, you're halfway there to turning heads.
quotes.author: Elle Macpherson

quotes.quote: I think lingerie plays a big part in how you carry yourself.
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.quote: Ladies, if you truly want your man to be successful, never ever underestimate the power of a lipstick, sexy lingerie, and high heels.
quotes.author: Lebo Grand

quotes.quote: A chain is no stronger than its weakest link, and life is after all a chain.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: In every conceivable manner, the family is a link to our past, bridge to our future.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.quote: It is a mistake to look too far ahead. Only one link of the chain of destiny can be handled at a time.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I have found the missing link between the higher ape and civilized man; it is we.
quotes.author: Konrad Lorenz

quotes.quote: Don't shrink your standards, link yourself with those who think and ink like you.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: That deed which in our guilt we today call weakness, will appear tomorrow as an essential link in the complete chain of Man.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: The written word is the link between the past and the future.
quotes.author: Lincoln Barnett

quotes.quote: The link between my experience as an entrepreneur and that of a politician is all in one word: freedom.
quotes.author: Silvio Berlusconi

quotes.quote: To communicate through silence is a link between the thoughts of man.
quotes.author: Marcel Marceau

quotes.quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
quotes.author: Richad Bach

quotes.quote: For people to link my music to their lives, it's incredible, there's no other feeling like it.
quotes.author: Adele

quotes.quote: Fathers, your are the head and strength of the family unit. If you are not in place, there is a weakness in the link.
quotes.author: Anita R. Sneed-Carter

quotes.quote: One of the first conditions of happiness is that the link between Man and Nature shall not be broken.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: You can free yourself from aging by reinterpreting your body and by grasping the link between belief and biology.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The truth is that we can learn to condition our minds, bodies, and emotions to link pain or pleasure to whatever we choose. By changing what we link pain and pleasure to, we will instantly change our behaviors.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: True, the lion is a mighty, noble animal, but it is an animal nevertheless!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A lion doesn't concern itself with the opinion of sheep.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: If the lion was advised by the fox, he would be cunning.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Be as a lion in the path. Be dangerous even in defeat.
quotes.author: Anton Szandor LaVey

quotes.quote: A lion is called a 'king of beasts' obviously for a reason.
quotes.author: Jack Hanna

quotes.quote: Even the lion has to defend himself against flies.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: The lion is an emblem of the dream of absolute power -- and, as a wild rather than a domestic animal, he belongs to a world outside the realm of society and culture.
quotes.author: Charles H. Hinnant

quotes.quote: A Lion that hunts for survival in the jungle does not envy the one being fed in a zoo.
quotes.author: Suhaib Rumi

quotes.quote: Only a lion can recognize a lion's roar.
quotes.author: Kodo Sawaki

quotes.quote: The lion cares less about being king of the beasts than about finding his dinner.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: The lion is most handsome when looking for food.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The lion will lay down with the lamb, but every morning they'll have to provide a new lamb. Maybe this world is another planet's hell.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Lions are neither predators nor killers. They just go for hunting like kings; because they are the kings!
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Until lions have their historians, tales of the hunt shall always glorify the hunters.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Naked lions are just as dangerous as elegantly dressed ones.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: If the lion didn't bite the tamer every once in a while, it wouldn't be exciting.
quotes.author: Darrell Waltrip

quotes.quote: The lion who breaks the enemy's ranks is a minor hero compared to the lion who overcomes himself.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The lion cannot protect himself from traps, and the fox cannot defend himself from wolves. One must therefore be a fox to recognize traps, and a lion to frighten wolves.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: The lion is ashamed, it's true, when he hunts with the fox.
quotes.author: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

quotes.quote: Truth does not sit in a cave and hide like a lie. It wanders around proudly and roars loudly like a lion.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Lions don't have to roar. There is power in silence, confidence, and persistence. Those who work don't talk, and those who talk don't work. Handle your business. Measure your efforts by results. Focus your time, energy, and activity on mastering and executing a plan.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Lions would have fared better, had lions been the artists.
quotes.author: John Henry Newman

quotes.quote: The lion is the defender of faith, strength, valor, fortitude, and kingliness.
quotes.author: Murray Zimiles

quotes.quote: Courage is poorly housed that dwells in numbers; the lion never counts the herd that are about him, nor weighs how many flocks he has to scatter.
quotes.author: Aaron Hill

quotes.quote: A lion's work hours are only when he's hungry; once he's satisfied, the predator and prey live peacefully together.
quotes.author: Chuck Jones

quotes.quote: You know the lion is dangerous when it is quiet, stalking, sneaking up on its prey. Only after it has ambushed and killed its prey does the lion roar. It wants to intimidate the jackals.
quotes.author: J. Hand

quotes.quote: If a lion could speak, it would not understand itself.
quotes.author: Michael Frayn

quotes.quote: A lion runs the fastest when he is hungry.
quotes.author: Salman Khan

quotes.quote: When a lion doesn't get its prey, it remains hungry. When the prey saves himself, he has not won, but has saved his life.
quotes.author: Uday Kotak

quotes.quote: If the lion knew his own strength, hard were it for any man to rule him.
quotes.author: Thomas More

quotes.quote: Lips like rosebuds peeping out of snow.
quotes.author: Philip James Bailey

quotes.quote: Language is wine upon the lips.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: The lips of those we love are sweet to us in life, and sacred in death.
quotes.author: Maria Charlesworth

quotes.quote: Lips, like roses dropping myrrh.
quotes.author: George Sandys

quotes.quote: Everything you declare with your lips will be tested in your life.
quotes.author: Jack Hyles

quotes.quote: Lips are the most sensual organ we are allowed to expose.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Lips with such sweetness in their honeyed deeps. As fills the rose in which a fairy sleeps.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer Lytton

quotes.quote: Your lips are my persuasion, your love will be my cure.
quotes.author: Billy Squier

quotes.quote: Lips, however rosy, must be fed.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: My lips are big, but my talent is bigger.
quotes.author: Fantasia Barrino

quotes.quote: Lips moulded in love are tremulously full of the glowing softness they borrow from the heart, and electrically obedient to its impulses.
quotes.author: Grace Greenwood

quotes.quote: For attractive lips, speak words of kindness.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Her lips were like living fire. He could not take his own away. He forgot everything.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Oh how sweet it is to hear one's own convictions from another's lips.
quotes.author: Frank Gifford

quotes.quote: Lips, like hanging fruit, whose hue. Is ruby 'neath a bloom of blue.
quotes.author: Thomas Gordon Hake

quotes.quote: Soul meets soul on lovers' lips.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: Lips are no part of the head, only made for a double-leaf door for the mouth.
quotes.author: John Lyly

quotes.quote: The time comes upon every public man when it is best for him to keep his lips closed.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: You know how you're supposed to choose between playing up your eyes or your lips? I always choose lips. I love the drama.
quotes.author: Leighton Meester

quotes.quote: Pure lips, sweet seals in my soft lips imprinted. What bargains may I make still to be sealing?
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: When the lips are opened, we behold the image of the soul.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Higgons

quotes.quote: Lips are the fingerprints of love.
quotes.author: Tyler Shields

quotes.quote: My lips are like camera for her, whenever I click her with my lips, she smiles.
quotes.author: Himanshu Chhabra

quotes.quote: Red lips are not so red as the stained stones kissed by the English dead.
quotes.author: Wilfred Owen

quotes.quote: There, the lips of silent passion, curved like an archer's bow to send the sweet arrows out.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: Lips move; lips touch; lips signal. Lips are on the outside for show, and on the most secret inside of your mouth. Lips frame words that tie.
quotes.author: Jane Rogers

quotes.quote: Her lips were like the soft ridges of dunes in the desert at sunset; like the crests of waves meeting in the frothy rush to shore; like the folded wings of courting birds.
quotes.author: Gregory David Roberts

quotes.quote: And yet to wine, to opium even, / I prefer the elixir of your lips on which love flaunts itself.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: A man's lips are never sealed so tight that a kiss can't melt them.
quotes.author: George Henry Miles

quotes.quote: Lips. There was something strangely, delicately indelicate about the word, like a kiss itself.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Pour yourself a drink, put on some lipstick, and pull yourself together.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: Lips without lipstick are like cake without frosting.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you are sad, if you are heartbroken, make yourself up, dress up, add more lipstick and attack. Men hate women who weep.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: You can't keep changing men, so you settle for changing your lipstick.
quotes.author: Heather Locklear

quotes.quote: Where lipstick is concerned, the important thing is not the color, but to accept God's final decision on where your lips end.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Lipstick is the red badge of courage.
quotes.author: Man Ray

quotes.quote: Heels and lipstick will put the fear of God into people.
quotes.author: Dita Von Teese

quotes.quote: Live your eyeliner, breathe your lipstick.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: Joy is the best makeup. But a little lipstick is a close runner-up.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Lipstick is really magical. It holds more than a waxy color - it holds the promise of a brilliant smile, a brilliant day, both literally and figuratively.
quotes.author: Roberta Gately

quotes.quote: Nobody looks good with brown lipstick on.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Lipstick can't solve all problems, but it's a pretty great start.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Give a woman the right lipstick and she can conquer the world.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Just have fun. Smile. And keep putting on lipstick.
quotes.author: Diane Keaton

quotes.quote: There are some things you can't cover up with lipstick and powder.
quotes.author: Elvis Costello

quotes.quote: There are endless ways to enhance beauty. You never know when you will find your perfect lipstick - unless you keep experimenting.
quotes.author: Pat McGrath

quotes.quote: A girl can never have too many lipstick options!
quotes.author: Zoe Sugg

quotes.quote: Lipstick can glam up a whole look, especially in red.
quotes.author: Rihanna

quotes.quote: Lipstick is the best cosmetic that exists.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.quote: Whether it's a bold color or something more natural, it's about feeeling comfortable in your look and wearing it with self-assurance.
quotes.author: Natalie Portman

quotes.quote: Lipstick was an easy answer to boredom. It was the most exciting thing you could do in the shortest amount of time because for a second, you got to convince yourself that you were the kind of gal who wears lipstick every day. You got to pout to yourself, and trick yourself that you were glamorous. Then in a second it was over, time to wipe it off and start again.
quotes.author: Ainslie Hogarth
