quotes.quote: Lipstick is for when you've had a shit day and you need red lipstick to face the world.
quotes.author: Keira Knightley

quotes.quote: Every season has its lipstick trend, and just because your perfect color is a pinky beige, that doesnt mean you can't wear deep burgundy.
quotes.author: Bobbi Brown

quotes.quote: Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The worst thing about some men is that when they are not drunk they are sober.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: A bumper of good liquor will end a contest quicker than justice, judge, or vicar.
quotes.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quotes.quote: Alcohol, taken in sufficient quantities, may produce all the effects of drunkenness.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Alcohol is necessary for a man so that he can have a good opinion of himself, undisturbed by the facts.
quotes.author: Finley Peter Dunne

quotes.quote: Alcohol is the anesthesia by which we endure the operation of life.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
quotes.author: Francis Scott Key Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Its liquor is like the sweetest dew from Heaven.
quotes.author: Lu Yu

quotes.quote: Candy is dandy. But liquor is quicker.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Drunkenness is nothing but voluntary madness.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Better belly burst than good liquor be lost.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: A drunk man's words are a sober man's thoughts.
quotes.author: Steve Fergosi

quotes.quote: There are only two real ways to get ahead today - sell liquor or drink it.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: Drink 'til the ground looks blue.
quotes.author: Thomas Heywood

quotes.quote: Drink washes off the daub and discovers the man.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: One martini is all right. Two are too many, and three are not enough.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Here's to alcohol, the rose colored glasses of life.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: You're not drunk if you can lie on the floor without holding on.
quotes.author: Dean Martin

quotes.quote: Almost anything can be preserved in alcohol, except health, happiness, and money.
quotes.author: Mary Wilson Little

quotes.quote: Nothing uses up alcohol faster than political argument.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: If drinking is interfering with your work, you're probably a heavy drinker. If work is interfering with your drinking, you're probably an alcoholic.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: In wine there is wisdom, in beer there is Freedom, in water there is bacteria.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Drinking makes you happy with your body the way it is.
quotes.author: Philip Rosenthal

quotes.quote: It's a great advantage not to drink among hard-drinking people. You can hold your tongue and, moreover, you can time any little irregularity of your own so that everybody else is so blind that they don't see or care.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Scotch whisky is made from barley and the morning dew on angel's nipples.
quotes.author: Warren Ellis

quotes.quote: Wine is the most healthful and most hygienic of beverages.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.quote: Wine hath drowned more men than the sea.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: It is 'Liquor Dealer.' It means soul stealer.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Alcohol, my permanent accessory. Alcohol, a party-time necessity. Alcohol, alternative to feeling like yourself. Oh alcohol, I still drink to your health.
quotes.author: Barenaked Ladies

quotes.quote: The ear of the leader must ring with the voices of the people.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Many a man would rather you heard his story than granted his request.
quotes.author: Phillip Stanhope

quotes.quote: Silence is a source of great strength.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The most basic of all human needs is the need to understand and be understood. The best way to understand people is to listen to them.
quotes.author: Ralph Nichols

quotes.quote: It's a rare person who wants to hear what he doesn't want to hear.
quotes.author: Dick Cavett

quotes.quote: Wisdom is the reward you get for a lifetime of listening when you'd have preferred to talk.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: One of the most sincere forms of respect is actually listening to what another has to say.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: If you make listening and observation your occupation, you will gain much more than you can by talk.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: Most of the successful people I've known are the ones who do more listening than talking.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn't said.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: The word 'listen' contains the same letters as the word 'silent'.
quotes.author: Alfred Brendel

quotes.quote: Listening is not merely not talking, though even that is beyond most of our powers; it means taking a vigorous, human interest in what is being told us.
quotes.author: Alice Deur Miller

quotes.quote: When you listen, it's amazing what you can learn. When you act on what you've learned, it's amazing what you can change.
quotes.author: Audrey Mclaughlin

quotes.quote: People start to heal the moment they feel heard.
quotes.author: Cheryl Richardson

quotes.quote: Be a good listener. Your ears will never get you in trouble.
quotes.author: Frank Tyger

quotes.quote: Being heard is so close to being loved that for the average person they are almost indistinguishable.
quotes.author: David Augsburger

quotes.quote: When you talk, you repeat what you already know; when you listen, you often learn something.
quotes.author: Jared Sparks

quotes.quote: To listen well is as powerful a means of communication and influence as to talk well.
quotes.author: John Marshall

quotes.quote: Listening is a magnetic and strange thing, a creative force. The friends who listen to us are the ones we move toward. When we are listened to, it creates us, makes us unfold and expand.
quotes.author: Karl Menninger

quotes.quote: You cannot truly listen to anyone and do anything else at the same time.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: I know that you believe you understand what you think I said, but I'm not sure you realize that what you heard is not what I meant.
quotes.author: Robert Mccloskey

quotes.quote: To listen well, is as powerful a means of influence as to talk well, and is as essential to all true conversation
quotes.author: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.quote: Everything has been said before, but since nobody listens we have to keep going back and beginning all over again.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: A good listener tries to understand what the other person is saying. In the end he may disagree sharply, but because he disagrees, he wants to know exactly what it is he is disagreeing with.
quotes.author: Kenneth A. Wells

quotes.quote: Deep listening is miraculous for both listener and speaker. When someone receives us with open-hearted, non-judging, intensely interested listening, our spirits expand.
quotes.author: Sue Patton Thoele

quotes.quote: A good listener is not only popular everywhere, but after a while he knows something.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: A person hears only what they understand.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Every person I work with knows something better than me. My job is to listen long enough to find it and use it.
quotes.author: Jack Nichols

quotes.quote: Give every man your ear, but few thy voice. Take each man's censure, but reserve thy judgment.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: God gave us two ears and one mouth, so we can hear twice as much as we say.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Insights and perceptions pass through the mind like fleet fireflies. Lit for an instant, then gone back into the dark.
quotes.author: Leonard Bishop

quotes.quote: We must view young people not as empty bottles to be filled, but as candles to be lit.
quotes.author: Robert H. Shaffer

quotes.quote: Hope is patience with the lamp lit.
quotes.author: Tertullian

quotes.quote: The fuses had been lit and could not be extinguished. All that remained was to observe the speed of the spark, and the size of the explosions.
quotes.author: Michael Lewis

quotes.quote: Something that had the quality of a dimly lit stage set just before the curtains rise on opening night. There was a rhythm to it, a beckoning, and a bittersweet tear in time.
quotes.author: Chris Abani

quotes.quote: Well lit streets discourage sin, but don't overdo it.
quotes.author: William Kennedy

quotes.quote: Dimly lit restaurants always make me think they're trying to hide the food.
quotes.author: Michael Kurland

quotes.quote: The lamps are going out all over Europe; we shall not see them lit again in our lifetime.
quotes.author: Edward Grey

quotes.quote: A lamp is lit in woman's eye. That souls, else lost on earth, remember angels by.
quotes.author: Willis

quotes.quote: Don't jump on a man unless he is down.
quotes.author: Finley Peter Dunn

quotes.quote: Blue oblivion, largely lit, smiled and smiled at me.
quotes.author: William Rose Benet

quotes.quote: No one can look bad when you've been lit for six hours.
quotes.author: Kate Winslet

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as an artist - only the world, lit or unlit, as the world allows.
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: Essentially what photography is is life lit up.
quotes.author: Sam Abell

quotes.quote: Many have forged a path to greatness lit only by a vision in their minds.
quotes.author: Chris Gardner

quotes.quote: How can we sleep when our soul is lit from within?
quotes.author: Anthony T Hincks

quotes.quote: A friend is the wax that keeps the flame lit, an enemy is the wind that blows it out.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Brilliantly lit from stem to stern, she looked like a sagging birthday cake.
quotes.author: Walter Lord

quotes.quote: Teen fiction should be about teenagers - no matter how many arguments there are about what Ya lit should be, this seems like the one thing we can all agree on.
quotes.author: Robin Wasserman

quotes.quote: In a world lit by data, street corners are painted with contextual information, automobiles can navigate autonomously, thermostats respond to patterns of activity, and retail outlets change as rapidly as search from Google.
quotes.author: John Battelle

quotes.quote: Everybody is candle true. But not everybody is lit.
quotes.author: Harbhajan Singh

quotes.quote: Night is world lit by itself.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: Everything which originates from pure love is lit with the radiance of beauty.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: Live on berries in a hollowed out comet lit by artificial suns long enough, and you start to have delusions about achieving enlightenment.
quotes.author: Hannu Rajaniemi

quotes.quote: The candle is not lit To give light, but to testify to the night.
quotes.author: Robert Bly

quotes.quote: Literacy is one of the greatest gifts a person could receive.
quotes.author: Jen Selinsky

quotes.quote: To encourage literature and the arts is a duty which every good citizen owes to his country.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Writing and reading decrease our sense of isolation. They deepen and widen and expand our sense of life: they feed the soul.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Learning is not attained by chance. It must be sought for with ardor and attended to with diligence.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: Literacy is the door to knowledge, essential to individual self-esteem and empowerment.
quotes.author: Irina Bokova

quotes.quote: Everyone must be given the opportunity to think, read and write.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: To acquire the habit of reading is to construct for yourself a refuge from almost all the miseries of life.
quotes.author: Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: There's nothing like a shovel full of dirt to encourage literacy.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Literacy is the harbinger of both intelligence and taste.
quotes.author: Albert Thomas Bifarelli

quotes.quote: The greatest gift is a passion for reading.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Hardwick

quotes.quote: There is an art of reading, as well as an art of thinking, and an art of writing.
quotes.author: Isaac D'Israeli

quotes.quote: Literacy is the jump-off point from which all of life's successes take flight.
quotes.author: Lauri Fortino

quotes.quote: The ratio of literacy to illiteracy is constant, but nowadays the illiterates can read and write.
quotes.author: Alberto Moravia

quotes.quote: literacy is the fertilizer needed for development to take root and grow.
quotes.author: David Archer

quotes.quote: Writing reminds you that you're never alone. Writing and reading is to be optimistic.
quotes.author: Richard Flanagan

quotes.quote: To learn to read is to light a fire; every syllable that is spelled out is a spark.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Literacy is freedom, and everyone has something significant to say,
quotes.author: Jimmy Santiago Baca

quotes.quote: For everyone, everywhere, literacy is, along with education in general, a basic human right.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: The fire of literacy is created by the emotional sparks between a child, a book, and the person reading.
quotes.author: Mem Fox

quotes.quote: Start writing, no matter what. The water does not flow until the faucet is turned on.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: To be successful in life what you need is education, not literacy and degrees.
quotes.author: Munshi Premchand

quotes.quote: Writing and reading is to me synonymous with existing.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: Whenever you read a good book, somewhere in the world a door opens to allow in more light.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: We have to teach empathy as we do literacy.
quotes.author: Bill Drayton

quotes.quote: Reading should not be presented to children as a chore or duty. It should be offered to them as a precious gift.
quotes.author: Kate Dicamillo

quotes.quote: Literacy is the most basic currency of the knowledge economy.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Learn to write by doing it. Read widely and wisely. Increase your word power. Find your own individual voice though practicing constantly. Go through the world with your eyes and ears open and learn to express that experience in words.
quotes.author: P. D. James

quotes.quote: Good education means learning to read, write and most importantly learn how to learn so that you can be whatever you want to be when you grow up.
quotes.author: Patty Murray

quotes.quote: Literacy, written language is a very late acquisition in terms of human evolution.
quotes.author: Jean Berko Gleason

quotes.quote: The man who does not read books has no advantage over the man that can not read them.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The best of a book is not the thought which it contains, but the thought which it suggests; just as the charm of music dwells not in the tones but in the echoes of our hearts.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: All good books are alike in that they are truer than if they had really happened and after you are finished reading one you will feel that all that happened to you and afterwards it all belongs to you; the good and the bad, the ecstasy, the remorse, and sorrow, the people and the places and how the weather was.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Of all the diversions of life, there is none so proper to fill up its empty spaces as the reading of useful and entertaining authors.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Reading makes a full man, meditation a profound man, discourse a clear man.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Literature adds to reality, it does not simply describe it. It enriches the necessary competencies that daily life requires and provides; and in this respect, it irrigates the deserts that our lives have already become.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: It's in literature that true life can be found. It's under the mask of fiction that you can tell the truth.
quotes.author: Gao Xingjian

quotes.quote: Literature is the art of discovering something extraordinary about ordinary people, and saying with ordinary words something extraordinary.
quotes.author: Boris Pasternak

quotes.quote: Every man's work, whether it be literature, or music or pictures or architecture or anything else, is always a portrait of himself.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Literature is the expression of a feeling of deprivation, a recourse against a sense of something missing.
quotes.author: Octavio Paz

quotes.quote: Great literature is simply language charged with meaning to the utmost possible degree.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: Literature is the question minus the answer.
quotes.author: Roland Barthes

quotes.quote: A classic is something that everybody wants to have read and nobody wants to read.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: What is wonderful about great literature is that it transforms the man who reads it towards the condition of the man who wrote.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: The duty of literature is to note what counts, and to light up what is suited to the light. If it ceases to choose and to love, it becomes like a woman who gives herself without preference.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: It is in literature that the concrete outlook of humanity receives its expression.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: The crown of literature is poetry.
quotes.author: William Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Literature always anticipates life. It does not copy it, but moulds it to its purpose.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Literature is strewn with the wreckage of those who have minded beyond reason the opinion of others.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: The difficulty of literature is not to write, but to write what you mean.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: For whatever is truly wondrous and fearful in man, never yet was put into words or books.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: The self-styled intellectual who is impotent with pen and ink hungers to write history with sword and blood.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: In literature the ambition of the novice is to acquire the literary language: the struggle of the adept is to get rid of it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The decline in literature indicates a decline in the nation. The two keep pace in their downward tendency.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: If literature isn't everything, it's not worth a single hour of someone's trouble.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Books are humanity in print.
quotes.author: Barbara W. Tuchman

quotes.quote: Good children's literature appeals not only to the child in the adult, but to the adult in the child.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: While thought exists, words are alive and literature becomes an escape, not from, but into living.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: Literature is a luxury; fiction is a necessity.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Literature is where I go to explore the highest and lowest places in human society and in the human spirit, where I hope to find not absolute truth but the truth of the tale, of the imagination and of the heart.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: One of the best things in the world to be is a boy; it requires no experience, but needs some practice to be a good one.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: A boy becomes an adult three years before his parents think he does, and about two years after he thinks he does.
quotes.author: Lewis B Hershey

quotes.quote: A man can never quite understand a boy, even when he has been a boy.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: A small son can charm himself into, and out of, most things.
quotes.author: Jenny De Vries

quotes.quote: Boys do not grow up gradually. They move forward in spurts like the hands of clocks in railway stations.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: There is a little boy inside the man who is my brother... Oh, how I hated that little boy. And how I love him too.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: What are little boys made of? Snips and snails and puppy-dog tails, And such are little boys made of.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: A boy's story is the best that is ever told.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: A boy carries out suggestions more wholeheartedly when he understands their aim.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: A boy is a magical creature - you can lock him out of your workshop, but you can't lock him out of your heart.
quotes.author: Allan Beck

quotes.quote: A boy is the only thing that God can use to make a man.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Young boys should never be sent to bed, they always wake up another day older.
quotes.author: Johnnie Depp

quotes.quote: The moment a little boy is concerned with which is a jay and which is a sparrow, he can no longer see the birds or hear them sing.
quotes.author: Eric Berne

quotes.quote: Old boys have their playthings as well as young ones; the difference is only in the price.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: With boys, you always know where you stand. Right in the path of a hurricane.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: The spirit is there in every boy; it has to be discovered and brought to light.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: A small boy, mischievous to the imp degree.
quotes.author: Rea Murtha

quotes.quote: A boy's will is the wind's will.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: It's the merry-hearted boys that make the best men!
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: Do not train boys to learning by force and harshness, but lead them by what amuses them, so that they may better discover the bent of their minds.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: A boy is naturally full of humor.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: When I grow up I want to be a little boy.
quotes.author: Joseph Heller

quotes.quote: Little boys are like snowflakes, there are no two alike.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Every puppy should have a boy.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: A boy's best friend is his mother.
quotes.author: Joseph Stefano

quotes.quote: Like the changing leaves of fall, My little boy is now a man.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Little boys are a ton of fun.
quotes.author: Tori Spelling

quotes.quote: Sometimes the smallest things take up the most room in your heart.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: It is rare that one can see in a little boy the promise of a man, but one can almost always see in a little girl the threat of a woman.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: High tax rates are followed by attempts of ingenious men to beat them as surely as surely as snow is followed by little boys on sleds.
quotes.author: Arthur M. Okun

quotes.quote: Our girls have learned that sweat is sexy, brawn is beautiful and a little dirt never hurt anyone.
quotes.author: Louise Slaughter

quotes.quote: A flapper is just a little girl trying to grow up - in the process of growing up.
quotes.author: Colleen Moore

quotes.quote: Little girls love dolls. They just don't love doll clothes. We've got four thousand dolls and ain't one of them got a stitch of clothes on.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: Little girls think it's necessary to put all their business on MySpace and Facebook, and I think it's a shame...I'm all about mystery.
quotes.author: Stevie Nicks

quotes.quote: It's every little girl's dream to have an exact look-alike doll. It's amazing.
quotes.author: Bindi Irwin

quotes.quote: Like star dust glistening on fairies' wings, Little girls dreams are of magical things.
quotes.author: Sherry Larson

quotes.quote: Little girls are cute and small only to adults. To one another they are not cute. They are life-sized.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: As a little girl I loved the thought of playing dress-up and getting ready.
quotes.author: Denise Richards

quotes.quote: Smiling face of every little girl is the signature of God's presence.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: As a little girl I used to daydream about my real father coming on a white horse to rescue me.
quotes.author: Christine Keeler

quotes.quote: Little girls are the nicest things that happen to people. They are born with a little bit of angelshine about them, and though it wears thin sometimes there is always enough left to lasso your heart.
quotes.author: Alan Beck

quotes.quote: Little girls are taught to be dependent, incapable of valuing themselves in many aspects of their daily lives.
quotes.author: Josefina Vazquez Mota

quotes.quote: To every little girl, her father is a hero. My father actually is one.
quotes.author: Alexandra Kerry

quotes.quote: Thank heaven for little girls! For little girls get bigger every day. Thank heaven for little girls! They grow up in the most delightful way.
quotes.author: Alan Jay Lerner

quotes.quote: There's no better feeling than making your little girls laugh.
quotes.author: Jerry O'Connell

quotes.quote: When I was a little girl, rocking my little dolls, I remember thinking I would be the world's best mom, and so far I've done it
quotes.author: Jenny McCarthy

quotes.quote: Courage, sacrifice, determination, commitment, toughness, heart, talent, guts. That's what little girls are made of.
quotes.author: Bethany Hamilton

quotes.quote: A little girl without a doll is almost as unfortunate and quite as impossible as a woman without children.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: There was a little girl who had a little curl right in the middle of her forehead; And when she was good she was very, very good, but when she was bad she was horrid.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: This little girl will guard her tower with the most vicious dragon of all: indifference
quotes.author: Yesenia Barkley

quotes.quote: Little girls, like butterflies, need no excuse.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: As a little girl living in the English countryside, I used to go running around in the forests, creating my own fairy tale.
quotes.author: Lily Collins

quotes.quote: My little girls are the most beautiful women in the world. I am a lucky, lucky man. I will spend every day making sure that they know this.
quotes.author: Russell Simmons

quotes.quote: Every little girl knows about love. It is only her capacity to suffer because of it that increases.
quotes.author: Francoise Sagan

quotes.quote: No one ever told me I was pretty when I was a little girl. All little girls should be told they're pretty, even if they aren't.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: I try to parent equally, but I think little girls are a little more sensitive.
quotes.author: Don Johnson

quotes.quote: An old man dies, a little girl lives. Fair trade.
quotes.author: Frank Miller

quotes.quote: Little girls. They could melt the toughest hearts.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: The knowingness of little girls, is hidden underneath their curls.
quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.quote: One can't get over the habit of being a little girl all at once.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: When you're a little kid, you are small, your life is small - and you're terrifically aware of that. But when you read, you can ride Arabian horses across the desert, you can be a dogsledder.
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.quote: Adults are always asking little kids what they want to be when they grow up because they're looking for ideas.
quotes.author: Paula Poundstone

quotes.quote: When you're around kids you can be a little kid yourself and pretend that life is magic and you don't have to be one of those sweaty people going to work every day.
quotes.author: Amy Winehouse

quotes.quote: A scout troop consists of twelve little kids dressed like schmucks following a big schmuck dressed like a kid.
quotes.author: Jack Benny

quotes.quote: I'm a little kid at heart, so my eyes light up when everything is lit.
quotes.author: John Slattery

quotes.quote: When you're a little kid, your heart is open and tender and a harsh word can go straight in and become part of your life.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: I'm not a grown up until everybody realises I'm a grown up. When everyone remembers me as the dirty kid singing little songs I am the dirty little kid.
quotes.author: Bo Burnham

quotes.quote: I was lucky enough to realize my dream. When I was a little kid in Santa Barbara, sitting on the floor in my grandmother's house, dreaming of maybe one day working for Walt Disney, and to have that dream come true, I think that's pretty remarkable.
quotes.author: Floyd Norman

quotes.quote: I think acting is totally conducive to being a little kid, because kids are less inhibited and use their imagination.
quotes.author: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

quotes.quote: I was always a little adult. Even as a little kid, I just couldn't understand why I was surrounded by all these kids. I took things very seriously.
quotes.author: Laura Benanti

quotes.quote: When you're a little kid, you don't see color, and the fact that my friends were black never crossed my mind. It never became an issue until I was a teenager and started trying to rap.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: What's fascinated me from the time I was a little kid was the way we construct our lives through stories.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Gates

quotes.quote: That's the point I'm trying to get across in 'Little': Kids can do anything, and that's how adults need to see things, too.
quotes.author: Marsai Martin

quotes.quote: You gotta have a little kid in you to play football.
quotes.author: Herman Edwards

quotes.quote: When you have little kids, you lose friends because you're so busy, but as they get older, you realise how important it is to have your girlfriends around.
quotes.author: Leslie Mann

quotes.quote: In those days, when I was a little kid, I met the truer more authentic people of my life. The men were so pure, strong, honest, and faithful unto death - with an incredible sense of respect for a boss.
quotes.author: Gianni Versace

quotes.quote: A word that has been said may be unsaid--it is but air. But when a deed is done, it cannot be undone, nor can our thoughts reach out to all the mischiefs that may follow.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: With love, you should go ahead and take the risk of getting hurt because love is an amazing feeling.
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.quote: Trying and getting hurt can't possibly be worse for you than being... stuck.
quotes.author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

quotes.quote: It seems everyone's so worried about getting hurt that they forget about letting love happen.
quotes.author: Carlos Salinas de Gortari

quotes.quote: Let him tell us he's never been hurt, but that's the definition of getting hurt.
quotes.author: Andre Ward

quotes.quote: Growing up is all about getting hurt. And then getting over it. You hurt. You recover. You move on. Odds are pretty good you're just going to get hurt again. But each time, you learn something.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: Here's my heart and soul, please grind them into hamburger, and enjoy.
quotes.author: Meredith Grey

quotes.quote: Who do you run to, to stop the tears, when the only person who can, is the one who caused the hurt.
quotes.author: Chas Yousey

quotes.quote: Break up in its final moments.
quotes.author: George Black

quotes.quote: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Love can sometimes be magic. But magic can sometimes... just be an illusion.
quotes.author: Javan

quotes.quote: You've hurt my feelings, you've broken my heart. I gave you my time, I gave you my trust but you left me for another.
quotes.author: Godwin Delali Adadzie

quotes.quote: A stiff apology is a second insult. . . The injured party does not want to be compensated because he has been wronged; he wants to be healed because he has been hurt.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: I tell kids that people will let them down and people will hurt them. But Jesus Christ will never let them down and never hurt them.
quotes.author: Willie Aames

quotes.quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The difference between friendship and love is how much you can hurt each other.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: The truth that many people never understand, until it is too late, is that the more you try to avoid suffering the more you suffer because smaller and more insignificant things begin to torture you in proportion to your fear of being hurt
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Sometimes we guard people from the truth to protect them from being hurt, but by doing that we only hurt them more in the long run.
quotes.author: Christina Pagliarulo

quotes.quote: Of all pains, the greatest pain, is to love, and to love in vain.
quotes.author: George Grenville

quotes.quote: I search, but never find. Hurt, but never cry. I work and forever tired.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: Anger is just a cowardly extension of sadness. It's a lot easier to be angry at someone than it is to tell them you're hurt.
quotes.author: Tom Gates

quotes.quote: Hurt is a part of life. To be honest, I think hurt is a part of happiness, that our definition of happiness has gotten very narrow lately, very nervous, a little afraid of this brawling, fabulous, unpredictable world.
quotes.author: Julian Gough

quotes.quote: I thought you were gone forever, I thought you'd walked away from everything, because I failed, because I destroyed the only thing that ever mattered to me. I waited for you to come, but you didn't.
quotes.author: Alexandra Adornetto

quotes.quote: I still own my heart, which I know because it hurts so much.
quotes.author: Emilie Autumn

quotes.quote: What other people think of me is none of my business. Sometimes, it hurts my feelings, but I have to just keep going.
quotes.author: Lana Del Rey

quotes.quote: Forgive others, not because they deserve forgiveness, but because you deserve peace.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: The person you're meant to be with will never have to be chased, begged, or given an ultimatum.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: It's okay to not be perfect. It's okay to make mistakes. It's okay to do something that you wish you hadn't done, because if we don't do those things we never grow.
quotes.author: Dawn stanton

quotes.quote: Until we have seen someone's darkness, we don't really know who they are. Until we have forgiven someone's darkness, we don't really know what love is.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Often it's the deepest pain which empowers you to grow into your highest self.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: Perfect happiness is a beautiful sunset, the giggle of a grandchild, the first snowfall. It's the little things that make happy moments, not the grand events. Joy comes in sips, not gulps.
quotes.author: Sharon Draper

quotes.quote: It's the little details that are vital. Little things make big things happen.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter, and sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Little things seem nothing, but they give peace, like those meadow flowers which individually seem odorless but all together perfume the air.
quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

quotes.quote: Life is made up, not of great sacrifices or duties, but of little things, in which smiles and kindness, and small obligations given habitually, are what preserve the heart and secure comfort.
quotes.author: Humphry Davy

quotes.quote: If you canât do the little things right, you will never do the big things right.
quotes.author: William H. McRaven

quotes.quote: Character is what emerges from all the little things you were too busy to do yesterday, but did anyway.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Watch the little things; a small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The happiness of most people is not ruined by great catastrophes or fatal errors, but by the repetition of slowly destructive little things.
quotes.author: Ernest Dimnet

quotes.quote: Where men or nations have broken down, it will almost invariably be found that neglect of little things was the rock on which they split.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: It has long been an axiom of mine that the little things are infinitely the most important.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Worry is spiritual nearsightedness, a fumbling way of looking at little things, and of magnifying their value.
quotes.author: Anna Robertson Brown

quotes.quote: I'm not sure why, but when a person expects something to last forever, they don't notice the little things. It's only when the clock is ticking all those little things add up and become bigger.
quotes.author: Shannon Wiersbitzky

quotes.quote: One of the greatest resources people cannot mobilize themselves is that they try to accomplish great things. Most worthwhile achievements are the result of many little things done in a single direction.
quotes.author: Nido Qubein

quotes.quote: Do little things now; so shall big things come to thee by and by asking to be done.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Wellbeing is attained by little and little, and nevertheless is no little thing itself.
quotes.author: Citium Zeno

quotes.quote: Little things are indeed little, but to be faithful in little things is a great thing.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Sometimes when I consider what tremendous consequences come from little things, I am tempted to think there are no little things.
quotes.author: Bruce Barton

quotes.quote: Little people doing little things in little places everywhere can change the world.
quotes.author: Anwar Fazal

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the significance of the little things done out of a large heart of love.
quotes.author: Elizabeth George

quotes.quote: Live life like its the last breath you take for that breath is the whole essence of living, the little things in life are what connects us to all the big things we live for.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: We can do no great things-only small things with great love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: God tests and proves us by the common occurrences of life. It is the little things which reveal the chapters of the heart.
quotes.author: Ellen G. White

quotes.quote: Little things console us because little things afflict us.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Enjoy the satisfaction that comes from doing little things well.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: We humans are a minority of giants stumbling around in a world of little things.
quotes.author: Sue Hubbell

quotes.quote: Friendship isnât a big thing â itâs a million little things
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: Character, in great and little things, means carrying through what you feel able to do.
quotes.author: Johann Von Goethe

quotes.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy, do not dwell in the past, do not worry about the future, focus on living fully in the present.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: We live in a dark and romantic and quite tragic world.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: There are two ways to live a life either forget everything or, remember nothing.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: A woman's happiness is in throwing everything away to live for love.
quotes.author: Ai Yazawa

quotes.quote: We live and we die and anything else is just a delusion.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: If you live each day as if it were your last, someday you'll be right.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The best way to be appreciative for your life is to live it; don't die for any other reason but love. Dreams are what guide us, art is what defines us, math is makes it all possible, and love is what lights our way.
quotes.author: Mike Norton

quotes.quote: Don't live to be judged for what you haven't done. Live to be judged for what you have done.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Live alone if staying together seems lifeless.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Be not afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living, and your belief will help create the fact.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Life and love are life and love, a bunch of violets is a bunch of violets, and to drag in the idea of a point is to ruin everything. Live and let live, love and let love, flower and fade, and follow the natural curve, which flows on, pointless.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: The attitude is we live and let live. This is actually an amazing change in values in a rather short time and it's an example of freedom from religion.
quotes.author: Tom Wolfe

quotes.quote: We have to live and let live in order to create what we are.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: My core beliefs revolve around the idea that we should live to the best of our abilities-we should live and let live.
quotes.author: Enya

quotes.quote: When you were young, and your heart, was an open book. You used to say, live and let live.
quotes.author: Paul Mccartney

quotes.quote: A man who flies from his fear may find that he has only taken a shortcut to meet it.
quotes.author: Sador

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Live every day as if it were your last and then some day you'll be right.
quotes.author: H.H. Breaker

quotes.quote: Live as if your were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: Don't be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Eventually all things fall into place. Until then, laugh at the confusion, live for the moments, and know everything happens for a reason.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work and learning from failure.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: If we don't change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we aren't really living.
quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

quotes.quote: Live with no excuses and love with no regrets.
quotes.author: Montel

quotes.quote: Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I do not ask for faith in a hereafter, but let me believe in today, and no hereafter can present that I shall not be well prepared.
quotes.author: Muriel Strode Lieberman

quotes.quote: The best way to prepare for death is to live life to its fullest.
quotes.author: John Bytheway

quotes.quote: A life without cause is a life without effect.
quotes.author: Barbarella

quotes.quote: Life is not the way it's supposed to be. It's the way it is. The way you deal with it is what makes the difference.
quotes.author: Virginia Satir

quotes.quote: One way to get the most out of life is to look upon it as an adventure.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: The purpose of life, after all, is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Nobody gets to live life backward. Look ahead, that is where your future lies.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Life is a great big canvas, and you should throw all the paint on it you can.
quotes.author: Danny Kaye

quotes.quote: Cherish your yesterdays, dream your tomorrows and live your todays.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Live your life to the fullest potential, and fight for your dreams.
quotes.author: Ashley Smith

quotes.quote: Everyone is trying to accomplish something big, not realizing that life is made up of little things.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: It is not the years in your life but the life in your years that counts.
quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson

quotes.quote: Live the life you've dreamed.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Live life for the moment because everything else is uncertain!
quotes.author: Louis Tomlinson

quotes.quote: What is the meaning of life? To be happy and useful.
quotes.author: HH the Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: When you realize you're alive, you can live life!
quotes.author: Chad Michael Murray

quotes.quote: Life is a game, play it; Life is a challenge, Meet it; Life is an opportunity, Capture it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Today's moment becomes memory of tomorrow. Embrace each moment with happiness, joy and fulfillment. Strive to enjoy your day to the fullest.
quotes.author: Anil Sinha

quotes.quote: There'll be two dates on your tombstone and all your friends will read 'em but all that's gonna matter is that little dash between 'em.
quotes.author: Kevin Welch

quotes.quote: Enjoy the little things in life, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Life isn't worth living unless you're willing to take some big chances and go for broke.
quotes.author: Eliot Wiggington

quotes.quote: There are many wonderful things that will never be done if you do not do them.
quotes.author: Charles D. Gill

quotes.quote: When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left, and could say, I used everything you gave me.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: I don't wait for the calendar to figure out when I should live life.
quotes.author: Gene Simmons

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Life is a one time gift. Use it in best possible manner. So love, laugh, live, be yourself, be happy and have trust in God.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Live life to the fullest because it only happens once.
quotes.author: Maddi Jenkins

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy, do not dwell in the past, do not worry about the future, focus on living fully in the present.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: After all, if you have added some lively colours to the world, you will be remembered well by the world!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The most lively young people become the best old people, not those who pretend to be as wise as grandfathers while they are still in school.
quotes.author: Herman Hesse

quotes.quote: Life is a lively process of becoming.
quotes.author: Douglas McArthur

quotes.quote: If you're quiet, you're not living. You've got to be noisy and colorful and lively.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.quote: There is no more lively sensation than that of pain; its impressions are certain and dependable, they never deceive as may those of the pleasure women perpetually feign and almost never experience.
quotes.author: Marquis De Sade

quotes.quote: Words, when well chosen, have so great a force in them that a description often gives us more lively ideas than the sight of things themselves
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: A lively imagination is one of the best companions
quotes.author: Frank Tyger

quotes.quote: A mind lively and at ease, can do with seeing nothing, and can see nothing that does not answer.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: The most lively thought is still inferior to the dullest sensation
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: Live before you die, so that death is also a lively celebration
quotes.author: BKS Iyengar

quotes.quote: It is of no use to possess a lively wit if it is not of the right proportion: The perfection of a clock is not to go fast, but to be accurate
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: So, lively brisk old fellow, don't let age get you down. White hairs or not, you can still be a lover.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: A mind that is lively and inquiring, compassionate, curious, angry, full of music, full of feeling, is a mind full of possible poetry.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: Men of great conversational powers almost universally practise a sort of lively sophistry and exaggeration which deceives for the moment both themselves and their auditors.
quotes.author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quotes.quote: A grave blockhead should always go about with a lively one - they show one another off to the best advantage.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: An aristocracy in a republic is like a chicken whose head has been cut off: it may run about in a lively way, but in fact it is dead.
quotes.author: Nancy Freeman Mitf

quotes.quote: Experience finds few of the scenes that lively hope designs
quotes.author: George Crabbe

quotes.quote: A perpetually new and lively world, but a dangerous one, full of tragedy and injustice
quotes.author: Joyce Cary

quotes.quote: Oh eyes, no eyes, but fountains fraught with tears; Oh life, no life, but lively form of death; Oh world, no world, but mass of public wrongs.
quotes.author: Thomas Ky

quotes.quote: This world's existence is one night long. There's a great lively gathering that night, but some people sleep through it
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Liverpool was an industrial town, a poor town. The people fought hard for what they wanted to achieve and there was a hunger there, and that hunger has remained with the musicians.
quotes.author: Pete Best

quotes.quote: We were a savage little lot, Liverpool kids, not pacifist or vegetarian or anything. But I feel I've gone beyond that, and that it was immature to be so prejudiced and believe in all the stereotypes.
quotes.author: Paul Mccartney

quotes.quote: I think that Liverpool's particular modern history lends itself to the cinema better than London in many ways. When you go to Liverpool, you absorb that whole sound and humour.
quotes.author: Rhys Ifans

quotes.quote: Liverpool has always made me brave, choice-wise. It was a city that criticized anyone for taking a chance.
quotes.author: David Morissey

quotes.quote: Liverpool is a club with a big, big, big history, and all the clubs in the world have a big history if the present is not too successful. If you have never had success, then nobody knows how it is, but in Liverpool, everybody knows how it was.
quotes.author: Jurgen Klopp

quotes.quote: In England, football is a big thing to talk about, but Liverpool, it's a special place. You feel it when you make your first step.
quotes.author: Jurgen Klopp

quotes.quote: Because we were all from Liverpool, we favored people who were street people.
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.quote: My family are from Liverpool, so I have some twang there - I have a Midlands accent, and I was raised about an hour north of London, so my voice is a mess. Although, to American ears, it sounds like the crisp language of a queen's butler.
quotes.author: John Oliver Hobbes

quotes.quote: There are a lot of famous comedians from Liverpool, then obviously the Beatles, and the football club. That's what people in Liverpool are passionate about.
quotes.author: Ian Rush

quotes.quote: I mean, I was born the day war broke out, but I don't remember all the bombs though they did actually break up Liverpool, you know. I remember when I was a little older, there was big gaps in all the streets where houses used to be. We used to play over them.
quotes.author: Ringo Starr

quotes.quote: My family is from Liverpool, so I have some of those vowel sounds, I've got the slack tone of someone from Birmingham, and then I was raised in Bedford, which is just north of London. So my accent, if it's possible, makes even less sense to a Brit than to an American.
quotes.author: John Oliver

quotes.quote: I was in the game for the love of football - and I wanted to bring back happiness to the people of Liverpool.
quotes.author: Bill Shankly

quotes.quote: At Liverpool, winning is customary.
quotes.author: Fernando Torres

quotes.quote: I'm a mixed race lad from Liverpool. I get to play a lot of hard characters, and some people perceive that's what I'm like, but it's great for me 'cos they're always the most interesting characters.
quotes.author: Stephen Graham

quotes.quote: I realised I'd been spoiled at Liverpool. We were used to winning. In Italy I grew up as a person. I didn't enjoy the football, mind. It was very defensive, but I became a better player because of the work I had to do around the box. Off the pitch, I learned about what to eat and what to drink to be successful, and I learned about life.
quotes.author: Ian Rush

quotes.quote: We don't have any splits here. The players country is Liverpool Football Club and their language is football.
quotes.author: Gerard Houllier

quotes.quote: Liverpool players must play like a lion, give his all. There must be determination, commitment and resolve to be a Liverpool player.
quotes.author: Gerard Houllier

quotes.quote: You have to know what club you are playing for, or you just play for yourself. Every time I put on a Liverpool shirt, I know it is more than just a football game.
quotes.author: Fernando Torres

quotes.quote: Feeds for livestock are made from animal by-products. These include blood meal and meat and bone scraps.
quotes.author: James R. Gillespie

quotes.quote: Livestock could play a strategic role in promoting rural growth and reducing rural poverty.
quotes.author: World Bank Staff

quotes.quote: Livestock also serves as an insurance substitute, especially for poor rural households; it can easily be sold during times of distress.
quotes.author: World Bank Staff

quotes.quote: Livestock and aquaculture offer opportunities to diversify income and contribute high quality protein products to mountain food systems.
quotes.author: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations

quotes.quote: Butchering your own livestock is not glamorous (especially when some were your four-legged farm friends!).
quotes.author: Brenda Knight

quotes.quote: For the poorest of the poor, livestock can, in some situations, be the first step along the pathway out of poverty.
quotes.author: ILRI

quotes.quote: The livestock farmer of today must master not only the vast skills necessary to be an ethical rancher, but also marketing, sales, processing, packaging, and so many others.
quotes.author: Marissa Guggiana

quotes.quote: Pour , ye mocking rains, and rattle, / On the bare, brown, grassless plain, / On the shrivelled hides of cattle, / That shall ne'er want grass again.
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: Bless the round-up year by year / And don't forget the growing steer; / Water the land with brooks and rills / For my cattle that roam a thousand hills.
quotes.author: Anonymous Americas

quotes.quote: Now, O Lord, won't you be good / And give our livestock plenty of food; / And to avert a winter's woe / Give Italian skies and little snow.
quotes.author: Anonymous Americas

quotes.quote: Agriculture is one of our best dollar earners. The balance of trade in our favor in agriculture is a tremendous source of dollarsâ and therefore goldâ to this country at a very important time.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Agriculture for an honorable and high-minded man, is the best of all occupations or arts by which men procure the means of living.
quotes.author: Xenophon

quotes.quote: The cattle galloping in the pasture say they will hurt the cattle-herd, but they hurt themselves.
quotes.author: Jamaican Sayings

quotes.quote: Livestock producers observe that when rough, stressful handling practices are eliminated, cattle resume eating a full day earlier.
quotes.author: Temple Grandin

quotes.quote: Indeed, a report from the United Nations has revealed that the livestock industry is the number-one contributor to global warming gasses - higher than even the transport industry. Plus, the effect of the livestock industry on our waterways and oceans is disastrous.
quotes.author: Karen Dawn

quotes.quote: Today's fishing industry supplies land farms with fish as well. Over fifty percent of the fish caught is fed to livestock on factory farms and 'regular' farms. It is an ingredient in the enriched 'feed meal' fed to livestock.
quotes.author: Sharon Gannon

quotes.quote: In the ancient world, taxes were paid in kind: landowners paid in crops or livestock; the landless paid with their labor. Taxing trade made medieval monarchs rich and funded the early-modern state.
quotes.author: Jill Lepore

quotes.quote: Man has been breeding livestock for ten thousand years and has yet to come up with a monstrous sheep that can trample buildings and graze a whole golf course for breakfast.
quotes.author: PJ O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Our main deal is pastured livestock. So we have beef cattle, pigs, turkeys, laying chickens, meat chickens, rabbit, lamb and ducks - egg-layer ducks.
quotes.author: Joel Salatin

quotes.quote: Farm animals feel pleasure and sadness, excitement and resentment, depression, fear and pain. They are far more aware and intelligent than we ever imagined. They are individuals in their own right.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: Men are not so much the keepers of herds as herds are the keepers of men.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Animal abuse is the norm Ã¢â¬â not the exception Ã¢â¬â in the meat, egg and dairy industry.
quotes.author: Paul Shapiro

quotes.quote: The nutritional composition of beef provides much-needed protein, vitamins and iron. Let us also not gloss over what is beef's most obvious benefit: Livestock take inedible and untasty grains and convert them into a protein-packed food most humans love to eat.
quotes.author: Jayson Lusk

quotes.quote: We have no ethical obligation to preserve the different breeds of livestock produced through selective breeding One generation and out. We have no problems with the extinction of domestic animals. They are creations of human selective breeding.
quotes.author: Wayne Pacelle

quotes.quote: If you are opposed to eating veal because the calves are slaughtered when they are only about four months old then you should be opposed to eating lambs, chickens, pigs, turkeys and other farm animals because they are not allowed to live for much longer.
quotes.author: Irene Collins

quotes.quote: Eighty per cent of global warming comes from livestock and deforestation.
quotes.author: Heather Mills

quotes.quote: Go into the largest livestock operation, search out the darkest and tiniest stall or pen, single out the filthiest, most forlorn little lamb or pig or calf, and that is one of God's creatures you're looking at, morally indistinguishable from your beloved Fluffy or Frisky.
quotes.author: Matthew Scully

quotes.quote: Cost-saver in industrial livestock agriculture may usually be taken to mean 'moral shortcut.
quotes.author: Matthew Scully

quotes.quote: Predators make it much more difficult to find consensus. It's a lot easier to agree about birds and plants than about animals that endanger people and livestock.
quotes.author: Gale Norton

quotes.quote: The history of agriculture is the history of humans breeding seeds and animals to produce traits we want in our crops and livestock.
quotes.author: Michael Specter

quotes.quote: You must live in the present, launch yourself on every wave, find your eternity in each moment. Fools stand on their island of opportunities and look toward another land. There is no other land; there is no other life but this.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hahn

quotes.quote: Living in the present moment creates the experience of eternity.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Act in the moment, live in the present, slowly slowly don't allow the past to interfere, and you will be surprised that life is such an eternal wonder, such a mysterious phenomenon and such a great gift that one simply feels constantly in gratitude.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: All I have is all I need and all I need is all I have in this moment.
quotes.author: Byron Katie

quotes.quote: Live the actual moment. Only this moment is life.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hahn

quotes.quote: This is real freedom - the ability to enjoy the choices we make in every successive moment of the present.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Life is a preparation for the future; and the best preparation for the future is to live as if there were none.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You are only here now; you're only alive in this moment.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: Today is life - the only life you are sure of. Make the most of today.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Rejoice in the things that are present; all else is beyond thee.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Living in the moment brings you a sense of reverence for all of life's blessings.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Be happy in the moment, that's enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Life is about not knowing, having to change, taking the moment and making the best of it, without knowing what's going to happen next.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.quote: Stop acting as if life is a rehearsal. Live this day as if it were your last. The past is over and gone. The future is not guaranteed.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Today is the first day of the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Charles Dederich

quotes.quote: Yesterday is a canceled check; tomorrow is a promissory note; today is the only cash you have - so spend it wisely.
quotes.author: Kay Lyons

quotes.quote: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Whatever the present moment contains, accept it as if you had chosen it.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Living in the moment means letting go of the past and not waiting for the future. It means living your life consciously, aware that each moment you breathe is a gift.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Live today. Not yesterday. Not tomorrow. Just today. Inhabit your moments. Don't rent them out to tomorrow.
quotes.author: Jerry Spinelli

quotes.quote: The here and now is all we have, and if we play it right it's all we'll need.
quotes.author: Ann Richards

quotes.quote: The past is behind, learn from it. The future is ahead, prepare for it. The present is here, live it.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Nothing is more precious than being in the present moment. Fully alive, fully aware.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Why not just live in the moment, especially if it has a good beat?
quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

quotes.quote: The key to enjoying the moment is to always carry a list of "Things I Gotta Do That Can Wait."
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Seize from every moment its unique novelty, and do not prepare your joys.
quotes.author: Andr_ Gide

quotes.quote: We know nothing of tomorrow; our business is to be good and happy today.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: The ability to be in the present moment is a major component of mental wellness.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
quotes.author: Matt Cameron

quotes.quote: Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: Nobody gets to live life backward. Look ahead, that is where your future lies.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: We have to live life with a sense of urgency so not a minute is wasted.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: I don't wait for the calendar to figure out when I should live life.
quotes.author: Gene Simmons

quotes.quote: I don't know how one should live - but I know that one should live.....
quotes.author: Glen Duncan

quotes.quote: As long as you're alive, there's always a chance things will get better.
quotes.author: Laini Taylor

quotes.quote: Live your life remembering good experiences, the bad ones were just lessons.
quotes.author: Michello Borgo

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid your life will end; be afraid that it will never begin.
quotes.author: Grace Hansen

quotes.quote: Live today facing forwardwith your back on yesterday, your eyes on tomorrow, and your head and heart in the moment.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quotes.author: Dennis P. Kimbro

quotes.quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The great thing in this world is not so much where you stand, as in what direction you are moving.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: The only way of finding the limits of the possible is by going beyond them into the impossible.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Work like you don't need the money, love like you've never been hurt and dance like no one is watching.
quotes.author: Randall G Leighton

quotes.quote: Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass...it's learning to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: What seems like the right thing to do could also be the hardest thing you have ever done in your life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I am the author of my life. Unfortunately I'm writing in pen and I can't erase my mistakes
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: It goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Enjoy the little things in life, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: If you obey all the rules, you'll miss all the fun.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: A life without cause is a life without effect.
quotes.author: Barbarella

quotes.quote: Life is a great big canvas, and you should throw all the paint on it you can.
quotes.author: Danny Kaye

quotes.quote: You've got to get to the stage in life where going for it is more important than winning or losing.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Debts are nowadays like children begot with pleasure, but brought forth in pain.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: Debt is like any other trap, easy enough to get into, but hard enough to get out of.
quotes.author: Henry Wheeler Shaw

quotes.quote: Promises make debt, and debt makes promises.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: If you would know the value of money, go and try to borrow some; for he that goes a borrowing goes a sorrowing.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A debt is just as hard for a Government to pay as it is for an individual. No debt ever comes due at a good time. Borrowing is the only thing that seems handy all the time.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Quick to borrow is always slow to pay.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Some debts are fun when you are acquiring them, but none are fun when you set about retiring them.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Small debts are like small gun shot; they are rattling around us on all sides and one can scarcely escape being wounded. Large debts are like canons, they produce a loud noise, but are of little danger.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: We have to look at loan forgiveness to incentivise young people to pursue degrees in areas where we know we need help.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Esty

quotes.quote: If you would know the value of money try to borrow some.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A small debt makes a man your debtor, a large one your enemy.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Debt is such a powerful tool, it is such a useful tool, it's much better than colonialism ever was because you can keep control without having an army, without having a whole administration.
quotes.author: Susan George

quotes.quote: Some people are just stuck in their ways and have been brainwashed into believing that credit cards and debt are an unavoidable part of life.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: The person whom you favoured with a loan, if he be a good man, will think himself in your debt after he has paid you.
quotes.author: Richard Steele

quotes.quote: A small loan makes a debtor; a great one, an enemy.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Debt is one person's liability, but another person's asset.
quotes.author: Paul Krugman

quotes.quote: Small debts are like small shot; they are rattling on every side, and can scarcely be escaped without a wound: great debts are like cannon; of loud noise, but little danger.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: A rolling loan gathers no loss.
quotes.author: Scott E. Pardee

quotes.quote: Loan sharks don't kill people. There's no percentage in it.
quotes.author: Sgt. Dean Gundlach

quotes.quote: But driving from bank to bank a man has got to be careful nowadays, for at the price of gas he will burn up more gasoline trying to get a loan than the loan is worth.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: My main philosophy is that my money is a loan from God. I'm in charge of it. I'm responsible for investing it, giving some of it away, providing for my family, and protecting it.
quotes.author: Orel Hershiher

quotes.quote: One can pay back the loan of gold, but one dies forever in debt to those who are kind.
quotes.author: Malayan Proverb

quotes.quote: Make a loan to a bad debtor, and he will repay with hate.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Bad money drives out good money.
quotes.author: Thomas Gresham

quotes.quote: Always try and rub up against money, fo if you rub up against money long enough, some of it may rub off on you.
quotes.author: Damon Runyon

quotes.quote: Money as such is not evil; it is its wrong use that is evil.
quotes.author: Gandhi

quotes.quote: No man needs money so much as a man who despises it.
quotes.author: Jean Richter

quotes.quote: Money is like love, it kills slowly and painfully the man who withholds it, and it enlivens the other who turns it upon his fellow men.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Take care of your pennies and your dollars will take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Scottish Proverb

quotes.quote: Money speaks sense in a language all nations understand.
quotes.author: Aphra Behn

quotes.quote: Lobsters one of the only animals that have to put up with being alive in the restaurant. If you go to a steakhouse, folks â no cow tank.
quotes.author: Richard Jeni

quotes.quote: Lobster is not going to be as tasty with ice tea unless that ice tea is from Long Island.
quotes.author: Heather McDonald

quotes.quote: If a lobster didn't look like a sci-fi monster, people would be less able to drop him alive into boiling water.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: A lobster bisque ought to be the crowning glory of the potager. And this one was excellent. Silky as a gigolo's compliment and fishy as a chancellor's promise.
quotes.author: A. A. Gill

quotes.quote: When you serve lobster, you've taken a being's life away. Therefore if you create a recipe, you have to be very dedicated to elevate the lobster, to make it good and tasty of course, but at the end of the day it's a matter of paying homage.
quotes.author: Eric Ripert

quotes.quote: The proper place to eat lobster... is in a lobster shack as close to the sea as possible. There is no menu card because there is nothing else to eat except boiled lobster with melted butter.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: I'm horrified of lobsters. And shrimp and lobsters are the cockroaches of the ocean.
quotes.author: Brooke Burke

quotes.quote: Why should aÂ lobsterÂ be any more ridiculous than a dog? ... or a cat, or a gazelle, or a lion, or any other animal one chooses to take for a walk? I have a liking forÂ lobsters. They are peaceful, serious creatures ... Goethe had an aversion to dogs, and he wasn't mad. They know the secrets of the sea, they don't bark.
quotes.author: Gerard de Nerval

quotes.quote: The bad is more easily perceived than the good. A fresh lobster does not give such pleasure to the consumer as a stale one will give him pain.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: When I get through tearing a lobster apart, or one of those tender West Coast octopuses, I feel like I had a drink from the fountain of youth.Â
quotes.author: Joseph MitchellÂ

quotes.quote: Lobsters displays all three of the classic biological characteristics of an insect, namely: 1. It has way more legs than necessary. 2. There is no way you would ever pet it. 3. It does not respond to simple commands such as "Here, boy!"
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Remember that a very good sardine is always preferable to a not that good lobster.
quotes.author: Ferran Adria

quotes.quote: He looks much more like aÂ lobsterÂ than mostÂ lobsters do.Â
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: It is, admittedly, a base foodstuff, butÂ lobster, well prepared, can nevertheless be made to satisfy the distinguished gourmand.Â
quotes.author: Eli Brown

quotes.quote: I'm very sentimental about lobsters. The last lobster I ate was the only lobster I cooked.
quotes.author: Ann Patchett

quotes.quote: I don't eat friggin' lobster or anything like that. Because they're alive when you kill it.Â
quotes.author: Nicole "Snooki" PolizziÂ

quotes.quote: Choosing location is integral to the film: in essence, another character.
quotes.author: Ridley Scott

quotes.quote: Location is the key to most businesses, and the entrepreneurs typically build their reputation at a particular spot.
quotes.author: Phyllis Schlafly

quotes.quote: In any situation, location is crucial.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.quote: Location pertains to feelings - feelings are bound up in place.
quotes.author: Eudora Welty

quotes.quote: When your location is a snowy mountain in the winter the obstacles are pretty extreme.
quotes.author: Travis Rice

quotes.quote: Even in a bad market, location, location, location is a way to still buy and sell property.
quotes.author: Vanilla Ice

quotes.quote: The precise location of heaven on earth has never been established but it may very well be right here.
quotes.author: Herb Caen

quotes.quote: As an artist, environment has a lot of impact on choices, and these choices can change by changing your location.
quotes.author: Ashkan Kooshanejad

quotes.quote: Location is a very important aspect to songwriting.
quotes.author: Ken Hill

quotes.quote: It was so much easier to be alone, if one could find just the right location.
quotes.author: Arthur Phillips

quotes.quote: The three most important aspects of debugging and real estate are the same: Location, Location, and Location.
quotes.author: Richard E. Pattis

quotes.quote: There's danger in thinking joy is a matter of location. If we can't find joy where we are, we probably won't find it anywhere.
quotes.author: Philip Gulley

quotes.quote: Nature is by and large to be found out of doors, a location where, it cannot be argued, there are never enough comfortable chairs.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: One of the most amazing locations I've ever been is the top of the volcano in Tanzania, Africa. It's an actual volcano where you really have this lava every day.
quotes.author: Jan de Bont

quotes.quote: Logical thinking will not be enough to get answers to the questions that matter most in life. We need revelation from God.
quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring

quotes.quote: The more you know, the more you know you don't know.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: There is no logical way to the discovery of these elemental laws. There is only the way of intuition, which is helped by a feeling for the order lying behind the appearance.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein
