quotes.quote: It is not logical for art to be logical. Art goes against the grain of the times as readily as it goes with it and at the very same moment. Instead of seeking the nearest exit, art responds to a new situation by uncovering a labyrinth of problems.
quotes.author: Harold Rosenberg

quotes.quote: It is only logical for the translator to become a part of the world of the author.
quotes.author: Ventseslav Konstantinov

quotes.quote: It is perfectly logical and proper to recognize differences between races and colors and creeds - as long as we don't classify them as being better or worse.
quotes.author: Arlene Francis

quotes.quote: However logical our induction, the end of the thread is fastened upon the assurance of faith.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbell Chapin

quotes.quote: Logic is one thing, the human animal another. You can quite easily propose a logical solution to something and at the same time hope in your heart of hearts it won't work out.
quotes.author: Luigi Pirandello

quotes.quote: Since there is absolutely no logical reason to assume there is an afterlife, I decided to make the life I have now as much fun as possible.
quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

quotes.quote: A priori Logical propositions are such as can be known a priori without study of the actual world.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Never put off the work till tomorrow what you can put off today.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: It's logical for us to sing, but not necessarily operatic pieces.
quotes.author: Jose Carreras

quotes.quote: It's very logical: There is proven ROI in doing whatever you can to turn your customers into advocates for your brand or business. The way to create advocates is to offer superior customer service.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: If one doesn't value logic, what logical argument would you invoke to prove they should value logic?
quotes.author: Sam Harris

quotes.quote: The logical man must either deny all miracles or none.
quotes.author: Charles Alexander Eastman

quotes.quote: It's logical that people from bad times will reflect their feelings in their communication. Music is part of the communication. If you lived it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Nina Simone

quotes.quote: In design, be logical, search for truth, be clear.
quotes.author: Massimo Vignelli

quotes.quote: Logical consequences are the scarecrows of fools and the beacons of wise men.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: Logical thinking keeps you from wasting time worrying, or hoping. It prevents disappointment. Imagination, on the other hand, only gets you hyped up over things that will never realistically happen.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: A logical picture of facts is a thought.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: The more you learn, the more you know. The more you know, the more you forget. The more you forget, the less you know. So why bother to learn.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: There is a logical explanation for everything, often mistaken for the reason it happened.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: All logical arguments can be defeated by the simple refusal to reason logically.
quotes.author: Steven Weinberg

quotes.quote: It is always easy to be logical. It is almost impossible to be logical to the bitter end.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Because of their very nature, science and logical thinking can never decide what is possible or impossible. Their only function is to explain what has been ascertained by experience and observation.
quotes.author: Rudolf Steiner

quotes.quote: It's so logical and so simple. Fat is the backup fuel system. The role it plays in the body is that when there's no carbohydrate around, fat will become the primary energy fuel. That's pretty well known.
quotes.author: Robert Atkins

quotes.quote: An action doesn't have to be wrong just because it is not logical. It doesn't have to be right just because it has its logic.
quotes.author: Lion Feuchtwanger

quotes.quote: There is no logical reason why thoughts, which have no substance, should have so much power over you, nor is there any reason why you should become their slave.
quotes.author: Dilgo Khyentse Rinpoche

quotes.quote: The strictly logical mind is usually if not always at fault in its valuations of that defiantly illogical thing known as human nature.
quotes.author: Oscar W. Firkins

quotes.quote: The logical conclusion to a compassionate and respectful relationship to sentient animals is that we stop eating them.
quotes.author: Jonathan Balcombe

quotes.quote: London is on the whole the most possible form of life.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: London is a labyrinth, half of stone and half of flesh.
quotes.author: Peter Ackroyd

quotes.quote: Living in London is like being on a luxury cruise liner.
quotes.author: Ma Jian

quotes.quote: London is the epitome of our times, and the Rome of to-day.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: London is one of the most enchanting places I've ever been on this planet.
quotes.author: Don Johnson

quotes.quote: London has the advantage of one of the most gloomy atmospheres in the world.
quotes.author: Bayard Taylor

quotes.quote: One thing about London is that when you step out into the night, it swallows you.
quotes.author: Sebastian Faulks

quotes.quote: When a man is tired of London, he is tired of life; for there is in London all that life can afford.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: We would rather see London laid in ruins and ashes than that it should be tamely and abjectly enslaved.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: London, that great cesspool into which all the loungers and idlers of the Empire are irresistibly drained.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: In London it's easy not to be the focus of attention, especially when Sting lives in the house just behind you.
quotes.author: Victoria Wood

quotes.quote: London is a small place, and it is very incestuous. People know where you live. Everybody is sort of on top of each other.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: London is like the tropical bush -- if you don't exercise constant care the jungle, in the shape of the slums, will break in.
quotes.author: John Buchan

quotes.quote: The charm of London is that you are never glad or sorry for ten minutes together; in the country you are one or the other for weeks.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: People in London think of London as the center of the world, whereas New Yorkers think the world ends three miles outside of Manhattan.
quotes.author: Toby Young

quotes.quote: There's nowhere else like London. Nothing at all, anywhere.
quotes.author: Vivienne Westwood

quotes.quote: London is full of creative people - you can never say that it's not.
quotes.author: Luke Treadaway

quotes.quote: London has become one of the great world destinations for someone who likes food.
quotes.author: Danny Meyer

quotes.quote: London is one of the most exciting cities in the world, with a melting pot of cultures and diversity.
quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

quotes.quote: London owes everything to its press: it owes as much to its press as it does to its being the seat of government and the law.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: London has always provided the landscape for my imagination. It becomes a character â a living being â within each of my books.
quotes.author: Peter Ackroyd

quotes.quote: London is a good fashion city. They're a little more daring. There's the element of the aristocracy, which is always interesting.
quotes.author: John Legend

quotes.quote: London is a modern Babylon.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: London; a nation, not a city.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: London is a roost for every bird
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: London is a very energising place to be.
quotes.author: Kevin Spacey

quotes.quote: London, thou art the flower of cities all!
quotes.author: William Dunbar

quotes.quote: London is like a cold dark dream sometimes.
quotes.author: Jean Rhys

quotes.quote: London is a riddle. Paris is an explanation.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterson

quotes.quote: In London, Man is the most secret animal on earth.
quotes.author: Laurie Lee

quotes.quote: Being alone never felt right. sometimes it felt good, but it never felt right.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Protagonists are always loners, almost by definition.
quotes.author: Pauline Kael

quotes.quote: One of the many advantages of being a loner is that often there's time to think, ponder, brood, meditate deeply, and figure things out to one's satisfaction.
quotes.author: Andrea Seigel

quotes.quote: A man can be himself alone so long as he is alone Ã¢â¬Â¦ if he does not love solitude, he will not love freedom; for it is only when he is alone that he is really free.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: People who want to be famous are really loners. Or they should be.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: Solitude is fine, but you need someone to tell you that solitude is fine.
quotes.author: HonorÃ© de Balzac

quotes.quote: If you're lonely when you're alone, you're in bad company.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: I am never less alone than when alone.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Language... has created the word 'loneliness' to express the pain of being alone. And it has created the word 'solitude' to express the glory of being alone.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: Solitude matters, and for some people, it is the air that they breathe.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: The faint whisper of rain and running water was still there and it had the same tender note of solitude and perfection.
quotes.author: Tove Jansson

quotes.quote: Reading requires a loner's temperament, a high tolerance for silence, and an unhealthy preference for the company of people who are imaginary or dead.
quotes.author: David Samuels

quotes.quote: It's the journey of self, I guess. You start with this kind of loner, outside guy, which a lot of people can relate to, and he goes out into the world.
quotes.author: Keanu Reeves

quotes.quote: Those who understand the true nature of humanity are always loners.
quotes.author: Dean Cavanagh

quotes.quote: Alone is what I have. Alone protects me.
quotes.author: Sherlock

quotes.quote: Many people suffer from the fear of finding oneself alone, and so they don't find themselves at all.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: Solitude is the best nurse of wisdom.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: Be a loner. That gives you time to wonder, to search for the truth. Have holy curiosity. Make your life worth living.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The best thinking has been done in solitude.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Most of the time I played by myself. Even then I was a loner, and I have stayed a loner all my life. It can make a man seem a little distant or even aloof - but it has helped pull me through some tight spots and hard times.
quotes.author: Roy Wilkins

quotes.quote: A lot of times the characters I play tend to be kind of loners or they don't have best friends or best buddies.
quotes.author: Michael Shannon

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to be a loner but be sure that you are correct in your judgement.
quotes.author: Walter Schloss

quotes.quote: The more powerful and original a mind, the more it will incline towards the religion of solitude.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
quotes.author: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: Reading is that fruitful miracle of a communication in the midst of solitude.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: I like silence; I'm a gregarious loner and without the solitude, I lose my gregariousness.
quotes.author: Karen Armstrong

quotes.quote: Solitude is the great teacher, and to learn its lessons you must pay attention to it.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The loner who looks fabulous is one of the most vulnerable loners of all.
quotes.author: Anneli Rufus

quotes.quote: Every kind of creative work demands solitude, and being alone, constructively alone, is a prerequisite for every phase of the creative process.
quotes.author: Barbara Powell

quotes.quote: To be left alone is the most precious thing one can ask of the modern world.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: Loneliness is more painful than being hurt
quotes.author: Eiichiro Oda

quotes.quote: The world seems a lonesome place when mother has passed away and only memories of her are left.
quotes.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.quote: Lonesome fells the heart under the skin of my chest.
quotes.author: Athar

quotes.quote: A lonely night is more profound then lonesome nights.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: Loneliness is a state of feeling that can be changed. People may still feel lonely even among the crowd.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Loneliness is something you can't walk away from.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: The worst part of holding the memories is not the pain. It's the loneliness of it.
quotes.author: Lois Lowry

quotes.quote: You must always see your loneliness as an opportunity to meet something good unexpected, something new unknown before, something interesting not happened yet!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Loneliness can make you feel that you have a kingdom in darkness.
quotes.author: Mrk Ontim

quotes.quote: Loneliness is really a wonderful companion that can show us so much about ourselves and others.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: It's hard to make people care again once you've taught them not to. It's hard to tell people that you need them, once you've told them you don't.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: Loneliness is the prison of the human spirit. When we are lonely, we pace back and forth in small, shut-in worlds.
quotes.author: John Joseph Powell

quotes.quote: The loneliness you feel with another person, the wrong person, is the loneliest of all.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: Loneliness is the biggest enemy of a human. Cause it is more than the enemy. When a person becomes lonely from inside, no one can save the person from sinking under the deep sea of end.
quotes.author: Salman Aziz

quotes.quote: Loneliness will give you the greatest chance of ever having a beautiful relationship with another person.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: The loneliest people are the kindest. The saddest people smile the brightest. The most damaged people are the wisest. All because they do not wish to see anyone else suffer the way they do.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Loneliness and the feeling of being unwanted is the most terrible poverty.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Loneliness is about the scariest thing out there.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: Loneliness is a great teacher and a master test of character.
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: Even the most popular people could feel lonely sometimes.
quotes.author: Aishabella Sheikh

quotes.quote: There's a special quality to the loneliness of dusk, a melancholy more brooding even than the night's.
quotes.author: Ed Gorman

quotes.quote: The loneliest moment in someone's life is when they are watching their whole world fall apart, and all they can do is stare blankly.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Sometimes being surrounded by everyone is the loneliest, because you'll realise you have no one to turn to.
quotes.author: Soraya

quotes.quote: It's a lonesome walk to the sidelines, especially when thousands of people are cheering your replacement.
quotes.author: Fran Tarkenton

quotes.quote: The loneliest thing in the world is lying awake beside someone asleep.
quotes.author: Rebecca Makkai

quotes.quote: Loneliness gives you opportunity to look the beauty of out of window.
quotes.author: Arya Vidhan

quotes.quote: To forget a friend is sad. Not everyone has had a friend.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-ExupÃ©ry

quotes.quote: There is a loneliness in this world so great that you can see it in the slow movement of the hands of a clock
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: What loneliness is more lonely than distrust?
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: You will be lonely, but you'll become strong.
quotes.author: Marie Rutkoski

quotes.quote: Nothing makes the earth seem so spacious as to have friends at a distance; they make the latitudes and longitudes.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: There are friendships imprinted in our hearts that will never be diminished by time and distance.
quotes.author: Dodinsky

quotes.quote: If our friendship depends on things like space and time, we have destroyed our own brotherhood.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: I don't cry because we've been separated by distance, and for a matter of years. Why? Because for as long as we share the same sky and breathe the same air, we're still together.
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: I've learned that true friendship continues to grow, even over the longest distance.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: True friendship is when two friends can walk in opposite directions, yet remain side by side.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The road to a friend's house is never too long!
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: There is no distance too far between friends, for friendship gives wings to the heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: No distance of place or lapse of time can lessen the friendship of those who are thoroughly persuaded of each other's worth.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: Being physically away from a friend does not mean the friendship is going to be affected , if two people really appreciate each other then nothing and nobody can push them apart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Friends are connected heart to heart. Distance and time can't break them apart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There is magic in long-distance friendships. They let you relate to other human beings in a way that goes beyond being physically together and is often more profound.
quotes.author: Diana Cortes

quotes.quote: A part of you has grown in me, together forever we shall be, never apart, maybe in distance, but not in heart.
quotes.author: Hakan Massoud Nawabi

quotes.quote: True friends never apart maybe in distance but never in heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: A friend who is far away is sometimes much nearer than one who is at hand. Is not the mountain far more awe-inspiring and more clearly visible to one passing through the valley than to those who inhabit the mountain?
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: A real friendship should not fade as time passes, and should not weaken because of space separatation.
quotes.author: John Newton

quotes.quote: True friends stay with you no matter the distance or time that seperates you from them.
quotes.author: Lance Reynald

quotes.quote: Distance does not break off the friendship absolutely, but only the activity of it.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The distance between you and me disappears with us.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote: The scariest thing about distance is that you don't know whether they'll miss you or forget you.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Odd how much it hurts when a friend moves away - and leaves behind only silence.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: A friend who is far away is sometimes much nearer than one who is at hand.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I have made new friends and have many new people that I know. But hey, you will always be a special part of my heart because no one has been able to replace the space you left in it.
quotes.author: Stephen Lob

quotes.quote: Though we drifted apart in distance I still think of you as being right here. And although we have many new friends, it is our friendship that means the most to me.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Though miles may lie between us, we're never far apart, for friendship doesn't count the miles, it's measured in the heart.
quotes.author: Rozina Hasham

quotes.quote: Distance sometimes endears friendship, and absence sweeteneth it.
quotes.author: James Howell

quotes.quote: Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Here is my favorite thing about long-distance besties; it can be years since you have seen each other and, the minute you start talking, it is like you were never apart.
quotes.author: Becca Anderson

quotes.quote: A friendship can weather most things and thrive in thin soil; but it needs a little mulch of letters and phone calls and small, silly presents every so often--just to save it from drying out completely.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: Some people can be so close to you even if physically far, they walk with you and stay near in every moment of your life.
quotes.author: Senora Roy

quotes.quote: This may be the last time I see you, but if you keep me in your heart, together we shall be eternal; if you believe, we shall never part.
quotes.author: Ben Harper

quotes.quote: When I don't see you, I don't miss you , I just place my hand over my heart and its there I will find you, because even though you are out of my sight , you will never be out of my heart.
quotes.author: Rashida Rowe

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to be apart from people you love, but that doesn't make you love them any less. Sometimes you love them more.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: The Pain of parting is nothing to the joy of meeting again.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: I fell in love with her when we were together, then fell deeper in love with in the years we were apart.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Being close is the first and last desire of lovers, but being far and loving each other without an inch's difference is the characteristic of real love.
quotes.author: Senora Ray

quotes.quote: There are no goodbyes for us. Wherever you are, you will always be in my heart.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Love will travel as far as you let it. It has no limits.
quotes.author: Dee King

quotes.quote: I believe in the immeasurable power of love; that true love can endure any circumstance and reach across any distance.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: No matter where I am, no matter where I go, your heart is my northern light, I will always find my way home.
quotes.author: Michael Kilby

quotes.quote: I close my eyes, thinking that there is nothing like an embrace after an absence, nothing like fitting my face into the curve of his shoulder and filling my lungs with the scent of him.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Your absence has not taught me how to be alone; it has merely shown me that when together we cast a single shadow on the wall.
quotes.author: Doug Fetherling

quotes.quote: In true love the smallest distance is too great, and the greatest distance can be bridged.
quotes.author: Hans Nouwens

quotes.quote: For anything worth having one must pay the price; and the price is always work, patience, love, self-sacrifice
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: The simple lack of her is more to me than others' presence.
quotes.author: Edward Thomas

quotes.quote: Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: t's not the distance that's the enemy, but the endless time I have to wait until I hold you in my arms.
quotes.author: Besski Levius

quotes.quote: Love is missing someone whenever you're apart, but somehow feeling warm inside because you're close in heart.
quotes.author: Kay Knudsen

quotes.quote: Sometimes I just sit in front of the computer dreaming. I have food in front of me but no appetite to eat it. All because my heart misses you and my mind is dreaming about you.
quotes.author: Sandra Toms

quotes.quote: The distance maybe far and wide but my heart can cover them all. The space between us is so much more but you should know that I love you so!
quotes.author: Linda Roy

quotes.quote: And ever has it been known that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Morning without you is dwindled dawn.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Our separation of each other is an optical illusion of consciousness.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Absence diminishes small loves and increases great ones, as the wind blows out the candle and blows up the bonfire.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rouchefoucauld

quotes.quote: We are the perfect couple, we're just not in the perfect situation.
quotes.author: Joey Rivett

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: There is no long distance about love, it always finds a way to bring hearts together no matter how many miles there are between them.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Just because things are not at their best right now does not mean that we should give up. Gold is tested in fire and something precious like love needs distance to be tested.
quotes.author: Olga Peters

quotes.quote: Our hours in love have wings; in absence, crutches.
quotes.author: Colley Cibbe

quotes.quote: I've got the long hair and kind of androgynous look. It's love-hate; it's sexy, but not sexy. So it's either you get it or you don't.
quotes.author: Carrot Top

quotes.quote: You know, if I tell the press that I like long blonde hair, the next day there will be girls with long hair wigs outside waiting for me.
quotes.author: Andy Lau

quotes.quote: People say women shouldn't have long hair over a certain age, but I've never done what everyone says.
quotes.author: Jane Seymour

quotes.quote: You have to keep your long hair.
quotes.author: Nick Jonas

quotes.quote: Long hair is considered bohemian, which may be why I grew it, but I keep it long because I love the way it feels, part cloak, part fan, part mane, part security blanket.
quotes.author: Marge Piercy

quotes.quote: I always had long hair. When you lose it, you realise just how important it is to your identity.
quotes.author: Delta Goodrem

quotes.quote: Long hair is a security blanket for me. I cut it short a few years ago and I really never want to do that again. When I do cut it, I cut it myself.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.quote: The long hair fits my physical appearance, but the short hair fits my personality.
quotes.author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

quotes.quote: I am just old-fashioned enough to prefer long hair.
quotes.author: Erich von Stroheim

quotes.quote: Long hair on a man is 'a dishonours his head' and that untended hair on a woman 'dishonours her head'.
quotes.author: Jerome Murphy-O'Connor

quotes.quote: Her hair was longer than it used to be, and it veiled her shoulders like a shawl. She used it for protection.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.quote: Only girls with long hair will understand the nervous feeling when you're near someone with scissors.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Long hair minimizes the need for barbers; socks can be done without; one leather jacket solves the coat problem for many years; suspenders are superfluous.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Long hair is an unpardonable offence which should be punishable by death.
quotes.author: Morrissey

quotes.quote: Extensions is you suddenly have long hair when you have short hair, and you can sleep with it and you have it forever, as long as you want to.
quotes.author: Nina Hagen

quotes.quote: The Beatles set the rules. And the rules were: now just because we have long hair doesn't mean that we're rebellious.
quotes.author: Davy Jones

quotes.quote: Long hair will make thee look dreafully to thine enemies, and manly to thy friends: it is, in peace, an ornament; in war, a strong helmet; it deadens the leaden thump of a bullet: in winter, it is a warm nightcap; in summer, a cooling fan of feathers.
quotes.author: Thomas Dekker

quotes.quote:
And forget not that the earth delights to feel your bare feet
and the winds long to play with your hair.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: If you got long hair, get your hands up. If you got long hair on your head, ladies! If you got long hair on your head! If you got long hair on your head from your ear to your sleeve. Even if you got a weave!
quotes.author: Crooklyn Clan

quotes.quote: But I sure think you're beautiful with your long long hair.
quotes.author: Romance on a Rocketship

quotes.quote: Everybody had long hair we hustled our way in.
quotes.author: Propellerheads

quotes.quote: Long hair seems to be the main attraction but the heat is causin' all the action.
quotes.author: The Standells

quotes.quote:
But I've seen your long hair come down it turned my head inside out
and I want you, I want you.
quotes.author: Walk the Moon

quotes.quote: Long hair, don't care when you see me in the street.
quotes.author: A.J. Crew

quotes.quote: There is a long hair, who doesn't like the short hair.
quotes.author: Four Tops

quotes.quote: Darlin', give me a head with hair, long beautiful hair. Shining, gleaming, steaming, flaxen, waxen. Give me down to there hair, shoulder length or longer.
quotes.author: The Cowsills

quotes.quote: Longevity in this business is about being able to reinvent yourself or invent the future.
quotes.author: Satya Nadella

quotes.quote: Longevity is the key to success.
quotes.author: Ed Seykota

quotes.quote: To achieve longevity you will have cycles. No one gets there in one straight shot.
quotes.author: Rob Lowe

quotes.quote: A long life is a life well spent.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: How do you live a long life? Take a two mile walk every morning before breakfast.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: There can be a lot of longevity in the repetition of things being told again and again in a variety of ways.
quotes.author: Kate Dicamillo

quotes.quote: It's a real roller-coaster ride if you're lucky to have longevity in this business you have to be able to ride those waves.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.quote: A long life may not be good enough, but a good life is long enough.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A sense of humor has been linked with longevity. It is a possibility that the mental attitude reflected in a lively sense of humor is an important factor predisposing some people toward long life.
quotes.author: Raymond Moody

quotes.quote: The key to excellent health and longevity is to eat a high ratio of micronutrients to macronutrients.
quotes.author: Joel Fuhrman

quotes.quote: The secret of long life is double careers. One to about age sixty, then another for the next thirty years.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: Mere longevity is a good thing for those who watch Life from the side lines. For those who play the game, an hour may be a year, a single day's work an achievement for eternity.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: The secret to longevity is to keep breathing.
quotes.author: Sophie Tucker

quotes.quote: There is only one difference between a long life and a good dinner: that, in the dinner, the sweets come last.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Being professional is just really clearly the way to go and helps you on the road to longevity.
quotes.author: Amanda Seyfried

quotes.quote: Long life is a burden, when it's spent in misery.
quotes.author: Laini Taylor

quotes.quote: The man who has lived the longest is not he who has spent the greatest number of years, but he who has had the greatest sensibility of life.
quotes.author: Jean-Baptiste Rousseau

quotes.quote: There's a long life ahead of you and it's going to be beautiful, as long as you keep loving and hugging each other.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Long life will sometimes obscure the star of fame.
quotes.author: Marie de Rabutin-Chantal

quotes.quote: Every single person is a beautiful human being, and we're lucky. That's what gives you longevity. You have to love the people that you work with.
quotes.author: Katee Sackhoff

quotes.quote: The longevity of success depends on how well you manage your breakthroughs.
quotes.author: Constance Chuks Friday

quotes.quote: A human being would certainly not grow to be seventy or eighty years old if this longevity had no meaning for the species. The afternoon of human life must also have a significance of its own and cannot be merely a pitiful appendage to life's morning.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: All of us can expect to live longer than any organization that we would work for. That continues apace. Human longevity is increasing; corporate longevity is decreasing.
quotes.author: Dan Pink

quotes.quote: Longevity uncommon extension of the fear of death.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: If you want to live a long life, focus on making contributions.
quotes.author: Hans Selye

quotes.quote: The key to longevity is to learn every aspect of music that you can.
quotes.author: Prince

quotes.quote: Positive people have more friends which is a key factor of happiness and longevity.
quotes.author: Robert D. Putnam

quotes.quote: Longevity is a big part of credibility.
quotes.author: Jason Calacanis

quotes.quote: Those who die without being forgotten get longevity.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The secret to a long life is to stay busy, get plenty of exercise and don't drink too much. Then again, don't drink too little.
quotes.author: Herman Smith-Johannsen

quotes.quote: Longing is not always a reciprocal thing.
quotes.author: Kate Dicamillo

quotes.quote: The yearning for an afterlife is the opposite of selfish: it is love and praise for the world that we are privileged, in this complex interval of light, to witness and experience.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Let not our longing slay the appetite of our living.
quotes.author: Jim Elliot

quotes.quote: Desire makes everything blossom; possession makes everything wither and fade.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Passing into higher forms of desire, that which slumbered in the plant, and fitfully stirred in the beast, awakes in the man.
quotes.author: Henry George

quotes.quote: The longing for peace is rooted in the hearts of all men. But the striving, which at present has become so insistent, cannot lay claim to such an ambition as leading the way to eternal peace, or solving all disputes among nations.
quotes.author: Alva Myrdal

quotes.quote: Feeling and longing are the motive forces behind all human endeavor and human creations.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: There is a space between man's imagination and man's attainment that may only be traversed by his longing.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: The only way to get rid of a temptation is to yield to it. Resist it, and your soul grows sick with longing for the things it has forbidden to itself.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If some longing goes unmet, don't be astonished. We call that life.
quotes.author: Anna Freud

quotes.quote: The longing for light is the longing for consciousness.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Art is longing. You never arrive, but you keep going in the hope that you will.
quotes.author: Anselm Kiefer

quotes.quote: We are all wondering the earth, alone, longing to be longed for.
quotes.author: William C. Hannan

quotes.quote: Only longing can fill with more of itself.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Every person has a longing to be significant; to make a contribution; to be a part of something noble and purposeful.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Desires are central to the soul's unfolding and should not be dismissed before giving them careful attention.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: Longing, the hope for fulfillment, is the one unwavering passion of the world's commerce.
quotes.author: E. L. Doctorow

quotes.quote: Our longing is our pledge, and blessed are the homesick, for they shall come home.
quotes.author: Isak Dinesen

quotes.quote: Longing and desire goes further than instant satisfaction. That's human nature.
quotes.author: Anna Sui

quotes.quote: The absolute yearning of one human body for another particular body and its indifference to substitutes is one of life's major mysteries.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: Longing on a large scale makes history.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.quote: Is there anything better than to be longing for something, when you know it is within reach?
quotes.author: Greta Garbo

quotes.quote: Longing is a compass that guides us through life. We may never get what we really want, that's true, but every step along the way will be determined by it.
quotes.author: Joan D. Chittister

quotes.quote: One of the deepest longings of the human soul is to be seen.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.quote: The act of longing for something will always be more intense than the requiting of it.
quotes.author: Gail Godwin

quotes.quote: Longing is like the rosy dawn. After the dawn out comes the sun. Longing is followed by the vision of God.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.quote: It is the future that creates his present. All is an interminable chain of longing.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Longing is like a seed that wrestles in the ground.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Longing is the core of mystery. Longing itself brings the cure. The only rule is, suffer the pain. Your desires must be disciplined And what you want to happen in time, sacrificed.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: He who desires but acts not, breeds pestilence.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Good looks hide adversity.
quotes.author: Constance Chuks Friday

quotes.quote: Looks fade. Brains don't.
quotes.author: Eunice Kennedy Shriver

quotes.quote: Withdraw into yourself and look.
quotes.author: Plotinus

quotes.quote: Look the world straight in the eye.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Look with favor upon a bold beginning.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: Look for happiness under your own roof.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.quote: You must look within for value, but must look beyond for perspective.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Always look at what you have left. Never look at what you have lost.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: People create their own questions because they are afraid to look straight. All you have to do is look straight and see the road, and when you see it, don't sit looking at it - walk.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Look beyond yourself..
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: Look for beauty in everything.
quotes.author: Katherine Center

quotes.quote: Look onwards to what lies ahead.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: We find what we are looking for.
quotes.author: Marshall Sylver

quotes.quote: Looking good is the best revenge.
quotes.author: Ivana Trump

quotes.quote: Looks fade, don't get too attached.
quotes.author: Ashton Kutcher

quotes.quote: Always look beyond what you can see.
quotes.author: Mark A. Cooper

quotes.quote: Seeing is not as simple as looking.
quotes.author: Joseph Kosuth

quotes.quote: Always look on the bright side of life.
quotes.author: Graham Chapman

quotes.quote: It's better to look ahead and prepare, than to look back and regret.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.quote: Don't look for things to be easier, look for you to be better.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Forget the past, it's gone, but glance back occasionally to remind yourself where you came from and where you are going.
quotes.author: Chloe Thurlow

quotes.quote: Sooner or later we've all got to let go of our past.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: It is important that we forgive ourselves for making mistakes. We need to learn from our errors and move on.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: I think looking forward will be better than looking back.
quotes.author: Erin Morgenstern

quotes.quote: Looking forward to things is half the pleasure of them. You mayn't get the things themselves; but nothing can prevent you from having the fun of looking forward to them.
quotes.author: L. M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: You've gotta know when it's time to turn the page.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: There will be many challenges ahead, and I'm looking forward to them.
quotes.author: Cael Sanderson

quotes.quote: Always look ahead, but never look back.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to forget what's gone. Appreciate what still remains. And look foward to what's coming next.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: To let go is to release the images and emotions, the grudges and fears, the clingings and disappointments of the past that bind our spirit.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: I'm looking forward, that's all, I'm not looking backwards.
quotes.author: Robbie Lawler

quotes.quote: It was a challenging experience. I'm looking forward to a break.
quotes.author: Martin Bashir

quotes.quote: Life moves on and so should we.
quotes.author: Spencer Johnson

quotes.quote: The truth is, unless you let go, unless you forgive yourself, unless you forgive the situation, unless you realize that the situation is over, you cannot move forward.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to take a step back to move forward.
quotes.author: Erika Taylor

quotes.quote: I can't take back the past, but I can fight for the future.
quotes.author: Shannon A. Thompson

quotes.quote: Sorrow is properly that state of the mind in which our desires are fixed upon the past without looking forward to the future.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: I'm just always looking forwards. I spend very little time, looking backwards.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: I'm really looking forward to, not more of the same, but a continual growth.
quotes.author: Ben Harper

quotes.quote: Where you are, right here and now, this is how bad stories end. But it's also how the best stories, begin.
quotes.author: Iain Thomas

quotes.quote: We keep moving forward, opening new doors, and doing new things, because we're curious and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: I don't care too much what happened in the past. I prefer to focus on what is coming next and I am really looking forward to it.
quotes.author: Sebastian Vettel

quotes.quote: I'm really looking forward to a time when generations after us look back and say how ridiculous it was that humans were driving cars.
quotes.author: Sebastian Thrun

quotes.quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it is letting go.
quotes.author: Herman Hesse

quotes.quote: I am looking forward to getting to do things I have never done before.
quotes.author: Tony Danza

quotes.quote: Look at your neck turning radius. Its designed to look 180 deg forward side only. Looking back slows you down. Always look forward in life.
quotes.author: Manoj Arora

quotes.quote: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: You can't look back; you have to keep looking forward.
quotes.author: Lucy Liu

quotes.quote: Change has to come for life to struggle forward.
quotes.author: Helen Hollick

quotes.quote: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
quotes.author: Victor Kiam

quotes.quote: Los Angeles is not a town full of airheads. There's a great deal of wonderful energy there.
quotes.author: Alan Rickman

quotes.quote: In Los Angeles everyone is a star.
quotes.author: Denzel Washington

quotes.quote: Los Angeles is 72 suburbs in search of a city.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: The town is an advertisement for itself; none of its charms are left to the visitor's imagination.
quotes.author: Christopher Isherwood

quotes.quote: Los Angeles is often described as the nadir of vapidity, a smog choked space cradle.
quotes.author: Diablo Cody

quotes.quote: Los Angeles is an industry town, and it has great facilities and personnel. The disadvantage is that everyone there seems to talk about the same subject matter.
quotes.author: Carter Burwell

quotes.quote: Los Angeles has no seasons, so it's kind of hard to keep track of time here. The lines between spring, summer, fall, and winter all blur like my vision. I get stuck on repeat for different measures of eternity.
quotes.author: Kris Kidd

quotes.quote: Los Angeles is a large city like area surrounding the Beverly Hills Hotel.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Los Angeles and all of Southern California is destined to become the greatest metropolitan area the world has ever known.
quotes.author: Otis Chandler

quotes.quote: Los Angeles is such a widespread city, sometimes it's hard to see your friends, and food is a great way to get together it's a great way of giving love.
quotes.author: Sofia Milos

quotes.quote: Los Angeles is one of those places where somebodies become nobodies and nobodies become somebody.
quotes.author: Carlos RuizÂ ZafÃ³n

quotes.quote: The great thing about Los Angeles is that you can get so much money in this town by constantly failing. You can get a lot of television deals that don't go anywhere, but you still get paid.
quotes.author: Daniel Tosh

quotes.quote: In Los Angeles, people dress with the deep and earnest hope that people will do nothing but stare at them.
quotes.author: Ellie Kemper

quotes.quote: Los Angeles gives one the feeling of the future more strongly than any city I know of. A bad future, too, like something out of Fritz Lang's feeble imagination.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Los Angeles is a planetary city making perishable toys from realities.
quotes.author: David Rowbotham

quotes.quote: Los Angeles is a great place. Where else can you smell the air and see it coming at you at the same time.
quotes.author: Jackie Gayle

quotes.quote: When you're in Los Angeles, everybody you meet is writing a movie, and they want you to be in it. Every cab driver is writing a movie!
quotes.author: William Sadler

quotes.quote: In Los Angeles, you drive around, and you're coming back from a club or something, and all of a sudden, you'll encounter a coyote. And they're very lean, hungry looking animals.
quotes.author: Dan Gilroy

quotes.quote: I turn up in Los Angeles every now and then, so I can get some big money films in order to finance my smaller money films.
quotes.author: John Hurt

quotes.quote: Los Angeles is the place where British people come to exceed their worth.
quotes.author: Ryan Cartwright

quotes.quote: Los Angeles, give me some of you! Los Angeles come to me the way I came to you, my feet over your streets, you pretty town I loved you so much, you sad flower in the sand, you pretty town!
quotes.author: John Fante

quotes.quote: Los Angeles is a one horse town. It's entirely driven by the entertainment business and that's what it is.
quotes.author: Jason Priestley

quotes.quote: With Los Angeles, it's kind of a love hate thing. Sometimes I think it's marvelous, and sometimes I think it's a dump. It's so fake and I can't deal with how fake it is.
quotes.author: Joe Elliott

quotes.quote: Los Angeles is the great experiment. The things we are going through now, the whole country will be going through in a few years.
quotes.author: Gary Phillips

quotes.quote: In Washington, the first thing people tell you is what their job is. In Los Angeles you learn their star sign. In Houston you're told how rich they are. And in New York they tell you what their rent is.
quotes.author: Simon Hoggart

quotes.quote: It's okay to lose. Losing teaches you something. Having to try and going through the trials and tribulations to actually overcome, to get there to win, to triumph, that's what makes life interesting.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Banks

quotes.quote: You must lose everything in order to gain anything.
quotes.author: Brad Pitt

quotes.quote: One who doesn't recognise an opportunity is bigger loser than one who tries his hand at an opportunity.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Friends might lose touch but never lose feelings
quotes.author: Josh Stern

quotes.quote: Losing something might be a blessing; gaining something might be a curse!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Losing is only temporary and not all encompassing. You must simply study it, learn from it, and try hard not to lose the same way again. Then you must have the self-control to forget about it.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: When you lose, you learn a lot about yourself. That experience is important.
quotes.author: Antonio Conte

quotes.quote: You must lose yourself if you want to be successful in animation and be the character.
quotes.author: Lucille Bliss

quotes.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The fear of losing something makes you weak, lose it and gain your strength.
quotes.author: Farid F. Ibrahim

quotes.quote: You may lose your path, but you must never lose your hope, because hope is the path to all the paths!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: If we win by losing ourselves, by losing what we were fighting for, then we never really win.
quotes.author: Meg Collett

quotes.quote: When you lose a person you love so much, surviving the loss is difficult.
quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.quote: Losing is part of the game. If you never lose, you are never truly tested, and never forced to grow.
quotes.author: David Sirlin

quotes.quote: Lose your dreams and you might lose your mind
quotes.author: Mick Jagger

quotes.quote: You learn more from losing than winning. You learn how to keep going.
quotes.author: Morgan Wootten

quotes.quote: Being a good loser helps build character, provides valuable lessons, and helps you become mentally prepared for your next challenge.
quotes.author: Frank Sonnenberg

quotes.quote: Losing will not always amount to a loss, sometimes you have to lose those toxic relationships and bad habits to create a space for better things.
quotes.author: Gift Gugu Mona

quotes.quote: Sometimes you must lose everything to gain it again, and the regaining is the sweeter for the pain of loss.
quotes.author: SebastiAn

quotes.quote: Lose something every day. Accept the fluster of lost door keys, the hour badly spent. The art of losing isn't hard to master.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bishop

quotes.quote: The more you lose yourself in something bigger than yourself, the more energy you will have.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Maybe the thing that we're losing is the very thing that has caused us to lose everything else in the first place.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: There will come a time in your life when you lose something that matters to you. You'll fight for it and you won't win. But what really matters isn't the war you're waging, it's that you don't lose the person you are in the midst of the battle.
quotes.author: J. Sterling

quotes.quote: The moment you believe you will fail, you have already lost the battle.
quotes.author: Bianca Frazier

quotes.quote: To lose a worthless friend is worthy of a testimony.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Don't be disappointed, the winning side is not always the right one.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: You're never a loser until you quit trying.
quotes.author: Mike Ditka

quotes.quote: Learn how to be a loser, because it's important to be a loser to be a winner.
quotes.author: Sanford I. Weill

quotes.quote: Maybe the truth is, there's a little bit of loser in all of us. Being happy isn't having everything in your life be perfect. Maybe it's about stringing together all the little things.
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: Losers fix the blame; winners fix what caused the problem.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Perfection is man's ultimate illusion. It simply doesn't exist in the universe. If you are a perfectionist, you are guaranteed to be a loser in whatever you do.
quotes.author: David D. Burns

quotes.quote: If at first you don't succeed, find out if the loser gets anything.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.quote: Second place is just the first place loser.
quotes.author: Dale Earnhardt

quotes.quote: How you respond to the challenge in the second half will determine what you become after the game, whether you are a winner or a loser.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: The cheerful loser is the winner.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: A peace is of the nature of a conquest; for then both parties nobly are subdued, and neither party loser.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Losers live in the past. Winners learn from the past and enjoy working in the present toward the future.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: The moment you think that your destiny is predetermined, you become a miserable loser! Trust your own power so that you can shape your own destiny!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Be careful you don't give up on what is yet to give you victory. Many people quit when they were yet to win. Successful people never quit and I believe no quitter had ever been successful too.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The path of least resistance is the path of the loser.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: The fear of losing anything is the inability to prepare for the best.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: One who doesn't recognise an opportunity is bigger loser than one who tries his hand at an opportunity.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: It seems that fighting is a game where everybody is the loser.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: It's not that he was going nowhere, it's that he'd already arrived.
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.quote: Stand up for the underdog, the loser. Sometimes having the strength to show loving support for unacknowledged others turns the tides of our own lives.
quotes.author: Alexandra Katehakis

quotes.quote: When you know that someone is playing love games with you and still you are there then it means either you are a true lover or a true loser.
quotes.author: Jasmine Kiyani

quotes.quote: The only difference between a winner and a loser is that one second when the winner decided not to give up.
quotes.author: Vikrmn

quotes.quote: It's okay to be a loser, these are people who tried to blend in with the world, still get the disrespect he doesn't deserve. decides to be just themselves. and still there's a girl you dream about, has someone else.
quotes.author: Jericho Pasaoa

quotes.quote: Don't try to impress a loser because If one is not happy about the things happening in their life, one cannot be happy about the things happening in someone else's life.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Losers always has an excuse Winner always find a way.
quotes.author: Noormohammad Bhuayan

quotes.quote: Losers doesn't require a miracle to Win.They just keep on fighting
quotes.author: Leo Ausdauer Wirabuana

quotes.quote: To be a good loser is to learn how to win.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: He's got that Ã¢â¬Ëborn to lose and lose violently' air about him. That's good.
quotes.author: Daniel Woodrell

quotes.quote: Winners do what losers don't want to do.
quotes.author: Gary Busey

quotes.quote: You have no choices about how you lose, but you do have a choice about how you come back and prepare to win again.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: When I lose a match, I know that I lose on the court and not in life.
quotes.author: Gabriela Sabatini

quotes.quote: Victory is fleeting. Losing is forever.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: That's what learning is, after all; not whether we lose the game,but how we lose and how we've changed because of it and what we take away from it that we never had before, to apply to other games. Losing, in a curious way, is winning.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Losing is part of the game. If you never lose, you are never truly tested, and never forced to grow.
quotes.author: David Sirlin

quotes.quote: Losing is only temporary and not all encompassing. You must simply study it, learn from it, and try hard not to lose the same way again. Then you must have the self-control to forget about it.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: If you learn from a loss you have not lost.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: I would prefer even to lose with honor than to win by cheating.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Losing is no disgrace if you've given your best.
quotes.author: Jim Palmer

quotes.quote: If you're afraid of losing, then you daren't win.
quotes.author: Bjorn Borg

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of losing, be afraid of playing a game and not learning something.
quotes.author: Dan Heisman

quotes.quote: Don't even mention losing to me. I can't stand to think of it.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.quote: Winning isn't everything but losing is nothing.
quotes.author: Edmar Mednis

quotes.quote: Most players ... do not like losing, and consider defeat as something shameful. This is a wrong attitude. Those who wish to perfect themselves must regard their losses as lessons and learn from them what sorts of things to avoid in the future.
quotes.author: Jose Capablanca

quotes.quote: You must never be satisfied with losing. You must get angry, terribly angry, about losing. But the mark of the good loser is that he takes his anger out on himself and not his victorious opponents or on his teammates.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: Losing an illusion makes you wiser than finding a truth.
quotes.author: Ludwig Borne

quotes.quote: Sometimes by losing a battle you find a new way to win the war.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Winners lose much more often than losers. So if you keep losing but you're still trying, keep it up! You're right on track.
quotes.author: Matthew Keith Groves

quotes.quote: We always learn more from the losing than the winning.
quotes.author: Yani Tseng

quotes.quote: Losing a game is heartbreaking. Losing your sense of excellence or worth is a tragedy.
quotes.author: Joe Paterno

quotes.quote: If you can't accept losing, you can't win.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Losing does not make me want to quit. It makes me want to fight that much harder.
quotes.author: Paul William "Bear" Bryant

quotes.quote: If you never lose, then you can never appreciate the victories.
quotes.author: Laura Twitchell

quotes.quote: Sometimes you learn more from losing than winning. Losing forces you to reexamine.
quotes.author: Pat Summitt

quotes.quote: The more you lose, the more positive you have to become. When you're winning, you can ride players harder because their self-esteem is high. If you are losing and you try to be tough, you're asking for dissension.
quotes.author: Rick Pitino

quotes.quote: You can't be a winner and be afraid to lose.
quotes.author: Charles Lynch

quotes.quote: That's what learning is, after all; not whether we lose the game, but how we lose and how we've changed because of it and what we take away from it that we never had before, to apply to other games. Losing, in a curious way, is winning.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: It's what you get from games you lose that is extremely important.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: We lost because we told ourselves we lost.
quotes.author: Leo Nikolaevich Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Losing comes of winning money.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.quote: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: On the death of a friend, we should consider that the fates through confidence have devolved on us the task of a double living, that we have henceforth to fulfill the promise of our friend's life also, in our own, to the world.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Death leaves a heartache no one can heal, love leaves a memory no one can steal.
quotes.author: Richard Puz

quotes.quote: Closed eyes, heart not beating, but a living love.
quotes.author: Avis Corea

quotes.quote: I pray to God to remove my enemies from my life, and before I know it I started losing friends. Am just saying no one to be trusted.
quotes.author: Blaze Olamiday

quotes.quote: Friendship is delicate as a glass, once broken it can be fixed but there will always be cracks.
quotes.author: Waqar Ahmed

quotes.quote: A friendship that can cease has never been real.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: We call that person who has lost his father, an orphan; and a widower that man who has lost his wife. But that man who has known the immense unhappiness of losing a friend, by what name do we call him? Here every language is silent and holds its peace in impotence.
quotes.author: Joseph Roux

quotes.quote: Sometimes we lose friends for whose loss our regret is greater than our grief, and others for whom our grief is greater than our regret.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: That friendship will not continue to the end which is begun for an end.
quotes.author: Francis Quareles

quotes.quote: When one has lost a friend one's eyes should be neither dry nor streaming. Tears, yes, there should be, but not lamentation.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: We all lose friends.. we lose them in death, to distance and over time. But even though they may be lost, hope is not. The key is to keep them in your heart, and when the time is right, you can pick up the friendship right where you left off. Even the lost find their way home when you leave the light on.
quotes.author: Amy Marie Walz

quotes.quote: The death of a friend is equivalent to the loss of a limb.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Lovers have a right to betray you friends don't.
quotes.author: Judy Holliday

quotes.quote: Good God! How often are we to die before we go quite off this stage? In every friend we lose a part of ourselves, and the best part.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: I have learned that no matter how good a friend is, they're going to hurt you every once in a while and you must forgive them for that.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If two friends ask you to judge a dispute, do not accept, as you may lose a friend.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Everyone leaves footprints in your memory, but the ones that leave footprints in your heart are the ones you will truly remember.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sperling

quotes.quote: The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Foley

quotes.quote: Make as many friends as you can, but don't build your life on them alone. It's an unstable foundation.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Fare thee well! and if for ever / Still for ever, fare thee well
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: A special friend is hard to find, hard to lose and impossible to forget.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I'm losing friends 'cause people are catching feelings I'm not catching.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Due to success I started losing friends.
quotes.author: Ace Hood

quotes.quote: Some people are going to leave, but that's not the end your story. That's the end of their part in your story.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Donât be dismayed at goodbyes. A farewell is necessary before you can meet again. And meeting again, after moments or lifetime, is certain for those, who are friends.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Life is a bus ride, with only so many seats. It took me a long time to comprehend that sometimes people had to leave my life, to make room for the better ones, but once I understood that it became easier to let go, and I was surprised at just how quickly new, interesting people somehow found their way onto my bus.
quotes.author: Dodie Clark

quotes.quote: When your friends are gone and you only can look at pictures, then remeber, that times and people change but that memories stay forever.
quotes.author: C.M.

quotes.quote: One of the difficult things about growing older is that you start losing so many friends. On the other hand, the older you get, the less time you have to wait until you see them again.
quotes.author: Ron Brackin

quotes.quote: Friendship is delicate as a glass, once broken it can be fixed but there will always be cracks.
quotes.author: Waqar Ahmed

quotes.quote: Two persons cannot long be friends if they cannot forgive each other's little failings.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: We all lose friends.. we lose them in death, to distance, and over time. But even though they may be lost, hope is not. The key is to keep them in your heart, and when the time is right, you can pick up the friendship right where you left off. Even the lost find their way home, when you leave the light on.
quotes.author: Amy Marie Walz

quotes.quote: An insincere friend is more to be feared than a wild beast; a wild beast may wound your body, but an evil friend will wound your mind.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Breaking with old friends is one of the most painful of the changes in all that piling up of a multitude of small distasteful changes that constitutes growing older.
quotes.author: John Dos Passos

quotes.quote: Friendship is like a glass ornament, once it is broken, it can rarely be put back together in exactly the same way.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: The worst solitude is to be destitute of sincere friendship.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: True regret is knowing you missed your only opportunity to be simply a good friend to someone that was exactly like you.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: The worst pain in the world goes beyond the physical. Even further beyond any other emotional pain one can feel. It is the betrayal of a friend.
quotes.author: Heather Brewer

quotes.quote: Good God! How often are we to die before we go quite off this stage? In every friend we lose a part of ourselves, and the best part
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: If two friends ask you to judge a dispute, do not accept, as you may lose a friend.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: While we are mourning the loss of our friend, others are rejoicing to meet him behind the veil.
quotes.author: John Taylor

quotes.quote: Though friendship is not quick to burn, it is explosive stuff.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: I need not fear my enemies because the most they can do is attack me. I need not fear my friends because the most they can do is betray me. But I have much to fear from people who are indifferent.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: It's hard to tell who has your back, from who has it long enough just to stab you in it'.
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.quote: It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: False friends are like our shadow, keeping close to us while we walk in the sunshine, but leaving us the instant we cross into the shade.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: Friendship must never be buried under the weight of misunderstanding.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: Sometimes the measure of friendship isn't your ability to not harm but your capacity to forgive the things done to you and ask forgiveness for your own mistakes.
quotes.author: Randy K. Milholland

quotes.quote: We can't feel the lose of a friend until they are apart from us.
quotes.author: Debolina

quotes.quote: A lost friendship is an enemy won.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Sometimes your closest friend is your greatest enemy.
quotes.author: Jason Fong

quotes.quote: Excuse me, then! you know my heart; But dearest friends, alas! must part
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: Don't be dismayed at goodbyes. A farewell is necessary before you can meet again. And meeting again, after moments or lifetime, is certain for those who are friends.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: You meet people who forget you. You forget people you meet. But sometimes you meet those people you can't forget. Those are your friends.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Some say that time changes. Best friends can become strangers.
quotes.author: Good Charlotte

quotes.quote: But fate ordains that dearest friends must part.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: In losing a friend, she is reminded of all she has lost and all she stands to lose again. There is nothing to be done to make it any easier. We all grieve alone.
quotes.author: Alice Hoffman

quotes.quote: She's very free-spirited and fun, not a care in the world. Like me in my freshman year. I could definitely see it. Just the natural ability.
quotes.author: Larissa Luther

quotes.quote: The moment you can visualize being free from the things that hold you back you have indeed begun to set yourself free.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to kind of die inside in order to rise from your own ashes and believe in yourself and love yourself to become a new person.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: I have been and still am a seeker, but I have ceased to question stars and books; I have begun to listen to the teaching my blood whispers to me.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: It takes courage...to endure the sharp pains of self discovery rather than choose to take the dull pain of unconsciousness that would last the rest of our lives.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: People often say that this or that person has not yet found himself. But the self is not something one finds, it is something one creates.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: If you don't get lost, there's a chance you may never be found.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately, to front only the essential facts of life, and see if I could not learn what it had to teach, and not, when I came to die, discover that I had not lived.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing. To keep our faces toward change and behave likefree spirits in the presence of fate is strength undefeatable.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Restore unto me the joy of thy salvation; and uphold me with thy free spirit.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: They can't chain my spirit! My spirit runs free! Walls can't contain it! Laws can't restrain it! Authority has no power over it!
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Don't gain the world and lose your soul; wisdom is better than silver or gold.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Tourists don't know where they've been, travelers don't know where they're going.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: Never lose yourself while trying to hold on to someone who doesn't care about losing you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The more time you waste trying to be what others want you to be, the more you lose yourself.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You were born an original. Don't die a copy
quotes.author: John Mason

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: And remember, no matter where you go, there you are.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Man stands in his own shadow and wonders why it's dark.
quotes.author: Zen Proverb

quotes.quote: To thine own self be true.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Don't give so much of yourself to others that you end up losing yourself.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The more you lose yourself in something bigger than yourself, the more energy you will have.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: I have always considered myself a free spirit with a Gypsy soul. Surrendering to where ever life takes me.
quotes.author: Melanie Moushigian Koulouris

quotes.quote: once you lose yourself, you have two choices: find the person you used to be, or lose that person completely.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: I'm so young, and I'm single, and I just want to drift.
quotes.author: Shailene Woodley

quotes.quote: When you lose touch with yourself, you lose yourself in the world.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Love yourself accept yourself be yourselfthese qualities will create for the first time an individual whose inner flame is undividable a great pool of energy will gather and surround youwith this an inner trust will arise from within you.
quotes.author: Swami Rajneesh

quotes.quote: A free spirit must be able to surmount anxiety time after time.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: A free spirit takes liberties even with liberty itself.
quotes.author: Francis Picabia

quotes.quote: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: There's always failure. And there's always disappointment. And there's always loss. But the secret is learning from the loss, and realizing that none of those holes are vacuums.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: The most beautiful people we have known are those who have known defeat, known suffering, known struggle, known loss, and have found their way out of those depths.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: When you lose something in your life, stop thinking it's a loss for you... it is a gift you have been given so you can get on the right path to where you are meant to go, not to where you think you should have gone.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Nothing on earth can make up for the loss of one who has loved you.
quotes.author: Selma LagerlÃ¶f

quotes.quote: It was one of those times you feel a sense of loss, even though you didn't have something in the first place. I guess that's what disappointment is- a sense of loss for something you never had.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: Life seems sometimes like nothing more than a series of losses, from beginning to end. That's the given. How you respond to those losses, what you make of what's left, that's the part you have to make up as you go.
quotes.author: Katharine Weber

quotes.quote: The greatest hazard of all, losing oneâs self, can occur very quietly in the world, as if it were nothing at all. No other loss can occur so quietly; any other loss - an arm, a leg, five dollars, a wife, etc. - is sure to be noticed.
quotes.author: SÃ¸ren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Loss is nothing else but change, and change is Nature's delight.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The loss of enemies does not compensate for the loss of friends.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Loss is a significant force that can serve as a catalyst for change. It can bring about an awakening, drawing out something sacred within us.
quotes.author: Mark Ireland

quotes.quote: Being prepared for loss is never the same as being ready for it.
quotes.author: R. K. Milholland

quotes.quote: Nothing that grieves us can be called little: by the eternal laws of proportion a child's loss of a doll and a king's loss of a crown are events of the same size.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: With endless time, nothing is special. With no loss or sacrifice, we canât appreciate what we have.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Everyone who lives long enough to love deeply will experience great losses. Don't let fear of loss, or the losses themselves, take away your ability to enjoy the wonderful life that is yours.
quotes.author: Barbara Cooper

quotes.quote: I cannot conceive of a greater loss than the loss of one's self-respect.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Prefer a loss to a dishonest gain; the one brings pain at the moment, the other for all time.
quotes.author: Chilon

quotes.quote: Loss alone is but the wounding of a heart; it is memory that makes it our ruin.
quotes.author: Brian Ruckley

quotes.quote: There is no teacher more discriminating or transforming than loss.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: In loss itself I find assuagement: having lost the treasure, I've nothing to fear.
quotes.author: Juana InÃ©s de la Cruz

quotes.quote: Anyone who has experienced a certain amount of loss in their life has empathy for those who have experienced loss.
quotes.author: Anderson Cooper

quotes.quote: Loss is like a closed road that forces us to turn around and find another way to our destination. Who knows what we will discover and see along the way.
quotes.author: Gerald Lawson Sittser

quotes.quote: At least at times of loss, we are reminded of our priorities, of our many blessings. In times of gain, we can so often lose our way.
quotes.author: Mindy Starns Clark

quotes.quote: In our lives, change is unavoidable, loss is unavoidable. In the adaptability and ease with which we experience change, lies our happiness and freedom.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: No matter how hard the loss, defeat might serve as well as victory to shake the soul and let the glory out.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: The loss of a friend is like that of a limb time may heal the anguish of the wound, but the loss cannot be repaired.
quotes.author: Robert Southey
