quotes.quote: Grief is a normal and natural response to loss. It is originally an unlearned feeling process. Keeping grief inside increases your pain.
quotes.author: Anne Grant

quotes.quote: We never understand how little we need in this world until we know the loss of it.
quotes.author: James M. Barrie

quotes.quote: A great man is one who leaves others at a loss after he is gone.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.quote: Winning a lottery may prove to be bad luck.
quotes.author: James Cook

quotes.quote: Forget the lottery. Bet on yourself instead.
quotes.author: Brian Koslow

quotes.quote: A lottery is the perfect tax...laid only upon the willing.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Winning the lottery is winning the lottery. It's highly unlikely and very unusual.
quotes.author: Lori Lansens

quotes.quote: Life's a lottery, and man should make up his mind to the blanks.
quotes.author: George Colman the Elder

quotes.quote: If all those psychics know the winning lottery numbers, why are they all still working?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: It's sad, the lottery. Good projects get funded by it, but there's an air of desperation about it.
quotes.author: Nina Conti

quotes.quote: The more tickets you have in a lottery, the worse your chance. And it is the same of virtues, in the lottery of life.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: A lottery is a salutary instrument and a tax... laid on the willing only, that is to say, on those who can risk the price of a ticket without sensible injury, for the possibility of a higher prize.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Lottery: A tax on people who are bad at math.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: You go and you buy a lottery ticket. You've got just as much chance of getting struck by lightning as you do of winning the lottery.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: People play the lottery all the time unaware of how mind-bogglingly difficult it is to win. It seems like they take a different approach to probabilities. Their rationale must be, âWell, I can either win it or not win it, so my odds of winning are 50/50.
quotes.author: Orlando Winters

quotes.quote: Why do people play the lottery, or why do people gamble, period? You know, it's with the hope of winning something more.
quotes.author: Derek Kilmer

quotes.quote: The world neither ever saw, nor ever will see, a perfectly fair lottery.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.quote: You could buy 100 lottery tickets and not win, or you could buy one and get it.
quotes.author: Luis Gonzalez

quotes.quote: No one makes a million dollars with minimal effort unless they win the lottery.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Before that lottery ticket won the jackpot, someone had to buy it.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: When you buy a lottery ticket, you don't know how tickets have been sold. But sold they have been. And there is an underlying distribution for the game.
quotes.author: Robert Haugen

quotes.quote: A lottery is a taxation on all of the fools in creation.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Absence is to love as wind is to fire; it extinguishes the small and enkindles the great.
quotes.author: Roger de Rabutin de Bussy

quotes.quote: One who marries for love alone will have bad days but good nights.
quotes.author: Egyptian (on marriage)

quotes.quote: Love is a force more formidable than any other. It is invisible - it cannot be seen or measured, yet it is powerful enough to transform you in a moment, and offer you more joy than any material possession could.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: I am in love and want to grow pale; I am in love and I want to suffer; I am in love, and I give away my genius in exchange for a kiss.
quotes.author: Alfred De Musset

quotes.quote: Love; that self-love a deux.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Love doesn't make the world go 'round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Love: a wildly misunderstood although highly desirable malfunction of the heart which weakens the brain, causes eyes to sparkle, cheeks to glow, blood pressure to rise and the lips to pucker.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is a canvas furnished by Nature and embroidered by imagination.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen nor even touched, but just felt in the heart.
quotes.author: Anne Sullivan

quotes.quote: At the touch of love, everyone becomes a poet.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: If I were pressed to say why I loved him, I feel that my only reply could be: 'Because it was he, because it was I'.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Love is a fabric which never fades, no matter how often it is washed in the water of adversity and grief.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: In the arithmetic of love, one plus one equals everything, and two minus one equals nothing.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Love is of all passions the strongest, for it attacks simultaneously the head, the heart and the senses.
quotes.author: LaoTzu

quotes.quote: Love is like quicksilver in the hand. Leave the fingers open and it stays. Clutch it, and it darts away.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Love is to love someone for who they are, who they were, and who they will be.
quotes.author: Chris Moore

quotes.quote: To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that's everything.
quotes.author: T. Tolis

quotes.quote: I shall be great and you rich, because we love each other.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Love is an untamed force. When we try to control it, it destroys us. When we try to imprison it, it enslaves us. When we try to understand it, it leaves us feeling lost and confused.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Love is an act of endless forgiveness, a tender look which becomes a habit.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Love is something eternal; the aspect may change, but not the essence.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Love is like an hourglass, with the heart filling up as the brain empties.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the Gods.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Love is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell.
quotes.author: Joan Crawford

quotes.quote: Love is the only sane and satisfactory answer to the problem of human existence.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Love has unbound my limbs and set me shaking, a monster bitter sweet and my unmaking.
quotes.author: Sappho

quotes.quote: Love always creates, it never destroys. In this lies man's only promise.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: It is no more in our power to love always than it was not to love at all.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Boundless love always manages somehow to sparkle through your limited form.
quotes.author: John Welwood

quotes.quote: A young woman in love always looks like patience on a monument smiling at grief.
quotes.author: Willliam Shakespeare

quotes.quote: He promised her that he would give her everything, everything she wanted, as men in love always do. And she trusted him despite herself, as women in love always do.
quotes.author: Philippa Gregory

quotes.quote: I'm not saying that love always takes you to heaven. Your life can become a nightmare. But that said, it is worth taking the risk.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Love always brings difficulties, that is true, but the good side of it is that it gives energy.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Love always ends for a reason and leaves with a lesson.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Whoever has a heart full of love always has something to give.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: Love always requires courage and involves risk.
quotes.author: M Scott Peck

quotes.quote: True love always makes a man better, no matter what woman inspires it.
quotes.author: Alexander Dumas

quotes.quote: Love always has its price, come whence it may.
quotes.author: Guy De Maupassant

quotes.quote: The commitment to love always transforms, heals, and opens new avenues of creativity.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Love and hurry are fundamentally incompatible. Love always takes time, and time is the one thing hurried people don't have.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.quote: Divine love always has been, and always will be, the answer that you seek.
quotes.author: Doreen Virtue

quotes.quote: Whatever is done for love always occurs beyond good and evil.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Love always wins over hate.
quotes.author: Johnny Corn

quotes.quote: Love always ends differently and it always begins differently - especially with me
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Friendship is really the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote:
Friendship is constant in all other things Save in the office and affairs of love. Therefore all hearts in love use their own tongues.
Let every eye negotiate for itself, And trust no agent; for beauty is a witch Against whose charms faith melteth into blood.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Love demands infinitely less than friendship.
quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

quotes.quote: Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Love without friendship is like a kite, aloft only when the winds are favorable. Friendship is what gives love its wings.
quotes.author: Sherry Thomas

quotes.quote: There is an important difference between love and friendship. While the former delights in extremes and opposites, the latter demands equality.
quotes.author: Francoise d'Aubigne, Marquise de Maintenon

quotes.quote: Friendship is Love without his wings!
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Do you know what the difference is between Friendship and Love? Friendship is the photograph, Love is the oil painting.
quotes.author: Frank Delaney

quotes.quote: In love and friendship, small, steady payments on a gold basis are better than immense promissory notes.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Love and friendship, two of life's abiding rewards, are endangered species in Hollywood. People crave both, mistaking alliance for friendship, lust for love, and ambition for both.
quotes.author: Lynda Obst

quotes.quote: The difference between friendship and love is how much you can hurt each other.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: Love and friendship. They are what make us who we are, and what can change us, if we let them.
quotes.author: Emily Giffin

quotes.quote: Friends can help each other. A true friend is someone who lets you have total freedom to be yourself - and especially to feel. Or, not feel. Whatever you happen to be feeling at the moment is fine with them. That's what real love amounts to - letting a person be what he really is.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Friendship often ends in love, but love in friendship - never.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Friendship is a serious affection; the most sublime of all affections, because it is founded on principle, and cemented by time. The very reverse may be said of love. In a great degree, love and friendship cannot subsist in the same bosom; even when inspired by different objects they weaken or destroy each other, and for the same object can only be felt in succession. The vain fears and fond jealousies, the winds which fan the flame of love, when judiciously or artfully tempered, are both incompatible with the tender confidence and sincere respect of friendship.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: It is love and friendship, the sanctity and celebration of our relationships, that not only support a good life, but create one. Through friendships, we spark and inspire one another's ambitions.
quotes.author: Wallace Stegner

quotes.quote: The difference between romantic love and friendship love is that romantic love involves a lot of compromise. It is a very giving type of love. With friendship, you can be a little bit more autonomous. You are not expected to compromise, in the same way. Maybe that's why friendships tend to last longer.
quotes.author: Olivia Wilde

quotes.quote: People may come and go,lives may change in a instant,but love and friendship will last forever.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Sims

quotes.quote: You can't choose between Love and Friendship. They're like a package: You either get both or you lose both
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: It is one of the severest tests of friendship to tell your friend his faults. So to love a man that you cannot bear to see a stain upon him, and to speak painful truth through loving words, that is friendship.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Friendship and love are impossible without a mutual vulnerability.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: Love is friendship set on fire.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
quotes.author: Hubert Humphrey

quotes.quote: Love and pain become one in the same in the eyes of a wounded child.
quotes.author: Pat Benatar

quotes.quote: Where there is love, there is vulnerability to pain.
quotes.author: Laura Ramirez

quotes.quote: Love is the burning point of life, and since all life is sorrowful, so is love. The stronger the love, the more the pain. Love itself is pain, you might say -the pain of being truly alive.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: I think that passion and love and pain are all bearable, and they go to make love beautiful.
quotes.author: Robert Plant

quotes.quote: For every day that there is sunshine, there will be days of rain, it's how we dance within them both that shows our love and pain.
quotes.author: Joey Tolbert

quotes.quote: All pain is a punishment, and every punishment is inflicted for love as much as for justice.
quotes.author: Joseph de Maistre

quotes.quote: To give and receive love, you have to be in touch with pain, you have to be capable of provoking it and feeling it.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.quote: But nothing that can be said can begin to take away the anguish and the pain of these moments. Grief is the price we pay for love.
quotes.author: Elizabeth II

quotes.quote: Don't hold to anger, hurt or pain. They steal your energy and keep you from love.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Grief can be the garden of compassion. If you keep your heart open through everything, your pain can become your greatest ally in your life's search for love and wisdom.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: There is that awful moment when you realize that you're falling in love. That should be the most joyful moment, and actually it's not. It's always a moment that's full of fear because you know, as night follows day, the joy is going to rapidly be followed by some pain or other. All the angst of a relationship.
quotes.author: Helen Mirren

quotes.quote: One word frees us of all the weight and pain in life. That word is love.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Why love if losing hurts so much? I have no answers anymore; only the life I have lived. The pain now is part of the happiness then.
quotes.author: Anthony Hopkins

quotes.quote: The greater your capacity to love, the greater your capacity to feel the pain.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: To act, you must know pain. You must know what it means to be in love, what it means to be rejected.
quotes.author: Preity Zinta

quotes.quote: The big relationships you make in your life are with those that you love and if things do go wrong then it's a source of great pain and that lasts.
quotes.author: Michael Morpurgo

quotes.quote: When you love someone so much that you are in pain when you are apart it ends up being destructive. I never want to be in that place again.
quotes.author: Sadie Frost

quotes.quote: We live in bodies that are fearfully and wonderfully made, yet they are not immune to illness and pain. We have hearts that are capable of experiencing great love, but sometimes they get broken.
quotes.author: Adam Hamilton

quotes.quote: I think there's always a bit of pain in everything that's ecstatic - relationships and love, they always come with pain.
quotes.author: Tove Lo

quotes.quote: Pain revealed the paltry dimensions of love. The paltry dimensions of everything, in fact, except pain.
quotes.author: Glen Duncan

quotes.quote: Through Love all that is bitter will be sweet, Through Love all that is copper will be gold, Through Love all dregs will become wine, through Love all pain will turn to medicine.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Pleasure of love lasts a moment, pain of love lasts a lifetime.
quotes.author: Jean Pierre Claris de Florian

quotes.quote: Pain and love -- the whole of life, in short -- cannot be looked on as a disease just because they make us suffer.
quotes.author: Italo Svevo

quotes.quote: If we deny love that is given to us, if we refuse to give love because we fear pain or loss, then our lives will be empty, our loss greater.
quotes.author: Margaret Weis

quotes.quote: The pain of love is the pain of being alive. It is a perpetual wound.
quotes.author: Maureen Duffy

quotes.quote: The blood of love welled up in my heart with a slow pain.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: A mighty pain to love it is, and 'tis a pain that pain to miss; but of all the pains, the greatest pain is to love, but love in vain.
quotes.author: Abraham Cowley

quotes.quote: If you want to know what love is, have a child. If you want to know what pain is, bury him.
quotes.author: Giannina Braschi

quotes.quote: Love is the sweetest pain inside.
quotes.author: Tarkan

quotes.quote: Pains of love be sweeter far than all the other pleasures are.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Love at first sight is only realizing an imagination that has always haunted us; or meeting with a face, a figure, or cast of expression in perfection that we have seen and admired in a less degree or in less favorable circumstances a hundred times before.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: The only true love is love at first sight; second sight dispels it.
quotes.author: Israel Zangwill

quotes.quote: It's not love at first sight, it's having the sight, to distinguish true love, from just mere beauty.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Love at first sight is easy to understand; it's when two people have been looking at each other for a lifetime that it becomes a miracle.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: The process of falling in love at first sight is as final as it is swift in such a case, but the growth of true friendship may be a lifelong affair.
quotes.author: Sarah Orne Jewett

quotes.quote: Maybe love at first sight isnât what we think it is. Maybe itâs recognising a soul we loved in a past life and falling in love with them again.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: Here's to love at first sight, and here's to getting over it the moment you blink.
quotes.author: Ahmed Mostafa

quotes.quote: It was love at first sight, at last sight, at ever and ever sight.
quotes.author: Vladmir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Love at first sight is different when you're 32 than when you're 22. In your early 20s, you fall in love after three weeks.
quotes.author: Eric Dane

quotes.quote: People believe those fairytales about falling in love at first sight at the bus, subway, or at the streets. But it doesn't make sense how they'd laugh at the ones who fell in love at first sight through TV screens. Loving a celebrity IS a type of love. Love is fair to everyone.
quotes.author: Tablo

quotes.quote: A stunning first impression was not the same thing as love at first sight. But surely it was an invitation to consider the matter.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: You can fall in love at first sight with a place as with a person.
quotes.author: Alec Waugh

quotes.quote: The advantage of love at first sight is that it delays a second sight.
quotes.author: Natalie Clifford Barney

quotes.quote: Friendship at first sight, like love at first sight, is said to be the only truth.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Love at first sight is a revival of an infantile impression. The first love object reappears in a different disguise.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Stekel

quotes.quote: Love at first sight becomes truly remarkable when people have been looking at each other for years and realize that they love each other all along.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sometimes, when we least expect it, we catch a glimpse of someone, a face, perhaps only a smile, and our heart latches on and will not let go. It may not be love at first, but soon and for always.
quotes.author: Regan Walker

quotes.quote: The first love is the one that leaves an everlasting impression on the heart.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: No one believes in love at fisrt sight until that special persons comes along and steals your heart.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: She must be assured that it is not a criminal offense to love at first sight.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: Something amazing happens when we surrender and just love. We melt into another world, a realm of power already within us. The world changes when we change. the world softens when we soften. The world loves us when we choose to love the world.
quotes.author: Marriane Williamson

quotes.quote: Watch out for each other. Love everyone and forgive everyone, including yourself. Forgive your anger. Forgive your guilt. Your shame. Your sadness. Embrace and open up your love, your joy, your truth, and most especially your heart.
quotes.author: Jim Henson

quotes.quote: Let us learn to live with kindness, to love everyone, even when they do not love us.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: We can not love everyone and be loved by everyone. It would be perfection, and nothing is perfect in this world.
quotes.author: Paul Pogba

quotes.quote: If I could choose to have one superpower, I would want to be able to make everyone love everyone!
quotes.author: Betsey Johnson

quotes.quote: There are times when I love the world and love everyone, and I want to talk to everyone, and other times when I feel really disillusioned, and like none of this is real, nothing is real around me.
quotes.author: Tall Lennox

quotes.quote: When you're taught to love everyone, to love your enemies, then what value does that place on love?
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: This is what my soul is telling me, be peaceful and love everyone.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: Love everyone unconditionally, including yourself.
quotes.author: Ken Keyes Jr.

quotes.quote: Help each other. Love everyone. Every leaf. Every ray of light. Forgive.
quotes.author: Terrence Malick

quotes.quote: You should love everyone; no one is a stranger; God dwells in all beings; without Him nothing can exist.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.quote: Eventually, I think you find a spiritual and emotional connection with someone, and I think it unifies you with everyone else. I think if you love one person, it makes you love everyone. That's how I feel now.
quotes.author: Russell Brand

quotes.quote: When we were born, nobody gave us a lesson on how to breatheâwe just did. The same thing happens with love. Nobody tells you how to loveâwe just do.
quotes.author: Connor Chalfant

quotes.quote: Love everyone today as if today is the last day of your life.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: You need not to love everyone, but you need to be polite with everyone, people will appreciate your politeness more than your love, because politeness is sweeter than love.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: The world says fall in love, but the universe says rise in love.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Every life matters. Be like Mother Nature and love everyone without judging.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: No matter what, love everyone because everyone is craving love.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Love is black. Love is white. Love is brown. Love is humanity.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Promise yourself to forgive everyone, love everyone, and judge no one.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Look at a flower. She loves everyone. She doesn't care who you are or where you're from. Why should we? Let us love everyone.
quotes.author: ApolloM

quotes.quote: Truth is, I love everyone that is a good person regardless of what they look like, walk like, or who they love.
quotes.author: Doja Cat

quotes.quote: Everybody needs love. Everyone deserves it.
quotes.author: Reese Witherspoon

quotes.quote: We can not love everyone and be loved by everyone. It would be perfection, and nothing is perfect in this world.
quotes.author: Paul Pogba

quotes.quote: Well... I mean, I think Christ teaches us to love everyone.
quotes.author: Stephen Cone

quotes.quote: Help each other. Love everyone. Every leaf. Every ray of light. Forgive.
quotes.author: Terrence Malick

quotes.quote: The only way to be happy is to love. Unless you love, your life will flash by.
quotes.author: Terrence Malick

quotes.quote: God doesn't always like everything we do. That's our choice. But he loves all his children.
quotes.author: Michael Caton-Jones

quotes.quote: You see, we don't have to love everyone. It's almost impossible. Many families don't get along. We don't even have to like each other. But you know, in my opinion, to survive, we have to learn to respect one another. Without respect, we will destroy each other.
quotes.author: Scott Takeda

quotes.quote: I just love being in love, I love everything about it I love falling in love I love being in love I love going from in love to love I love that I love all things love I love being loved I love everyone I love everything I love when people love me back, do you love me?
quotes.author: Robert Raymond

quotes.quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: I love life and nothing intimidates me anymore.
quotes.author: Olivia Newton-John

quotes.quote: I don't want anyone part of my love life besides me and the person I'm loving.
quotes.author: Ansel Elgort

quotes.quote: Life is a flower of which love is the honey.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Gift the love of your life with undistracted, untelevisioned, unhurried attentiveness.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: The sadest part of love life is when you cannot live with and without the one you love.
quotes.author: Amit Abraham

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: The best relationship is one in which your love for each other exceeds your need for each other.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Dost thou love life? Then do not squander time, for that is the stuff that life is made of.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I dream this day of wondrous things, of peace and hope and pride. I dance my dance with life today, I'm filled with love inside.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: When I have to cry, I think about my love life. When I have to laugh, I think about my love life.
quotes.author: Glenda Jackson

quotes.quote: Once in a lifetime true love comes in your life. That is made just for you and you should not lose that chance of grasping it.
quotes.author: Lovely Goyal

quotes.quote: Life has taught us that love does not consist in gazing at each other but in looking outward together in the same direction.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-ExupÃ©ry

quotes.quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Love is a force more formidable than any other. It is invisibleÃ¢â¬âit cannot be seen or measured, yet it is powerful enough to transform you in a moment, and offer you more joy than any material possession could.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: It means much to have loved, to have been happy, to have laid my hand on the living Garden, even for a day.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: A dream is what makes people love life even when it is painful.
quotes.author: Theodore Zeldin

quotes.quote: Love life. Live your life with joy so you may fill the world with joy. Let no one leave your presence without feeling the joy of life.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Life is like an echo; if you love life, it loves you back.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
quotes.author: Max Muller

quotes.quote: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.
quotes.author: Arthur Rubinstein

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: I argue thee that love is life. And life hath immortality.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: And he'd hated himself, and hated her, too, for the ruin they'd made of each other.
quotes.author: Dennis Lehane

quotes.quote: I don't think, until you've actually lost somebody you really love, that you can go through that door that allows you to be grown-up.
quotes.author: Felicity Kendal

quotes.quote: Where you used to be, there is a hole in the world, which I find myself constantly walking around in the daytime, and falling in at night. I miss you like hell.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: When love is lost, do not bow your head in sadness; instead keep your head up high and gaze into heaven for that is where your broken heart has been sent to heal.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: In love, unlike most other passions, the recollection of what you have had and lost is always better than what you can hope for in the future.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: People should not judge failed love affairs as failed experiences, but as part of the growth process. Something does not have to end well for it to have been one of the most valuable experiences of a lifetime.
quotes.author: Ethel Person

quotes.quote: Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: I have loved and I have lost and I'm starting to believe; it's okay. Sometimes what we 'think' is best for us, is only the beginning of what is truly 'meant' for us. And if I have loved, so deeply the wrong heart; I am content in knowing the greatest love I will ever experience, hasn't even begun yet.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: A dream you once were, a dream of all my realities, a dream I can no longer strive for, in the wake of many betrayals.
quotes.author: C. Elizabeth

quotes.quote: When it's gone, you'll know what a gift love was.You'll suffer like this. So go back and fight to keep it.
quotes.author: Ian McEwan

quotes.quote: I thought when love for you died, I should die. It's dead. Alone, most strangely, I live on.
quotes.author: Rupert Brooke

quotes.quote: Yet leave me not; yet, if thou wilt, be free;Love me no more, but love my love of thee.
quotes.author: Algernon Charles Swinburne

quotes.quote: It's better to have loved and lost than to have to do forty pounds of laundry a week.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: I think the worst feeling in the world is knowing that someone you used to talk to everyday doesn't care about you anymore
quotes.author: Anmol Andore

quotes.quote: There can't be a perfect replacement for those we lost, whom we love so much. But there's always a kind replacement, strong and caring enough to take us through those lonely moments.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: What the heart has once owned and had, it shall never lose.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: An act of love that fails is just as much a part of the divine life as an act of love that succeeds, for love is measured by fullness, not by reception.
quotes.author: Harold Loukes

quotes.quote: Tis better to have loved and lostthan never to have loved at all.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Sigh no more, ladies, sigh no more, Men were deceivers ever, One foot in sea and one on shore, To one thing constant never.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The way to love anything is to realize that it might be lost.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: I have loved deeply. I have lost intensely. I will never love again. I get that love by people who care for me.
quotes.author: Richard Simmons

quotes.quote: Any relationship should have love, and if there is no love, it is better to call off a relationship. People say that love happens only once, but I don't believe in it because for me, if one relationship doesn't work, you should move on and seek love in another relationship. Who knows; you might find love in the second relationship.
quotes.author: Bipasha Basu

quotes.quote: When you love someone, and you've lost that one, then nothing really matters.
quotes.author: Agnetha Faltskog

quotes.quote: To love and win is the best thing; to love and lose, the next best.
quotes.author: William Thackeray

quotes.quote: Everyone keeps telling me that time heals all wounds, but no one can tell me what I'm supposed to do right now. Right now I can't sleep. It's right now that I can't eat. Right now I still hear his voice and sense his presence even though I know he's not here. Right now all I seem to do is cry. I know all about time and wounds healing, but even if I had all the time in the world, I still don't know what to do with all this hurt right now.
quotes.author: Nina Guilbeau

quotes.quote: Love becomes logically true when lost but still sought from the same source.
quotes.author: Brian Celio

quotes.quote: Love is grand; divorce is a hundred grand.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: You can love someone so much...But you can never love people as much as you can miss them.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: The new job of art is to sit on the wall and get more expensive.
quotes.author: Robert Hughes

quotes.quote: Don't pick a job with great vacation time. Pick one that doesn't need escaping from.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Do what you love. When you love your work, you become the best worker in the world.
quotes.author: Uri Geller

quotes.quote: If a job's worth doing, it's worth doing well.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To be successful, the first thing to do is fall in love with your work.
quotes.author: Mary Lauretta

quotes.quote: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Sometimes, you've got to work a little, so you can ball a lot.
quotes.author: Tom Haverford

quotes.quote: Whatever you decide to do, make sure it makes you happy.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: It's not what you achieve, it's what you overcome. That's what defines your career.
quotes.author: Carlton Fisk

quotes.quote: Find out what you like doing best and get someone to pay you for doing it.
quotes.author: Katherine Whitehorn

quotes.quote: The secret of joy in work is contained in one word Ã¢â¬â excellence. To know how to do something well is to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Work is love made visible. And if you cannot work with love but only with distaste, it is better that you should leave your work and sit at the gate of the temple and take alms of those who work with joy.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Work to become, not to acquire.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: You never stop earning when you do what you love.
quotes.author: Asha Tyson

quotes.quote: A career is wonderful, but you can't curl up with it on a cold night.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: People don't choose their careers; they are engulfed by them.
quotes.author: John Dos Passos

quotes.quote: You can only become truly accomplished at something you love. Don't make money your goal. Instead pursue the things you love doing and then do them so well that people can't take their eyes off of you.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: A career is born in public - talent in privacy.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A leader is not an administrator who loves to run others, but someone who carries water for his people so that they can get on with their jobs.
quotes.author: Robert Townsend

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Never continue in a job you don't enjoy. If you're happy in what you're doing, you'll like yourself, you'll have inner peace. And if you have that, along with physical health, you will have had more success than you could possibly have imagined.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: Real success is finding your lifework in the work that you love.
quotes.author: David McCullough

quotes.quote: Anyone can like their job. To love your job is not enough, you must give your passion to your job.
quotes.author: Zahi Hawass

quotes.quote: Love your Job, but never fall in love with your Company.
quotes.author: Narayana Murthy

quotes.quote: Sometimes your nearness takes my breath away and all the things I want to say can find no voice. Then in silence, I can only hope my eyes will speak my heart.
quotes.author: Robert Sexton

quotes.quote: Loving someone and having them love you back is the most precious thing in the world.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Love is always open arms. If you close your arms about love you will find that you are left holding only yourself.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: True love will triumph in the end â which may or may not be a lie, but if it is a lie, it's the most beautiful lie we have.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Life has turned into a beautiful garden ever since you entered into my life. You have changed my life and made me feel so good. I feel so loved and cared for. You are the best thing that happened to me.
quotes.author: Ruse San

quotes.quote: I seem to have loved you in numberless forms, numberless times, in life after life, in age after age forever.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: No matter how far you go, I will keep loving you because you are the best thing that has ever happened to me. I really love you!
quotes.author: Karl Jonas

quotes.quote: You pierce my soul. I am half agony, half hope. Tell me not that I am too late, that such precious feelings are gone for ever. I offer myself to you again with a heart even more your own, than when you almost broke it eight years and a half ago.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: There is no remedy for love but to love more.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The heart wants what it wants. There's no logic to these things. You meet someone and you fall in love and that's that.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: There is only one page left to write on. I will fill it with words of only one syllable. I love. I have loved. I will love.
quotes.author: Audrey Niffenegger

quotes.quote: I may search for another thousand years but still may not find someone as sweet and loving as you are.
quotes.author: Smokey Mack

quotes.quote: To live with you is to live. To live without you is to die.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: From the day you walked into my life, you're all I think about. You're the reason I breathe. You are the stars in my sky. I wouldn't want this any other way. You're the love of my life.
quotes.author: Kemis Khan quotes

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: To live is like to love - all reason is against it, and all healthy instinct for it.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
quotes.author: Angelita Lim

quotes.quote: The best thing you can do is fall in love. My life has been changed by falling in love.
quotes.author: Russell Brand

quotes.quote: True love is usually the most inconvenient kind.
quotes.author: Kiera Cass

quotes.quote: Being deeply, passionately, and intensely in love is being deeply, passionately, and intensely in life.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: To love someone is to see a miracle invisible to others.
quotes.author: Francois Mauriac

quotes.quote: Like the flowers that spread fragrance, your love brings romance in my ordinary life.
quotes.author: Cornell Lowe

quotes.quote: The most precious possession that ever comes to a man in this world is a woman's heart.
quotes.author: Josiah G. Holland

quotes.quote: I wanted to tell you that wherever I am, whatever happens, I'll always think of you, and the time we spent together, as my happiest time. I'd do it all over again, if I had the choice. No regrets.
quotes.author: Cynthia Hand

quotes.quote: The one thing we can never get enough of is love. And the one thing we never give enough is love.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: I swear I couldn't love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow.
quotes.author: Leo Christopher

quotes.quote: I think it a glorious thing to have the hope of living with you, because I love you.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: The best romance is inside marriage; the finest love stories come after the wedding, not before.
quotes.author: Irving Stone

quotes.quote: Life is one big love story with hundreds of little love stories within it.
quotes.author: Ram Charan

quotes.quote: No love story ends or begins out of accordance with how it needs to go.
quotes.author: Rebecca Serle

quotes.quote: A good love story always keeps the pot boiling.
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: A love story, at least a convincing one, requires three elements - the lover, the beloved, and the adventures they have together.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.quote: Where there is love there is life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: It's appropriate to have magic in a love story, because magic is a sort of metaphor for what love feels like? When we fall in love, the world feels magical to us. It becomes an enchanted place.
quotes.author: Theodora Goss

quotes.quote: The love that lasts longest is the love that is never returned.
quotes.author: William Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Don't waste your time searching and wishing. Grow and be ready...and you'll see God will give you a love story far better than you could ever dreamed of.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul; that makes us reach for more, that plants the fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds. Thatâs what I hope to give you forever.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Man's creative struggle, his search for wisdom and truth, is a love story.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, thatâs everything.
quotes.author: T. Tolis

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because the reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Some love stories aren't epic novels. Some are short stories, but that doesn't make them any less filled with love.
quotes.author: Sex and the City

quotes.quote: A love story is not about those who lost their heart but about those who find that sullen inhabitant who, when it is stumbled upon, means the body can fool no one, can fool nothingânot the wisdom of sleep or the habit of social graces. It is a consuming of oneself and the past.
quotes.author: Michael Ondaatje

quotes.quote: You always gain by giving love.
quotes.author: Reese Witherspoonâ

quotes.quote: Love recognizes no barriers.
quotes.author: Maya Angelouâ

quotes.quote: The decision to kiss for the first time is the most crucial one in any love story.
quotes.author: Emil Ludwig

quotes.quote: Success is like a liberation or the first phrase of a love story.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.quote: The weirdest love stories are always the best.
quotes.author: Margaret Mazzantini

quotes.quote: You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Love stories always seem to be a spark.
quotes.author: Alyson Richman

quotes.quote: Most love stories are nocturnal. That's what makes them so fascinating.
quotes.author: Raymond Federman

quotes.quote: If you find someone you love in your life, then hang on to that love.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: All love stories are the same.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The love story for me was the nature of the love and not the age of the lovers.
quotes.author: Kate Capshaw

quotes.quote: The one who loves you will make you weep.
quotes.author: Brandi Snyder

quotes.quote: When I fight with you, I'm really fighting for us..because If I didn't care, I wouldn't bother.
quotes.author: Carson Kolhoff

quotes.quote: Life sucks when love hurts. Life hurts when love sucks. So just remember this much. Love will suck the life right out of you!
quotes.author: B. B. K.

quotes.quote: I love being married. It's so great to find one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Love is a promise delivered already broken.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: Deceiving others. That is what the world calls a romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Love is deceitful and sublime. In its truest form, it brings out the best in all beings. At its worst, it's a tool used to manipulate and ruin anyone who is stupid enough to hold it.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: I love you and it's getting worse.
quotes.author: Joseph E. Morris

quotes.quote: Love is what makes two people sit in the middle of a bench when there is plenty of room at both ends.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: Love is only a dirty trick played on us to achieve continuation of the species.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: We just have to accept the fact that some people are going to stay in our hearts even if they don't stay in our lives.
quotes.author: Ronald Oliver

quotes.quote: Love is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell.
quotes.author: Joan Crawford

quotes.quote: We all dream about love, want to be in love, and have been hurt by love.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: So dear I love him, that with him all deaths I could endure, without him live no life.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: People should fall in love with their eyes closed. Just close your eyes. Don't look and it's magic.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: Love looks not with the eyes but with the mind. and therefore is winged Cupid painted blind.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Worst feeling in the world is when someone you love the most like the person you hate.
quotes.author: Janes

quotes.quote: Love is a grave mental disease.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Sometimes you're afraid to fall in love with a chick, but she sucks you in anyway.
quotes.author: Sammy Hagar

quotes.quote: Love sucks. Sometimes it feels good. Sometimes it's just another way to bleed.
quotes.author: Laurell K Hamilton

quotes.quote: My love life is like a piece of Swiss cheese. Most of it's missing, and what's there stinks.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: You call it madness, but I call it love.
quotes.author: Don Byas

quotes.quote: My love is expansive. Your love is expensive.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: First love is a kind of vaccination which saves man from catching the complaint the second time.
quotes.author: HonorÃ© de Balzac

quotes.quote: If loving someone is putting them in a straitjacket and kicking them down a flight of stairs, then yes, I have loved a few people.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: When one is in love, one always begins by deceiving one's self, and one always ends by deceiving others. That is what the world calls a romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Love is an ocean of emotions entirely surrounded by expenses.
quotes.author: Thomas Dewar

quotes.quote: Love is unknown. To open the heart in trust is unknown. They say love hurts. It doesn't have to.
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.quote: Love in action is a harsh and dreadful thing compared with love in dreams.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: Love is a trap. When it appears, we see only its light, not its shadows.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Whether you're tall or shorter, or a little bigger, more curves, skinny you just have to be proud of what you have, and everyone is beautiful.
quotes.author: Caroline Wozniacki

quotes.quote: Lighten up on yourself. No one is perfect. Gently accept your humanness.
quotes.author: Deborah Day

quotes.quote: Diets are the best way of confusing your metabolism for the rest of your life. Just be you & get on with it.
quotes.author: Emma Thompson

quotes.quote: Within my body are all the sacred places of the world, and the most profound pilgrimage I can ever make is within my own body.
quotes.author: Saraha

quotes.quote: Your body is a temple, but only if you treat it as one.
quotes.author: Astrid Alauda

quotes.quote: I accept my body. I accept how I am and make the best of what I am given.
quotes.author: Kate Winslet

quotes.quote: I finally realized that being grateful to my body was key to giving more love to myself.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Your body is your home. Treat it with love and respect.
quotes.author: Jasmin Terrany

quotes.quote: Being comfortable in your own skin is the spirit of rock and roll and, really, the spirit of cool.
quotes.author: A.D. Aliwat

quotes.quote: I feel like I've set the example for loving your body no matter what size it is, but I also can set the example for being healthy as well.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.quote: It's ok to love your body the way it is.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: A healthy body means a healthy mind. You get your heart rate up, and you get the blood flowing through your body to your brain. Look at Albert Einstein. He rode a bicycle. He was also an early student of Jazzercise. You never saw Einstein lift his shirt, but he had a six-pack under there.
quotes.author: Steve Carell

quotes.quote: Your body hears everything your mind says.
quotes.author: Naomi Judd

quotes.quote: No diet can substitute for the wisdom of your body.
quotes.author: Brooke Castillo

quotes.quote: The human body is the best work of art.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: You are imperfect, permanently and inevitably flawed. And you are beautiful.
quotes.author: Amy Bloom

quotes.quote: Love your body. Exercise for 10-15 minutes daily.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: I stand in awe of my body.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You have to stand up and say, There's nothing wrong with me or my shape or who I am; you're the one with the problem!
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.quote: To lose confidence in one's body is to lose confidence in oneself.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: To love yourself as you are is a miracle, and to see yourself is to have found yourself, for now. And now is all we have, and love is who we are.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: How I feel about myself is more important than how I look. Feeling confident, being comfortable in your skin that's what really makes you beautiful.
quotes.author: Bobbi Brown

quotes.quote: Your body is just a body. And just a body is already so very much.
quotes.author: Anne-Sophie Reinhardt

quotes.quote: To all girls with butts, boobs, hips and a waist, put on a bikini, put it on and stay strong.
quotes.author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quotes.quote: One day I had to sit down with myself and decide that I loved myself no matter what my body looked like and what other people thought about my body.
quotes.author: Gabourey Sidibe

quotes.quote: Each individual woman's body demands to be accepted on its own terms.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote:
The body must be nourished, physically, emotionally and spiritually.
We're spiritually starved in this culture not underfed but undernourished.
quotes.author: Carol Hornig

quotes.quote: My body is strong. My body can do amazing things. My body is my own.
quotes.author: Jessica Sanders

quotes.quote: When you hear your friends saying something negative about their bodies, gently remind them of the lessons you have learnt from this book. You can lift your friends up by listing all the things you love about their personalities or by celebrating the amazing things their bodies can do.
quotes.author: Jessica Sanders

quotes.quote: Lovesick, bitter and hardened heart. Aching, waiting for life to start.
quotes.author: Bil Keane

quotes.quote: It is only love that has already fallen sick that is killed by absence.
quotes.author: Diane de Poitiers

quotes.quote: When love fills your life all limitations are gone. The medicine this sick world needs so badly is love.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: Breaking up is like having the worst nightmare after having the best dream.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Tolerance is love sick with the sickness of haughtiness.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: A love-sick heart dies when the heart is whole, for all the heart's health is to be sick with love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa of Calcutta

quotes.quote: All fancy-sick she is and pale of cheer, with sighs of love, that costs the fresh blood dear.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Many men kill themselves for love, but many more women die of it.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Experience is how life catches up with us and teaches us to love and forgive each other.
quotes.author: Judy Collins

quotes.quote: No matter how lovesick a woman is, she shouldn't take the first pill that comes along!
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: A wolf is handsome in the eyes of a lovesick girl.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The pain of love is the pain of being alive. It is a perpetual wound.
quotes.author: Maureen Duffy

quotes.quote: The fact that the word lovesick exists, that the simple absence of a person can make you feel physically ill, says a great deal about the terrible power of the human heart.
quotes.author: Beau Taplin

quotes.quote: The lovesick, the betrayed, and the jealous all smell alike.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The sad truth is so many people are in love and not together and so many people are together and not in love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sometimes divulging your vulnerabilities without any kind of filter can make you more human, but then again, it can also provide material that can be used against you.
quotes.author: Tonya Hurley

quotes.quote: The folly of all follies is to be love sick for a shadow.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: All I ever wanted was to reach out and touch another human being not just with my hands but with my heart.
quotes.author: Tahereh Mafi

quotes.quote: Love sought is good, but given unsought, is better.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: This is what happened in love. One of you cried a lot and then both of you grew sarcastic.
quotes.author: Lorrie Moore

quotes.quote: If you enter this world knowing you are loved and you leave this world knowing the same, then everything that happens in between can be dealt with.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: I wished a companion to lie near me in the starlight, silent and not moving, but ever within touch. For there is a fellowship more quiet even than solitude, and which, rightly understood, is solitude made perfect.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Most relationships are troubled because of negative beliefs and decisions set up in the first seven years of life.
quotes.author: Gill Edwards

quotes.quote: Our relationships with others mirror our primary relationship with self and if we don't see ourselves as worthy of love, caring and attention, nor will those around us.
quotes.author: Gill Edwards

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter that you've broken your vow a thousand times, Still come, and yet again, come.
quotes.author: Coleman Barks

quotes.quote: Every time I thought I was being rejected from something good, I was actually being re-directed to something better.
quotes.author: Dr. Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Don't worry when you are not recognized, but strive to be worthy of recognition.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Appraisals are where you get together with your team leader and agree what an outstanding member of the team you are, how much your contribution has been valued, what massive potential you have and, in recognition of all this, would you mind having your salary halved.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Don't work for recognition, but do work worthy of recognition.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Unless there is recognition that women are most vulnerable... and you do something about social and cultural equality for women, you're never going to defeat this pandemic.
quotes.author: Stephen Lewis

quotes.quote: You don't have to be a big name to do big things. Shine does not require recognition.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: Don't do something for recognition. Do it out of kindness. Do it because out of giving, it will make you whole and complete.
quotes.author: Angie Karan Krezos

quotes.quote: There is no limit to the amount of good you can do if you don't care who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: For me, it's not about winning an award. It's also about not even being nominated
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: No matter how much one seeks recognition, they are still unrecognised.
quotes.author: Aditya Ajmera

quotes.quote: People need appreciation from more persons than they need love from one person.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: You have to give yourself credit, not too much because that would be bragging.
quotes.author: Frank McCourt

quotes.quote: A pat on the back is only a few vertebrae removed from a kick in the pants, but is miles ahead in results.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Recognition is the greatest motivator.
quotes.author: Gerard C. Eakedale

quotes.quote: It is up to us to give ourselves recognition. If we wait for it to come from others, we feel resentful when it doesn't, and when it does, we may well reject it.
quotes.author: Spencer Tracy

quotes.quote: Appreciation can make a day-even change a life. Your willingness to put it into words is all that is necessary.
quotes.author: Margaret Cousins

quotes.quote: Feeling appreciated is one of the most important needs that people have. When you share with someone your appreciation and gratitude, they will not forget you. Appreciation will return to you many times.
quotes.author: Steve Brunkhorst

quotes.quote: I will tell you King's First Law of Recognition: You never get it when you want it, and then when it comes, you get too much.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: There's nothing greater in the world than when somebody on the team does something good, and everybody gathers around to pat him on the back.
quotes.author: Billy Martin

quotes.quote: There are two things people want more than sex and money... recognition and praise.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: It's so ironic - when you finally achieve recognition, you hide behind dark glasses.
quotes.author: Madhuri Dixit

quotes.quote: Most painters want recognition, especially by their peers.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.quote: A brave man acknowledges the strength of others.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: It's amazing how much you can get done if you don't worry about who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Dallin H. Oaks

quotes.quote: Empowerment comes from self-realization and recognition of our internal gifts, which we already have in abundance.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Recognition without money will not get you recognised.
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: True happiness that stands the taste of time comes by recognizing and appreciating what we do possess.
quotes.author: Ogwo David Emenike

quotes.quote: There's a big difference between grabbing attention and rewarding attention.
quotes.author: Darby Bannard

quotes.quote: I realized I was never going to be a nationally recognized painter but that I could set the goal of being a successful regional painter.
quotes.author: Linda Blondheim

quotes.quote: Recognition of function always precedes recognition of being.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: The most painful thing is losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much, and forgetting that you are special too.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: When you love someone you know that with every heartbeat they sink deeper into your heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Loving someone is a full time commitment. Use that time wisely. Cherish the high points and fight hard to conquer the challenges. No one said love would be easy, but it is dam sure worth it.
quotes.author: Carlos Wallace

quotes.quote: Loving someone meant letting them be who they were, not caging them.
quotes.author: Melissa Marr

quotes.quote: Loving someone can be hard at times. You risk a lot when you love - your heart and soul, at the least. Love is the most important and most rewarding investment you can make in another person.
quotes.author: J.E.B. Spredemann

quotes.quote: The thing about loving someone is that you have to love them the way they need to be loved and not the way you want to love them.
quotes.author: Karrine Steffans

quotes.quote: You don't love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I am coming to terms with the fact that loving someone requires a leap of faith, and that a soft landing is never guaranteed.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Loving someone who doesn't love you is like waiting for a ship at the airport.
quotes.author: Zayn Malik

quotes.quote: When you truly love someone it means your love is unconditional. It means taking the good and the bad, loving them for the person they are, and not trying to change them into the person you want them to be.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you love someone put their name in a circle, not a heart, because hearts can be broken but circles go on forever.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You never stop loving someone. You just learn to live without them.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: It hurts to love someone and not be loved in return, but what is the most painful is to love someone and never find the courage to let the person know how you feel.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You don't stop loving someone just because you hate them.
quotes.author: Hanif Kureishi

quotes.quote: Unless you love someone, nothing else makes any sense.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: Loving someone is setting them free, letting them go.
quotes.author: Kate Winslet

quotes.quote: When you faithfully love someone with all your heart and give it your all without getting anything in return. Good things will come for you and true love will find you.
quotes.author: Diana Vim

quotes.quote: When you love someone all your saved up wishes start coming out.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: As the old saying goes, 'sometimes loving someone means letting them go.'
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.quote: Loving someone and having them love you back is the most precious thing in the world.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Loving someone who doesn't love you back is like hugging a cactus. The tighter you hold on, the more it hurts.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If we are serious about loving someone, we have to surrender all the desires within us to manipulate the relationship.
quotes.author: Rob Bell

quotes.quote: Anyone can say they love someone....It's loving someone enough to let them go that will prove that love.
quotes.author: Jessica Jung

quotes.quote: To love someone is to understand each other, laugh together, smile with your heart and trust one another.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Loving someone never gives you the right to control them. You can't force them to love you the way you want.
quotes.author: Neena Gupta

quotes.quote: When you truly love someone, you don't judge them by their past. You leave it there. Just be happy that their future belongs to you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: In a nutshell, loving someone is about giving, not receiving.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: If you have to think about whether you love someone or not then the answer is no. When you love someone you just know.If you have to think about whether you love someone or not then the answer is no. When you love someone you just know.
quotes.author: Janice Markowitz

quotes.quote: To love someone is to see a miracle invisible to others.
quotes.author: Francois Mauriac

quotes.quote: I have been loving you a little more every minute since this morning.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Do not save your loving speeches for your friends till they are dead. Do not write them on their tombstones, speak them rather now instead.
quotes.author: Anna Cummins

quotes.quote: I must confess, as the experience of my own soul, that the expectation of loving my friends in heaven principally kindles my love to them while on earth.
quotes.author: Richard Baxter

quotes.quote: The most I can do for my friend is simply to be his friend. I have no wealth to bestow on him. If he knows that I am happy in loving him, he will want no other reward. Is not friendship divine in this?
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Surely great loving-kindness yet may go With a little gift: all's dear that comes from friends.
quotes.author: Theocritus

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: To love for the sake of being loved is human, but to love for the sake of loving is angelic.
quotes.author: Alphonse De Lamartine

quotes.quote: Even if loving meant leaving, or solitude, or sorrow, love was worth every penny of its price.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Do you have to have a reason for loving?
quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

quotes.quote: Loving someone can be hard at times. You risk a lot when you love - your heart and soul, at the least. Love is the most important and most rewarding investment you can make in another person.
quotes.author: J.E.B. Spredemann

quotes.quote: It is an absolute human certainty that no one can know his own beauty or perceive a sense of his own worth until it has been reflected back to him in the mirror of another loving, caring human being.
quotes.author: John Joseph Powell

quotes.quote: The degree of loving is measured by the degree of giving.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: There is no limit to the power of loving.
quotes.author: John Morton

quotes.quote: Loving is not just looking at each other, it's looking in the same direction.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-ExupÃ©ry

quotes.quote: It is by loving and by being loved that one can come nearest to the soul of another.
quotes.author: George Mcdonald

quotes.quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Trust no friend without faults, and love a maiden, but no angel.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: A friend is one who knows you and loves you just the same.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Greater love has no one than this, than to lay down one's life for his friends.
quotes.author: John the Apostle

quotes.quote: Sooner or later you've heard all your best friends have to say. Then comes the tolerance of real love.
quotes.author: Ned Rorem

quotes.quote: It is one of the severest tests of friendship to tell your friend his faults. So to love a man that you cannot bear to see a stain upon him, and to speak painful truth through loving words, that is friendship.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: would consider him definitely one of my very best friends and I know he feels the same about me. We have a lot of love and respect.
quotes.author: Anthony Kiedis

quotes.quote: The more we love our friends, the less we flatter them; it is by excusing nothing that pure love shows itself.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: Consult your friend on all things, especially on those which respect yourself. His counsel may then be useful where your own self-love might impair your judgment.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Get not your friends by bare compliments, but by giving them sensible tokens of your love.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: When your love contracts in anger, the atmosphere itself feels threatening. But when you're expansive, no matter what the weather, you're in an open, windy field with friends.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Love your friends as if they would some day hate you.
quotes.author: R. D. Hicks

quotes.quote: Nobody who is afraid of laughing, and heartily too, at his friend, can be said to have a true and thorough love for him.
quotes.author: Julius Charles Hare

quotes.quote: Love yourself. It is important to stay positive because beauty comes from the inside out.
quotes.author: Jenn Proske

quotes.quote: Love yourself instead of abusing yourself.
quotes.author: Karolina Kurkova

quotes.quote: Even when it seems that there is no one else, always remember there's one person who never ceased to love you - yourself.
quotes.author: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.quote: I am perfect, I love and accept myself as I am.
quotes.author: Avis Williams

quotes.quote: Loving yourself doesn't make you selfish. When done correctly, the exact opposite occurs, because you know that selfish behaviors are negative for your mind, body and spirit.
quotes.author: Donald L. Hicks

quotes.quote: Don't ignore the love you DO have in your life by focusing on the love you DON'T.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Be a bit of a challenge; not because you're playing games but because you realize you're worth the extra effort.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a life-long romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If you aren't good at loving yourself, you will have a difficult time loving anyone, since you'll resent the time and energy you give another person that you aren't even giving to yourself.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: When I loved myself enough, I began leaving whatever wasn't healthy. This meant people, jobs, my own beliefs and habits anything that kept me small. My judgement called it disloyal. Now I see it as self-loving.
quotes.author: Kim McMillen

quotes.quote: Whatever you are doing, love yourself for doing it. Whatever you are feeling, love yourself for feeling it.
quotes.author: Thaddeus Golas

quotes.quote: A man who loves himself takes the first step towards real love.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Loving yourself means accepting your weaknesses as parts of yourself you are still working to improve and celebrating your strengths. Do that for those around you, and you'll find that life is filled with joy.
quotes.author: Yee Shun-Jian

quotes.quote: I Am In Love With Myself, With My Heart.
quotes.author: Nirav Sanchaniya

quotes.quote: I love myself for I am a beloved child of the universe and the universe lovingly takes care of me now...Love is the great miraclecure. Loving ourselves works miracles in our lives.
quotes.author: Louise L. Hay.

quotes.quote: You're always with yourself, so you might as well enjoy the company.
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: Love yourself or no one else will.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You've got to love yourself first. You've got to be okay on your own before you can be okay with somebody else.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.quote: If you don't love yourself, you cannot love others. You will not be able to love others. If you have no compassion for yourself then you are not able of developing compassion for others.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Loving yourself does not mean being self-absorbed or narcissistic, or disregarding others. Rather it means welcoming yourself as the most honored guest in your own heart, a guest worthy of respect, a lovable companion.
quotes.author: Margo Anand

quotes.quote: Turns out that loving yourself is the greatest way to improve yourself, and as you improve yourself, your improve your world.
quotes.author: Joe Vitale

quotes.quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: It's not selfish to love yourself, take care of yourself, and to make your happiness a priority. It's necessary.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: People like me great. People don't like me great. As long as I like myself that all that matters.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The more you like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Love brings you face to face with yourself. It`s impossible to love others if you don't love yourself.
quotes.author: John Pierrkos

quotes.quote: Lend yourself to others, but give yourself to yourself.
quotes.author: Montaigne

quotes.quote: Self love does not lessen our ability to love others; it increases it. The more love we have within the more love we have to give out.
quotes.author: Randi G. Fine

quotes.quote: Fill your own well with love so that others may drink from it.
quotes.author: Randi G. Fine
