quotes.quote: Low self-esteem is like driving through life with your hand-brake on.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.quote: Esteem cannot be where there is no confidence, and there can be no confidence where there is no respect.
quotes.author: Henry Giles

quotes.quote: Insecure people only eclipse your sun because they're jealous of your daylight and tired of their dark, starless nights.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Low self-esteem is no better home to take a refuge. It does not keep you comforted from any danger; it keeps you confined away from your real belongings!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Sometimes people with low self-esteem will try to punish you for caring about them.
quotes.author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quotes.quote: Most people with low self-esteem have earned it.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: I think high self-esteem is overrated. A little low self-esteem is actually quite good. Maybe you're not the best, so you should work a little harder.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: Lack of confidence is what makes you want to change somebody else's mind. When you're OK, you don't need to convince anyone else in order to empower yourself.
quotes.author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quotes.quote: It's not the lack of ability or opportunity that holds you back; it is only a lack of confidence in yourself.
quotes.author: Richard Monckton Milnes

quotes.quote: Many of us harbor hidden low self-esteem. We deem everything and everyone more important that ourselves and think that meeting their needs is more important than meeting our own. But if you run out of gas, everyone riding with you will be left stranded.
quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

quotes.quote: When you are in the grips of low self-esteem, it's painful, and it certainly doesn't feel like pride. But I believe that this is the dark, quieter side of pride thwarted pride.
quotes.author: Edward T Welch

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as perfect security, only varying levels of insecurity.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: Most bad behaviour comes from insecurity.
quotes.author: Debra Winger

quotes.quote: It's insecurity that is always chasing you and standing in the way of your dreams.
quotes.author: Vin Diesel

quotes.quote: Each one of us requires the spur of insecurity to force us to do our best.
quotes.author: Harold W. Dodds

quotes.quote: Of all the traps and pitfalls in life, self-disesteem is the deadliest, and the hardest to overcome, for it is a pit designed and dug by our own hands, summed up in the phrase, "It's no use - I can't do it.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: Diffidence is a sort of false modesty.
quotes.author: Thackeray

quotes.quote: Diffidence is not always innocence
quotes.author: Mme. Necker

quotes.quote: Mere bashfulness without merit is awkward.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Bashfulness is an ornament to youth, but a reproach to old age.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Bashfulness is a great hindrance to a man, both in uttering his sentiments and in understanding what is proposed to him; 't is therefore good to press forward with discretion, both in discourse and company of the better sort.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Bashfulness may sometimes exclude pleasure, but seldom opens any avenue to sorrow or remorse.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: When I was small, my most serious handicap was a painful bashfulness in the presence of strangers.
quotes.author: George Mcgovern

quotes.quote: Shyness has a strange element of narcissism, a belief that how we look, how we perform, is truly important to other people.
quotes.author: Andre Dubus III

quotes.quote: The level of shyness has gone up dramatically in the last decade. I think shyness is an index of social pathology rather than a pathology of the individual.
quotes.author: Philip Zimbardo

quotes.quote: Shyness is just egoism out of its depth.
quotes.author: Penelope Keith

quotes.quote: There is a shyness about me, and I really need to get out more.
quotes.author: Priscilla Presley

quotes.quote: The way you overcome shyness is to become so wrapped up in something that you forget to be afraid.
quotes.author: Claudia Lady Bird Johnson

quotes.quote: You know what my greatest personal stumbling block is? My shyness.
quotes.author: Susan Lucci

quotes.quote: Loyalty is not just a matter of reciprocation. Loyalty is a matter of personal character.
quotes.author: Drishti Bablani

quotes.quote: Loyalty is just the wheels on the bus meaning that it keeps things moving but it's neutral when it comes to the direction they move in.
quotes.author: M.R. Carey

quotes.quote: Loyalty is the highest virtue taught by abusers, and used as a control tool.
quotes.author: Dr. Bill Tollefson

quotes.quote: Loyalty is something you give regardless of what you get back, and in giving loyalty, you're getting more loyalty; and out of loyalty flow other great qualities.
quotes.author: Charles Jones

quotes.quote: Loyalty is a characteristic trait. Those who have it, give it free of charge.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: The strength of a family, like the strength of an army, is in its loyalty to each other.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: Loyalty is the pledge of truth to oneself and others.
quotes.author: Ada Velez-Boardley

quotes.quote: Loyalty to the true, core values and roots of democracy is what makes a true patriot, not loyalty to a symbol of the country.
quotes.author: Cindy Sheehan

quotes.quote: Loyalty is a characteristic trait. Those who has it, gives it free of charge.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: Loyalty is what makes us trust. Trust is what makes us stay. Staying is what makes us love, and love is what gives us hope.
quotes.author: Glenn van Dekken

quotes.quote: Honesty and loyalty are key. If two people can be honest with each other about everything, that's probably the biggest key to success.
quotes.author: Taylor Lautner

quotes.quote: Loyalty of the law-making power to the executive power was one of the dangers the political fathers foretold.
quotes.author: Garet Garrett

quotes.quote: You give loyalty, you'll get it back. You give love, you'll get it back.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: Be loyal to those who are loyal to you. And respect everyone, even your enemies and competition.
quotes.author: John Cena

quotes.quote: When people show loyalty to you, you take care of those who are with you. It's how it goes with everything. If you have a small circle of friends, and one of those friends doesn't stay loyal to you, they don't stay your friend for very long.
quotes.author: John Cena

quotes.quote: Loyalty to an unjust cause is a perversion of honor.
quotes.author: Brian Herbert

quotes.quote: The person who renders loyal service in a humble capacity will be chosen for higher responsibilities, just as the biblical servant who multiplied the one pound given him by his master was made ruler over ten cities.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.quote: Total loyalty is possible only when fidelity is emptied of all concrete content, from which changes of mind might naturally arise.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Loyalty is a measure of who can be counted upon to act in our interest. Disloyalty is an act against us. Loyalty is vital to a herding creature
quotes.author: Martin Fritz

quotes.quote: Loyalty is a virtue if it is directed at something greater than self-interest or group interest.
quotes.author: Thomas Freeman

quotes.quote: Loyalty may be extended to a personality or to the position. To which we value speaks volumes about original intent. Be mindful.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: Loyalty to petrified opinion never yet broke a chain or freed a human soul.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Loyalty is the strongest glue which makes a relationship last for a life time.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: Loyalty is a fine quality, but in excess it fills political graveyards.
quotes.author: Neil Kinnock

quotes.quote: Loyalty to the country always. Loyalty to the government when it deserves it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Loyalty starts with a demonstration of respect and gratitude.
quotes.author: Chip Bell

quotes.quote: Loyalty means nothing unless it has at its heart the absolute principle of self-sacrifice.
quotes.author: Woodrow T. Wilson

quotes.quote: Total loyalty is possible only when fidelity is emptied of all concrete content, from which changes of mind might naturally arise.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Loyalty is still the same, whether it win or lose the game; true as a dial to the sun, although it be not shined upon.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Loyalty means giving me your honest opinion, whether you think I'll like it or not. Disagreement, at this state, stimulates me. But once a decision is made, the debate ends. From that point on, loyalty means executing the decision as if it were your own.
quotes.author: General Colin Powell

quotes.quote: If put to the pinch, an ounce of loyalty is worth a pound of cleverness.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Loyalty isn't grey. It's black and white. You're either loyal completely, or not loyal at all.
quotes.author: Sharnay

quotes.quote: Loyalty cannot be blueprinted. It cannot be produced on an assembly line. In fact, it cannot be manufactured at all, for its origin is the human heart-the center of self-respect and human dignity. It is a force which leaps into being only when conditions are exactly right for it-and it is a force very sensitive to betrayal.
quotes.author: Maurice R. Franks

quotes.quote: You cannot buy loyalty; you cannot buy the devotion of hearts, minds, and souls. You have to earn these things.
quotes.author: Clarence Francis

quotes.quote: The only people I owe my loyalty to are those who never made me question theirs.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If loyalty is, and always has been, perceived as obsolete, why do we continue to praise it? Because loyalty is essential to the most basic things that make life livable. Without loyalty there can be no love. Without loyalty there can be no family. Without loyalty there can be no friendship. Without loyalty there can be no commitment to community or country. And without those things, there can be no society.
quotes.author: Eric Felten

quotes.quote: Don't let your loyalty become slavery. If they don't appreciate what you bring to the table, let them eat alone.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Our modern, rootless times do seem to be a particularly inhospitable environment for loyalty. We come and go so relentlessly that our friendships can't but come and go too. What sort of loyalty is there in the age of Facebook, when friendship is a costless transaction, a business of flip reciprocity.... Friendship held together by nothing more permanent than hyperlinks is hardly the stuff of selfless fidelity.
quotes.author: Eric Felten

quotes.quote: Loyalty to a petrified opinion never yet broke a chain or freed a human soul.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The highest spiritual quality, the noblest property of mind a man can have, is this of loyalty ... a man with no loyalty in him, with no sense of love or reverence or devotion due to something outside and above his poor daily life, with its pains and pleasures, profits and losses, is as evil a case as man can be.
quotes.author: Algernon Charles Swinburne

quotes.quote: I'll take fifty percent efficiency to get one hundred percent loyalty.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: Loyalty is a fine quality, but in excess it fills political graveyards.
quotes.author: Neil Kinnock

quotes.quote: Loyalty to the country always. Loyalty to the government when it deserves it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Unlike the puerile loyalty to a conviction, loyalty to a friend is a virtue â perhaps the only virtue, the last remaining one.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: Loyalty to an unjust cause is a perversion of honor.
quotes.author: Brian Herbert & Kevin J. Anderson

quotes.quote: Loyalty publicly results in leverage privately.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: Loyal companions are an unequaled grace, stanching fear before it bleeds you numb, a reliable antidote for creeping despair.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Loyalty and friendship, which is to me the same, created all the wealth that I've ever thought I'd have.
quotes.author: Ernie Banks

quotes.quote: Loyalty is a characteristic trait. Those who have it, give it free of charge.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: Loyalty to the family must be merged into loyalty to the community, loyalty to the community into loyalty to the nation, and loyalty to the nation into loyalty to mankind. The citizen of the future must be a citizen of the world.
quotes.author: Thomas Cochrane

quotes.quote: Those who don't know the value of loyalty can never appreciate the cost of betrayal.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Confidentiality is a virtue of the loyal, as loyalty is the virtue of faithfulness.
quotes.author: Cheryl Cole

quotes.quote: Within the hearts of men, loyalty and consideration are esteemed greater than success.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: An intelligent and conscientious opposition is a part of loyalty to country.
quotes.author: Bainbridge Colby

quotes.quote: Loyalty is what makes us trust, Trust is what makes us stay, Staying is what makes us love, and love is what gives us hope.
quotes.author: Glenn van Dekken

quotes.quote: No more important duty can be urged upon those who are entering the great theater of life than simple loyalty to their best convictions.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbell Chapin

quotes.quote: Hereâs the thing about luck. You donât know if itâs good or bad until you have some perspective.
quotes.author: Alice Hoffman

quotes.quote: Learn to recognize good luck when itâs waving at you, hoping to get your attention.
quotes.author: Sally Koslow

quotes.quote: Luck is a goddess not to be coerced and forcibly wooed by those who seek her favors.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: Luck is what we make it, not what is thrust upon us. Youâve shown initiative and it has nothing to do with luck.
quotes.author: George Bellairs

quotes.quote: Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get.
quotes.author: Ray Kroc

quotes.quote: Luck is great, but most of life is hard work.
quotes.author: Iain Duncan Smith

quotes.quote: The only good luck many great men ever had was being born with the ability and determination to overcome bad luck.
quotes.author: Channing Pollock

quotes.quote: Iâve always believed in luck. I love the fact that people can change their lives instantly.
quotes.author: Fiona Barton

quotes.quote: You donât get lucky while sitting in the sofa with arms crossed doing nothing. You can be lucky only when you are prepared.
quotes.author: Nesta Jojoe Erskine

quotes.quote: Good luck is when opportunity meets preparation, while bad luck is when lack of preparation meets reality.
quotes.author: Eliyahu Goldratt

quotes.quote: Iâve found that what most people call luck is often little more than raw talent combined with the ability to make the most of opportunities.
quotes.author: Timothy Zahn

quotes.quote: Being deeply learned and skilled, being well trained and using well-spoken words: this is good luck.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The universe works in crazy ways. Your good luck will come in waves, and so does your bad, so you have to take the good with the bad and press forward.
quotes.author: Nick Cummins

quotes.quote: You know, in life there are only three or four fundamental decisions to make. The rest is just luck.
quotes.author: Raymond Aubrac

quotes.quote: With luck, you have other things to do than wait for lightning to strike.
quotes.author: Paul Lauterbur

quotes.quote: Luck is merely an illusion, trusted by the ignorant and chased by the foolish.
quotes.author: Timothy Zahn

quotes.quote: You can't just trust to luck; you have to really listen to what that character is telling you.
quotes.author: Estelle Parsons

quotes.quote: Luck is the by-product of busting your fanny.
quotes.author: Don Sutton

quotes.quote: Luck when your burst of energy doesn't run afoul of someone else's.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Go and wake up your luck.
quotes.author: Persian Saying

quotes.quote: Those who have succeeded at anything and don't mention luck are kidding themselves.
quotes.author: Larry King

quotes.quote: Luck never made a man wise.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: I am great believer in luck. The harder work I work, the more of it I seem to have.
quotes.author: Coleman Cox

quotes.quote: I believe in luck: how else can you explain the success of those you dislike?
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: The thing about luck is that it's like a fever. You can take fever meds and lie in bed and drink chicken broth and sleep seventeen hours in a row, but basically your fever will break when it wants to break.
quotes.author: Cynthia Kadohata

quotes.quote: Luck is not only having the best hand dealt to you but having someone to raise.
quotes.author: Joseph Julius Bonkowski

quotes.quote: Luck will occasionally blow some wind into wings that were not made to properly support flight.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: Hereâs luck!â while waitinâ for the luck that never comes.
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: We all have bad luck some times, but it mends.
quotes.author: Clarence Michael

quotes.quote: So Good-Luck came, and on my roof did light, like noiseless snow, or as the dew of night.
quotes.author: Robert Herrick

quotes.quote: Neither sleet nor rain nor a half inch of snow will compel me to dress like a lumberjack.
quotes.author: Gayle Forman

quotes.quote: A lumberjack! Leaping from tree to tree.
quotes.author: Monty Python

quotes.quote: I'm a lumberjack and I'm OK I sleep all night and I work all day.
quotes.author: Monty Python

quotes.quote: Will you tell me somethin', Mr. Lumberjack. Is it one for forward and three for back?
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: Lumberjack chopping up the beat just swinging low.
quotes.author: Prime Minister Pete Nice

quotes.quote: I gave that notion up the day a lumberjack came in and it wasn't to pray.
quotes.author: The Kingston Trio

quotes.quote: Will you tell me somethin' Mr Lumberjack is it one for forward and three for back.
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.quote: I was your lumberjack but I can't stomach this I'm leavin' you, I'm not comin' back.
quotes.author: Jamie N Commons

quotes.quote: They be swinging on a trapper like a lumberjack.
quotes.author: T.I.

quotes.quote: You have many contacts among the lumberjacks.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote:
"Will you tell me somethin', Mr. Lumberjack
Is it one for forward and three for back?"
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote:
"The lumberjacks with their bloody axes
Are on their knees"
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote:
"Can't let go of her lumberjack
Got his name tattooed across her back"
quotes.author: Deana Carter

quotes.quote: Your girl take the wood lumberjack.
quotes.author: Stormzy

quotes.quote: A lumberjack with the travelling blues
quotes.author: Mark Knopfler

quotes.quote:
"Lumberjack the fifth wonder
I never slumber 'cause I keep it on the under"
quotes.author: Boy Wonder

quotes.quote: That's romantic and profound but now we're like lumberjacks holding the axes that brung it down.
quotes.author: Lupe Fiasco

quotes.quote: You're not a lumberjack trying to hack down a tree. You're a dancer, and the sword is an extension of your arm. Move with the blade and keep your eyes on your enemy's upper body, not their weapon.
quotes.author: Julie Kagawa

quotes.quote: Sometimes the Nonman would climb upon some wild pulpit, the mossed remains of a fallen tree, the humped back of a boulder, and paint wonders with his dark voice. Wonders and horrors both.
quotes.author: R. Scott Bakker

quotes.quote: The quiet rhythmic monotone of the wall of logs fills one with the rustic peace of a secluded nook in the woods.
quotes.author: Gustav Stickley

quotes.quote: The logs of wood which move down the river together Are driven apart by every wave. Such inevitable parting should not be the cause of misery.
quotes.author: Siddha Nagarjuna

quotes.quote: Once upon a time there was a piece of wood. It was not an expensive piece of wood. Far from it. Just a common block of firewood, one of those thick, solid logs that are put on the fire in winter to make cold rooms cozy and warm.
quotes.author: Carlo Collodi

quotes.quote: When sudden deforestation and depopulation occur together, that's how you know a time-traveling lumberjack has crossed paths with his family tree.
quotes.author: Bauvard

quotes.quote: Chop your own wood and it will warm you twice.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: If I had four hours to chop down a tree, I'd spend the first two hours sharpening the axe
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The lunatic's visions of horror are all drawn from the material of daily fact.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: The lunatic is the man who lives in a small world but thinks it is a large one; he is the man who lives in a tenth of the truth, and thinks it is the whole. The madman cannot conceive any cosmos outside a certain tale or conspiracy or vision.
quotes.author: Gilbert K Chesterton

quotes.quote: Over intellect will make you a genius, over emotions will make you a lunatic.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Lunatics are writers whose works write them.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: Perhaps a lunatic was simply a minority of one.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Only a lunatic would think that art is superior to nature.
quotes.author: Gao Xingjian

quotes.quote: All that makes a lunatic are very ordinary ideas of mankind shut up very tight inside a man's head.
quotes.author: Diane Arbus

quotes.quote: Every broken lunatic needed a theme song.
quotes.author: Scott Nicholson

quotes.quote: Embrace your inner lunatic. Fun times guaranteed.
quotes.author: Derek Landy

quotes.quote: A sure sign of a lunatic is that sooner or later, he brings up the Templars.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: If a lunatic scribbles a jumble of mathematical symbols it does not follow that the writing means anything merely because to the inexpert eye it is indistinguishable from higher mathematics.
quotes.author: Eric Temple Bell

quotes.quote: I know of men who believe in themselves more colossally than Napoleon or Caesar. I know where flames the fixed star of certainty and success. I can guide you to the thrones of the Super-men. The men who really believe in themselves are all in lunatic asylums.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The world is becoming like a lunatic asylum run by the lunatics.
quotes.author: David Lloyd George

quotes.quote: My Minister's room is like a padded cell, and in certain ways I am like a person who is suddenly certified a lunatic and put safely into this great, vast room, cut off from real life and surrounded by male and female trained nurses and attendants. When I am in a good mood they occasionally allow an ordinary human being to come and visit me; but they make sure that I behave right, and that the other person behaves right; and they know how to handle me. Of course, they don't behave quite like nurses because the Civil Service is profoundly deferential-'Yes, Minister! No, Minister! If you wish it, Minister!'
quotes.author: Richard Crossman

quotes.quote: I guess the definition of a lunatic is a man surrounded by them.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: The lunatic, the lover, the poet, / Are of imagination all compact.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: My father had a profound influence on me, he was a lunatic.
quotes.author: Spike Milligan

quotes.quote: A child is a curly, dimpled lunatic.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Those comfortably padded lunatic asylums which are known, euphemistically, as the stately homes of England.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: The difference between a humanist and a lunatic is in fact one of degree.
quotes.author: Arnold Toynbee

quotes.quote: What can you do, thought Winston, against the lunatic who is more intelligent than yourself; who gives your arguments a fair hearing and simply persists in his lunacy?
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: You may be right, / I may be crazy, / But it just may be a lunatic / you're looking for.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: A man can no more diminish God's glory by refusing to worship Him than a lunatic can put out the sun scribbling the word 'darkness' on the walls of his cell.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: When a well-packaged web of lies has been sold gradually to the masses over generations, the truth will seem utterly preposterous and its speaker a raving lunatic.
quotes.author: Donald James

quotes.quote: The place where optimism most flourishes is the lunatic asylum.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.quote: A casual stroll through the lunatic asylum shows that faith does not prove anything.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The world is full of lunatics who think the world is full of lunatics.
quotes.author: SebastiAn

quotes.quote: Life has a gap in it. It just does. You don't go crazy trying to fill it like some lunatic.
quotes.author: Geraldine

quotes.quote: Take a trip inside / To my precious lunatic asylum / Welcome, enter the house of hell / My precious lunatic asylum / You can get anything you need / At the the precious lunatic asylum / Hang on as we take the ride / Into the precious lunatic asylum / Prepare to descend / Into my precious lunatic asylum / The ultimate insanity awaits below / In my precious lunatic asylum / Look at all the tortured souls / In the precious lunatic asylum / Here we are so let the fun begin / In my precious lunatic asylum / Gone, your mind is gone / It now belongs to me / Your mind is gone / I am insanity.
quotes.author: Waters Comeau

quotes.quote: Naked lunchâ a frozen moment when everyone sees what is on the end of every fork.
quotes.author: John Bartlett

quotes.quote: Eat breakfast like a king, lunch like a prince, and dinner like a pauper.
quotes.author: Adella Davis

quotes.quote: Nearly everyone wants at least one outstanding meal a day.
quotes.author: Duncan Hines

quotes.quote: We should look for someone to eat and drink with before looking for something to eat and drink, for dining alone is leading the life of a lion or wolf.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: Breakfasts and lunches are the meals that get rushed or even forgotten during the week, even though they have such an impact on our energy levels and mood during the dayâ not to mention our waistlines.
quotes.author: Lacey Baier

quotes.quote: The lunch break helps you stay focused and energized throughout the day by recharging both your body and your mind. When you plan your lunch you have the opportunity to be healthy and nutritious, but you can also be creative with your lunchtime options and activities so that you will look forward to and make time for lunch.
quotes.author: Miriam Jacobs

quotes.quote: Lunches don't get free just because you don't see the prices on the menu. And economists don't get popular by reminding people of that.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: At lunch you order steamed vegetables because you're remembering that you have a heart too. You feel humbled by your heart, it works so hard. You want to thank it. You give your heart a little patt.
quotes.author: Aimee Bender

quotes.quote: Time is an illusion, lunchtime doubly so.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: To lunch with the important that should be the daily goal of those for whom life is not a playground but a ladder.
quotes.author: Rose Macaulay

quotes.quote: Lunch is the best time of day to eat in Paris. Then you get to go walk it off afterwards.
quotes.author: Rosecrans Baldwin

quotes.quote: The free lunch is the essence of modern liberalism.
quotes.author: Charles Krauthammer

quotes.quote: The penny lunch has spread faster than the measles. There seems no immunity for it. Everybody is taking it.
quotes.author: J.M. Withrow

quotes.quote: Lunches were something to be 'survived' rather than enjoyed.
quotes.author: Andrew R. Ruis

quotes.quote: Lunchtime is more than an academic break for youngstersâ it's a time to refresh the calories needed to concentrate and focus for the afternoon ahead.
quotes.author: Kidbizo Team

quotes.quote: Lunchtime is also a time to socialize. Chances are at that play, not eating, is the priority at lunchtime.
quotes.author: Kidbizo Team

quotes.quote: Working couples spend an enormous amount of money eating out, not so much for pleasure and entertainment as just to avoid the chore of cooking.
quotes.author: Stephanie H. Dahl

quotes.quote: When I was younger, I made it a rule never to take strong drink before lunch. It is now my rule never to do so before breakfast.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Sunday lunches in the spring are particularly pleasurable because my parents live in the country, and all of us kids live in the city with our children.
quotes.author: Edward Giobbi

quotes.quote: Add up what you spend on lunches in a year. You may be in for a shock!
quotes.author: Madonna Gauding

quotes.quote: School lunch managers face many problems. They have limited budgets and must constantly stretch their resources to provide nonprofit, nutritious lunches at low cost.
quotes.author: United States Department of Agriculture

quotes.quote: Everyone makes sure that no child goes hungry because he can't afford to pay for his lunch.
quotes.author: United States Department of Agriculture

quotes.quote: School lunches contribute significantly to a child's physical and mental development.
quotes.author: United States Department of Agriculture

quotes.quote: Someone can influence all the children in schools that have good lunches to realize they need to eat those lunches for their own health and happiness.
quotes.author: United States Department of Agriculture

quotes.quote: But the calorie limits on school lunches upset some people. Parents, lawmakers, and students were used to larger portions. Some students found the new lunches left them hungry just an hour or two after lunch.
quotes.author: Amanda Lanser

quotes.quote: Simple cookies may be served to increase the food value of the lighter lunches, and they also add interesting variety of texture and flavor.
quotes.author: Clara Rowena Schmidt Carpenter

quotes.quote: Another safeguard is to plan lunches far enough ahead to make sure that the main dishes of any given week are sufficiently varied to include, all told, all the kinds of food essential for good nutrition.
quotes.author: Clara Rowena Schmidt Carpenter

quotes.quote: For many of us, Sunday lunch is the most important meal of the week as we get to catch up with friends and family over a lovingly prepared meal.
quotes.author: Cassie Best

quotes.quote: Lunch money is for one purpose onlyâ namely for buying lunchâ and should not be confused with the allowance, which the child can spend as he/she wishes.
quotes.author: Bernice Bronia Grunwald

quotes.quote: The lurking suspicion that something could be simplified is the world's richest source of rewarding challenges.
quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

quotes.quote: The suspicious mind believes more than it doubts. It believes in a formidable and ineradicable evil lurking in every person.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Once you get over the first hill, there is always a new, higher one lurking, of course.
quotes.author: Esa-Pekka Salonen

quotes.quote: Thereâs something about shadows because you make your own mind up about whatâs lurking in them.
quotes.author: Richard O'Brien

quotes.quote: A lurking pun is the worst pun, one the offender has been waiting to spring on you.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: The scariest monsters are the ones that lurk within our souls...
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Always check your hats before donning them. You never know what might be lurking inside.
quotes.author: Marissa Meyer

quotes.quote: True monsters are not those lurking under the bed, but the ones sleeping in it.
quotes.author: Silje Akselberg Iversen

quotes.quote: What would an ocean be without a monster lurking in the dark? It would be like sleep without dreams.
quotes.author: Werner Herzog

quotes.quote: Every man has a lurking wish to appear considerable in his native place.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Behind every successful man lurks a truly amazed ex-mother-in-law.
quotes.author: John Chrusciel

quotes.quote: Tomorrow lurks in us, the latency to be all that was not achieved before.
quotes.author: Loren Eiseley

quotes.quote: I feel that there is reason lurking in you somewhere, so we will patiently grope round for it.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle Sr.

quotes.quote: There is a lurking fear that some things are not 'meant' to be known, that some inquiries are too dangerous for human beings to make.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Whatever may be the tensions and the stresses of a particular day, there is always lurking close at hand the trailing beauty of forgotten joy or unremembered peace.
quotes.author: Howard Thurman

quotes.quote: Truth is what every man sees lurking at the bottom of his own soul, like the oyster shell housewives put in the kitchen kettle to collect the lime from the water. By and by each manâs iridescent oyster shell of Truth becomes coated with the lime of prejudice and hearsay.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: Let all the poisons that lurk in the mud, Hatch out.
quotes.author: Tiberius

quotes.quote: In every cradle decked with rosy wreath lurk germs of death.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: We live in a world of constant juxtaposition between joy that's possible and pain that's all too common. We hope for love and success and abundance, but we never quite forget that there is always lurking the possibility of disaster.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: There's no love more intense than the love we have for our kids - and where there is intense love, there is also intense fear lurking beneath the surface.
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.quote: In their vanity men focus on what they wish to hear and miss the hidden meaning, the lurking threat.
quotes.author: David Hewson

quotes.quote: 'Lurking' is one metaphor that the Omniscience has allowed us to borrow.
quotes.author: Larry Wall

quotes.quote: There's a snake lurking in the grass.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: Failure is the foundation of success: success is the lurking place of failure.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Reality is like a fruitcake; pretty enough to look at but with all sorts of nasty things lurking just beneath the surface.
quotes.author: A. Lee Martinez

quotes.quote: The more we are filled with thoughts of lust the less we find true romantic love.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: Lust is to the other passions what the nervous fluid is to life; it supports them all, lends strength to them all ambition, cruelty, avarice, revenge, are all founded on lust.
quotes.author: Marquis De Sade

quotes.quote: Lust is a thing of the blood. Doesn't need head or heart.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: Lust is the difference between loving someone and being in love with someone.
quotes.author: Teresa Mummert

quotes.quote: Lust has less logic than love, sometimes, but it's easier to fight.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Lust is a sharp spur to vice, which always putteth the affections into a false gallop.
quotes.author: Saint Ambrose

quotes.quote: Of the seven deadly sins, lust is definitely the pick of the litter.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Lust, forgetful of future suffering, hurries us along the forbidden path.
quotes.author: Claudian

quotes.quote: Lust is the craving for salt of a man who is dying of thirst.
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: Lust is a poor, weak, whimpering, whispering thing compared with that richness and energy of desire which will arise when lust has been killed.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Lust is the cause of generation.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Lust is an immoderate wantonness of the flesh, a sweet poison, a cruel pestilence; a pernicious poison, which weakeneth the body of man, and effeminateth the strength of the heroic mind.
quotes.author: Francis Quarles

quotes.quote: Lust is, of all the frailties of our nature, what most we ought to fear; the headstrong beast rushes along, impatient of the course; nor hears the rider's call, nor feels the rein.
quotes.author: Nicholas Rowe

quotes.quote: Lust is a pleasure bought with pains, a delight hatched with disquiet, a content passed with fear, and a sin finished with sorrow.
quotes.author: Demonax

quotes.quote: Beware of lust; it corrupteth both the body and the mind.
quotes.author: Zoroaster

quotes.quote: Among absent lovers, ardor always fares better.
quotes.author: Sextus Propertius

quotes.quote: To burn with desire and keep quiet about it is the greatest punishment we can bring on ourselves.
quotes.author: Federico Garcia Lorca

quotes.quote: Lust is a tool, desire a trap. Wield the first, and you can take someone's soul. Fall into the second, and they can take yours.
quotes.author: Riley Shane

quotes.quote: Craving, not having, is the mother of a reckless giving of oneself.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Sex is the consolation you have when you can't have love.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: The human body is the best work of art.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: Lust's passion will be served; it demands, it militates, it tyrannizes.
quotes.author: Marquis De Sade

quotes.quote: Men get laid, but women get screwed.
quotes.author: A.G. Hall

quotes.quote: I think I could fall madly in bed with you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sex without love is an empty experience, but as empty experiences go it's one of the best.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Desire is in men a hunger, in women only an appetite.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Lust is an enemy to the purse, a foe to the person, a canker to the mind, a corrosive to the conscience, a weakness of the wit, a besotter of the senses, and finally, a mortal bane to all the body.
quotes.author: Pliny

quotes.quote: Lust will curdle like milk if you don't keep using it up.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I admit, I have a tremendous sex drive. My boyfriend lives forty miles away.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: If it is the dirty element that gives pleasure to the act of lust, then the dirtier it is, the more pleasurable it is bound to be.
quotes.author: Marquis De Sade

quotes.quote: It's a luxury to be understood.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The greatest luxury is being free.
quotes.author: Manolo Blahnik

quotes.quote: Luxury is more deadly than any foe.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Art is a luxury but also a necessity.
quotes.author: Edwidge Danticat

quotes.quote: Happy endings are a luxury of fiction.
quotes.author: Trudi Canavan

quotes.quote: The past is the luxury of proprietors.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Morality is a private and costly luxury.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: Pessimism is the luxury of the powerful.
quotes.author: Fatima Mernissi

quotes.quote: Luxury destroys more efficiently than war.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Luxury ruins republics; poverty, monarchies.
quotes.author: Charles de Montesquieu

quotes.quote: It is only to the happy that tears are a luxury.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: You can't afford the luxury of a negative thought.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: Poverty is an expensive luxury. We cannot afford it.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Class structures are a luxury that we cannot afford.
quotes.author: H. Rap Brown

quotes.quote: When you dance you can enjoy the luxury of being you.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The future is the most expensive luxury in the world.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: Luxury must be comfortable, otherwise it is not luxury.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Real luxury is time and opportunity to read for pleasure.
quotes.author: Jane Brody

quotes.quote: Pessimism is a luxury that a Jew can never allow himself.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: Luxury is the ease of a t-shirt in a very expensive dress.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Sometimes choice is a luxury that fate does not afford us.
quotes.author: Jasper Fforde

quotes.quote: Luxury is the income tax of vanity. But it is so pleasant.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Literacy is not a luxury, it is a right and a responsibility.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: The less luxury there is in a republic, the more it is perfect.
quotes.author: Baron de Montesquieu

quotes.quote: Luxury is about pleasing yourself, not dressing for other people.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: Luxury is not a necessity to me, but beautiful and good things are.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: The only luxury is time. The time you get to spend with your family.
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: Luxury is a state of mind.
quotes.author: L'Wren Scott

quotes.quote: Reading is my greatest luxury.
quotes.author: Louise Brown

quotes.quote: Luxury is experiencing reality.
quotes.author: Chogyam Trungpa

quotes.quote: Hard truths can be dealt with, triumphed over, but lies will destroy your soul.
quotes.author: Patricia Briggs

quotes.quote: Never to lie is to have no lock to your door, you are never wholly alone.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: A lie with a purpose is one of the worst kind, and the most profitable.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Lying to ourselves is more deeply ingrained than lying to others.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: Liars are always most disposed to swear
quotes.author: Vittorio Alfieri

quotes.quote: Sometimes you can learn things from the way a person denies something. The choice of lies can be almost as helpful as the truth.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: The man who lies to himself and listens to his own lie comes to such a pass that he cannot distinguish the truth within him.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: Truth is treason in the empire of lies.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.quote: Someone who always has to lie discovers that every one of his lies is true.
quotes.author: Elias Canetti

quotes.quote: I'm not upset that you lied to me, I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The great mass of people will more easily fall victems to a big lie than to a small one.
quotes.author: Adolph Hitler

quotes.quote: They all lie, from the top man down to the bottom. If their lips are moving, a lie is unfolding.
quotes.author: William Rivers Pitt

quotes.quote: A man would rather have a hundred lies told of him than one truth which he does not wish should be known.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Statistics don't lie, but liars use statistics
quotes.author: James B. and Hannah Yoseph

quotes.quote: It is a problem for me that I am part of a profession that is systematically lying to people.
quotes.author: Dr Mark Donohoe

quotes.quote: Never chase a lie. Let it alone, and it will run itself to death. I can work out a good character much faster than anyone can lie me out of it
quotes.author: Lyman Beecher

quotes.quote: Never hide things from hardcore thinkers. They get more aggravated, more provoked by confusion than the most painful truths.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The closer to the truth, the better the lie, and the truth itself, when it can be used, is the best lie.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: No one believes a liar. Even when she's telling the truth.
quotes.author: Sara Shepard

quotes.quote: The men the American people admire most extravagantly are the most daring liars; the men they detest most violently are those who try to tell them the truth.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Understand that the tongue can conceal the truth, but the eyes--never!
quotes.author: Mikhail Bulgakov

quotes.quote: Of all the liars in the world, sometimes the worst are your own fears.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: It was easier to lie with a gesture than a word.
quotes.author: Smauel R. Delany

quotes.quote: Lying is done with words and also with silence.
quotes.author: Adrienne Rich

quotes.quote: A lie that is half-truth is the darkest of all lies.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: A lie would have no sense unless the truth were felt as dangerous.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: A lie has no legs, and cannot stand; but it has wings, and can fly far and wide.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: A man is never more truthful than when he acknowledges himself a liar.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You may tell the greatest lies and wear a brilliant disguise, but you can't escape the eyes of the one who sees right through you.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: The most mischievous liars are those who keep on the verge of truth.
quotes.author: Eliza Cook
